[03] ^b^niccaṃ pariharitabbattā^eb^ti sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṃ viya ekadāva ananuyuñjitvā sabbakālaṃ pariharaṇīyattā anuyuñjitabbattā. ^b^evamādiguṇasamannāgata^eb^nti piyabhāvādīhi guṇehi sampannaṃ. kalyāṇamitto hi saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno. tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ, kammaphalañca, tena sammāsambodhiyā hetubhūtaṃ sattesu hitesitaṃ na pariccajati. sīlasampattiyā sattānaṃ piyo hoti garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo, sutasampattiyā saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ gambhīrānaṃ kathānaṃ kattā hoti, cāgasampattiyā appiccho hoti ^a^V1.0112^ea^ santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho, vīriyasampattiyā āraddhavīriyo hoti attahitaparahitapaṭipattiyaṃ, satisampattiyā ^a^M1.0120^ea^ upaṭṭhitassati hoti, samādhisampattiyā avikkhitto samāhitacitto, paññāsampattiyā aviparītaṃ pajānāti. so satiyā kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samannesamāno paññāya sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā samādhinā tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena satte ahitaṃ nisedhetvā hite niyojeti. tena vuttaṃ ``piyo...pe0... niyojakoti evamādiguṇasamannāgata''nti.

[03] taṃ pana kalyāṇamittaṃ paramukkaṃsagataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``mamaṃ hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^kārakabhāvaṃ^eb^ yogakammassa. ^b^pakāseti^eb^ attānaṃ paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanena samuttejanāya, sampahaṃsanāya ca, nanu kathesi paveṇipālanatthanti adhippāyo. ^b^evarūpo^eb^ti pesalo hutvā bahussuto. ^b^tantidharo^eb^ti suttadharo tattha kehicipi asaṃhīro. ^b^vaṃsānurakkhako^eb^ti buddhānubuddhavaṃsassa anurakkhako. ^b^paveṇipālako^eb^ti paveṇiyā ācariyuggahaṇassa anupālako. ^b^ācariyamatiko^eb^ti ācariyamatiyaṃ niyutto tassā anativattanato. na attanomatiṃ pakāseti kathetīti ^b^na attanomatiko,^eb^ attano matiṃ paggayha vattā na hotīti attho.

[03] ``pubbe vuttakhīṇāsavādayo''tiādi ekaccakhīṇāsavato bahussutova kammaṭṭhānadāne seyyoti dassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^pubbe vuttakhīṇāsavādayo^eb^ti ``yaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetukāmo''tiādinā vuttakhīṇāsavādikā. ^b^uggahaparipucchānaṃ visodhitattā^eb^ti uggahetabbato ``uggaho''ti laddhanāmāya kammaṭṭhānupakārāya pāḷiyā, tadatthaṃ paripucchanato ``paripucchā''ti laddhasamaññāya atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya ca visesato sodhitattā niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā gahitattā. ^b^ito cito ca suttañca kāraṇañca sallakkhetvā^eb^ti pañcasupi nikāyesu ito cito ca tassa tassa kammaṭṭhānassa anurūpaṃ suttapadañceva suttānugataṃ yuttiñca suṭṭhu upalakkhetvā. ^b^sappāyāsappāyaṃ yojetvā^eb^ti yassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhati, tassa upakārānupakāraṃ yuttiṃ magganena yojetvā, samādāya vā sammadeva hadaye ṭhapetvāti attho. ^b^mahāmaggaṃ dassento^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānavidhiṃ mahāmaggaṃ katvā dassento.

[03] ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0121^ea^ tattha tattha vihāre. ^b^vattapaṭipattiṃ kurumānenā^eb^ti paviṭṭhakāle āgantukavattaṃ, nikkhamanakāle gamikavattanti yathārahaṃ taṃ taṃ vattaṃ pūrentena. ^b^sabbapārihāriyatela^eb^nti sabbesaṃ aṅgānaṃ ^a^V1.0113^ea^, sabbesaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya pariharitabbatelaṃ. ^b^ṭhapemī^eb^ti anujānāpanaṃ. yaṃ taṃ sammāvattaṃ paññattanti sambandho. ekadivasaṃ sāyaṃ vissajjitenāpīti yojanā. ^b^ārocetabbaṃ āgamanakāraṇaṃ. sappāyavelā^eb^ sarīracittānaṃ kallasamayo.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ santāne rāgassa ussannabhāvena caraṇaṃ pavatti ^b^rāgacariyā,^eb^ sā sassatāsayādayo viya daṭṭhabbā. tathā ^b^dosacariyā^eb^dayo. saṃsaggo sampayogārahavasena veditabbo, yathā ``rāgamohacariyā dosamohacariyā''tiādi. ^b^sannipāto^eb^ ekasantatipariyāpannatāvasena, yathā ``rāgadosacariyā rāgadosamohacariyā''tiādi. imā eva hi sandhāya ^b^``aparāpi catasso''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^tathā^eb^ti yathā rāgādīnaṃ, tathā saddhādīnaṃ ^b^saṃsaggasannipātavasena^eb^ saddhābuddhicariyā saddhāvitakkacariyā buddhivitakkacariyā saddhābuddhivitakkacariyāti. imā aparāpi catasso. ^b^eva^eb^nti saṃsaggasannipātavasena. ^b^saṃsagga^eb^nti saṃsajjanaṃ missīkaraṇaṃ ``rāgasaddhācariyā dosasaddhācariyā''tiādinā. ^b^anekā^eb^ti tesaṭṭhi, tato atirekāpi vā, tā pana asammohantena ^b^saṃyuttasuttaṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ vitthārato dassitāti tattha vuttanayena veditabbā. ^b^``pakatī''^eb^ti iminā asati paṭipakkhabhāvanāyaṃ tattha tattha santāne cariyāya sabhāvabhūtataṃ dasseti. ^b^ussannatā^eb^ aññadhammehi rāgādīnaṃ adhikatā, yato rāgacariyādīnaṃ paccayasamavāye rāgādayo balavanto honti, abhiṇhañca pavattanti. ^b^tāsaṃ vasenā^eb^ti channaṃ mūlacariyānaṃ vasena ^b^chaḷeva puggalā honti^eb^. aññathā anekapuggalā siyuṃ, tathā ca sati adhippetatthasiddhi ca na siyāti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^saddhā balavatī hoti^eb^ rāgussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa niyogato adhikabhāvasambhavato. tenāha ^b^``rāgassa āsannaguṇattā''^eb^ti, sinehapariyesanāpariccajanehi sabhāgadhammattāti attho. sabhāgo hi dūrepi āsanneyevāti sabhāgatālakkhaṇamidha āsannaggahaṇaṃ. tattha saddhāya siniyhanaṃ pasādavasena akālussiyaṃ alūkhatā ^a^M1.0122^ea^, rāgassa pana rañjanavasena. saddhāya pariyesanaṃ adhimuccanavasena tanninnatā, rāgassa taṇhāyanavasena. saddhāya apariccajanaṃ okappanavasena anupakkhandanaṃ, rāgassa abhisaṅgavasenāti evaṃ bhinnasabhāvānampi ^a^V1.0114^ea^ tesaṃ yathā alūkhatādisāmaññena sabhāgatā, evaṃ taṃsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha ^b^``rāgacaritassa saddhācarito sabhāgo''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^paññā balavatī hoti^eb^ dosussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa niyogato adhikabhāvasambhavato. tenāha ^b^``dosassa āsannaguṇattā''^eb^ti, anallīyanapariyesanaparivajjanehi sabhāgadhammattāti attho. tattha paññāya ārammaṇassa anallīyanaṃ tassa yathāsabhāvāvabodhavasena visaṃsaṭṭhatā, dosassa pana byāpajjanavasena. paññāya pariyesanaṃ yathābhūtadosapavicayo, dosassa abhūtadosanijigīsā. paññāya parivajjanaṃ nibbindanādivasena ñāṇutrāso, dosassa ahitādhānavasena chaḍḍananti evaṃ bhinnasabhāvānampi tesaṃ yathā anallīyanādisāmaññena sabhāgatā, evaṃ taṃsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha ^b^``dosacaritassa buddhicarito sabhāgo''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^antarāyakarā vitakkā^eb^ti micchāvitakkā micchāsaṅkappā uppajjanti mohussanne santāne tadanuguṇassa dhammassa yebhuyyena pavattisabbhāvato. tenāha ^b^``mohassa āsannalakkhaṇattā''^eb^ti, anavaṭṭhānacañcalabhāvehi sabhāgadhammattāti attho. tattha vitakkassa anavaṭṭhānaṃ parikappavasena savipphāratāya, mohassa sammūḷhatāvasena byākulatāya. tathā vitakkassa lahuparivitakkanena tadaṅgacalatāya cañcalatā, mohassa anogāḷhatāyāti evaṃ bhinnasabhāvānampi tesaṃ yathā anavaṭṭhānādisāmaññena sabhāgatā, evaṃ taṃsamaṅgīnampi puggalānanti āha ^b^``mohacaritassa vitakkacarito sabhāgo''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^taṇhā rāgoyeva^eb^ sabhāvato, tasmā rāgacariyāvinimuttā taṇhācariyā natthīti attho. ^b^taṃsampayutto^eb^ti tena rāgena sampayutto, dosādayo viya tena vippayutto natthīti adhippāyo. ^b^tadubhaya^eb^nti taṇhāmānadvayaṃ. ^b^nātivattatī^eb^ti sabhāvato, sampayogavasena ca na atikkamitvā vaṭṭati. kāmañcettha yathā rāgadosehi sampayogavasena saha ^a^M1.0123^ea^ vattamānassapi mohassa ussannatāvasena visuṃ cariyābhāvo, na kevalaṃ mohasseva, tathā saddhābuddhivitakkānaṃ. evaṃ rāgena satipi sampayoge mānassāpi visuṃ cariyābhāvo yutto siyā, evaṃ santepi rāgapaṭighamānadiṭṭhivicikicchāvijjānaṃ viya anusayaṭṭho imesaṃ rāgādīnaṃyeva āveṇiko cariyaṭṭhoti, nattheva mānacariyā. yato cariyā ``pakatī''ti vuttā. pakati ca sabhāvoti. eteneva diṭṭhiyāpi visuṃ cariyābhāvābhāvo saṃvaṇṇitoti daṭṭhabbo. ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana mohacariyantogadhāva ^a^V1.0115^ea^ diṭṭhicariyāti dassetuṃ ^b^``mohanidānattā cā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ca^eb^-saddena sampayogaṃ samuccinoti mohanidānattā, mohasampayuttattā cāti.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ ^b^kiṃ sappāya^eb^nti kīdisaṃ senāsanādisappāyaṃ. ^b^pubbāciṇṇaṃ^eb^ purimajātīsu ācaritaṃ. ^b^ekacce^eb^ti ^b^upatissattheraṃ^eb^ sandhāyāha. tena hi ^b^vimuttimagge^eb^ tathā vuttaṃ. ^b^pubbe kirā^eb^ti ^b^kira^eb^-saddo arucisūcanattho. ^b^iṭṭhappayogo^eb^ manāpakiriyā. ^b^subhakammabahulo^eb^ yebhuyyena sobhanakammakārī. na sabbe rāgacaritā eva honti, aluddhānampi pubbe iṭṭhappayogasubhakammabahulatāsambhavato, saggā cavitvā idhūpapattisambhavato ca. etena asati pubbahetuniyāme yathāvuttakāraṇamattena na tesaṃ luddhatā, luddhabhāvahetukā ca rāgacariyāti imamatthaṃ dasseti.

[03] ^b^itare^eb^ti chedanādikammabahulā nirayādito idhūpapannā ca na sabbe dosamohacaritā eva hontīti yojanā. idhāpi yathāvuttakāraṇassa kodhanabhāve, mūḷhabhāve ca anekantikattā dosamohacaritatāyapi anekaṃsikatā veditabbā. dhātūnaṃ ussadaniyamo yadi pamāṇato, so natthi, atha sāmatthiyato, sopi ekaṃsiko na upalabbhatīti dassento āha ^b^``yathāvutteneva nayena ussadaniyamo nāma natthī''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^yathāvuttenevā^eb^ti ``dvinnaṃ pana dhātūna''ntiādinā vuttappakāreneva. ^b^dosaniyame^eb^ti semhādidosādhikatāya rāgādicarito hotīti dosavasena cariyāniyame ``semhādhiko rāgacarito''ti vatvā puna ``semhādhiko mohacarito''ti, ``vātādhiko mohacarito''ti vatvā puna ``vātādhiko rāgacarito''ti ca vuttattā ^b^tampi^eb^ dosavasena niyamavacanaṃ ^b^pubbāparaviruddhameva^eb^. ^b^aparicchinnavacana^eb^nti ^a^M1.0124^ea^ paricchedakārikāya paññāya na paricchinditvā vuttavacanaṃ, anupaparikkhitavacananti attho.

[03] ^b^ussadakittane^eb^ti vipākakathāyaṃ gahitaussadakittane. ^b^pubbahetuniyāmenā^eb^ti purimabhave pavattalobhādihetuniyāmena. ^b^niyāmo^eb^ti ca tesaṃyeva lobhādīnaṃ paṭiniyato lubbhanādisabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. lobho ussado etesanti ^b^lobhussadā,^eb^ ussannalobhā, lobhādhikāti attho. ^b^amohussadā cā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. tena ye ime lobhussadatādīnaṃ paccekaṃ vomissato ca cuddasa pabhedā icchitā, te anavasesato sampiṇḍeti yathāvuttesu chasveva tesaṃ antogadhattā. phalabhūtā cettha lobhussadatādayo daṭṭhabbā.

[03] idāni ^a^V1.0116^ea^ taṃ nesaṃ lobhussadatādīnaṃ paccekaṃ vomissakatādiṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^``yassa hī''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^kammāyūhanakkhaṇe^eb^ti kammakaraṇavelāyaṃ. ^b^lobho balavā^eb^ti lobho tajjāya paccayasāmaggiyā sāmatthiyato adhiko hoti. ^b^alobho mando^eb^ti tappaṭipakkho alobho dubbalo. kathaṃ panete lobhālobhā aññamaññaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā ekakkhaṇe pavattantīti? na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ``ekakkhaṇe pavattantī''ti. nikantikkhaṇaṃ pana āyūhanapakkhiyameva katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ. eseva nayo sesesupi. ^b^pariyādātu^eb^nti abhibhavituṃ ^b^na sakkoti^eb^. yo hi ``evaṃsundaraṃ evaṃvipulaṃ evaṃmahagghañca na sakkā dātu''ntiādinā amuttacāgatādivasena pavattāya cetanāya sampayutto alobho, so sammadeva lobhaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti. dosamohānaṃ anuppattiyā, tādisapaccayalābhena ca ^b^adosāmohā balavanto. tasmā^eb^ti lobhādosāmohānaṃ balavabhāvato, alobhadosamohānañca dubbalabhāvatoti vuttameva kāraṇaṃ paccāmasati. ^b^so^eb^ti taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo. ^b^tena kammenā^eb^ti tena lobhādiupanissayavatā kusalakammunā. ^b^sukhasīlo^eb^ti sakhilo. tamevatthaṃ ^b^``akkodhano''^eb^ti pariyāyena vadati.

[03] ^b^purimanayenevā^eb^ti pubbe vuttanayānusārena mandā alobhādosā lobhadose pariyādātuṃ na sakkonti, amoho pana balavā mohaṃ pariyādātuṃ sakkotīti evaṃ tattha tattha vāre yathārahaṃ atidesattho ^a^M1.0125^ea^ veditabbo. ^b^duṭṭho^eb^ti kodhano. ^b^dandho^eb^ti mandapañño. ^b^sīlako^eb^ti sukhasīlo.

[03] ettha ca lobhavasena, dosamohalobhadosalobhamohadosamohalobhadosamohavasenāti tayo ekakā, tayo dukā, eko tikoti lobhādiussadavasena akusalapakkheyeva satta vārā, tathā kusalapakkhe alobhādiussadavasenāti cuddasa vārā labbhanti. tattha alobhadosāmohā, alobhādosamohā, alobhadosamohā balavantoti āgatehi kusalapakkhe tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi dosussadamohussadadosamohussadavārā gahitā eva honti, tathā akusalapakkhe lobhādosamohā, lobhadosāmohā, lobhādosāmohā balavantoti āgatehi tatiyadutiyapaṭhamavārehi adosussadāmohussadādosāmohussadavārā gahitā evāti akusalakusalapakkhesu tayo tayo vāre antogadhe katvā aṭṭheva vārā dassitā. ye pana ubhayesaṃ missatāvasena lobhālobhussadavārādayo apare ekūnapaññāsa vārā dassetabbā, te alabbhanato eva na dassitā. na hi ekasmiṃ santāne antarena avatthantaraṃ ``lobho ca balavā, alobho cā''tiādi yujjatīti, paṭipakkhavasena vā hi etesaṃ balavadubbalabhāvo, sahajātadhammavasena ^a^V1.0117^ea^ vā. tattha lobhassa tāva paṭipakkhavasena alobhena anadhibhūtatāya balavabhāvo, tathā dosamohānaṃ adosāmohehi. alobhādīnaṃ pana lobhādiabhibhavanato, sabbesañca samānajātiyamabhibhuyya pavattivasena sahajātadhammato balavabhāvo. tena vuttaṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ``lobho balavā alobho mando, adosāmohā balavanto dosamohā mandā''ti. so ca nesaṃ mandabalavabhāvo purimūpanissayato tathā āsayassa paribhāvitatāya veditabbo.

[03] ^b^yo luddhoti vutto^eb^ti yo ussadakittane ``luddho''ti vutto, ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ idha cariyāvicāre ^b^``rāgacarito''^eb^ti veditabbo. ^b^duṭṭhadandhā^eb^ti ``duṭṭho, dandho''ti ca vuttā yathākkamaṃ ^b^dosamohacaritā. paññavā^eb^ti sātisayaṃ sappañño. yato saddhāvitakkesu vijjamānesupi ^b^buddhicarito^eb^ti vuccati. alobhādosānaṃ ^a^M1.0126^ea^ balavabhāvo saddhūpanissayatāya vinā na hotīti āha ^b^``aluddhāduṭṭhā pasannapakatitāya saddhācaritā''^eb^ti.

[03] ayañca nayo sādhāraṇato vuttoti nibbattitapubbahetuniyāmavaseneva buddhicaritādikepi dassetuṃ ^b^``yathā vā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^amohaparivārenā^eb^ti amohaparikkhittena, upanissayato sampayogato ca paññāya abhisaṅkhatenāti attho. sesapadattayepi eseva nayo. ^b^lobhādinā vomissaparivārenā^eb^ti ettha lobhamohādinā aññamaññāviruddhavomissaparivārenāti attho. avirodho ca yugaggāhavasena appavattiyā veditabbo. tathā hi saddhānusāridhammānusārigottāni aññamaññampi bhinnasabhāvāneva. ekaṃsena ca missakacariyāpi sampaṭicchitabbā pubbahetuniyāmena cariyāsiddhito. tathā ceva ussadakittanaṃ pavattaṃ yathārahaṃ lobhālobhādīnaṃ vipākassa paccayabhāvato. tenāha ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge^eb^ (paṭi0 ma0 1.232) --

[02] ``gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti? kusalakammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti, tena vuccati kusalamūlapaccayāpi saṅkhārā. nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti, tena vuccati akusalamūlapaccayāpi saṅkhārā. paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti, tena vuccati nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayāpi nāmarūpa''nti --

[25] ādi ^a^V1.0118^ea^. pubbahetuniyāmena ca yathā tihetukassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ, na tathā duhetukassa. yathā ca duhetukassa itikattabbatā nepakkaṃ, na tathā ahetukassa. evaṃ lobhussadādayo puggalā rāgacaritādayo hontīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti. yathāvuttamatthaṃ nigamavasena dassetuṃ ^b^``evaṃ lobhādīsū''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0127^ea^ tasmiṃ pucchāvacane. ^b^nayo^eb^ti jānananayo. puggalādhiṭṭhānena vuttopi attho dhammamukheneva paññāyatīti dhammādhiṭṭhānenāha ^b^``cariyāyo vibhāvaye''^eb^ti. ^b^pakatigamanenā^eb^ti akittimena sabhāvagamanena. ^b^cāturiyenā^eb^ti cāturabhāvena siṅgārena. ^b^ukkuṭika^eb^nti asamphuṭṭhamajjhaṃ. ^b^khaṇanto viyā^eb^ti bhūmiṃ khaṇanto viya. ^b^anukaḍḍhita^eb^nti pādanikkhepasamaye kaḍḍhanto viya pādaṃ nikkhipati. tenassa padaṃ anukaḍḍhitaṃ pacchato añchitaṃ hoti. ^b^paribyākulāyā^eb^ti parito āluḷitāya. ^b^chambhito viyā^eb^ti vitthāyanto viya. bhīto viyāti keci. ^b^sahasānupīḷita^eb^nti aggapādena, paṇhiyā ca sahasāva sannirujjhitaṃ. ^b^vivaṭṭacchadassā^eb^ti vinivaṭṭacchadanassa pahīnakilesassa. ^b^idamīdisaṃ pada^eb^nti bhagavato padaṃ disvā vadati.

[03] ^b^pāsādika^eb^nti pasādāvahaṃ. ^b^madhurākāra^eb^nti iṭṭhākāraṃ. ^b^thaddhākāra^eb^nti thambhitākāraṃ. ^b^ataramāno^eb^ti nataramāno, saṇikanti attho. ^b^samodhāyā^eb^ti sammadeva odhāya avikkhipitvā. ^b^nipajjitvā^eb^ti kāyapasāraṇalakkhaṇāya nipajjāya seyyāya nipajjitvā ^b^sayati^eb^ niddāyati. ^b^pakkhittakāyo^eb^ti avakkhittakāyo avaso viya sahasā patitakāyo. ^b^dussaṇṭhāna^eb^nti virūpasannivesaṃ. ^b^vikkhittakāyo^eb^ti ito cito ca khittāṅgapaccaṅgo.
[03] ^b^samparivattaka^eb^nti samparivattitvā. ^b^āloḷayamāno^eb^ vālikākacavarāni ākulayanto.

[03] ^b^nipuṇamadhurasamasakkaccakārī^eb^ti sukosallaṃ sundaraṃ avisamaṃ sābhisaṅkhārañca karaṇasīlo. ^b^gāḷhathaddhavisamakārī^eb^ti thiraṃ asithilaṃ visamañca karaṇasīlo. ^b^aparicchinnaṃ^eb^ apariniṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] ^b^mukhapūraka^eb^nti mukhassa pūraṇaṃ mahantaṃ. ^b^arasapaṭisaṃvedī^eb^ti narasapaṭisaṃvedī. ^b^bhājane chaḍḍento^eb^ti bhojanabhājane sitthāni chaḍḍento. ^b^mukhaṃ makkhento^eb^ti bahimukhaṃ makkhento.
[03] ^b^kilantarūpo^eb^ ^a^V1.0119^ea^ ^b^viyā^eb^ti tassa asahanena khedappatto viya. ^b^aññāṇupekkhāyā^eb^ti aññāṇabhūtāya upekkhāya. aññāṇasaṅkhātāya upekkhāyāti keci.

[03] ^b^māyā^eb^dīsu ^a^M1.0128^ea^ santadosapaṭicchadanalakkhaṇā ^b^māyā^eb^. asantaguṇapakāsanalakkhaṇaṃ ^b^sāṭheyyaṃ^eb^. unnatilakkhaṇo ^b^māno^eb^. asantaguṇasambhāvanāmukhena paṭiggahaṇe amattaññutālakkhaṇā ^b^pāpicchatā^eb^. santaguṇasambhāvanāmukhena paṭiggahaṇe amattaññutālakkhaṇā ^b^mahicchatā^eb^. sakalābhena asantussanalakkhaṇā ^b^asantuṭṭhitā^eb^. vijjhanaṭṭhena ^b^siṅgaṃ,^eb^ siṅgāratānāgarikabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ kilesasiṅgaṃ. attano sarīrassa, cīvarādiparikkhārassa ca maṇḍanavasena pavattaṃ loluppaṃ ^b^cāpalyaṃ. evamādayo^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ahirikānottappamadappamādādayo saṅgayhanti.

[03] parāparādhassa upanayhanalakkhaṇo ^b^upanāho^eb^. paresaṃ guṇamakkhaṇalakkhaṇo ^b^makkho^eb^. parassa guṇe ḍaṃsitvā apanento viya yugaggāhalakkhaṇo ^b^paḷāso^eb^. parasampattiusūyanalakkhaṇā ^b^issā^eb^. attasampattinigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ ^b^macchariyaṃ^eb^. idha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena dovacassatāpāpamittatādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[03] anussāhanaṃ ^b^thinaṃ^eb^. asattivighāto ^b^middhaṃ^eb^. cetaso avūpasamo ^b^uddhaccaṃ^eb^. vippaṭisāro ^b^kukkuccaṃ^eb^. saṃsayo ^b^vicikicchā^eb^. ayoniso daḷhaggāho ^b^ādhānaggāhitā^eb^. yathāgahitassa micchāgāhassa dubbiveṭhiyatā ^b^duppaṭinissaggiyatā^eb^. idha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena muṭṭhasaccāsampajaññādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
[03] ^b^muttacāgatā^eb^ti vissaṭṭhacāgatā nissaṅgapariccāgo. yathā māyādayo, tathā pavattā akusalakkhandhā, yathā ^b^ariyānaṃ dassanakāmatā^eb^dayo, tathā pavattā kusalakkhandhā veditabbā.

[01] ^b^pasādanīyaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ nāma vatthuttayaṃ. ^b^saṃvejanīyaṭṭhānāni^eb^ jātiādīni. ^b^kusalānuyoge^eb^ti kusaladhammabhāvanāyaṃ. ``evañca evañca karissāmī''ti kiccānaṃ rattibhāge parivitakkanaṃ ^b^rattiṃ dhūmāyanā^eb^. tathāvitakkitānaṃ tesaṃ divasabhāge anuṭṭhānaṃ ^b^divā pajjalanā. hurāhuraṃ dhāvanā^eb^ti ito cito ca tattha tattha ārammaṇe cittavosaggo. tenevāha ``idaṃ pure cittamacāri cārikaṃ, yenicchakaṃ ^a^V1.0120^ea^ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukha''nti (dha0 pa0 326), ``cittamassa vidhāvatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.55) ca.

[03] dhammappavattidassanādi ^a^M1.0129^ea^ ca pāḷiyaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyañca anāgatamevāti na sakkā vattunti ^b^``sabbākārenā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. kiñci kiñci āgatampi atthevāti hi adhippāyo. ``na sārato paccetabba''nti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^``rāgacaritassa hī''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^appamādavihārino^eb^ti tattha vinidhāya bhāvaṃ paṭipajjanena appamādakārino. ^b^bhinnalakkhaṇā iriyāpathādayo^eb^ti cāturiyena acāturiyena saṇikaṃ, sahasā ca gamanādayo. ^b^na upapajjantī^eb^ti na yujjanti. ^b^pucchitvā jānitabba^eb^nti dhammappavattiādiṃ pucchitvā jānitabbaṃ.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ ^b^sappāyaṃ^eb^ hitaṃ, kilesavighātīti attho. ^b^adhotavedika^eb^nti aparisuddhaparikkhepavedikaṃ. ^b^bhūmaṭṭhaka^eb^nti bhūmitaleyeva uṭṭhāpitaṃ uparimatalarahitaṃ. ekato onatassa pabbatapādassa heṭṭhābhāgo akatabhittibhūmiparikammo ^b^akatapabbhāro. jatukābharita^eb^nti adhomukhāhi olambamānamukhāhi khuddakavaggulīhi paripuṇṇaṃ. ^b^oluggavilugga^eb^nti chinnabhinnaṃ. ^b^ujjaṅgalaṃ^eb^ lūkhadhūsaraṃ chāyūdakarahitaṃ. sīhabyagghādibhayena ^b^sāsaṅkaṃ. durūpa^eb^nti virūpaṃ. ^b^dubbaṇṇa^eb^nti asundaravaṇṇaṃ, dussaṇṭhānaṃ vā. jālākārena katapūvaṃ ^b^jālapūvaṃ. sāṇi viya kharasamphassa^eb^nti sāṇiphalako viya dukkhasamphassaṃ. bhārikabhāvena, antarantarā tunnakaraṇena ca ^b^kicchapariharaṇaṃ. āṇigaṇṭhikāhato^eb^ti āṇinā, gaṇṭhiyā ca hatasobho. idaṃ rāgacaritassa sappāyaṃ, evamassa kilesasamudācāro na hotīti adhippāyo. eseva nayo sesesupi.

[01] ^b^disāmukha^eb^nti disābhimukhaṃ, abbhokāsābhimukhanti adhippāyo. ^b^mahākasiṇa^eb^nti mahantaṃ kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ. ^b^sesaṃ^eb^ senāsanādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ mohacaritassa, taṃ dosacaritassa vuttasadisameva.
[03] ^b^vitakkavidhāvanasseva paccayo hoti^eb^ yathā taṃ āyasmato ^b^meghiyattherassa. darīmukhe^eb^ti pabbatavivare. ^b^paritta^eb^nti suppasarāvamattaṃ.

[03] pabhedaparicchedato nidānaparicchedato vibhāvanaparicchedato sappāyaparicchedatoti paccekaṃ ^b^pariccheda^eb^-saddo yojetabbo. ^b^vibhāvanā^eb^ti ``ayaṃ rāgacarito''tiādinā jānanavibhāvanā. ekaccakasiṇānussatiṭṭhānamattassa ^a^V1.0121^ea^ pasaṅgena kathitattā vuttaṃ ^b^``na ca tāva cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ sabbākārena āvikata''^eb^nti.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅkhātaniddesato^eb^ti ^a^M1.0130^ea^ saṅkhātānaṃ ``cattālīsāyā''ti saṅkhyāvasena gahitānaṃ uddiṭṭhānaṃ niddesato. ``ettha ettakāni upacārajjhānāvahāni, ettakāni appanājjhānāvahānī''ti ^b^upacārappanāvahato^eb^. ``ettakāni ekajjhānikāni, ettakāni dukatikajjhānikāni, ettakāni sakalajjhānikānī''ti ^b^jhānappabhedato^eb^. ``etesu aṅgasamatikkamo, etesu ārammaṇasamatikkamo''ti evaṃ ^b^samatikkamato^eb^. ``ettakānettha vaḍḍhetabbāni, ettakāni na vaḍḍhetabbānī''ti ^b^vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanato. ārammaṇato^eb^ti sabhāvadhammanimittanavattabbavasena, calitācalitavasena ca ārammaṇavibhāgato. ^b^bhūmito^eb^ti kāmāvacarādibhūmivibhāgato. ^b^gahaṇato^eb^ti diṭṭhādivasena gahaṇavibhāgato. ^b^paccayato^eb^ti āruppādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ paccayabhāvato. ^b^cariyānukūlato^eb^ti rāgacariyādīnaṃ anukūlabhāvato.

[03] ^b^kammaṭṭhānānī^eb^ti ārammaṇabhāvena yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānāni. ^b^catukkajjhānikā^eb^ti catubbidharūpāvacarajjhānavanto, tesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtāti attho. catukkanayavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^tikacatukkajjhānikesū^eb^ti tikajjhānikesu purimesu brahmavihāresu, catukkajjhānikesu ānāpānakasiṇesu. ^b^sesesū^eb^ti vuttāvasesesu ekavīsatiyā kammaṭṭhānesu.

[03] dibbacakkhunā diṭṭhahadayarūpassa sattassa cittaṃ ādikammiko cetopariyañāṇena paricchindituṃ sakkoti, na itarassāti kasiṇapharaṇaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa paccayo hoti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``parasattānañca cetasā cittamaññātuṃ samattho hotī''^eb^ti. ^b^okāsena paricchinnattā^eb^ti attano ṭhitokāsena paricchinnattā. tathā uggahakosallassa sampāditattā paricchinnākāreneva tāni upatiṭṭhanti, tasmā na tattha vaḍḍhanāti adhippāyo. sace pana koci vaḍḍheyya, na tena koci guṇoti dassento āha ^b^``ānisaṃsābhāvā cā''^eb^ti. ^b^``tesu panā''^eb^tiādinā tameva ānisaṃsābhāvaṃ vivarati. yasmā vaḍḍhitesu kuṇaparāsiyeva vaḍḍhati, avaḍḍhitepi kāmarāgavikkhambhanā ^a^V1.0122^ea^ hotiyeva, tasmā ānisaṃsābhāvo. ^b^vibhūtā^eb^ti vipulārammaṇatāya supākaṭā, vaḍḍhitanimittatāya appamāṇārammaṇabhāvena paribyattāti attho.

[03] ^b^kevala^eb^nti ^a^M1.0131^ea^ sakalaṃ anavasesaṃ. ^b^``pathaviṃ ima''^eb^nti vacanaṃ upaṭṭhānākārena vuttaṃ, na nimittassa vaḍḍhanenāti adhippāyo. ^b^lābhittā^eb^ti sātisayaṃ lābhitāya, ukkaṃsagatavasibhāvatoti attho. thero hi paramāya vasipattiyā assamaṇḍale assaṃ sārento viya yattha tattha nisinnopi ṭhitopi taṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjateva. tenassa samantato nimittaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ viya upaṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``sabbadisāsū''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ^b^vuttā^eb^ti ^b^dhammasaṅgahe^eb^ vuttā. ^b^mahante^eb^ti vipule. ninnathalādivasena hi ekadese aṭṭhatvā samantato gahaṇavasena sakalasarīre nimittaṃ gaṇhantassa taṃ mahantaṃ hoti. ^b^mahante^eb^ vā sarīre. ^b^appake^eb^ti sarīrassa ekadese ^b^nimittaṃ gaṇhātī^eb^ti yojanā. ^b^appake^eb^ vā khuddake dārakasarīre. ^b^eta^eb^nti asubhanimittaṃ. ^b^ādīnava^eb^nti ``asubharāsi eva vaḍḍhati, na ca koci ānisaṃso''ti ^b^vuttaṃ^eb^ ādīnavaṃ.

[03] ^b^sesānipi na vaḍḍhetabbānī^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ upapattito vivarituṃ ^b^``kasmā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. picupiṇḍādivasena upaṭṭhahantampi nimittaṃ vātasaṅghātasannissayanti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``vātarāsiyeva vaḍḍhatī''^eb^ti. ^b^okāsena paricchinna^eb^nti nāsikaggamukhanimittādiokāsena saparicchedaṃ. vāyokasiṇavaḍḍhane viya na ettha koci guṇo, kevalaṃ vātavaḍḍhanamevāti āha ^b^``sādīnavattā''^eb^ti. ^b^tesa^eb^nti brahmavihārānaṃ. ^b^nimitta^eb^nti ārammaṇaṃ. ^b^na ca tena attho atthī^eb^ti tena sattarāsivaḍḍhanena pathavīkasiṇādivaḍḍhane viya kiñci payojanaṃ natthi. ^b^pariggahavasenā^eb^ti apariggahitassa bhāvanāvisayassa pariggahavasena, na nimittavaḍḍhanavasena. tenāha ^b^``ekāvāsadviāvāsādinā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^etthā^eb^ti brahmavihārabhāvanāyaṃ. ^b^yadaya^eb^nti yaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ ayaṃ yogī. sīmāsambhedeneva hettha upacārajjhānuppatti, na nimittuppattiyā. yadi evaṃ kathaṃ parittādiārammaṇatā jhānassāti āha ^b^``parittāppamāṇārammaṇatāpettha pariggahavasenā''^eb^ti, katipaye satte pariggahetvā pavattā mettādayo parittārammaṇā, bahuke appamāṇārammaṇāti attho. ^b^ākāsaṃ kasiṇugghāṭimattā^eb^ na vaḍḍhetabbanti yojanā. vakkhati vā yaṃ tena sambandhitabbaṃ. parikappajameva ārammaṇaṃ vaḍḍhetuṃ sakkā, na itaranti āha ^b^``na hi sakkā sabhāvadhammaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0123^ea^ ^b^vaḍḍhetu''^eb^nti ^a^M1.0132^ea^. āruppānaṃ parittāppamāṇārammaṇatā parittakasiṇugghāṭimākāse, vipulakasiṇugghāṭimākāse ca pavattiyā veditabbā. ^b^sesāni^eb^ buddhānussatiādīni dasa kammaṭṭhānāni. ^b^animittattā^eb^ti paṭibhāganimittābhāvā.

[03] ^b^paṭibhāganimittārammaṇānī^eb^ti paṭibhāganimittabhūtāni ārammaṇāni. ^b^sesāni^eb^ aṭṭhārasa. ^b^sesāni chā^eb^ti cattāro brahmavihārā, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, ākiñcaññāyatananti imāni sesāni cha. vissandamānapubbatāya ^b^vipubbakaṃ^eb^. paggharamānalohitatāya ^b^lohitakaṃ^eb^. kimīnaṃ pacalanena ^b^puḷuvakaṃ,^eb^ calitārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. vātapānavivarādīhi antopaviṭṭhassa sūriyālokādikassa calanākāro paññāyatīti ^b^obhāsamaṇḍalārammaṇa^eb^mpi calitārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^pubbabhāge^eb^ti paṭibhāganimittappavattiyā pubbabhāge. ^b^sannisinnamevā^eb^ti santaṃ niccalameva.
[03] ^b^devesū^eb^ti kāmāvacaradevesu, tattha asubhānaṃ paṭikūlassa ca āhārassa abhāvato. assāsapassāsānaṃ brahmaloke abhāvato ^b^``ānāpānassati cā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^diṭṭhenā^eb^ti diṭṭhena vatthunā kāraṇabhūtena. ^b^gahetabbānī^eb^ti uggahetabbāni, uppādetabbauggahanimittānīti attho. tenāha ^b^``pubbabhāge''^eb^tiādi. ^b^tassā^eb^ti kāyagatāsatiyā. ucchusassādīnaṃ pattesu pacalamānavaṇṇaggahaṇamukhena vā tassa gahetabbattā vuttaṃ ^b^``vāyokasiṇaṃ diṭṭhaphuṭṭhenā''^eb^ti. ^b^na ādikammikena gahetabbānī^eb^ti ādikammikena na gahetabbāni, bhāvanārambhavasena na paṭṭhapetabbāni, heṭṭhime tayo brahmavihāre, kasiṇesu rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānañca anadhigantvā sampādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
[03] ^b^imesu pana kammaṭṭhānesū^eb^ti ettha kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇena yathārahaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ, jhānānañca gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^sukhavihārassā^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa.

[03] ^b^``ekādasa kammaṭṭhānāni anukūlānī''^eb^ti ujuvipaccanīkavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. evaṃ sesesupi. vakkhati hi ``sabbañceta''ntiādi. ^b^anukūlāni^eb^ rāgavikkhambhanassa upāyabhāvato. aṭṭha anukūlānīti yojanā. evaṃ sesesu. ^b^eka^eb^nti idaṃ anussatiapekkhaṃ anussatīsu ekanti, na mohacaritavitakkacaritāpekkhaṃ tesaṃ aññassāpi anukūlassa alabbhanato ^a^V1.0124^ea^. ^b^``saddhācaritassa^eb^ ^a^M1.0133^ea^ ^b^purimā cha anussatiyo''^eb^ti idaṃ atisappāyavasena vuttaṃ. imasseva ujuvipaccanīkaṃ imassa atisappāyanti gahetabbassa visesassa abhāvato ^b^sabbacaritānaṃ anukūlāni. paritta^eb^nti sarāvamattaṃ, ^b^appamāṇa^eb^nti tato adhikapamāṇaṃ. ^b^parittaṃ^eb^ vā suppasarāvamattaṃ, ^b^appamāṇaṃ^eb^ adhikapamāṇaṃ khalamaṇḍalādikasiṇabhāvena pariggahitaṃ.

[03] ^b^cattāro dhammā^eb^ti cattāro manasikaraṇīyā dhammā. ^b^uttarī^eb^ti sīlasampadā, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyadhammassavanaṃ, vīriyaṃ; paññāti imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhānato upari. ^b^asubhā^eb^ti asubhabhāvanā ekādasasu asubhakammaṭṭhānesu bhāvanānuyogā. ^b^mettā^eb^ti anodhiso, odhiso vā pavattā mettābhāvanā. ^b^ānāpānassatī^eb^ti soḷasavatthukā ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā. ^b^vitakkupacchedāyā^eb^ti micchāvitakkānaṃ upacchindanatthāya. ^b^aniccasaññā^eb^ti ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti (a0 ni0 3.137; dha0 pa0 277; mahāni0 27) evaṃ pavattā aniccānupassanā. ^b^asmimānasamugghātāyā^eb^ti ``asmī''ti uppajjanakassa navavidhassāpi mānassa samucchindanāya. ettha hi ekasseva cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā vuttā, na ekassa catucariyatāya. tena viññāyati ``sabbānipi kammaṭṭhānāni sabbākusalavikkhambhanāni sabbakusalaparibrūhanānī''ti.

[03] ^b^ekasseva satta kammaṭṭhānāni vuttāni,^eb^ na cāyasmā rāhulo sabbacaritoti adhippāyo. ^b^vacanamatte^eb^ti ``asukakammaṭṭhānaṃ asukacaritassa anukūla''nti evaṃ vuttavacanamatte. ^b^adhippāyo^eb^ti tathāvacanassa adhippāyo. so pana ``sabbañceta''ntiādinā vibhāvito eva.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ ``piyo garū''tiādinā (a0 ni0 7.37) vuttappakāraṃ ^b^kalyāṇamittaṃ^eb^. ``attano pattacīvaraṃ sayameva gahetvā''tiādinā vuttanayena ^b^upasaṅkamitvā. somanassameva uppajjati^eb^ ``evaṃ bahuparissayoyaṃ attabhāvo ṭhāneyeva mayā niyyātito''ti. tenāha ^b^``yathā hī''^eb^tiādi.

[01] ^b^atajjanīyo^eb^ti na tajjetabbo na niggahetabbo. svāyaṃ atajjanīyabhāvo dovacassatāya vā siyā, ācariye aniviṭṭhapematāya vāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``dubbaco vā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. yo hi ācariyena tajjiyamāno kopañca dosañca apaccayañca pātukaroti, yo vā ``kimassa ^a^M1.0134^ea^ ^a^V1.0125^ea^ santike vāsenā''ti pakkamati, ayaṃ duvidhopi atajjanīyo. ^b^dhammenā^eb^ti ovādānusāsanidhammena. ^b^gūḷhaṃ gantha^eb^nti kammaṭṭhānaganthaṃ, saccapaṭiccasamuppādādisahitaṃ gambhīraṃ suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttañca.

[03] ^b^tumhākamatthāyāti vutte^eb^ti ``sataporise papāte patanena tumhākaṃ koci attho hotī''ti kenaci vutte. ^b^ghaṃsento^eb^ti ``manussakakkena tumhākaṃ koci attho''ti vutte ghaṃsento ^b^niravasesaṃ^eb^ attabhāvaṃ ^b^khepetuṃ ussaheyyaṃ^eb^. ``mama assāsapassāsanirundhanena tumhākaṃ koci rogavūpasamādiko attho atthī''ti kenaci vutte. tīhipi bhikkhūhi ācariye bhattipavedanamukhena vīriyārambho eva pavedito.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ aññattha pavattitvāpi cittaṃ āgamma yattha seti, so tassa āsayo ``migāsayo'' viya, āsayo eva ^b^ajjhāsayo^eb^. so duvidho vipanno, sampannoti. tattha vipanno sassatādimicchābhinivesanissito. sampanno duvidho vaṭṭanissito, vivaṭṭanissitoti. tesu vivaṭṭanissito ajjhāsayo ``sampannajjhāsayenā''ti idhādhippeto. idāni naṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^``alobhādīnaṃ vasenā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^chahākārehī^eb^ti alubbhanādīhi chahi ākārehi. ^b^sampannajjhāsayenā^eb^ti pubbabhāgiyānaṃ sīlasampadādīnaṃ sādhanavasena, lokuttarānaṃ upanissayabhāvena ca sampanno ajjhāsayo etassāti sampannajjhāsayo, tena. alobhādayo hi anekadosavidhamanato, anekaguṇāvahato ca sattānaṃ bahukārā visesato yogino. tathā hi alobhādayo maccheramalādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvena pavattanti. vuttaṃ hetaṃ (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 1 mūlarāsīvaṇṇanā) --

[02] ``alobho maccheramalassa paṭipakkho, adoso dussīlyamalassa, amoho kusalesu dhammesu abhāvanāya. alobho cettha dānahetu, adoso sīlahetu, amoho bhāvanāhetu. tesu ca alobhena anadhikaṃ gaṇhāti luddhassa adhikaggahaṇato, adosena anūnaṃ duṭṭhassa ūnaggahaṇato, amohena aviparītaṃ mūḷhassa viparītaggahaṇato.

[02] ``alobhena ^a^M1.0135^ea^ cettha vijjamānaṃ dosaṃ dosato dhārento dose pavattati, luddho hi dosaṃ paṭicchādeti. adosena vijjamānaṃ guṇaṃ guṇato dhārento guṇe pavattati, duṭṭho hi guṇaṃ makkheti. amohena yāthāvasabhāvaṃ yāthāvasabhāvato dhārento yāthāvasabhāve pavattati ^a^V1.0126^ea^, mūḷho hi tacchaṃ `ataccha'nti, atacchañca `taccha'nti gaṇhāti. alobhena ca piyavippayogadukkhaṃ na hoti luddhassa piyasabbhāvato, piyavippayogāsahanato ca, adosena appiyasampayogadukkhaṃ na hoti duṭṭhassa appiyasabbhāvato, appiyasampayogāsahanato ca, amohena icchitālābhadukkhaṃ na hoti, amūḷhassa hi `taṃ kutettha labbhā'ti evamādipaccavekkhaṇasabbhāvato.

[02] ``alobhena cettha jātidukkhaṃ na hoti alobhassa taṇhāpaṭipakkhato, taṇhāmūlakattā ca jātidukkhassa, adosena jarādukkhaṃ na hoti tikkhadosassa khippaṃ jarāsambhavato, amohena maraṇadukkhaṃ na hoti, sammohamaraṇañhi dukkhaṃ, na ca taṃ amūḷhassa hoti. alobhena ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ, amohena pabbajitānaṃ, adosena pana sabbesampi sukhasaṃvāsatā hoti.

[02] ``visesato cettha alobhena pettivisaye upapatti na hoti, yebhuyyena hi sattā taṇhāya pettivisayaṃ upapajjanti, taṇhāya ca paṭipakkho alobho. adosena niraye upapatti na hoti, dosena hi caṇḍajātitāya dosasadisaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti, dosassa ca paṭipakkho adoso. amohena tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbatti na hoti, mohena hi niccasammūḷhaṃ tiracchānayoniṃ upapajjanti, mohapaṭipakkho ca amoho. etesu ca alobho rāgavasena upagamanassa abhāvakaro, adoso dosavasena apagamanassa, amoho mohavasena amajjhattabhāvassa.

[02] ``tīhipi ^a^M1.0136^ea^ cetehi yathāpaṭipāṭiyā nekkhammasaññā abyāpādasaññā avihiṃsāsaññāti imā tisso, asubhasaññā appamāṇasaññā dhātusaññāti imā ca tisso saññāyo honti. alobhena pana kāmasukhallikānuyogāntassa, adosena attakilamathānuyogāntassa parivajjanaṃ hoti, amohena majjhimāya paṭipattiyā paṭipajjanaṃ. tathā alobhena abhijjhākāyaganthassa pabhedanaṃ hoti, adosena byāpādakāyaganthassa, amohena sesaganthadvayassa. purimāni ca dve satipaṭṭhānāni purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ ānubhāvena, pacchimāni pacchimasseva ānubhāvena ijjhanti.

[02] ``alobho ^a^V1.0127^ea^ cettha ārogyassa paccayo hoti, aluddho hi lobhanīyampi asappāyaṃ na sevati, tena arogo hoti. adoso yobbanassa, aduṭṭho hi valitapalitāvahena dosagginā aḍayhamāno dīgharattaṃ yuvā hoti. amoho dīghāyukatāya, amūḷho hi hitāhitaṃ ñatvā ahitaṃ parivajjento, hitañca paṭisevamāno dīghāyuko hoti.

[02] ``alobho cettha bhogasampattiyā paccayo cāgena bhogapaṭilābhato, adoso mittasampattiyā mettāya mittānaṃ paṭilābhato, aparihānato ca, amoho attasampattiyā, amūḷho hi attano hitameva karonto attānaṃ sampādeti. alobho ca dibbavihārassa paccayo hoti, adoso brahmavihārassa, amoho ariyavihārassa.

[02] ``alobhena cettha sakapakkhesu sattasaṅkhāresu nibbuto hoti tesaṃ vināsena abhisaṅgahetukassa dukkhassa abhāvā, adosena parapakkhesu, aduṭṭhassa hi verīsupi verisaññāya abhāvato, amohena udāsīnapakkhesu amūḷhassa sabbābhisaṅgatāya abhāvato.

[02] ``alobhena ^a^M1.0137^ea^ ca aniccadassanaṃ hoti, luddho hi upabhogāsāya aniccepi saṅkhāre aniccato na passati. adosena dukkhadassanaṃ, adosajjhāsayo hi pariccattāaghātavatthupariggaho saṅkhāreyeva dukkhato passati. amohena anattadassanaṃ, amūḷho hi yāthāvagahaṇakusalo apariṇāyakaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ apariṇāyakato bujjhati. yathā ca etehi aniccadassanādīni, evaṃ etepi aniccadassanādīhi honti. aniccadassanena hi alobho hoti, dukkhadassanena adoso, anattadassanena amoho. ko hi nāma `aniccamida'nti sammā ñatvā tassatthāya pihaṃ uppādeyya, saṅkhāre vā `dukkha'nti jānanto aparampi accantatikhiṇaṃ kodhadukkhaṃ uppādeyya, attasuññatañca bujjhitvā puna sammohaṃ āpajjeyyā''ti.

[03] tena vuttaṃ ``pubbabhāgiyānaṃ sīlasampadādīnaṃ sādhanavasena lokuttarānaṃ, upanissayabhāvena ca sampanno ajjhāsayo etassāti sampannajjhāsayo''ti. tenāha ^b^``evaṃ tissannaṃ bodhīnaṃ aññataraṃ pāpuṇātī''^eb^ti.

[03] idāni ^a^V1.0128^ea^ te ajjhāsaye pāḷiyāva vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``yathāhā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^chā^eb^ti gaṇanaparicchedo. ^b^ajjhāsayā^eb^ti paricchinnadhammanidassanaṃ. ubhayaṃ pana ekajjhaṃ katvā chabbidhā ajjhāsayāti attho. ^b^bodhisattā^eb^ti bujjhanakasattā, bodhiyā vā niyatabhāvena sattā laggā, adhimuttā tanninnā tappoṇāti attho. ^b^bodhiparipākāya saṃvattantī^eb^ti yathābhinīhāraṃ attanā pattabbabodhiyā paripācanāya bhavanti. ^b^alobhajjhāsayā^eb^ti alubbhanākārena pavattājjhāsayā, ādito ``kathaṃ nu kho mayaṃ sabbattha, sabbadā ca aluddhā eva hessāmā''ti, majjhe ca alubbhanavaseneva, pacchā ca tasseva rocanavasena pavattājjhāsayā. ^b^lobhe dosadassāvino^eb^ti lubbhanalakkhaṇe lobhe sabbappakārena ādīnavadassāvino. idaṃ tassa ajjhāsayassa ekadesato brūhanākāradassanaṃ. lobhe hi ādīnavaṃ, alobhe ca ānisaṃsaṃ passantassa alobhajjhāsayo parivaḍḍhati, svāyaṃ tattha ādīnavānisaṃsadassanavidhi vibhāvitoyeva. sesapadesupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. ayaṃ ^a^M1.0138^ea^ pana viseso -- ^b^nekkhamma^eb^nti idha pabbajjā. ^b^paviveko^eb^ tadaṅgaviveko, vikkhambhanaviveko, kāyaviveko, cittaviveko ca. ^b^nissaraṇaṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ. ^b^sabbabhavagatīsū^eb^ti sabbesu bhavesu, sabbāsu ca gatīsu. ^b^tadadhimuttatāyā^eb^ti yadatthaṃ bhāvanānuyogo, yadatthā ca pabbajjā, tadadhimuttena. tenevāha ^b^``samādhādhimuttenā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ ^b^``kiṃ caritosī''^eb^ti pucchito sace ``na jānāmī''ti vadeyya, ^b^``ke vā te dhammā bahulaṃ samudācarantī''^eb^ti pucchitabbo. ^b^kiṃ vā^eb^ti kiṃ asubhaṃ vā anussatiṭṭhānaṃ vā aññaṃ vā. ^b^kiṃ te manasi karoto phāsu hotī^eb^ti cittassa ekaggabhāvena sukhaṃ hoti. ^b^cittaṃ namatī^eb^ti pakatiyāva abhirativasena namati. ^b^evamādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena iriyāpathādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. tepi hi na sabbassa ekaṃsato byabhicārino eva. tathā hi samudācāro pucchitabbo vutto. ``asukañca asukañca manasikāravidhiṃ katipayadivasaṃ anuyuñjāhī''ti ca vattabbo.

[03] ^b^``pakatiyā uggahitakammaṭṭhānassā''^eb^ti idaṃ yaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetukāmo, tattha sajjhāyavasena vā manasikāravasena vā kataparicayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^ekaṃ dve nisajjānī^eb^ti ekaṃ vā dve vā uṇhāsanāni. ^b^sajjhāyaṃ kāretvā^eb^ attano sammukhāva adhīyāpetvā ^b^dātabbaṃ,^eb^ so ce aññattha gantukāmoti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``santike vasantassā''^eb^ti. ^b^āgatāgatakkhaṇe kathetabbaṃ,^eb^ pavattiṃ sutvāti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^pathavīkasiṇa^eb^nti ^a^V1.0129^ea^ pathavīkasiṇakammaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^katassā^eb^ti katassa kasiṇassa. ^b^taṃ taṃ ākāra^eb^nti ācariyena kammaṭṭhāne vuccamāne padapadatthādhippāyaopammādikaṃ attano ñāṇassa paccupaṭṭhitaṃ taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ, yaṃ yaṃ nimittanti vuttaṃ. ^b^upanibandhitvā^eb^ti upanetvā nibaddhaṃ viya katvā, hadaye ṭhapetvā apamussantaṃ katvāti attho. ^b^evaṃ^eb^ suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitassatitāya ^b^nimittaṃ gahetvā^eb^ tattha sampajānakāritāya ^b^sakkaccaṃ suṇantena. ta^eb^nti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ suggahitaṃ nissāya. ^b^itarassā^eb^ti tathā agaṇhantassa. ^b^sabbākārenā^eb^ti kassacipi pakārassa tattha asesitattā vuttaṃ.
[06] kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti tatiyaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ ^b^phāsu^eb^ ^a^M1.0139^ea^ ^a^V1.0130^ea^ ^b^hotī^eb^ti āvāsasappāyādilābhena manasikāraphāsutā bhāvanānukūlatā hoti. ^b^parisodhentenā^eb^ti tesaṃ tesaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānānaṃ chindanavasena visodhentena. ^b^akilamantoyevā^eb^ti akilantakāyo eva. sati hi kāyakilamathe siyā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa antarāyoti adhippāyo. ^b^gaṇṭhiṭṭhāna^eb^nti atthato, adhippāyato ca dubbinivedhatāya gaṇṭhibhūtaṃ ṭhānaṃ. ^b^chinditvā^eb^ti yāthāvato atthassa, adhippāyassa ca vibhāvanena chinditvā, vibhūtaṃ supākaṭaṃ katvāti adhippāyo. ^b^suvisuddha^eb^nti suṭṭhu visuddhaṃ, nigumbaṃ nijjaṭanti attho.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ ^b^aññatarenā^eb^ti aññatarenāpi, pageva anekehīti adhippāyo. mahantabhāvo ^b^mahattaṃ^eb^. tathā sesesu. soṇḍavā ^b^soṇḍī^eb^. tathā ^b^paṇṇa^eb^ntiādīsu. bodhiaṅgaṇādīsu kātabbaṃ idha ^b^``vatta''^eb^nti adhippetanti āha ^b^``pānīyaghaṭaṃ vā ritta''^eb^nti. ^b^niṭṭhitāyā^eb^ti paviṭṭhapaviṭṭhānaṃ dānena parikkhīṇāya. jiṇṇavihārepi yatra bhikkhū evaṃ vadanti ``āyasmā, yathāsukhaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ karotu, mayaṃ paṭijaggissāmā''ti. ^b^evarūpe vihātabba^eb^nti ayampi nayo labbhati, vuttanayattā pana na vutto.

[03] ^b^mahāpathavihāre^eb^ti mahāpathasamīpe vihāre. ^b^bhājanadārudoṇikādīnī^eb^ti rajanabhājanāni, rajanatthāya dāru, dārumayadoṇikā, rajanapacanaṭṭhānaṃ, dhovanaphalakanti evamādīni. ^b^sākahārikā^eb^ti sākahāriniyo itthiyo. ^b^visabhāgasaddo^eb^ kāmaguṇūpasaṃhito gītasaddoti vadanti, kevalopi itthisaddo visabhāgasaddo eva. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti pupphavante vihāre. ^b^tādisoyevā^eb^ti ``tatthassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā''tiādinā yādiso paṇṇavante vihāre upaddavo vutto, tādisoyeva. ``pupphahārikāyo pupphaṃ ocinantiyo''ti pana vattabbaṃ. ayamidha viseso.
[03] ^b^patthanīye^eb^ti ^a^V1.0131^ea^ tattha vasantesu sambhāvanāvasena upasaṅkamanādinā patthetabbe. tenāha ^b^``leṇasammate''^eb^ti. ^b^dakkhiṇāgirī^eb^ti magadhavisaye dakkhiṇāgirīti vadanti.
[03] ^b^visabhāgārammaṇāni^eb^ ^a^M1.0140^ea^ iṭṭhāni, aniṭṭhāni ca. aniṭṭhānaṃ hi dassanatthaṃ ^b^``ghaṭehi nighaṃsantiyo''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. dabbūpakaraṇayoggā rukkhā ^b^dabbūpakaraṇarukkhā^eb^.

[03] ^b^yo pana^eb^ vihāro. ^b^khala^eb^nti dhaññakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^gāvo rundhanti^eb^ ``sassaṃ khādiṃsū''ti. ^b^udakavāra^eb^nti kedāresu sassānaṃ dātabbaudakavāraṃ. ^b^ayampī^eb^ti mahāsaṅghabhogopi vihāro. ^b^vāriyamānā^eb^ kammaṭṭhānikena bhikkhunā.

[03] samuddasāmuddikanadīnissitaṃ ^b^udakapaṭṭanaṃ^eb^. mahānagarānaṃ āyadvārabhūtaṃ aṭavimukhādinissitaṃ ^b^thalapaṭṭanaṃ. appasannā honti^eb^. tenassa tattha phāsuvihāro na hotīti adhippāyo. ^b^maññamānā^eb^ rājamanussā.

[03] ^b^samosaraṇenā^eb^ti ito cito sañcaraṇena. ^b^papāte^eb^ti papātasīse ^b^ṭhatvā gāyi^eb^ ``gītasaddena idhāgataṃ papāte pātetvā khādissāmī''ti. ^b^vegena gahetvā^eb^ti vegenāgantvā ``kuhiṃ yāsī''ti khandhe gahetvā.
[03] ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yasmiṃ vihāre, vihārasāmantā vā na sakkā hoti ^b^kalyāṇamittaṃ laddhuṃ,^eb^ tattha vihāre so alābho mahādosoti yojanā.

[03] ^b^panthani^eb^nti panthe nīto pavattitoti panthanī, magganissito vihāro. taṃ panthaniṃ. ^b^soṇḍi^eb^nti soṇḍisahito vihāro soṇḍī, taṃ soṇḍiṃ. tathā ^b^paṇṇa^eb^ntiādīsu. nagaranissitaṃ ^b^nagara^eb^nti vuttaṃ uttarapadalopena yathā ``bhīmaseno bhīmo''ti. ^b^dārunā^eb^ti dārunissitena saha. ^b^visabhāgenā^eb^ti yo visabhāgehi vusīyati, visabhāgānaṃ vā nivāso, so vihāro visabhāgo. tena visabhāgena saddhiṃ. paccantanissitañca sīmānissitañca asappāyañca ^b^paccantasīmāsappāyaṃ. yattha mitto na labbhati,^eb^ tampīti sabbattha ṭhāna-saddāpekkhāya napuṃsakaniddeso. ^b^iti viññāyā^eb^ti ``bhāvanāya ananurūpānī''ti evaṃ vijānitvā.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0132^ea^ ^b^anurūpo nāmā^eb^ti ayaṃ vihāro bhāvanāya anurūpo nāma. ^b^nātidūra^eb^nti gocaraṭṭhānato aḍḍhagāvutato orabhāgatāya na ^a^M1.0141^ea^ atidūraṃ. ^b^nāccāsanna^eb^nti pacchimena pamāṇena gocaraṭṭhānato pañcadhanusatikatāya na atiāsannaṃ. tāya ca pana nātidūranāccāsannatāya, gocaraṭṭhānaṃ parissayādirahitamaggatāya ca gamanassa ca āgamanassa ca yuttarūpattā ^b^gamanāgamanasampannaṃ^eb^. divasabhāge mahājanasaṃkiṇṇatābhāvena ^b^divā appākiṇṇaṃ^eb^. abhāvattho hi ayaṃ ^b^appa^eb^-saddo ``appiccho''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.336) viya. rattiyaṃ janālāpasaddābhāvena ^b^rattiṃ appasaddaṃ^eb^. sabbadāpi janasannipātanigghosābhāvena ^b^appanigghosaṃ. appakasirenā^eb^ti akasirena sukheneva. sīlādiguṇānaṃ thirabhāvappattiyā ^b^therā^eb^. suttageyyādi bahu sutaṃ etesanti ^b^bahussutā^eb^. vācuggatakaraṇena, sammadeva garūnaṃ santike āgamitabhāvena ca āgato pariyattidhammasaṅkhāto āgamo etesanti ^b^āgatāgamā^eb^. suttābhidhammasaṅkhātassa dhammassa dhāraṇena ^b^dhammadharā^eb^. vinayassa dhāraṇena ^b^vinayadharā^eb^. tesaṃyeva dhammavinayānaṃ mātikāya dhāraṇena ^b^mātikādharā^eb^. tattha tattha dhammaparipucchāya ^b^paripucchati^eb^. atthaparipucchāya ^b^paripañhati^eb^ vīmaṃsati vicāreti. ^b^idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ imassa ko attho^eb^ti paripucchanaparipañhākāradassanaṃ. ^b^avivaṭañceva^eb^ pāḷiyā atthaṃ padesantarapāḷidassanena āgamato ^b^vivaranti. anuttānīkatañca^eb^ yuttivibhāvanena ^b^uttānīkaronti. kaṅkhaṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu^eb^ saṃsayuppattiyā hetutāya gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtesu pāḷipadesesu yāthāvato vinicchayadānena ^b^kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti^eb^. ettha ca ``nātidūraṃ, nāccāsannaṃ, gamanāgamanasampanna''nti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, ``divā appākiṇṇaṃ, rattiṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosa''nti ekaṃ, ``appaḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassa''nti ekaṃ, ``tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa...pe0... parikkhārā''ti ekaṃ, ``tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā...pe0... kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodentī''ti ekaṃ. evaṃ pañca aṅgāni veditabbāni.
[03] 54^b^.^eb^ khuddakapalibodhupacchede payojanaṃ parato āgamissati. aggaḷānuvātaparibhaṇḍadānādinā ^b^daḷhīkammaṃ vā^eb^. tantacchedādīsu ^b^tunnakammaṃ vā^eb^ kātabbaṃ.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbakammaṭṭhānavasenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0142^ea^ ^a^V1.0133^ea^ anukkamena niddisiyamānassa cattālīsavidhassa sabbassa kammaṭṭhānassa vasena. ^b^piṇḍapātapaṭikkantenā^eb^ti piṇḍapātaparibhogato paṭinivattena, piṇḍapātabhuttāvinā onītapattapāṇināti attho. ^b^bhattasammadaṃ paṭivinodetvā^eb^ti bhojananimittaṃ parissamaṃ vinodetvā. āhāre hi āsayaṃ paviṭṭhamatte tassa āgantukatāya yebhuyyena siyā sarīrassa koci parissamo, taṃ vūpasametvā. tasmiṃ hi avūpasante sarīrakhedena cittaṃ ekaggataṃ na labheyyāti. ^b^pavivitte^eb^ti janavivitte. ^b^sukhanisinnenā^eb^ti pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya nisajjāya sukhanisinnena. ^b^vuttañheta^eb^nti yaṃ ``katāya vā''tiādinā pathaviyā nimittaggahaṇaṃ idha vuccati, vuttaṃ hetaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ.

[03] idāni taṃ aṭṭhakathāpāḷiṃ dassento ^b^``pathavīkasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto''^eb^tiādimāha. tatthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho -- ^b^pathavīkasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto^eb^ti uggahanimittabhāvena pathavīkasiṇaṃ gaṇhanto ādiyanto, uggahanimittabhūtaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ uppādentoti attho. uppādanañcettha tathānimittassa upaṭṭhāpanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^pathaviya^eb^nti vakkhamānavisese pathavīmaṇḍale. ^b^nimittaṃ gaṇhātī^eb^ti tattha cakkhunā ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ viya bhāvanāñāṇena vakkhamānavisesaṃ pathavīnimittaṃ gaṇhāti. ``pathaviya''nti vatvāpi maṇḍalāpekkhāya napuṃsakaniddeso. ^b^kate^eb^ti vakkhamānavidhinā abhisaṅkhateti attho. ^b^vā^eb^-saddo aniyamattho. ^b^akate^eb^ti pākatike khalamaṇḍalādike pathavīmaṇḍale. ^b^sāntake^eb^ti sāntake eva, saparicchede evāti attho. sāvadhāraṇañhetaṃ vacanaṃ. tathā hi tena nivattitaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``no anantake''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^sakoṭiye^eb^tiādīnipi tasseva vevacanāni. ^b^suppamatte vā^eb^tiādīsu suppasarāvāni samappamāṇāni icchitāni. keci pana vadanti ``sarāvamattaṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ hoti, suppamattaṃ tato adhikappamāṇanti. kittimaṃ kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedena sarāvamattaṃ, uparimaparicchedena suppamattaṃ, na tato adho, uddhaṃ vāti parittappamāṇabhedasaṅgaṇhanatthaṃ ^b^`suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā'^eb^ti vutta''nti. yathāupaṭṭhite ārammaṇe ekaṅgulamattampi vaḍḍhitaṃ appamāṇamevāti vuttovāyamattho. keci pana ``chattamattampi kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ kātabba''nti vadanti.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ ^a^M1.0143^ea^ ^b^taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ karotī^eb^ti so yogāvacaro taṃ pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ suggahitaṃ nimittaṃ ^a^V1.0134^ea^ karoti. yadā cakkhuṃ ummīletvā oloketvā tattha nimittaṃ gahetvā nimmīletvā āvajjentassa ummīletvā olokitakkhaṇe viya upaṭṭhāti, tadā suggahitaṃ karoti nāma. athettha satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā abahigatena mānasena punappunaṃ sallakkhento ^b^sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāreti^eb^ nāma. evaṃ upadhāritaṃ pana naṃ punappunaṃ āvajjento manasi karonto tamevārabbha āsevanaṃ bhāvanaṃ bahulaṃ pavattento ^b^suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapeti^eb^ nāma. ^b^tasmiṃ ārammaṇe^eb^ti evaṃ suggahitakaraṇādinā sammadeva upaṭṭhite tasmiṃ pathavīkasiṇasaññite ārammaṇe. ^b^cittaṃ upanibandhatī^eb^ti attano cittaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ upanetvā nibandhati aññārammaṇato vinivattaṃ karoti. ^b^addhā imāyā^eb^tiādi ānisaṃsadassāvitādassanaṃ.

[03] idāni yathādassitassa aṭṭhakathāpāṭhassa atthappakāsanena saddhiṃ bhāvanāvidhiṃ vibhāvetukāmo akate tāva nimittaggahaṇaṃ dassento ^b^``tattha yena atītabhavepī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ aṭṭhakathāpāṭhe. ^b^catukkapañcakajjhānānī^eb^ti catukkapañcakanayavasena vadati. ^b^puññavato^eb^ti bhāvanāmayapuññavato. ^b^upanissayasampannassā^eb^ti tādiseneva upanissayena samannāgatassa. ^b^khalamaṇḍale^eb^ti maṇḍalākāre dhaññakaraṇaṭṭhāne. ^b^taṃṭhānappamāṇamevā^eb^ti olokitaṭṭhānappamāṇameva.

[03] ^b^avirādhetvā^eb^ti avirajjhitvā vuttavidhinā eva. ^b^nīlapītalohitaodātasambhedavasenā^eb^ti nīlādivaṇṇāhi mattikāhi paccekaṃ, ekajjhañca saṃsaggavasena. ^b^gaṅgāvahe^eb^ti gaṅgāsote. sīhaḷadīpe kira rāvaṇagaṅgā nāma nadī, tassā sotena chinnataṭaṭṭhāne mattikā aruṇavaṇṇā. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^``gaṅgāvahe mattikāsadisāya aruṇavaṇṇāyā''^eb^ti. ^b^aruṇavaṇṇāya^eb^ aruṇanibhāya, aruṇappabhāvaṇṇāyāti attho.

[03] evaṃ kasiṇadose dassetvā idāni kasiṇakaraṇādike sesākāre dassetuṃ ^b^``tañca kho''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^saṃhārima^eb^nti saṃharitabbaṃ gahetvā caraṇayoggaṃ. ^b^tatraṭṭhaka^eb^nti yatra kataṃ, tattheva tiṭṭhanakaṃ. ^b^vuttappamāṇa^eb^nti ^a^M1.0144^ea^ ``suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā''ti vuttappamāṇaṃ. ^b^vaṭṭa^eb^nti maṇḍalasaṇṭhānaṃ. ^b^parikammakāle^eb^ti nimittuggahaṇāya bhāvanākāle. ^b^etadevā^eb^ti yaṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulavitthāraṃ, etadeva pamāṇaṃ sandhāya ^b^``suppamattaṃ vā sarāvamattaṃ vā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. suppaṃ hi nātimahantaṃ, sarāvañca mahantaṃ cāṭipidhānappahonakanti samappamāṇaṃ hoti.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ ^b^tasmā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0135^ea^ paricchedatthāya vuttattā. ^b^evaṃ vuttapamāṇaṃ pariccheda^eb^nti yathāvuttappamāṇaṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulavitthāraṃ paricchedaṃ katvā, evaṃ vuttappamāṇaṃ vā kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ visabhāgavaṇṇena paricchedaṃ katvā. ^b^rukkhapāṇikā^eb^ti kucandanādirukkhapāṇikā aruṇavaṇṇassa ^b^visabhāgavaṇṇaṃ samuṭṭhapeti^eb^. tasmā taṃ aggahetvāti vuttaṃ. pakatirukkhapāṇikā pana pāsāṇapāṇikāgatikāva. ninnunnataṭṭhānābhāvena ^b^bherītalasadisaṃ^eb^ katvā. ^b^tato dūratare^eb^tiādi yathāvuttato padesato, pīṭhato ca aññasmiṃ ādīnavadassanaṃ. ^b^kasiṇadosā^eb^ti hatthapāṇipadādayo idha kasiṇadosā.

[03] ^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ``aḍḍhateyyahatthantare padese, vidatthicaturaṅgulapādake pīṭhe''ti ca vuttavidhināva. ^b^kāmesu ādīnava^eb^nti ``kāmā nāmete aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā nirassādaṭṭhena, tiṇukkūpamā anudahanaṭṭhena, aṅgārakāsūpamā mahābhitāpaṭṭhena, supinakūpamā ittarapaccupaṭṭhānaṭṭhena, yācitakūpamā tāvakālikaṭṭhena, rukkhaphalūpamā sabbaṅgapaccaṅgapalibhañjanaṭṭhena, asisūnūpamā adhikuṭṭanaṭṭhena, sattisūlūpamā vinivijjhanaṭṭhena, sappasirūpamā sapaṭibhayaṭṭhenā''tiādinā (pāci0 aṭṭha0 417; ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.234) ``appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā''tiādinā (pāci0 417; ma0 ni0 1.234; 2.42) ``kāmasukhañca nāmetaṃ bahuparissayaṃ, sāsaṅkaṃ, sabhayaṃ, saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ, mīḷhaparibhogasadisaṃ, hīnaṃ, gammaṃ, pothujjanikaṃ, anariyaṃ, anatthasaṃhita''ntiādinā ca anekākāravokāraṃ vatthukāmakilesakāmesu ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ paccavekkhitvā. ^b^kāmanissaraṇe^eb^ti kāmānaṃ nissaraṇabhūte, tehi vā nissaṭe. aggamaggassa pādakabhāvena ^b^sabbadukkhasamatikkamassa upāyabhūte. nekkhamme^eb^ti jhāne. ^b^jātābhilāsena^eb^ sañjātacchandena. ``sammāsambuddho vata bhagavā aviparītadhammadesanattā, svākkhāto ^a^M1.0145^ea^ dhammo ekantaniyyānikattā, suppaṭipanno saṅgho yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanato''ti evaṃ ^b^buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇānussaraṇena^eb^ ratanattayavisayaṃ ^b^pītipāmojjaṃ janayitvā^eb^. nekkhammaṃ paṭipajjati etāyāti ^b^nekkhammapaṭipadā,^eb^ saupacārassa jhānassa, vipassanāya, maggassa, nibbānassa ca adhigamakāraṇanti attho. pubbe pana paṭhamajjhānameva nekkhammanti vuttattā vuttāvasesā sabbepi nekkhammadhammā. yathāha --
[21] ``pabbajjā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, nibbānaṃ ca vipassanā.
[22] sabbepi kusalā dhammā, `nekkhamma'nti pavuccare''ti.. (itivu0 aṭṭha0 109).

[25] ^b^pavivekasukharasassā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0136^ea^ cittavivekādivivekajassa sukharasassa. evametehi pañcahi padehi ``ānisaṃsadassāvī''tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^samena ākārenā^eb^ti atiummīlanātimandālocanāni vajjetvā nātiummīlananātimandālocanasaṅkhātena samena ālocanākārena. ^b^nimittaṃ gaṇhantenā^eb^ti pathavīkasiṇe cakkhunā gahitanimittaṃ manasā gaṇhantena. ^b^bhāvetabba^eb^nti tathāpavattaṃ nimittaggahaṇaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ āsevitabbaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^cakkhu kilamati^eb^ atisukhumaṃ, atibhāsurañca rūpagataṃ upanijjhāyato viya. ^b^ativibhūtaṃ hoti^eb^ attano sabhāvāvibhāvato. tathā ca vaṇṇato vā lakkhaṇato vā upatiṭṭheyya. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``tenassa nimittaṃ nuppajjatī''^eb^ti. ^b^avibhūtaṃ hoti^eb^ gajanimmīlanena pekkhantassa rūpagataṃ viya. ^b^cittañca līnaṃ hoti^eb^ dassane mandabyāpāratāya kosajjapātato. tenāha ^b^``evampi nimittaṃ nuppajjatī''^eb^ti. ^b^ādāsatale mukhanimittadassinā viyā^eb^ti yathā ādāsatale mukhanimittadassī puriso na tattha atigāḷhaṃ ummīlati, nāpi atimandaṃ, na ādāsatalassa vaṇṇaṃ paccavekkhati, nāpi lakkhaṇaṃ manasi karoti. atha kho samena ākārena olokento attano mukhanimittameva passati, evameva ayampi pathavīkasiṇaṃ samena ākārena olokento nimittaggahaṇappasutoyeva hoti, tena vuttaṃ ^b^``samena ākārenā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^na vaṇṇo paccavekkhitabbo^eb^ti yo tattha pathavīkasiṇe aruṇavaṇṇo, so na cintetabbo. cakkhuviññāṇena pana gahaṇaṃ na sakkā nivāretuṃ. tenevettha ``na oloketabbo''ti ^a^M1.0146^ea^ avatvā paccavekkhaṇaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. ^b^na lakkhaṇaṃ manasi kātabba^eb^nti yaṃ tattha pathavīdhātuyā thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ na manasi kātabbaṃ.

[01] disvā gahetabbattā ``vaṇṇaṃ amuñcitvā''ti vatvāpi vaṇṇavasenettha ābhogo na kātabbo, so pana vaṇṇo nissayagatiko kātabboti dassento āha ^b^``nissayasavaṇṇaṃ katvā''^eb^ti. nissayena samānākārasannissito so vaṇṇo tāya pathaviyā samānagatikaṃ katvā, vaṇṇena saheva ``pathavī''ti manasi kātabbanti attho. ^b^ussadavasena paṇṇattidhamme^eb^ti pathavīdhātuyā ussannabhāvena sattito adhikabhāvena sasambhārapathaviyaṃ ``pathavī''ti yo lokavohāro, tasmiṃ paṇṇattidhamme ^b^cittaṃ paṭṭhapetvā^eb^ ``pathavī, pathavī''ti ^b^manasi kātabbaṃ^eb^. yadi lokavohārena paṇṇattimatte cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, nāmantaravasenapi pathavī manasi kātabbā bhaveyyāti, hotu, ko dosoti dassento ^b^``mahī medinī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^yamicchatī^eb^ti yaṃ nāmaṃ vattuṃ icchati, ^b^taṃ vattabbaṃ^eb^. tañca kho ^b^yadassa saññānukūlaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0137^ea^ ^b^hoti^eb^ yaṃ nāmaṃ assa yogino pubbe tattha gahitasaññāvasena anukūlaṃ pacuratāya, paguṇatāya vā āgacchati, ^b^taṃ vattabbaṃ. vattabba^eb^nti ca paṭhamasamannāhāre kassaci vacībhedopi hotīti katvā vuttaṃ, ācariyena vā vattabbataṃ sandhāya. kiṃ vā bahunā, pākaṭabhāvoyevettha pamāṇanti dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^kālena ummīletvā kālena nimmīletvā^eb^ti kiñci kālaṃ cakkhuṃ ummīletvā nimittaggahaṇavasena pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ oloketvā puna kiñci kālaṃ cakkhuṃ nimmīletvā āvajjitabbaṃ. yenākārena oloketvā gahitaṃ, tenākārena puna taṃ samannāharitabbaṃ.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ ^b^āpāthamāgacchatī^eb^ti manodvārikajavanānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ upagacchati. ^b^tassa^eb^ uggahanimittassa. ^b^na tasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ^eb^. kasmā? yadi uggahanimitte jātepi pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ oloketvā bhāveti, paṭibhāganimittuppatti na siyā. samīpaṭṭhena ca na oloketuṃ na sakkā. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā''^eb^tiādi. nissaddabhāvāya ^b^ekapaṭalikūpāhanā^eb^gahaṇaṃ, parissayavinodanatthaṃ ^b^kattaradaṇḍa^eb^ggahaṇaṃ. sace nassati, athānena bhāvetabbanti sambandho. vakkhamānesu asappāyesu ^b^kenacideva^eb^ asappāyena kāraṇabhūtena. ^b^nimittaṃ ādāyā^eb^ti yathājātaṃ uggahanimittaṃ gahetvā. ^b^samannāharitabba^eb^nti āvajjitabbaṃ nimittanti adhippāyo, sammā vā anu ^a^M1.0147^ea^ anu āharitabbaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti attho. ^b^takkāhataṃ vitakkāhata^eb^nti takkanato, savisesaṃ takkanato ca ``takko, vitakko''ti ca evaṃ laddhanāmena bhāvanācittasampayuttena sammāsaṅkappena āhananapariyāhananakiccena aparāparaṃ vattamānena kammaṭṭhānaṃ āhataṃ, pariyāhatañca kātabbaṃ, balappattavitakko manasikāro bahulaṃ pavattetabboti attho. ^b^evaṃ karontassā^eb^ti evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ karontassa. yathā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahati, evaṃ anuyuñjantassa. ^b^anukkamenā^eb^ti bhāvanānukkamena. yadā saddhādīni indriyāni suvisadāni tikkhāni pavattanti, tadā assaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena sātisayathāmappattehi sattahi balehi laddhūpatthambhāni vitakkādīni kāmāvacarāneva jhānaṅgāni bahūni hutvā pātubhavanti. tato eva tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā kāmacchandādayo saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi vidūrī bhavanti, paṭibhāganimittuppattiyā saddhiṃ taṃ ārabbha upacārajjhānaṃ uppajjati. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhantī''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^sannisīdantī^eb^ti sammadeva sīdanti, upasamantīti attho.

[01] ^b^imassā^eb^ti paṭibhāganimittassa. aṅgulipadapāṇipadādiko ^b^kasiṇadoso^eb^. ādāsamaṇḍalūpamādīhi ^a^V1.0138^ea^ uggahanimittato paṭibhāganimittassa suparisuddhataṃ, saṇhasukhumatañca dasseti. ^b^tañca kho^eb^ paṭibhāganimittaṃ ^b^neva vaṇṇavantaṃ na saṇṭhānavantaṃ^eb^ aparamatthasabhāvattā. ^b^īdisa^eb^nti vaṇṇasaṇṭhānavantaṃ. ^b^tilakkhaṇabbhāhata^eb^nti uppādādilakkhaṇattayānupaviṭṭhaṃ, aniccatādilakkhaṇattayaṅkitaṃ vā. yadi ^b^na panetaṃ tādisaṃ^eb^ vaṇṇādivantaṃ, kathaṃ jhānassa ārammaṇabhāvoti āha ^b^``kevalañhī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^saññaja^eb^nti bhāvanāsaññājanitaṃ, bhāvanāsaññāya sañjātamattaṃ. na hi asabhāvassa kutoci samuṭṭhānaṃ atthi. tenāha ^b^``upaṭṭhānākāramatta''^eb^nti.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ ^b^vikkhambhitāneva sannisinnāva,^eb^ na pana tadatthaṃ ussāho kātabboti adhippāyo. ``upacārasamādhinā''ti vutte itaropi samādhi atthīti atthato āpannanti tampi dassetuṃ ^b^``duvidho hi samādhī''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^dvīhākārehī^eb^ti jhānadhammānaṃ paṭipakkhadūrībhāvo, thirabhāvappatti cāti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi. idāni tāni kāraṇāni avatthāmukhena dassetuṃ ^b^``upacārabhūmiyaṃ vā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^upacārabhūmiya^eb^nti upacārāvatthāyaṃ. yadipi tadā jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni mahaggatabhāvappattāni na uppajjanti, tesaṃ ^a^M1.0148^ea^ pana paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanena cittaṃ samādhiyati. tenāha ^b^``nīvaraṇappahānena cittaṃ samāhitaṃ hotī''^eb^ti. ^b^paṭilābhabhūmiya^eb^nti jhānassa adhigamāvatthāyaṃ. tadā hi appanāpattānaṃ jhānadhammānaṃ uppattiyā cittaṃ samādhiyati. tenāha ^b^``aṅgapātubhāvenā''^eb^ti. cittaṃ samāhitaṃ hotīti sambandho.

[03] ^b^na thāmajātānī^eb^ti na jātathāmāni, na bhāvanābalaṃ pattānīti attho. ^b^citta^eb^nti jhānacittaṃ. ^b^kevalampi rattiṃ kevalampi divasaṃ tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti samāpattivelaṃ sandhāyāha. upacārabhūmiyaṃ nimittavaḍḍhanaṃ yuttanti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``nimittaṃ vaḍḍhetvā''^eb^ti. ^b^laddhaparihānī^eb^ti laddhaupacārajjhānaparihāni. nimitte avinassante tadārammaṇajhānampi aparihīnameva hoti, nimitte pana ārakkhābhāvena vinaṭṭhe laddhaṃ laddhaṃ jhānampi vinassati tadāyattavuttito. tenāha ^b^``ārakkhamhī''^eb^tiādi.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ ``thāvarañca hotī''ti vatvā yathā thāvaraṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``sati upaṭṭhāti, cittaṃ samādhiyatī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yathāladdhañhi nimittaṃ tattha satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ekaggataṃ vindantassa ^a^V1.0139^ea^ thiraṃ nāma hoti, surakkhitañca. ^b^sati^eb^-ggahaṇena cettha sampajaññaṃ, samādhiggahaṇena vīriyañca saṅgahitaṃ hoti nānantariyabhāvato. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tesu āvāsesu. ^b^tīṇi tīṇī^eb^ti ekekasmiṃ āvāse avutthāvutthaṭṭhāne vasananiyāmena tayo tayo divase ^b^vasitvā^eb^.
[03] ^b^uttarena vā dakkhiṇena vā^eb^ti vuttaṃ gamanāgamane sūriyābhimukhabhāvanivāraṇatthanti. sahassadhanuppamāṇaṃ ^b^diyaḍḍhakosaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^dvattiṃsa tiracchānakathā^eb^ti ^b^rājakathādike^eb^ (dī0 ni0 1.17; ma0 ni0 2.223; saṃ0 ni0 5.1080; a0 ni0 10.69; pāci0 508) sandhāyāha. tā hi pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatāpi araññapabbatanadīdīpakathā iti-saddena saṅgahetvā saggamokkhānaṃ tiracchānabhāvato ``dvattiṃsa tiracchānakathā''ti vuttā. ^b^dasakathāvatthunissita^eb^nti ``appicchatā, santuṭṭhi, paviveko, asaṃsaggo, vīriyārambho, sīla, samādhi, paññā, vimutti, vimuttiñāṇadassana''nti imāni appicchakathādīnaṃ vatthūni, tannissitaṃ bhassaṃ ^b^sappāyaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^atiracchānakathiko^eb^ti ^a^M1.0149^ea^ natiracchānakathiko, tiracchānakathā vidhuraṃ dhammikaṃ kammaṭṭhānapaṭisaṃyuttameva kathaṃ kathetīti adhippāyo. ^b^sīlādiguṇasampanno^eb^ti sīlasamādhiādiguṇasampanno. yo hi samādhikammaṭṭhāniko, samādhikammaṭṭhānassa vā pāraṃ patto, so imassa yogino sappāyo. tenāha ^b^``yaṃ nissāyā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^kāyadaḷhībahulo^eb^ti kāyassa santappanaposanappasuto. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharatī''ti (dī0 ni0 3.320; ma0 ni0 1.186; a0 ni0 5.206).

[03] bhojanaṃ yebhuyyena madhurambilarasavasena sattānaṃ upayogaṃ gacchati dadhiādīsu tathā dassanato. kaṭukādirasā pana kevalaṃ abhisaṅkhārakā evāti āha ^b^``kassaci madhuraṃ, kassaci ambilaṃ sappāyaṃ hotī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^yasmiṃ iriyāpathe^eb^ ādhārabhūte, vattamāne vā, yasmiṃ vā iriyāpathe pavattamānassa. ^b^nimittāsevanabahulassā^eb^ti nimitte āsevanābahulassa paṭibhāganimitte visayabhūte bhāvanāmanasikāraṃ ^a^V1.0140^ea^ bahulaṃ āsevantassa, nimittassa vā gocarāsevanavasena āsevanābahulassa. yena hi bhāventassa bhāvanāsevanā, tena gocarāsevanāpi icchitabbāti.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ ^b^na hoti^eb^ appanā. yena vidhinā appanāyaṃ kusalo hoti, so dasavidho vidhi ^b^appanākosallaṃ,^eb^ tannibbattaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ. ^b^vatthuvisadakiriyato^eb^ti vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇato appanākosallaṃ icchitabbanti sambandho. evaṃ sesesupi.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ cittacetasikānaṃ hi pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato sarīraṃ, tappaṭibaddhāni cīvarādīni ca idha ``vatthūnī''ti adhippetāni. tāni yathā cittassa sukhāvahāni honti, tathā karaṇaṃ tesaṃ ^b^visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ^eb^. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``ajjhattikabāhirāna''^eb^ntiādi. ^b^sarīraṃ vā^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddo aṭṭhānappayutto, sarīraṃ sedamalaggahitaṃ vā aññena vā avassutakiccena vibādhitanti adhippāyo. ^b^senāsanaṃ vā^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddena pattādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. nanu cāyaṃ nayo ^a^M1.0150^ea^ khuddakapalibodhupacchedena saṅgahito, puna kasmā vuttoti? saccaṃ saṅgahito, so ca kho bhāvanāya ārambhakāle. idha pana āraddhakammaṭṭhānassa upacārajjhāne ṭhatvā appanāparivāsaṃ vasantassa kālantare jāte tathāpaṭipatti appanākosallāya vuttā. ^b^avisade^eb^ sati, visayabhūte vā. kathaṃ bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa tāni visayo? antarantarā pavattanakacittuppādavasenevaṃ vuttaṃ. te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya aparisuddhabhāvāya saṃvattanti. ^b^cittacetasikesu^eb^ nissayādipaccayabhūtesu. ^b^ñāṇampī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo sampiṇḍane. tena ``na kevalaṃ taṃ vatthuyeva, atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotī''ti dassitaṃ. taṃsampayuttānaṃ pana aparisuddhatā avuttasiddhā, ñāṇassa ca visuṃ gahaṇaṃ appanāya bahukārattā. tathā hi jhānaṃ ``dandhābhiññaṃ, khippābhiñña''nti ñāṇamukhena niddiṭṭhaṃ. nissayanissayopi nissayotveva vuccatīti āha ^b^``dīpakapallikavaṭṭitelāni nissāyā''^eb^ti. ñāṇe avisade vipassanābhāvanā viya samādhibhāvanāpi paridubbalā hotīti dassetuṃ ^b^``aparisuddhena ñāṇenā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^kammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ āha. ^b^vuḍḍhiṃ^eb^ aṅgapātubhāvena, ^b^virūḷhiṃ^eb^ guṇabhāvena, ^b^vepullaṃ^eb^ sabbaso vasibhāvappattiyā veditabbaṃ. ^b^visade panā^eb^ti sukkapakkho, tassa vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ ^b^samabhāvakaraṇa^eb^nti ^a^V1.0141^ea^ kiccato anūnādhikabhāvakaraṇaṃ. yathāpaccayaṃ saddheyyavatthusmiṃ adhimokkhakiccassa paṭutarabhāvena, paññāya avisadatāya, vīriyādīnaṃ ca sithilatādinā ^b^saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti^eb^. tenāha ^b^``itarāni mandānī''^eb^ti. ^b^tato^eb^ti tasmā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvato, itaresañca mandattā. kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho, paggahova kiccaṃ, ^b^paggahakiccaṃ^eb^ kātuṃ na sakkotīti sambandhitabbaṃ. ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, anissajjanaṃ vā ^b^upaṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ vikkhepapaṭipakkho. yena vā sampayuttā avikkhittā honti, so ^b^avikkhepo^eb^. rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato visayasabhāvaṃ passati, taṃ ^b^dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti^eb^ balavatā saddhindriyena abhibhūtattā. sahajātadhammesu hi indaṭṭhaṃ kārentānaṃ sahapavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekarasatāvaseneva atthasiddhi, na aññathā. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati ^a^M1.0151^ea^. ^b^ta^eb^nti saddhindriyaṃ. ^b^dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenā^eb^ti yassa saddheyyavatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe adhimuccanassa sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tassa paccayapaccayuppannādivibhāgato yāthāvato vīmaṃsanena. evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena sabhāvarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro adhimokkho na hoti, ``ayaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvo''ti parijānanavasena paññābyāpārassa sātisayattā. dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti, evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hotīti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāpetabba''^eb^nti.

[03] ^b^tathā amanasikārenā^eb^ti yenākārena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti, tenākārena bhāvanāya ananuyuñjanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo, attano vā paccayavisesato kiccuttariyena, vīriyādīnaṃ vā mandakiccatāya. tattha paṭhamavikappe hāpanavidhi dassito, dutiyavikappe pana yathā manasi karoto vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena vīriyādīnaṃ paṭukiccabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samarasaṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ. iminā nayena sesindriyesupi hāpanavidhi veditabbo.

[01] ^b^vakkalittheravatthū^eb^ti so hi āyasmā saddhādhimuttatāya katādhikāro satthu rūpakāyadassanappasuto eva hutvā viharanto satthārā ``kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena? yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 3.87) ovaditvā ^a^V1.0142^ea^ kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi taṃ ananuyuñjanto paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi. atha naṃ satthā yathānisinnova obhāsaṃ visajjento attānaṃ dassetvā --
[21] ``pāmojjabahulo bhikkhu, pasanno buddhasāsane.
[22] adhigacche padaṃ santaṃ, saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukha''nti.. (dha0 pa0 381) --

[25] gāthaṃ vatvā ``ehi vakkalī''ti āha. so tena amateneva abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. saddhāya pana balavabhāvato ^a^M1.0152^ea^ vipassanāvīthiṃ na otari. taṃ ñatvā bhagavā indriyasamataṃ paṭipādento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi. so satthārā dinnanayena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``vakkalittheravatthu cettha nidassana''^eb^nti.

[03] ^b^itarakiccabheda^eb^nti upaṭṭhānādikiccavisesaṃ. ^b^passaddhādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena samādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^hāpetabba^eb^nti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāyati, evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiādibhāvanāya hāyati, samādhipakkhiyattā tassā. tathā hi sā samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā viya vīriyindriyassa adhimattataṃ uddhaccapātato rakkhantī ekaṃsato hāpeti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``passaddhādibhāvanāya hāpetabba''^eb^nti.

[03] ^b^soṇattherassa vatthū^eb^ti (mahāva0 243) sukumārassa soṇattherassa vatthu. so hi āyasmā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto ``mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ, na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ, kāyaṃ kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo kātabbo''ti ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi. satthā tattha gantvā vīṇovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato. theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ yojento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``soṇattherassa vatthu dassetabba''^eb^nti.

[01] ^b^sesesupī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0143^ea^ satisamādhipaññindriyesupi. ^b^ekassā^eb^ti ekekassa. sāmaññaniddesovāyaṃ daṭṭhabbo. evaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ paccekaṃ adhimattatāya pana hāpanavasena samataṃ dassetvā idāni tattha yesaṃ visesato asādhāraṇato, sādhāraṇato ca samatā icchitabbā, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``visesato panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etesu pañcasu indriyesu. ^b^samata^eb^nti saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anūnānadhikabhāvaṃ. tathā samādhivīriyānaṃ ^a^M1.0153^ea^. yathā hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññānativattanaṃ visesato icchitabbameva, yato nesaṃ samadhuratāya appanā sampajjatīti, evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ kosajjauddhaccapakkhikānaṃ samarasatāya sati aññamaññūpatthambhanato sampayuttadhammānaṃ antadvayapātābhāvena sammadeva appanā ijjhati.

[03] ^b^``balavasaddho hī''^eb^tiādi nidassanavasena vuttaṃ. tassattho -- yo balavatiyā saddhāya samannāgato avisadañāṇo, so muddhappasanno hoti, na aveccappasanno. tathā hi so ^b^avatthusmiṃ pasīdati^eb^ seyyathāpi titthiyasāvakā. ^b^kerāṭikapakkha^eb^nti sāṭheyyapakkhaṃ bhajati. saddhāhīnāya paññāya atidhāvanto ``deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī''tiādīni parikappeti hetupaṭirūpakehi vañcito. evaṃbhūto pana sukkhatakkaviluttacitto paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ nādiyati, saññattiṃ na gacchati. tenāha ^b^``bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho hotī''^eb^ti. yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaviraho na atthāvaho anatthāvaho ca, evamidhāpi samādhivīriyānaṃ aññamaññaviraho na avikkhepāvaho vikkhepāvaho cāti veditabbaṃ. ^b^kosajjaṃ abhibhavati,^eb^ tena appanaṃ na pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo. ^b^uddhaccaṃ abhibhavatī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^tadubhaya^eb^nti taṃ saddhāpaññādvayaṃ, samādhivīriyadvayañca. ^b^samaṃ kātabba^eb^nti samarasaṃ kātabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^samādhikammikassā^eb^ti samathakammaṭṭhānikassa. ^b^eva^eb^nti evaṃ sante, saddhāya tesaṃ balavabhāve satīti attho. ^b^saddahanto^eb^ti ``pathavī pathavī''ti manasikaraṇamattena kathaṃ jhānuppattīti acintetvā ``addhā sammāsambuddhena vuttavidhi ijjhissatī''ti saddahanto saddhaṃ janento. ^b^okappento^eb^ti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena okappento pakkhandanto. ^b^ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati^eb^ samādhipadhānattā jhānassa. ^b^ubhinna^eb^nti samādhipaññānaṃ, samādhikammikassa samādhino adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha ^b^``samatāyapī''^eb^ti, samabhāvenāpīti attho. ^b^appanā^eb^ti idhādhippetāppanā. tathā hi ^b^``hotiyevā''^eb^ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati ^a^V1.0144^ea^, lokuttarappanā pana tesaṃ samabhāveneva icchitā. yathāha -- ``samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī''ti (paṭi0 ma0 2.1, 5).

[03] yadi ^a^M1.0154^ea^ visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ, samādhivīriyānañca samatā icchitā, kathaṃ satīti āha ^b^``sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭatī''^eb^ti. ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti līnuddhaccapakkhesu pañcasu indriyesu. uddhaccapakkhiye gaṇhanto ^b^``saddhāvīriyapaññāna''^eb^nti āha. aññathāpīti ca gahetabbā siyā. tathā hi ^b^``kosajjapakkhena samādhinā''^eb^ icceva vuttaṃ, na ``passaddhisamādhiupekkhāhī''ti. ^b^sā^eb^ sati. sabbesu rājakammesu niyutto ^b^sabbakammiko. tena^eb^ kāraṇena sabbattha icchitabbatthena. ^b^āha^eb^ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. sabbattha niyuttā ^b^sabbatthikā,^eb^ sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhiyena bojjhaṅgaggahaṇena atthetabbā sabbatthiyā, sabbatthiyāva ^b^sabbatthikā. citta^eb^nti kusalacittaṃ. tassa hi ^b^sati paṭisaraṇaṃ^eb^ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya. tenāha ^b^``ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ^b^cittekaggatānimittassā^eb^ti cittekaggatāya nimittassa, cittekaggatāsaṅkhātassa ca nimittassa. cittassa hi samāhitākāraṃ sallakkhetvā samathanimittaṃ rakkhantoyeva kasiṇanimittaṃ rakkhati. tasmā ^b^pathavīkasiṇādikassā^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena na kevalaṃ paṭibhāganimittasseva, atha kho samathanimittassāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^ta^eb^nti rakkhaṇakosallaṃ. ^b^idha^eb^ appanākosallakathāyaṃ ``nimittakosalla''nti ^b^adhippetaṃ,^eb^ karaṇabhāvanākosallānaṃ pageva siddhattāti adhippāyo.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ ^b^atisithilavīriyatādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena pamodanasaṃvejanavipariyāye saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^līna^eb^nti saṅkucitaṃ kosajjapakkhapatitaṃ. ^b^citta^eb^nti bhāvanācittaṃ. ^b^dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo bhāvetī^eb^ti ettha ``tayo''ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. yathā pana te bhāvetabbā, taṃ sayameva vakkhati.

[03] ^b^paritta^eb^nti appakaṃ. ^b^ujjāletukāmo^eb^ti padīpetukāmo. ^b^udakavātaṃ dadeyyā^eb^ti udakamissaṃ vātaṃ upaneyya. ^b^akālo^eb^ti nakālo, ayuttakālo vā. satiādidhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā bujjhati etāyāti katvā, taṃsamaṅgino vā bujjhatīti bodhino yogino aṅganti bojjhaṅgo ^a^V1.0145^ea^, pasattho, sundaro vā bojjhaṅgo sambojjhaṅgo ^a^M1.0155^ea^. kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā passaddhiyeva sambojjhaṅgo passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, tassa ^b^passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa. samādhisambojjhaṅgādī^eb^supi eseva nayo. ayaṃ pana viseso -- samādhissa tāva padatthalakkhaṇāni heṭṭhā āgatāneva. upapattito ikkhatīti ^b^upekkhā^eb^. sā panāyaṃ atthato tatramajjhattupekkhāva idha bojjhaṅgupekkhā veditabbā. ^b^dusamuṭṭhāpaya^eb^nti samuṭṭhāpetuṃ uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ. dhammānaṃ, dhammesu vā vicayo ^b^dhammavicayo,^eb^ paññāti attho. vīrassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā, vidhinā vā īretabbaṃ pavattetabbanti ^b^vīriyaṃ,^eb^ ussāho. pīṇeti kāyaṃ, cittaṃ ca santappetīti ^b^pīti^eb^.

[03] yaṃ yaṃ sakaṃ ^b^yathāsakaṃ,^eb^ attano attanoti attho. ^b^āhāravasenā^eb^ti paccayavasena. ^b^bhāvanā^eb^ti uppādanā, vaḍḍhanā ca. ^b^kusalākusalā^eb^ti kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena kusalā, tappaṭipakkhato akusalā. ye akusalā, te sāvajjā. ye kusalā, te anavajjā. akusalā ^b^hīnā,^eb^ itare ^b^paṇītā^eb^. kusalāpi vā hīnehi chandādīhi āraddhā ^b^hīnā,^eb^ itare ^b^paṇītā. kaṇhā^eb^ti kāḷakā cittassa apabhassarabhāvakaraṇā, ^b^sukkā^eb^ti odātā cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇā. kaṇhābhijātihetuto vā ^b^kaṇhā,^eb^ sukkābhijātihetuto ^b^sukkā^eb^. te eva ^b^sappaṭibhāgā^eb^. kaṇhā hi ujuvipaccanīkatāya sukkehi sappaṭibhāgā. tathā sukkāpi itarehi. atha vā kaṇhā ca sukkā ca sappaṭibhāgā ca ^b^kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā^eb^. sukhā hi vedanā dukkhāya vedanāya sappaṭibhāgā, dukkhā ca vedanā sukhāya sappaṭibhāgāti. ^b^anuppannassā^eb^ti anibbattassa. ^b^uppādāyā^eb^ti uppādanatthāya. ^b^uppannassā^eb^ti nibbattassa. ^b^bhiyyobhāvāyā^eb^ti punappunabhāvāya. ^b^vepullāyā^eb^ti vipulabhāvāya. ^b^bhāvanāyā^eb^ti vaḍḍhiyā. ^b^pāripūriyā^eb^ti paripūraṇatthāya.

[03] ^b^tatthā^eb^ti ``atthi bhikkhave''tiādinā dassitapāṭhe. ^b^sabhāvasāmaññalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasenā^eb^ti ekajjhaṃ katvā gahaṇe anavajjasukhavipākādikassa visuṃ visuṃ pana phusanādikassa sabhāvalakkhaṇassa, aniccādikassa sāmaññalakkhaṇassa ca paṭivijjhanavasena. ^b^pavattamanasikāro^eb^ti kusalādīnaṃ taṃtaṃsabhāvalakkhaṇādikassa yāthāvato avabujjhanavasena uppannajavanacittuppādo. so hi aviparītamanasikāratāya ^b^``yonisomanasikāro''^eb^ti vutto. tadābhogatāya āvajjanāpi taggatikāva. ruppanalakkhaṇādikampi ^a^M1.0156^ea^ idha sāmaññalakkhaṇeneva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. kusalakiriyāya ādiārambhavasena pavattavīriyaṃ dhitisabhāvatāya ``dhātū''ti vuttanti āha ^b^``ārambhadhātūti paṭhamavīriyaṃ vuccatī''^eb^ti. laddhāsevanaṃ vīriyaṃ balappattaṃ ^a^V1.0146^ea^ hutvā paṭipakkhaṃ vidhamatīti āha ^b^``kosajjato nikkhantattā tato balavatara''^eb^nti. adhimattādhimattatarānaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vidhamanasamatthaṃ paṭupaṭutarādibhāvappattaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavatara''^eb^nti. tiṭṭhati pavattati etthāti ṭhāniyā, pītisambojjhaṅgassa ṭhāniyā ^b^pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyā^eb^. ṭhātabbo vā ṭhāniyo, pītisambojjhaṅgo ṭhāniyo etesūti ^b^pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyā,^eb^ aparāparaṃ vattamānā pītisambojjhaṅgasampayuttā dhammā. yasmā pana tesu pītiyeva pītisambojjhaṅgassa visesakāraṇaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``pītiyā eva etaṃ nāma''^eb^nti. ^b^uppādakamanasikāro^eb^ti yathā manasi karoto anuppanno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjati, uppanno ca vaḍḍhati, tathā pavattamanasikāro.

[03] ^b^paripucchakatā^eb^ti pariyogāhetvā pucchakabhāvo. pañcapi hi nikāye uggahetvā ācariye pariyupāsitvā tassa tassa atthaṃ paripucchantassa, te vā saha aṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ taṃ ``idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ, imassa ko attho''ti pucchantassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti. ^b^vatthuvisadakiriyā indriyasamattapaṭipādanā^eb^ saṅkhepato, vitthārato ca pakāsitā eva. tattha pana samādhisaṃvattaniyabhāvena āgatā, idha paññāsaṃvattaniyabhāvena. yadaggena hi samādhisaṃvattanikā, tadaggena paññāsaṃvattanikā samādhissa ñāṇapaccupaṭṭhānato. ``samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.99; 5.1071) vuttaṃ. ^b^duppaññapuggalaparivajjanā^eb^ nāma duppaññānaṃ mandabuddhīnaṃ bhattanikkhittakākamaṃsanikkhittasunakhasadisānaṃ momūhapuggalānaṃ dūrato pariccajanā. ^b^paññavantapuggalasevanā^eb^ nāma paññāya katādhikārānaṃ saccapaṭiccasamuppādādīsu kusalānaṃ ariyānaṃ, vipassanākammikānaṃ vā mahāpaññānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ. ^b^gambhīrañāṇacariyapaccavekkhaṇā^eb^ti gambhīrañāṇehi caritabbānaṃ khandhāyatanadhātādīnaṃ, saccapaccayākārādidīpanānaṃ vā suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ suttantānaṃ paccavekkhaṇā. ^b^tadadhimuttatā^eb^ti paññādhimuttatā, paññāya ninnapoṇapabbhāratāti attho.

[03] ^b^apāyādī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0157^ea^ ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena jātiādiṃ atīte vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, anāgate vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakañca dukkhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. vīriyāyattassa lokiyalokuttaravisesassa adhigamo eva ānisaṃso, tassa dassanasīlatā ^b^vīriyāyatta...pe0... dassitā^eb^. sapubbabhāgo nibbānagāmimaggo ^b^gamanavīthi^eb^ gantabbā paṭipajjitabbā paṭipadāti katvā ^a^V1.0147^ea^. ^b^dāyakānaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena piṇḍāpacāyanatā^eb^ti paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalakārabhāvassa karaṇena piṇḍassa bhikkhāya paṭipūjanā. ^b^itarathā^eb^ti āmisapūjāya. ^b^kusītapuggalaparivajjanatā^eb^ti alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyadaḷhībahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhādianuyuñjanakānaṃ tiracchānakathikānaṃ puggalānaṃ dūrato pariccajanā. ^b^āraddhavīriyapuggalasevanatā^eb^ti ``divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāyā''tiādinā (vibha0 519; a0 ni0 3.16) bhāvanārambhavasena āraddhavīriyānaṃ daḷhaparakkamānaṃ puggalānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanā. ^b^sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇatā^eb^ti catubbidhasammappadhānānubhāvassa paccavekkhaṇatā. ^b^tadadhimuttatā^eb^ti tasmiṃ vīriyasambojjhaṅge adhimutti sabbiriyāpathesu ninnapoṇapabbhāratā. ettha ca thinamiddhavinodanakusītapuggalaparivajjanāaraddhavīriyapuggalasevanatadadhimuttatā paṭipakkhavidhamanapaccayūpasaṃhāravasena, apāyādibhayapaccavekkhaṇādayo samuttejanavasena ^b^vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa^eb^ uppādakā daṭṭhabbā.

[03] buddhādīsu pasādasinehābhāvena thusakharahadayā ^b^lūkhapuggalā,^eb^ tabbipariyāyena ^b^siniddhapuggalā^eb^ veditabbā. buddhādīnaṃ guṇaparidīpanā sampasādanīyasuttādayo (dī0 ni0 3.141 ādayo) ^b^pasādanīyasuttantā. imehi ākārehī^eb^ti yathāvuttehi kusalādīnaṃ sabhāvasāmaññalakkhaṇapaṭivijjhanādiākārehi ceva paripucchakatādiākārehi ca. ^b^ete dhamme^eb^ti ete kusalādīsu yonisomanasikārādike ceva dhammatthaññutādike ca.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ ^b^accāraddhavīriyatādīhī^eb^ti ativiya paggahitavīriyatādīhi. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena saṃvejanapamodanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^uddhata^eb^nti samādhiādīnaṃ mandatāya avūpasantaṃ. ^b^duvūpasamaya^eb^nti vūpasametuṃ samādhātuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ.

[03] ^b^taṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0158^ea^ ^b^ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā^eb^ti yenākārena assa yogino passaddhi samādhi upekkhāti ime passaddhiādayo dhammā pubbe yathārahaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle uppannapubbā, taṃ cittataṃsampayuttadhammānaṃ passaddhākāraṃ, samāhitākāraṃ, ajjhupekkhitākārañca upalakkhetvā upadhāretvā. ^b^tīsupi padesū^eb^ti ``atthi, bhikkhave, kāyappassaddhī''tiādinā āgatesu tīsupi vākyesu, tehi vā pakāsitesu tīsu dhammakoṭṭhāsesu. yathāsamāhitākāraṃ sallakkhetvā gayhamāno ^a^V1.0148^ea^ samatho eva samathanimittanti āha ^b^``samathanimittanti ca samathassevetamadhivacana''^eb^nti. nānārammaṇe paribbhamanena vividhaṃ aggaṃ etassāti byaggo, vikkhepo. tathā hi so anavaṭṭhānaraso, bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca vutto. ekaggatābhāvato byaggapaṭipakkhoti abyaggo, samādhi. so eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ. tenāha ^b^``avikkhepaṭṭhena ca tasseva abyagganimittanti adhivacana''^eb^nti.

[03] sarīrāvatthaṃ ñatvā mattaso paribhutto paṇītāhāro kāyalahutādīnaṃ samuṭṭhāpanena passaddhiyā paccayo hoti, tathā utusappāyaṃ, iriyāpathasappāyañca sevitaṃ, payogo ca kāyiko pavattitoti āha ^b^``paṇītabhojanasevanatā''^eb^tiādi. payogasamatādīnaṃ abhāvena sadarathakāyacittā puggalā ^b^sāraddhapuggalā^eb^. vuttavipariyāyena ^b^passaddhakāyā puggalā^eb^ veditabbā.

[03] ^b^nirassādassā^eb^ti bhāvanassādarahitassa. bhāvanā hi vīthipaṭipannā pubbenāparaṃ visesavatī pavattamānā cittassa assādaṃ upasamasukhaṃ āvahati, tadabhāvato nirassādaṃ cittaṃ hoti. ^b^saddhāsaṃvegavasenā^eb^ti saddhāvasena, saṃvegavasena ca. ^b^sampahaṃsanatā^eb^ti sammadeva pahaṃsanatā saṃvejanapubbakapasāduppādanena bhāvanā cittassa tosanā. ^b^sammāpavattassā^eb^ti līnuddhaccavirahena, samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca samaṃ, savisesañca pavattiyā sammadeva pavattassa bhāvanācittassa. ^b^ajjhupekkhanatā^eb^ti paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu abyāvaṭatā. ^b^jhānavimokkhapaccavekkhaṇatā^eb^ti paṭhamādīni jhānāni paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttatādinā teyeva vimokkhā tesaṃ ``evaṃ bhāvanā, evaṃ samāpajjanā, evaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ, evaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ, evaṃ saṃkileso, evaṃ vodāna''nti pati pati avekkhaṇā.

[03] ^b^sattamajjhattatā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0159^ea^ sattesu piyaṭṭhāniyesupi gahaṭṭhapabbajitesu majjhattākāro ajjhupekkhanā. ^b^saṅkhāramajjhattatā^eb^ti ajjhattikesu cakkhādīsu, bāhiresu pattacīvarādīsu majjhattākāro ajjhupekkhanā. sattasaṅkhārānaṃ mamāyanaṃ ^b^sattasaṅkhārakelāyanaṃ. imehākārehī^eb^ti imehi yathāvuttehi kāyacittānaṃ passaddhākārasallakkhaṇādiākārehi ceva sappāyāhārasevanādiākārehi ca. ^b^ete dhamme^eb^ti ete passaddhiādidhamme.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ ^b^paññāpayogamandatāyā^eb^ti paññābyāpārassa appabhāvena. yathā hi dānasīlāni alobhādosappadhānāni ^a^V1.0149^ea^, evaṃ bhāvanā amohappadhānā visesato appanāvahā. tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti, tadā bhāvanācittassa anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa abhiruciṃ na janeti, tena taṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. yadā ca bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti sammadeva avīthipaṭipattiyā, tadā upasamasukhassa alābhena cittaṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. tadubhayaṃ sandhāyāha ``paññāpayogamandatāyā''tiādi. ^b^na^eb^nti cittaṃ. ^b^jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni^eb^ yathārahaṃ sugatiyaṃ, duggatiyañca hontīti tadaññameva pañcavidhabandhanādikhuppipāsādiaññamaññavibādhanādihetukaṃ ^b^apāyadukkhaṃ^eb^ daṭṭhabbaṃ. tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ gahitanti atīte, anāgate ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāni. ye pana sattā āhārūpajīvino, tattha ca uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino, tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ jīvitadukkhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
