[03] ^b^sabbāneva^eb^ ^a^M1.0199^ea^ dasapi kasiṇāni. ^b^imaṃ pabhedaṃ labhantī^eb^ti imaṃ vaḍḍhanādivisesaṃ pāpuṇanti. ^b^eko^eb^ti ekacco. ^b^sañjānātī^eb^ti bhāvanāpaññāya sañjānāti. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ``āpokasiṇa''ntiādipāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[01] ^b^uparigaganatalābhimukhaṃ^eb^ ``pathavīkasiṇameko sañjānātī''ti pāḷipadāni ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. tañca kho vaḍḍhanavasena. tenāha ^b^``ekacco hi uddhameva kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetī''^eb^ti. ^b^heṭṭhābhūmitalābhimukha^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. pubbe vaḍḍhanakāle payojanaṃ anapekkhitvā vaḍḍhentānaṃ vasena vuttattā idāni ^b^``tena tena vā kāraṇena evaṃ pasāretī''^eb^ti āha, kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetīti attho. yathā kinti āha ^b^``ālokamiva dibbacakkhunā rūpadassanakāmo''^eb^ti. uddhañce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo uddhaṃ ālokaṃ pasāreti, adho ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo adho ālokaṃ pasāreti, samantato ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo samantato ālokaṃ pasāreti, evamayaṃ kasiṇanti attho.

[03] ^b^ekassā^eb^ti pathavīkasiṇādīsu ekekassa. ^b^aññabhāvānupagamanattha^eb^nti aññakasiṇabhāvānupagamanadīpanatthaṃ, na aññaṃ pathavīādi. na hi udakena ṭhitaṭṭhāne sasambhārapathavī atthi. ^b^añño kasiṇasambhedo^eb^ti āpokasiṇādinā saṅkaro. ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbesu āpokasiṇādīsu sesakasiṇesu. ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesena pharaṇappamāṇassa aggahaṇato pharaṇaṃ ^b^appamāṇaṃ^eb^. teneva hi nesaṃ kasiṇasamaññā. tathā cāha ^b^``tañhī''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^cetasā pharanto^eb^ti bhāvanācittena ālambanaṃ karonto. bhāvanācittañhi kasiṇaṃ parittaṃ vā vipulaṃ vā ekakkhaṇe sakalameva manasi karoti, na ekadesanti.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ ^b^ānantariyakammasamaṅgino^eb^ti pañcasu ānantariyakammesu yena kenaci samannāgatā. ^b^niyatamicchādiṭṭhikā^eb^ti ahetukadiṭṭhi akiriyadiṭṭhi natthikadiṭṭhīti tīsu micchādiṭṭhīsu yāya kāyaci niyatāya micchādiṭṭhiyā samannāgatā. ^b^ubhatobyañjanakapaṇḍakā^eb^ti ubhatobyañjanakā, paṇḍakā ca. kāmañcete ahetukapaṭisandhikattā vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā honti, tathāpi tibbakilesattā kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā vuttā. ^b^ahetukadvihetukapaṭisandhikā^eb^ti ahetukapaṭisandhikā ^a^V1.0188^ea^, dvihetukapaṭisandhikā ca. duhetukapaṭisandhikānampi hi ariyamaggapaṭivedho, jhānapaṭilābho ^a^M1.0200^ea^ ca natthi, tasmā tepi vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā eva.

[03] ^b^apaccanīkapaṭipadāya^eb^nti maggassa anulomapaṭipadāyaṃ saccānulomikāyaṃ vipassanāyaṃ. ^b^acchandikā^eb^ti ``kattukamyatāchandarahitā''ti ^b^sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ, tampi nibbānādhigamatthameva kattukamyatāchandaṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. uttarakurukāpi manussā mārādayo viya acchandikaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā nibbutichandarahitattā. ^b^duppaññā^eb^ti bhavaṅgapaññāya parihīnā. ``bhavaṅgapaññāya paripuṇṇāyapi yassa bhavaṅgaṃ lokuttarassa pādakaṃ na hoti, sopi duppaññoyevā''ti ^b^sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ. yasmiṃ hi bhavaṅge vattamāne taṃsantatiyaṃ lokuttaraṃ nibbattati, taṃ tassa pādakaṃ nāma hoti.

[03] ^b^kusalesu dhammesū^eb^ti anavajjadhammesu, sukhavipākadhammesu vā. ^b^okkamitu^eb^nti adhigantuṃ. ^b^kasiṇeyevā^eb^ti kasiṇakammaṭṭhāneyeva. ^b^etesa^eb^nti kammāvaraṇasamannāgatādīnaṃ. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ete vipākantarāyādayo evaṃ atthajānikarā, anatthahetubhūtā ca, tasmā. tiṇṇameva cettha antarāyānaṃ gahaṇaṃ itarassa sappaṭikārattā, kammantarāyapakkhikattā vāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^sappurisūpanissayādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena tajjaṃ yonisomanasikārādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^saddha^eb^nti kammaphalasaddhaṃ, ratanattayasaddhañca. ^b^chanda^eb^nti bhāvanānuyoge tibbakattukamyatāsaṅkhātaṃ kusalacchandaṃ. ^b^pañña^eb^nti pārihāriyapaññaṃ. ^b^vaḍḍhetvā^eb^ti yathā bhāvanā ijjhati, tathā paribrūhetvā. yaṃ panettha atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyattā, heṭṭhā vuttanayattā ca na vibhattaṃ.
[06] sesakasiṇaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti pañcamaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ ^b^``aviññāṇakāsubhesū''^eb^ti ^a^M1.0201^ea^ ^a^V1.0189^ea^ idaṃ uddhumātakādīnaṃ sabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṃ. tasmā bhūtakathanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na saviññāṇakāsubhassa akammaṭṭhānabhāvato. tathā hi vakkhati ``na kevalaṃ matasarīra''ntiādi (visuddhi0 1.122). ^b^uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā^eb^ti jīvitakkhayato upari maraṇato paraṃ. ^b^samuggatenā^eb^ti uṭṭhitena. ^b^uddhumātattā^eb^ti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ dhumātattā sūnattā. ^b^uddhumātameva uddhumātaka^eb^nti ^b^ka^eb^-kārena padavaḍḍhanamāha anatthantarato yathā ``pītakaṃ lohitaka''nti. ^b^paṭikkūlattā^eb^ti jigucchanīyattā. ^b^kucchitaṃ uddhumātaṃ uddhumātaka^eb^nti kucchanatthe vā ayaṃ ^b^ka^eb^-kāroti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ yathā ``pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī''ti (mahāva0 285; pari0 325; dī0 ni0 2.149; a0 ni0 5.213). ^b^tathārūpassā^eb^ti ``bhastā viya vāyunā''tiādinā yathārūpaṃ vuttaṃ, tathārūpassa.
[01] setarattehi paribhinnaṃ vimissitaṃ nīlaṃ ^b^vinīlaṃ,^eb^ purimavaṇṇavipariṇāmabhūtaṃ vā nīlaṃ ^b^vinīlaṃ^eb^.
[01] ^b^paribhinnaṭṭhānesu^eb^ kākakaṅkādīhi. ^b^vissandamānapubba^eb^nti vissavantapubbaṃ, tahaṃ tahaṃ paggharantapubbanti attho.
[01] ^b^apadhārita^eb^nti vivaṭaṃ ugghāṭitaṃ. ^b^khitta^eb^nti chaḍḍitaṃ, soṇasiṅgālādīhi visuṃ katvā khādanena sarīrasaṅghātato luñcitvā tahaṃ tahaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ. vividhaṃ khittanti ^b^vikkhittaṃ^eb^.

[01] ^b^purimanayenā^eb^ti ``vividhaṃ khitta''ntiādinā pubbe vuttanayena. ^b^satthena hanitvā^eb^ti verīhi khaggakaravālādinā ^a^V1.0190^ea^ satthena paharitvā. ^b^vuttanayenā^eb^ti ``aññena hattha''ntiādinā pubbe vuttanayena.
[03] abbhantarato nikkhamantehi kimīhi paggharantakimikulaṃ puḷavakanti āha ^b^``kimiparipuṇṇassā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^uddhumātakādīni^eb^ ^a^M1.0202^ea^ āmakasusānādīsu chaḍḍitāsubhāni. ^b^nissāyā^eb^ti paṭicca tānipi ārabbha. ^b^nimittāna^eb^nti uggahapaṭibhāganimittānaṃ. ^b^etāneva^eb^ uddhumātakādīneva ^b^nāmāni^eb^.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhāvetukāmenā^eb^ti uppādetukāmena. ^b^tenā^eb^ti ācariyena. ^b^assā^eb^ti yogino. ^b^asubhanimittatthāyā^eb^ti asubhanimittassa uggaṇhanatthāya, asubhe vā uggahanimittassa atthāya. ^b^gamanavidhāna^eb^nti gamanavidhi. yena vidhinā gantabbaṃ, so vidhi. uggahanimittassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya pathavīkasiṇe vuttaṃ paṭipajjanavidhiṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``appanāvidhānapariyosāna''^eb^nti.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ ^b^tāvadevā^eb^ti sutakkhaṇeyeva. ^b^atitthena^eb^ puṇṇanadīādiṃ ^b^pakkhandantena viya^eb^ anupavisantena viya. ^b^kedārakoṭiyā^eb^ti kedāramariyādāya. ^b^visabhāgarūpa^eb^nti khettarakkhikādivisabhāgavatthurūpaṃ. ^b^sarīra^eb^nti uddhumātakakaḷevaraṃ. ^b^adhunāmata^eb^nti aciramataṃ uddhumātakabhāvaṃ appattaṃ. ^b^takkayatī^eb^ti sambhāveti bhāriyaṃ katvā na maññati.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ ^b^rūpasaddādī^eb^ti ettha amanussānaṃ rūpehi, sīhabyagghādīnaṃ saddādīhi, amanussānampi vā rūpasaddādīhi. tathā ^b^sīhabyagghādīna^eb^nti yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ. ^b^aniṭṭhārammaṇābhibhūtassā^eb^ti bheravādibhāvena aniṭṭhehi ārammaṇehi abhibhūtassa ajjhotthaṭassa. ^b^na paṭisaṇṭhātī^eb^ti vidāhavasena āsaye na tiṭṭhati, ucchaḍḍetabbaṃ hotīti attho. ^b^añño^eb^ti amanussādīnaṃ vasena vā aññathā vā vuttappakārato añño ābādho hoti. ^b^so^eb^ti saṅghatthero, abhiññātabhikkhu vā. yassānena ārocitaṃ, so. ^b^katakammā^eb^ti katatheyyakammā. ^b^akatakammā^eb^ti theyyakammaṃ kātukāmā. katakammā pana idhādhippetā. tasmā ^b^te^eb^ti katakammā corā. saha oḍḍhenāti ^b^sahoḍḍhaṃ,^eb^ thenetvā gahiyamānabhaṇḍena saddhinti attho. ^b^yajamāno^eb^ti yaññaṃ yajanto ^a^V1.0191^ea^ yaññasāmiko. ``addhā imāya paṭipattiyā jarāmaraṇato muccissāmī''ti ^b^pītisomanassaṃ uppādetvā^eb^.

[01] evaṃ ^a^M1.0203^ea^ gamanavidhānaṃ ekadesena vatvā idāni aṭṭhakathāsu āgatanayena taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``aṭṭhakathāsu vuttena vidhinā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^uggaṇhanto^eb^ti uggaṇhanahetu. ^b^eko^eb^ti ayaṃ ^b^eka^eb^-saddo asahāyattho, na aññādiatthoti ^b^``adutiyo''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yathā vaṇṇādito vavatthānaṃ ekaṃsato samuditameva icchitabbaṃ sabbatthakabhāvato, na tathā sandhiāditoti dassanatthaṃ ^b^``vaṇṇatopī''^eb^tiādinā chasu ṭhānesu sampiṇḍanattho ^b^pi^eb^-saddo gahito. ^b^puna eko adutiyo^eb^tiādi gahitanimittassa yogino nivattitvā vasanaṭṭhānagamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^tabbhāgiyaññevā^eb^ti tappakkhiyaṃyeva asubhanimittamanasikārasahitameva. ^b^āsanaṃ paññapetī^eb^ti nisajjaṃ kappeti. yaṃ pana ``asubhanimittadisābhimukhe bhūmippadese''ti (visuddhi0 1.113) vakkhati, tampi imamevatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. na hi kevalena disābhimukhabhāvena kiñci ijjhati.

[03] ^b^samantā nimittupalakkhaṇā^eb^ti uddhumātakassa samantā pāsāṇādinimittasallakkhaṇā. ^b^asammohatthā^eb^ti uggahanimitte upaṭṭhite uppajjanakasammohavigamatthā. ^b^ekādasavidhenā^eb^ti vaṇṇādivasena ekādasavidhena. ^b^upanibandhanattho^eb^ti asubhārammaṇe cittaṃ upanetvā nibandhanattho. ^b^vīthisampaṭipādanatthā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānavīthiyā sammadeva paṭipādanatthā. puññakiriyavatthu adhigataṃ hotīti sambandho.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā asubhanimittassa uggaṇhanaṃ ariyamaggapadaṭṭhānassa paṭhamajjhānassa adhigamupāyo, yasmā vā ``asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhanto eko adutiyo gacchatī''ti vuttaṃ, tasmā. ^b^cittasaññattatthāyā^eb^ti sarīrasabhāvasallakkhaṇena, saṃvegajananena ca attano cittassa saññattiatthaṃ saññāpanatthaṃ. ``cittasaññatatthāyā''ti vā pāṭho, kilesavasena asaṃyatassa cittassa saṃyamanatthaṃ damanatthaṃ, na kammaṭṭhānatthanti attho. ^b^kammaṭṭhānasīsenā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānena sīsabhūtena, taṃ uttamaṅgaṃ padhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ katvā. ^b^mūlakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti pakatiyā attanā kālena kālaṃ parihariyamānaṃ buddhānussatiādisabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṃ. ``kammaṭṭhānasīsena gacchāmī''ti taṃ ^b^avissajjetvā^eb^. tenāha ^b^``taṃ manasikarontenevā''^eb^ti. ^b^sūpaṭṭhitabhāvasampādanenā^eb^ti mūlakammaṭṭhāne suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitabhāvassa sampādanena. evaṃ ^a^M1.0204^ea^ hi sati asammuṭṭhā nāma hoti. bahiddhā ^a^V1.0192^ea^ puthuttārammaṇe appavattitvā kammaṭṭhāneyeva pavattamānaṃ mānasaṃ ^b^abahigataṃ^eb^ nāma. tathābhūtena cānena rūpindriyāni appavattakiccāni katāni hontīti āha ^b^``manacchaṭṭhānaṃ...pe0... gantabba''^eb^nti.

[03] ^b^dvāraṃ sallakkhetabba^eb^nti vihāre puratthimādīsu disāsu asukadisāya idaṃ dvāraṃ, tato eva tāya disāya sallakkhitena asukadvārena nikkhantomhīti dvāraṃ upadhāretabbaṃ. ^b^tato^eb^ti dvārasallakkhaṇato pacchā. ^b^yena maggena gacchati^eb^ sayaṃ. ^b^nimittaṭṭhāna^eb^nti asubhanimittassa gaṇhanaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^āhāraṃ chaḍḍāpeyyā^eb^ti vamanaṃ kārāpeyya. ^b^kaṇṭakaṭṭhāna^eb^nti kaṇṭakavantaṃ ṭhānaṃ.

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ ^b^disā vavatthapetabbā^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^``ekasmiṃ hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^khāyatī^eb^ti upaṭṭhāti. ^b^kammaniya^eb^nti bhāvanāya kammakkhamaṃ. ^b^ubbāḷhassā^eb^ti bādhitassa. ^b^vidhāvatī^eb^ti nānārammaṇe visarati. ^b^ukkammā^eb^ti ujukaṃ anuvātato apakkamma. matakaḷevaraṃ puthujjanassa yebhuyyena bhayato upaṭṭhātīti āha ^b^``accāsanne bhayamuppajjatī''^eb^ti. ^b^anupāda^eb^nti pādasamīpaṃ. yattha ṭhitassa sukhena oloketuṃ sakkā, taṃ ^b^olokentassa phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ ^b^samantā^eb^ti samantato. puna ^b^samantā^eb^ti sāmantā samīpe. ^b^kacchako^eb^ti kāḷakacchako, ``pilakkho''tipi vadanti. ^b^kapītano^eb^ti pippalirukkho. ^b^sindī^eb^ti khuddakakhajjurī. ^b^karamandā^eb^dayo pākaṭā eva. ^b^sāmā^eb^ti sāmalatā. ^b^kāḷavallī^eb^ti kāḷavaṇṇā apattikā ekā latājāti. ^b^pūtilatā^eb^ti jīvanavalli, yā ``galocī''ti vuccati.

[03] 109^b^.^eb^ ^b^taṃ^eb^ nimittakaraṇādi ^b^idheva^eb^ yathāvutte pāsāṇādinimittakaraṇe eva ^b^antogadhaṃ^eb^ pariyāpannaṃ. ^b^sanimittaṃ karotī^eb^ti saha nimittaṃ karoti, asubhaṃ pāsāṇādinimittena saha karoti vavatthapeti. atha vā asubhanimittaṃ, pāsāṇādinimittañca saha ekajjhaṃ karonto vavatthapento ^b^``sanimittaṃ karotī''^eb^ti vutto. samānakālatādīpakena hi saha-saddena ayaṃ samāso yathā ``sacakkaṃ dehī''ti. tayidaṃ nimittakaraṇaṃ aparāparaṃ sallakkhaṇena ^a^M1.0205^ea^ hoti, na ekavāramevāti āha ^b^``punappunaṃ vavatthapento hi sanimittaṃ karotī''^eb^ti. ^b^dve^eb^ti pāsāṇāsubhanimittāni. ^b^samāsetvā^eb^ saṅgahetvā ekajjhaṃ katvā. ^b^sārammaṇa^eb^nti asubhārammaṇena saddhiṃ pāsāṇādiṃ samānārammaṇaṃ karoti, saha vā ārammaṇaṃ karoti, ekārammaṇaṃ viya ubhayaṃ ^a^V1.0193^ea^ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, ekajjhaṃ viya ca aparāparaṃ sallakkhento pāsāṇādiṃ, asubhanimittañcāti dvayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karotīti attho.

[03] ^b^attaniyo^eb^ti sako. ^b^vaṇita^eb^nti sūnaṃ. ^b^sabhāvena sarasenā^eb^ti uddhumātakabhāvasaṅkhātena attano lakkhaṇena, paresaṃ jigucchuppādanasaṅkhātena attano kiccena ca, sabhāvo eva vā tathā nipphajjanato ``raso''ti vutto.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ ^b^chabbidhena nimittaṃ gahetabba^eb^nti vaṇṇādinā chappakārena tāva uddhumātakāsubhanimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ. keci ``kaḷevarassa dīgharassādippamāṇena saddhiṃ sattavidhenā''ti vadanti, taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ natthi. ^b^liṅgato^eb^ti ettha ^b^liṅgaṃ^eb^ nāma vayo liṅgaṃ, na thanamassuādi itthipurisaliṅganti dassentena ^b^``itthiliṅgaṃ vā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^ṭhitassa^eb^ sattassa ^b^idaṃ sarīra^eb^nti sambandho. ^b^uddhumātakasaṇṭhānavaseneva,^eb^ na pākatikasaṇṭhānavasena. etena yadi tattha koci anuddhumātakabhāvappatto padeso siyā, so na gahetabboti dasseti. oḷārikāvayavavasena idaṃ saṇṭhānavavatthānaṃ, na sukhumāvayavavasenāti sīsasaṇṭhānādikaṃ navavidhameva saṇṭhānaṃ gahitaṃ.

[03] ^b^imissā disāyā^eb^ti imissā puratthimāya, dakkhiṇapacchimauttarāya disāya, anudisāya vā ṭhitoti yojanā. ^b^imasmiṃ nāma okāse hatthā^eb^ti imasmiṃ nāma bhūmippadese imassa kaḷevarassa hatthā ṭhitāti vavatthapetabbanti yojanā.

[03] ^b^adho pādatalenā^eb^tiādi nābhiyā heṭṭhā adho, tato uddhaṃ uparīti imassa vavatthānassa vasena vuttaṃ. ^b^hatthaparicchedo^eb^ heṭṭhā aṅguliaggena upari aṃsakūṭasandhinā tiriyaṃ tacapariyantena gahetabbo. esa nayo ^b^pādaparicchedā^eb^dīsupi. ^b^yattakaṃ vā pana ṭhānaṃ gaṇhatī^eb^ti sace sabbaṃ sarīraṃ paricchinditvā gahetuṃ na sakkoti, padeso tassa uddhumāto, so ^a^M1.0206^ea^ yattakaṃ sarīrappadesaṃ uddhumātakavasena ñāṇena pariggaṇhāti, ^b^tattakameva^eb^ yathāpariggahitameva. ^b^idaṃ īdisa^eb^nti idaṃ hatthādikaṃ īdisaṃ evamākāraṃ. ^b^uddhumātaka^eb^nti yathāsabhāvato ^b^paricchinditabbaṃ. visabhāge sarīre ārammaṇa^eb^nti kammaṭṭhānaṃ paṭikkūlākāro ^b^na upaṭṭhāti^eb^ na khāyati, subhato upaṭṭhaheyya. tenāha ^b^``vipphandanasseva paccayo hotī''^eb^ti, kilesaparipphandanasseva nimittaṃ hotīti attho. ^b^ugghāṭitāpī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0194^ea^ uddhumātabhāvappattāpi, sabbaso kuthitasarīrāpīti vā attho. svāyamattho ^b^paṭhamapārājike^eb^ (pārā0 67 ādayo) vinītavatthūhi dīpetabbo.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ ^b^āsevitakammaṭṭhāno^eb^ti asubhakammaṭṭhāne kataparicayo. sosānikaṅgādīnaṃ vasena ^b^parihatadhutaṅgo^eb^. catudhātuvavatthānavasena ^b^parimadditamahābhūto^eb^. salakkhaṇato ñāṇena ^b^pariggahitasaṅkhāro^eb^. paccayapariggahavasena ^b^vavatthāpitanāmarūpo^eb^. salakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya ukkaṃsanena suññatānupassanābalena ^b^ugghāṭitasattasañño^eb^. vipassanāya paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhisampāpanena ^b^katasamaṇadhammo^eb^. tato eva sabbaso kusalavāsanāya, kusalabhāvanāya ca pūraṇena ^b^vāsitavāsano bhāvitabhāvano^eb^. vivaṭṭūpanissayakusalabījena ^b^sabījo^eb^. ñāṇassa paripakkabhāvena ^b^ñāṇuttaro^eb^. yathāvuttāya paṭipattiyā kilesānaṃ tanukaraṇena ^b^appakileso. olokitolokitaṭṭhāneyevā^eb^ti uddhumātakādiasubhassa yattha yattha olokitolokitaṭṭhāne eva, tādisassa kālaviseso, asubhassa padesaviseso vā apekkhitabbo natthīti attho. ^b^no ce evaṃ upaṭṭhātī^eb^ti evaṃ yathāvuttapurisavisesassa viya paṭibhāganimittaṃ no ce upaṭṭhāti. ^b^evaṃ chabbidhenā^eb^ti evaṃ vuttākārena vaṇṇādivasena chabbidhena. ^b^punapī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. tena nimittaggahaṇavidhiṃ sampiṇḍeti, na pañcavidhataṃ. chabbidhena hi pubbe nimittaggahaṇaṃ vihitaṃ.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ ^b^asītisatasandhito^eb^ti sabbepi sandhayo tadāpi atthevāti dassanatthaṃ vatvā uddhumātabhāvena yebhuyyena na paññāyanti. ye pana paññāyanti, te vavatthapetabbāti dassetuṃ ^b^``uddhumātake panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^tayo dakkhiṇahatthasandhī^eb^ti aṃsakapparamaṇibandhānaṃ vasena ^a^M1.0207^ea^ tayo dakkhiṇahatthasandhayo. tathā vāmahatthasandhayo. kaṭijaṇṇugopphakānaṃ vasena tayo dakkhiṇapādasandhayo. tathā vāmapādasandhayo. ^b^eko kaṭisandhī^eb^ti kaṭiyā saddhiṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakasandhiṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^hatthantara^eb^nti dakkhiṇahatthadakkhiṇapassānaṃ, vāmahatthavāmapassānañca antaraṃ vivaraṃ. ^b^pādantara^eb^nti ubhinnaṃ pādānaṃ vemajjhaṃ. ^b^udarantara^eb^nti nābhiṭṭhānasaññitaṃ kucchivemajjhaṃ, udarassa vā abbhantaraṃ. ^b^kaṇṇantara^eb^nti kaṇṇachiddaṃ. ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, tena nāsacchiddādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. akkhīnaṃ, mukhassa ca vasenāpi vivaraṃ labbhatevāti dassetuṃ ^b^``akkhīnampī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^samantato^eb^ti evaṃ sandhiādito uddhumātakaṃ vavatthapentassa ce nimittaṃ upatiṭṭhati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. no ce, samantato vavatthapetabbanti vavatthāpanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``sakalasarīre''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ñāṇaṃ cāretvā^eb^ti sabbatthakameva sarīraṃ ^a^V1.0195^ea^ āvajjetvā tattha paṭikkūlākārasahitaṃ uddhumātakabhāvaṃ ārabbha nirantaraṃ bhāvanāñāṇaṃ pavattetvā. ^b^yaṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti evaṃ pana ñāṇaṃ cārentassa tasmiṃ sarīre yo padeso vibhūto hutvā uddhumātakākārena vibhūtabhāvena upaṭṭhāti. ^b^udarapariyosānaṃ^eb^ uparimasarīraṃ.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ ^b^vinicchayakathā^eb^ti vinicchayasahitā atthavaṇṇanā. ^b^yathāvuttanimittaggāhavasenā^eb^ti vaṇṇādito, sandhiādito ca vuttappakārauddhumātakanimittaggahaṇavasena. ^b^suṭṭhu nimittaṃ gaṇhitabba^eb^nti yathā uggahanimittaṃ upaṭṭhahati, evaṃ sammadeva asubhanimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ. idāni tameva nimittassa suṭṭhu gahaṇākāraṃ upadisanto ^b^``satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^evaṃ punappunaṃ karontenā^eb^ti yathā ``imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇato muccissāmī''ti sañjātādarena satisampajaññañca suṭṭhu upaṭṭhapetvā uddhumātakāsubhaṃ paṭhamaṃ āvajjitaṃ, evaṃ punappunaṃ tattha āvajjanaṃ karontena. ^b^sādhukaṃ upadhāretabbañceva vavatthapetabbañcā^eb^ti sakkaccaṃ satiyā sallakkhetabbañceva paññāya nicchetabbañca. sati hi ``dhāraṇā''ti niddiṭṭhā, ^b^dhāraṇa^eb^ñcettha sallakkhaṇaṃ. paññā ``pavicayo''ti (dha0 sa0 16) niddiṭṭhā, ^b^pavicayo^eb^ cettha nicchayoti. atha vā ^b^upadhāretabba^eb^nti satipubbaṅgamāya paññāya upalakkhetabbaṃ ^a^M1.0208^ea^. na hi kadāci satirahitā paññā atthi. ^b^vavatthapetabba^eb^nti paññāpubbaṅgamāya satiyā nicchinitabbaṃ. paññāsahitā eva hi sati idhādhippetā, na tabbirahitā. addhakkhiapaṅgādivasenāpi olokanaṃ atthīti ^b^``ummīletvā oloketvā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tena paribyattameva olokanaṃ dasseti. ^b^evaṃ punappunaṃ karontassā^eb^ti vuttappakārena cakkhuṃ ummīletvā olokanaṃ, nimmīletvā āvajjanañca aparāparaṃ anekavāraṃ karontassa. ^b^uggahanimitta^eb^nti uddhumātake uggaṇhananimittaṃ. ^b^suggahita^eb^nti suṭṭhu gahitaṃ. yathā na vinassati na pamuṭṭhaṃ hoti, evaṃ gahitaṃ. ^b^ekasadisa^eb^nti samānasadisaṃ. samānattho hi ayaṃ ^b^eka^eb^-saddo, yathā ``ariyavinayeti vā, sappurisavinayeti vā, esese eke ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāte taññe vā''ti.

[03] ^b^āgamanakāle^eb^ti vihārato susānaṃ uddissa āgamanakāle. ^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti atidesavasena dīpitampi atthaṃ ``ekakenā''tiādinā sarūpato dasseti. tattha ^b^tadeva kammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti uddhumātakakammaṭṭhānaṃ. mūlakammaṭṭhānanti eke, tadayuttaṃ. upaṭṭhitanimittaṃ hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā ^a^V1.0196^ea^ kammaṭṭhānantaramanasikāro rañño rajjaṃ chaḍḍetvā videsagamanaṃ viyāti. ^b^āgatenā^eb^ti attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgatena.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ ^b^avelāya^eb^nti sañjhāvelādiayuttavelāyaṃ. ^b^bībhaccha^eb^nti virūpaṃ. ^b^bheravārammaṇa^eb^nti vetāḷasadisaṃ bhayānakaṃ visayaṃ. ^b^vikkhittacitto^eb^ti bhīrukapuriso viya pisācādiṃ disvā cittavikkhepaṃ patto. ^b^ummattako viyā^eb^ti yakkhummattako viya ekacco hoti. ^b^jhānavibbhantako^eb^ti jhānato viccutako sīlavibbhantakamantavibbhantakā viya. ^b^santhambhetvā^eb^ti uppannaparittāsavūpasamanena vigatakampatāya niccalo hutvā. ^b^satiṃ sūpaṭṭhita^eb^ntiādi santhambhanassa upāyadassanaṃ. ^b^matasarīraṃ uṭṭhahitvā anubandhanakaṃ^eb^ nāma natthi asati tādise mantappayoge. sopi uddhumātakādibhāvamappatte avinaṭṭharūpe eva ijjhati, tathā devatādhiggaho, na evarūpeti adhippāyo. ^b^saññajo^eb^ti bhāvanāparikappasaññāya jāto. tato eva ^b^saññāsambhavo^eb^ saññāmattasamuṭṭhāno. ^b^tāsaṃ vinodetvā^eb^ti nimittupaṭṭhānanimittaṃ uppannacittasantāsaṃ vuttappakārena vinodetvā vūpasametvā ^a^M1.0209^ea^. ``idāni tava parissamo sapphalo jāto''ti ^b^hāsaṃ^eb^ pītiṃ pamodanaṃ ^b^uppādetvā. cittaṃ sañcarāpetabba^eb^nti bhāvanācittaṃ pavattetabbaṃ manasikātabbaṃ.

[01] ^b^nimittaggāha^eb^nti nimittassa uggaṇhanaṃ, uggahanimittaṃ. ^b^sampādento^eb^ti sādhento nipphādento. ^b^kammaṭṭhānaṃ upanibandhatī^eb^ti bhāvanaṃ yathāvutte nimitte upanento nibandhati. yogakammaṃ hi yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato ``kammaṭṭhāna''nti adhippetaṃ, yogakammassa vā pavattiṭṭhānatāya yathāupaṭṭhitanimittaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ bhāvanācitte upanibandhati. taṃ panassa upanibandhanaṃ sandhāya cittaṃ sañcarāpetabbaṃ. evaṃ ``visesamadhigacchatī''ti vuttanti dassento ^b^``tassa hī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^tassā^eb^ti yogino, tassa vā uddhumātakāsubhassa. ^b^mānasaṃ cārentassā^eb^ti bhāvanācittaṃ aparāparaṃ pavattentassa, uggahanimittaṃ punappunaṃ manasi karontassāti attho.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ ^b^``vīthisampaṭipādanatthā''^eb^ti padassa ``kammaṭṭhānavīthiyā sampaṭipādanatthā''ti atthaṃ vatvā taṃ pana kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ, tassā ca sampaṭipādanavidhiṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^``sace hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^katimī^eb^ti pakkhassa katamī, kiṃ dutiyā, tatiyādīsu vā aññatarāti attho. ^b^tuṇhībhūtena gantuṃ na vaṭṭati^eb^ pucchantānaṃ cittassa aññathattapariharaṇatthaṃ. appasannānañhi pasādāya, pasannānañca bhiyyobhāvāya sāsanasampaṭipatti. ^b^nassatī^eb^ti na dissati ^a^V1.0197^ea^, na upaṭṭhātīti attho. ^b^``āgantukapaṭisanthāro kātabbo''^eb^ti iminā āgantukavattaṃ ekadesena dassitanti ``avasesānipī''ti vatvā āgantukavattaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ gahetuṃ puna ^b^āgantuka^eb^ggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. ^b^gamikavattādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena āvāsikānumodanapiṇḍacārikānumodanapiṇḍacārikāaraññikasenāsanavaccakuṭivattādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^vattakkhandhake^eb^ (cūḷava0 356) hi āgatāni mahāvattāni idha ^b^``khandhakavattānī''^eb^ti vuttāni. tajjanīyakammakatādikāle pana pārivāsikādikāle ca caritabbāni imassa bhikkhuno asambhavato idha nādhippetāni. ^b^nimittaṃ vā antaradhāyatī^eb^ti susāne ṭhitaṃ asubhanimittaṃ uddhumātakabhāvāpagamena antaradhāyati. tenāha ^b^``uddhumātaka''^eb^ntiādi. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti tena ^a^M1.0210^ea^ kāraṇena, imassa kammaṭṭhānassa dullabhattāti attho. nisīditvā paccavekkhitabboti sambandho.

[03] nimittaṃ gahetuṃ gamane viya nimittaṃ gahetvā nivattanepi yathāsallakkhitadisādipaccavekkhaṇaṃ yāva nimittavināsā pavattitakiriyāya avicchedena upadhāraṇatthaṃ. sati hi tassa nirantarūpadhāraṇe vihāraṃ pavisitvā nisinnakāle kammaṭṭhānassa upaṭṭhitākāro samathanimittassa gahaṇe cittassa samāhitākāro viya pākaṭo hutvā upatiṭṭheyyāti. tenāha ^b^``tassevaṃ...pe0... vīthiṃ paṭipajjatī''^eb^ti. purimākārena nimittassa pākaṭabhāvena upaṭṭhitattā purimākāreneva kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro bhāvanāvīthiṃ paṭipajjati.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ uddhumātakaṃ nāma ativiya asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlaṃ bībhacchaṃ bhayānakañca, evarūpe ārammaṇe bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa evaṃ ābaddhaparikammassa thirībhūtasseva yogino adhippāyo samijjhatīti dassetuṃ ^b^``ānisaṃsadassāvī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^eva^eb^nti evameva vuttappakāreneva ānisaṃsadassāvinā. ^b^taṃ rakkheyyā^eb^ti ``addhā iminā sukhaṃ jīvissāmī''ti attano jīvitaṃ viya taṃ maṇiratanaṃ rakkheyya. ^b^catudhātukammaṭṭhāniko^eb^tiādi nesaṃ kammaṭṭhānānaṃ sulabhatādassanaṃ. tattha ^b^catudhātukammaṭṭhāniko^eb^ti catudhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ vā tattha vā niyutto, catudhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ vā pariharanto. ^b^itarānī^eb^ti vuttāvasiṭṭhāni anussatibrahmavihārādīni. ^b^taṃ nimitta^eb^nti taṃ yathāladdhaṃ uggahanimittaṃ. ^b^``rakkhitabba''^eb^nti vatvā rakkhaṇavidhiṃ puna dassetuṃ ^b^``rattiṭṭhāne''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ nānā karīyati etenāti ^b^nānākaraṇaṃ,^eb^ bhedo. ^b^bībhacchaṃ bheravadassanaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti^eb^ manasikārassa ^a^V1.0198^ea^ anuḷāratāya, anupasantatāya ca ārammaṇassa. tabbipariyāyato ``paṭibhāganimittaṃ thūlaṅgapaccaṅgapuriso viya upaṭṭhātī''ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^bahiddhā^eb^ti gocarajjhattato bahiddhā. ^b^kāmānaṃ amanasikārā^eb^ti asubhabhāvanānubhāvena kāmasaññāya dūrasamussāritattā kāmaguṇe ārabbha manasikārasseva abhāvā. ^b^amanasikārā^eb^ti vā manasikārapaṭipakkhahetu. yāya hi kāmasaññāya vasena sattā kāme manasi karonti, tassā paṭipakkhabhūtā asubhasaññā kāmānaṃ amanasikāro, tannimittanti attho. tenāha ^a^M1.0211^ea^ ^b^``vikkhambhanavasena kāmacchando pahīyatī''^eb^ti. paṭibhāganimittārammaṇāya hi asubhasaññāya saddhiṃ balappatto samādhi uppajjamānova kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambheti, anurodhamūlako āghāto mūlakāraṇe vikkhambhite vikkhambhitoyeva hotīti āha ^b^``anunaya...pe0... pahīyatī''^eb^ti. na hi kadāci pahīnānunayassa byāpādo sambhavati. yathāvuttāsubhasaññāsahagatā hi pīti sātisayā pavattamānāva byāpādaṃ vikkhambhentī pavattati. ^b^tathā āraddhavīriyatāyā^eb^ti yathā upacārajjhānaṃ uppajjati, tathā kammaṭṭhānamanasikāravasena paggahitavīriyatāya. vīriyañhi paggaṇhantassa sammāsaṅkappo micchāsaṅkappaṃ viya savipphāratāya ^b^thinamiddhaṃ^eb^ vikkhambhentameva uppajjati.

[03] vippaṭisāro pacchānutāpo, tappaṭipakkhato ^b^avippaṭisāro^eb^ darathapariḷāhābhāvena cittassa nibbutatā. tassa avippaṭisārassa paccayabhūtaṃ sīlaṃ, taṃsahagatā tadupanissayā ca pītipassaddhisukhādayo sabhāvato, hetuto ca santasabhāvā, tesaṃ anuyuñjanena avūpasantasabhāvaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyatīti āha ^b^``avippaṭisārakarasantadhammānuyogavasena uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyatī''^eb^ti. bhāvanāya hi pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahantiyā yaṃ sātisayaṃ sukhaṃ labbhati, taṃ anupasantasabhāvaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vikkhambhentameva uppajjati. ^b^adhigatavisesassā^eb^ti yathādhigatassa bhāvanāvisesassa. ^b^paccakkhatāyā^eb^ti paṭipajjantassa yogino paccakkhabhāvato ``sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā, yo evarūpiṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ desetī''ti ^b^paṭipattidesake satthari. paṭipattiya^eb^nti paṭipajjamānajjhānapaṭipattiyaṃ. ^b^paṭipattiphale^eb^ti tāya sādhetabbe lokiyalokuttaraphale. ^b^vicikicchā pahīyati^eb^ dhammanvayavicārāhitabalena vicārabalena. ^b^iti pañca nīvaraṇāni pahīyantī^eb^ti evaṃ paṭibhāganimittapaṭilābhasamakālameva heṭṭhā pavattabhāvanānubhāvanipphannehi samādhiādīhi kāmacchandādīni pañca nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanavasena pahīyanti. na hi paṭipakkhena vinā pahātabbassa pahānaṃ sambhavati, paṭipakkhā ^a^V1.0199^ea^ ca samādhiādayo kāmacchandādīnaṃ. yathāha ^b^peṭake^eb^ ``samādhi kāmacchandassa paṭipakkho''tiādi.

[01] teneva ^a^M1.0212^ea^ ca ``imehi tesaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ pahāna''nti pahānaparidīpanamukhena jhānaṅgāni sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^``tasmiññeva cā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^tasmiññeva cā^eb^ti yaṃ taṃ yathāupaṭṭhitaṃ uggahanimittaṃ bhinditvā viya upaṭṭhitaṃ, tassa paṭicchannabhūtaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ, tasmiññeva nimitte. ^b^cetaso^eb^ti attanā sampayuttacittassa. ^b^abhiniropanalakkhaṇo^eb^ti āropanalakkhaṇo, appanāsabhāvoti attho. nimittānumajjanaṃ paṭibhāganimitte anuvicaraṇaṃ. ārammaṇe hi bhamarassa padumassūpari anuparibbhamanaṃ viya vicārassa anuvicāraṇākārena pavatti ^b^anumajjanakiccaṃ^eb^. viseso eva adhigantabbato visesādhigamo, paṭiladdho ca so visesādhigamo cāti paṭi...pe0... gamo, tappaccayā taṃhetukā ^b^paṭiladdhavisesādhigamapaccayā pīti. pītimanassa^eb^ pītisahitacittassa. ^b^passaddhisambhavato^eb^ti kāyacittapassaddhīnaṃ saṃsijjhanato. ``pītimanassa kāyo passambhatī''ti hi vuttaṃ. ^b^passaddhinimittaṃ^eb^ passaddhihetukaṃ ^b^sukhaṃ^eb^ ``passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vediyatī''ti vacanato. ^b^sukhanimittā^eb^ sukhapaccayā ^b^ekaggatā^eb^. ``sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī''ti (dī0 ni0 1.466; a0 ni0 3.96; 11.12) hi vuttaṃ. ^b^iti jhānaṅgāni pātubhavantī^eb^ti evaṃ etāni vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni tasmiṃyeva nimitte uppajjanti. ^b^paṭhamajjhānapaṭibimbabhūta^eb^nti paṭhamajjhānassa paṭicchannabhūtaṃ. ^b^taṅkhaṇaññeva^eb^ paṭibhāganimittapaṭilābhasamakālameva upacārajjhānampi ^b^nibbattati,^eb^ na nīvaraṇappahānamevāti adhippāyo.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ ^b^vinīlakādīsu^eb^pi kammaṭṭhānesu. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ vutta^eb^nti yaṃ taṃ nimittaggahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti uddhumātake vuttanayeneva. saha vinicchayena, adhippāyena cāti ^b^savinicchayādhippāyaṃ. taṃ sabbaṃ^eb^ lakkhaṇaṃ ^b^veditabba^eb^nti sambandho.
[03] ^b^kabarakabaravaṇṇa^eb^nti yebhuyyena sabalavaṇṇaṃ. ^b^ussadavasenā^eb^ti rattasetanīlavaṇṇesu ussadassa vaṇṇassa vasena.
[03] ^b^sannisinna^eb^nti ^a^V1.0200^ea^ niccalabhāveneva sabbaso thirataṃ.

[03] ^b^corāṭaviya^eb^nti corehi pariyuṭṭhitāraññe. ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yasmiṃ āghātane. ^b^chinnapurisaṭṭhāne^eb^ti chinnapurisavante ṭhāne. ^b^nānādisāyaṃ patitampī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0213^ea^ chinnaṃ hutvā sarīrassa khaṇḍadvayaṃ visuṃ disāsu patitampi. ^b^ekāvajjanenā^eb^ti ekasamannāhārena. ^b^āpāthamāgacchatī^eb^ti ekajjhaṃ āpāthaṃ āgacchati. ^b^vissāsaṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti ajegucchitaṃ upagaccheyya seyyathāpi chavaḍāhako. sahatthā aparāmasane jigucchā saṇṭhātiyevāti āha ^b^``kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā daṇḍakena vā...pe0... upanāmetabba''^eb^nti. vicchiddakabhāvapaññāyanatthaṃ ekaṅgulantarakaraṇaṃ. ^b^upanāmetabba^eb^nti upanetabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^khāyitasadisamevā^eb^ti khāyitāsubhasadisameva. ^b^aṅgulaṅgulantara^eb^nti vividhaṃ khittaṃ sarīrāvayavaṃ aṅgulantaraṃ aṅgulantaraṃ. ^b^katvā vā^eb^ti kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā daṇḍakena vā sayaṃ katvā vā.
[03] ^b^laddhappahārāna^eb^nti laddhāvudhappahārānaṃ mukhatoti sambandho. ^b^mukhato^eb^ti pahārādimukhato. ^b^paggharamānakāle^eb^ti lohitaṃ paggharamānakāle. lohitakaṃ labbhatīti yojanā.
[03] ^b^ta^eb^nti puḷavakaṃ. ^b^tesū^eb^ti soṇādisarīresu. ^b^aṭṭhika^eb^nti aṭṭhikāsubhaṃ nānappakārato vuttanti sambandho. ^b^purimanayenevā^eb^ti pubbe uddhumātake vuttanayeneva.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ ^b^ta^eb^nti aṭṭhikaṃ. ^b^na upaṭṭhātī^eb^ti sabhāvato na upaṭṭhāti, paṭikkūlavasena na upaṭṭhātīti attho. tenāha ^b^``odātakasiṇasambhedo hotī''^eb^ti. aṭṭhike paṭhamavayādisaṃlakkhaṇaṃ na sakkāti ^b^``liṅganti idha hatthādīnaṃ nāma''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikā pana ``ayaṃ daharassa, ayaṃ yobbane ṭhitassa, ayaṃ avayavehi vuddhipattissā''ti evaṃ vayavasena vavatthapetuṃ sakkuṇeyyāva, abyāpitāya pana na gahitanti veditabbaṃ. yadipi aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikāyaṃ sandhito vavatthāpanaṃ labbhati, aṭṭhike pana na labbhatīti tassa aniyatabhāvadīpanatthaṃ kamavilaṅghanaṃ katvā ^b^``tassa tassa aṭṭhino ninnaṭṭhānathalaṭṭhānavasenā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ninnaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ nāma aṭṭhino vinatappadeso. ^b^thalaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ unnatappadeso. ^b^ghaṭitaghaṭitaṭṭhānavasenā^eb^ti anupagatanhārubandhānaṃ, itaresañca aññamaññaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkiliṭṭhaṭṭhānavasena. ^b^antaravasenā^eb^ti aññamaññassa antaravasena, susiravasena ca. ^b^sabbatthevā^eb^ti sakalāya aṭṭhisaṅkhalikāya, sabbasmiṃ vā aṭṭhike.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ ^b^etthā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0214^ea^ ^a^V1.0201^ea^ etasmiṃ aṭṭhikāsubhe. ^b^yujjamānavasena sallakkhetabba^eb^nti yaṃ nimittaggahaṇaṃ yattha yujjati, taṃ tattha uggaṇhanatthaṃ nimittaggahaṇavasena upalakkhetabbaṃ. ^b^sakalāyā^eb^ti anavasesabhāgāya paripuṇṇāvayavāya. ^b^sampajjati^eb^ nimittupaṭṭhānavasena. ^b^tesū^eb^ti aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṭṭhikesu. ^b^vuttaṃ^eb^ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. ^b^ta^eb^nti ``ekasadisamevā''ti vacanaṃ. ^b^ekasmiṃ aṭṭhike yutta^eb^nti idaṃ yathā vinīlakādīsu ubhinnaṃ nimittānaṃ yathārahaṃ vaṇṇavisesato, paripuṇṇāparipuṇṇato, savivarāvivarato, calācalato ca viseso labbhati, na evametassāti katvā vuttaṃ, na pana sabbena sabbaṃ visesābhāvato. tenevāha ^b^``ekaṭṭhikepi cā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^bībhacchenā^eb^ti suvibhūtāṭṭhirūpattā aṭṭhibhāveneva virūpena. ^b^bhayānakenā^eb^ti teneva pākatikasattānaṃ bhayāvahena. ^b^pītisomanassajanakenā^eb^ti saṇhamaṭṭhabhāvena upaṭṭhānato, bhāvanāya ca savisesattā pītiyā, somanassassa ca uppādakena. tenevāha ^b^``upacārāvahattā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^imasmiṃ okāse^eb^ti uggahapaṭibhāganimittānaṃ vuttaṭṭhāne. ^b^dvāraṃ datvā vā^eb^ti ``paṭikkūlabhāveyeva diṭṭhe nimittaṃ nāma hotī''ti ettake eva aṭṭhatvā anantarameva ``duvidhaṃ idha nimitta''ntiādinā uggahapaṭibhāganimittāni vibhajitvā vacanena yathāvuttassa nimittavibhāgassa dvāraṃ datvāva vuttaṃ. ^b^nibbikappa^eb^nti ``subha''nti vikappena nibbikappaṃ, asubhantvevāti attho. ^b^vicāretvā^eb^ti ``ekasmiṃ aṭṭhike yutta''ntiādinā vicāretvā.

[03] ^b^mahātissattherassā^eb^ti cetiyapabbatavāsīmahātissattherassa. ^b^nidassanānī^eb^ti dantaṭṭhikamattadassanena sakalassāpi tassā itthiyā ^b^sarīrassa aṭṭhisaṅghātabhāvena upaṭṭhānādīni ettha^eb^ aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhāne uggahapaṭibhāganimittānaṃ visesavibhāvanāni udāharaṇāni.

[03] ^b^subhaguṇo^eb^ti savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahīnattā suparisuddhaguṇo. ^b^dasasatalocanenā^eb^ti sahassakkhena devānamindena. so hi ekāsaneneva sahassātthānaṃ vicāraṇasamatthena paññācakkhunā samannāgatattā ``sahassakkho''ti vuccati. ^b^thutakittī^eb^ti ``yo dhīro sabbadhi danto''tiādinā (mahāva0 58) abhitthutakittisaddo.

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ ujupaṭipakkhena ^a^M1.0215^ea^ ^a^V1.0202^ea^ pahīnabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``suvikkhambhitarāgattā''^eb^ti. ^b^asubhappabhedo^eb^ti uddhumātakādiasubhavibhāgo. ^b^sarīrasabhāvappattivasenā^eb^ti sarīrassa attano sabhāvūpagamanavasena. sarīrañhi vinassamānaṃ aññarūpena ṭhitassa rakkhasassa viya sabhāvappattivaseneva vinassati. ^b^rāgacaritabhedavasenā^eb^ti rāgacaritavibhāgavasena. yadi sarīrasabhāvappattivasena ayamasubhappabhedo vutto, ^b^mahāsatipaṭṭhānādīsu^eb^ (dī0 ni0 2.372 ādayo; ma0 ni0 1.105 ādayo) kathaṃ navappabhedoti? so sarasato eva sabhāvappattivasena vutto, ayaṃ pana parūpakkamenāpi. tattha ca idhāgatesu dasasu asubhesu ekaccāneva gahitāni, aṭṭhikañca pañcavidhā vibhattaṃ. tāni ca vipassanāvasena, imāni samathavasenāti pākaṭoyaṃ bhedoti.

[03] imesaṃ pana dassanampi asubhabhāvasāmaññena satipi avisesato rāgacaritānaṃ sappāyabhāve yaṃ vuttaṃ ``rāgacaritabhedavasena cā''ti, taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^``visesato''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. sūnabhāvena susaṇṭhitampi sarīraṃ dussaṇṭhitameva hotīti uddhumātakasarīre saṇṭhānavipattiṃ dīpetīti āha ^b^``sarīrasaṇṭhānavipattippakāsanato''^eb^ti. saṇṭhānasampattiyaṃ ratto ^b^saṇṭhānarāgī,^eb^ tassa ^b^sappāyaṃ^eb^ saṇṭhānarāgassa vikkhambhanupāyabhāvato. kāyo eva ^b^kāyavaṇo,^eb^ tattha ^b^paṭibaddhassa^eb^ nissitassa. ^b^susirabhāvappakāsanato^eb^ti susirassa vivarassa atthibhāvappakāsanato. ^b^sarīre ghanabhāvarāgino^eb^ti sarīre aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ thirabhāvaṃ paṭicca uppajjanakarāgavato. ^b^vikkhepappakāsanato^eb^ti soṇasiṅgālādīhi ito cito ca vikkhepassa pakāsanato ^b^aṅgapaccaṅgalīlārāgino sappāyaṃ^eb^. īdisānaṃ kira anavaṭṭhitarūpānaṃ avayavānaṃ ko līḷāvilāsoti virāgasambhavato. ^b^saṅghātabhedavikārappakāsanato^eb^ti saṅghātassa aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ saṃhatabhāvassa susambandhatāya bhedo eva vikāro saṅghātabhedavikāro, tassa pakāsanato. lohitaṃ makkhitaṃ hutvā paṭikkūlabhāvo ^b^lohitamakkhitapaṭikkūlabhāvo,^eb^ tassa ^b^pakāsanato. mamattarāgino^eb^ti ``mama aya''nti uppajjanakarāgavato. ^b^dantasampattirāgino^eb^ti dantasampattiyaṃ rajjanasīlassa.

[03] kasmā ^a^M1.0216^ea^ panettha uddhumātakādike paṭhamajjhānameva uppajjati, na dutiyādīnīti anuyogaṃ ^a^V1.0203^ea^ manasi katvā āha ^b^``yasmā panā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^aparisaṇṭhitajalāyā^eb^ti sotavasena pavattiyā samantato aṭṭhitajalāya asannisinnasalilāya. ^b^arittabalenā^eb^ti pājanadaṇḍabalena. ^b^dubbalattā ārammaṇassā^eb^ti paṭikkūlabhāvena attani cittaṃ ṭhapetuṃ asamatthabhāvo ārammaṇassa dubbalatā. paṭikkūle hi ārammaṇe sarasato cittaṃ pavattituṃ na sakkoti, abhiniropanalakkhaṇena pana vitakkena abhiniropiyamānameva cittaṃ ekaggataṃ labhati. ^b^na vinā vitakkenā^eb^ti vitakkarahitāni dutiyādijjhānāni tattha patiṭṭhaṃ na labhanti. tenāha ^b^``vitakkabalenevā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] yadi paṭikkūlabhāvato uddhumātādiārammaṇe dutiyādijjhānāni na pavattanti, evaṃ sante paṭhamajjhānenāpi tattha na uppajjitabbaṃ. na hi tattha pītisomanassānaṃ sambhavo yuttoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``paṭikkūlepi ca etasmi''^eb^ntiādi. tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitānīvaraṇasantāparogavūpasamānaṃ yathākkamaṃ pupphacchaḍḍaka, vamanavirecanaupamā yojetabbā.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ yathāvuttakāraṇena dasadhā vavatthitampi sabhāvato ekavidhamevāti dassetuṃ ^b^``dasavidhampi ceta''^eb^ntiādiṃ vatvā svāyaṃ sabhāvo yathā aviññāṇakesu, evaṃ saviññāṇakesupi labbhateva. tasmā tatthāpi yonisomanasikāravato bhāvanā ijjhatevāti dassento ^b^``tadetaṃ iminā lakkhaṇenā''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ jīvamānakasarīre. ^b^alaṅkārenā^eb^ti paṭijagganapubbakena alaṅkaraṇena. ^b^na paññāyati^eb^ pacurajanassāti adhippāyo. ^b^atirekatisatāṭṭhikasamussayaṃ^eb^ dantaṭṭhikehi saddhiṃ, tehi pana vinā ``timattāni aṭṭhisatānī''ti (visuddhi0 1.190) kāyagatāsatiyaṃ vakkhati. ^b^chiddāvachidda^eb^nti khuddānukhuddachiddavantaṃ. ^b^medakathālikā^eb^ medabharitabhājanaṃ. ^b^niccuggharitapaggharita^eb^nti niccakālaṃ upari, heṭṭhā ca vissavantaṃ. ^b^vematta^eb^nti nānattaṃ. ^b^nānāvatthehī^eb^ti nānāvaṇṇehi vatthehi. hiriyā lajjāya kopanato vināsanato ^b^hirikopinaṃ,^eb^ uccārapassāvamaggaṃ. ^b^yāthāvasarasa^eb^nti yathābhūtaṃ sabhāvaṃ. yāthāvato rasīyati ñāyatīti hi ^b^raso,^eb^ sabhāvo. ^b^rati^eb^nti abhiratiṃ abhiruciṃ. attasinehasaṅkhātena ^a^M1.0217^ea^ rāgena rattā ^b^attasineharāgarattā. vihaññamānenā^eb^ti icchitālābhena vighātaṃ āpajjantena.

[03] ^b^kiṃsuka^eb^nti pālibhaddakaṃ, palāsoti keci, simbalīti apare. ^b^atilolupo^eb^ti ativiya lolasabhāvo ^a^V1.0204^ea^. ^b^adu^eb^nti etaṃ. ^b^na^eb^nti kesādisarīrakoṭṭhāsaṃ. ^b^mucchitā^eb^ti mohitā, mucchāpāpikāya vā taṇhāya vasena mucchaṃ pattā. ^b^sabhāva^eb^nti paṭikkūlabhāvaṃ.

[03] ^b^ukkarūpamo^eb^ti uccārapassāvaṭṭhānasamo, vaccakūpasamo vā. ^b^cakkhubhūtehī^eb^ti cakkhuṃ pattehi paṭiladdhapaññācakkhukehi, lokassa vā cakkhubhūtehi. ^b^allacammapaṭicchanno^eb^ti allacammapariyonaddho.

[03] ^b^dabbajātikenā^eb^ti uttarimanussadhamme paṭiladdhuṃ bhabbarūpena. ^b^yattha yattha^eb^ sarīre, sarīrassa vā yattha yattha koṭṭhāse. ^b^nimittaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti asubhākārassa suṭṭhu sallakkhaṇavasena yathā uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati, evaṃ uggaṇhanavasena nimittaṃ gahetvā, uggahanimittaṃ uppādetvāti attho. ^b^kammaṭṭhānaṃ appanaṃ pāpetabba^eb^nti yathāladdhe uggahanimitte kammaṃ karontena paṭibhāganimittaṃ uppādetvā upacārajjhāne ṭhitena tameva bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpentena asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ appanaṃ pāpetabbaṃ. adhigatappano hi paṭhamajjhāne ṭhito tameva jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā saṅkhāre sammasanto nacirasseva sabbāsave khepetīti.
[06] asubhakammaṭṭhānaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti chaṭṭhaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ ^b^asubhānantara^eb^nti ^a^M1.0218^ea^ ^a^V1.0205^ea^ asubhakammaṭṭhānānantaraṃ. ^b^anussatīsū^eb^ti anussatikammaṭṭhānesu. ``anu anu sati anussatī''ti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``punappunaṃ uppajjanato''^eb^ti vatvā na ettha ^b^anu^eb^-saddayogena sati-saddo atthantaravācakoti dassetuṃ ^b^``satiyeva anussatī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tena nāyamanu-saddo ``upalabbhatī''tiādīsu upa-saddo viya anatthako, nāpi ``sañjānanaṃ pajānana''ntiādīsu saṃ-saddādayo viya atthantaradīpakoti dasseti. ``pavattitabbaṭṭhānamhiyeva vā pavattattā''ti iminā ca anussatiyā anussaritabbānurūpatā vuttā hotīti pavattakasseva anurūpataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``kulaputtassa anurūpā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, saddhāpabbajitassa vā kulaputtassa. anurūpatā nāma pavattitabbaṭṭhānassa anurūpatāya eva hotīti pavattakasseva anurūpatā vuttā, na ubhayassa. ^b^anurūpā^eb^ti ca yuttāti attho. ^b^buddha^eb^nti ye guṇe upādāya bhagavati ``buddho''ti paññatti, te guṇe ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. tenāha ^b^``buddhaguṇārammaṇāya satiyā etamadhivacana''^eb^nti. ^b^ārabbhā^eb^ti ālambitvā. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti pariyattidhammena saddhiṃ navavidhampi lokuttaradhammaṃ. nanu ca nibbānaṃ visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena vakkhati? kiñcāpi vakkhati, dhammabhāvasāmaññena pana maggaphalehi saddhiṃ idha pāḷiyā saṅgahitattā tassāpi dhammānussatikammaṭṭhāne gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, asaṅkhatāmatādibhāvena pana maggaphalehi visiṭṭhatāya tassa visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena gahaṇaṃ kataṃ. ^b^sīlānussati^eb^ādīnaṃ pana tissannaṃ anussatīnaṃ visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvena gahaṇaṃ yogāvacarassa attano eva sīlassa cāgassa saddhādīnañca anussatiṭṭhānabhāvena gahetabbattā. ^b^rūpakāyaṃ gatā^eb^ti attano karajakāyaṃ ārabbha ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattā. ^b^kāye^eb^ti kāye visayabhūte. ^b^koṭṭhāsanimittārammaṇāyā^eb^ti kesādikoṭṭhāsesu paṭikkūlanimittārammaṇāya. ito purimāsu sattasu anussatīsu natthi nimittuppatti ^a^V1.0206^ea^, idha atthīti dassanatthaṃ ^b^nimitta^eb^-ggahaṇaṃ. tathā ^b^assāsapassāsanimittārammaṇāyā^eb^ti etthāpi. ^b^upasama^eb^nti sabbasaṅkhārūpasamaṃ, nibbānanti attho.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ avecca ^a^M1.0219^ea^ buddhaguṇe yāthāvato ñatvā uppanno pasādo ^b^aveccappasādo,^eb^ ariyamaggena āgatappasādo, taṃsadisopi vā yo diṭṭhigatavātehi acalo asampakampiyo, tena ^b^samannāgatena^eb^. tādisassa buddhānussatibhāvanā ijjhati, na itarassa. ^b^patirūpasenāsane^eb^ti yathāvuttāṭṭhārasadosavajjite pañcaṅgasamannāgate senāsane. ^b^rahogatenā^eb^ti rahasi gatena. tena kāyavivekaṃ dasseti. ^b^paṭisallīnenā^eb^ti nānārammaṇato paṭisallīnena, bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato paṭikkamāpetvā kammaṭṭhāne sallīnena, susiliṭṭhacittenāti attho. ^b^eva^eb^nti imāya pāḷiyā āgatanayena.

[03] ^b^so bhagavā^eb^ti ettha ^b^so^eb^ti yo so samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho devānaṃ atidevo brahmānaṃ atibrahmā lokanātho bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi sadevake loke ``bhagavā''ti patthaṭakittisaddo, so. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti idaṃ satthu nāmakittanaṃ. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kata''ntiādi (mahāni0 198, 210; cūḷani0 ajitamāṇavapucchāniddesa 2). parato pana ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti guṇakittanaṃ. ^b^araha^eb^ntiādīsu navasu ṭhānesu paccekaṃ itipi-saddaṃ yojetvā buddhaguṇā anussaritabbāti dassento ^b^``itipi arahaṃ...pe0... itipi bhagavāti anussaratī''^eb^ti āha. ``itipetaṃ bhūtaṃ itipetaṃ taccha''ntiādīsu (dī0 ni0 1.6) viya ^b^iti^eb^-saddo āsannapaccakkhakaraṇattho, ^b^pi^eb^-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. tena nesaṃ bahubhāvo dīpito, tāni ca guṇasallakkhaṇakāraṇāni bhāventena cittassa sammukhībhūtāni kātabbānīti dassento ^b^``iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hotī''^eb^ti āha.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ dūratā nāma āsannatā viya upādāyupādāya vuccatīti paramukkaṃsagataṃ dūrabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^``suvidūravidūre''^eb^ti āha, suṭṭhu vidūrabhāveneva vidūreti attho. sā panassa kilesato dūratā tesaṃ sabbaso pahīnattāti dassento āha ^b^``maggena kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattā''^eb^ti. nanu aññesampi khīṇāsavānaṃ te pahīnā evāti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``savāsanāna''^eb^nti. na hi bhagavantaṃ ṭhapetvā aññe saha vāsanāya kilese pahātuṃ sakkonti ^a^V1.0207^ea^, etena aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ ^a^M1.0220^ea^ bhagavato arahattanti dassitaṃ hoti. kā panāyaṃ vāsanā nāma? pahīnakilesassāpi appahīnakilesassa payogasadisapayogahetubhūto kilesanihito sāmatthiyaviseso āyasmato ^b^pilindavacchassa^eb^ (pārā0 621) vasalasamudācāranimittaṃ viya. kathaṃ pana ``ārakā''ti vutte ``kilesehī''ti ayamattho labbhatīti? sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato, visesatthinā ca visesassa anupayojetabbato, ``ārakāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā''tiādīni (ma0 ni0 1.434) suttapadānettha udāharitabbāni. ^b^ārakā^eb^ti cettha ā-kārassa rassattaṃ, ka-kārassa ca ha-kāraṃ, sānusāraṃ katvā niruttinayena ^b^``araha''^eb^nti padasiddhi veditabbā. vuttamevatthaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ ^b^``so tato ārakā nāmā''^eb^ti gāthābandhamāha. tattha samañjanasīlo samaṅgī, na samaṅgitā ^b^asamaṅgitā^eb^ asamannāgamo asahavuttitā.
[03] 126^b^.^eb^ anatthacaraṇena kilesā eva arayoti ^b^kilesārayo^eb^. ``arīnaṃ hatattā arihā''ti vattabbe niruttinayena ^b^``araha''^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ yañcetaṃ saṃsāracakkanti sambandho. rathacakkassa nābhi viya mūlāvayavabhūtaṃ anto, bahi ca samavaṭṭhitaṃ avijjābhavataṇhāmayaṃ dvayanti vuttaṃ ^b^``avijjābhavataṇhāmayanābhī''^eb^ti. nābhiyā, nemiyā ca sambandhā arasadisā paccayaphalabhūtehi avijjātaṇhājarāmaraṇehi sambandhā puññādisaṅkhārāti vuttaṃ ^b^``puññādiabhisaṅkhārāra''^eb^nti. tattha tattha bhave pariyantabhāvena pākaṭaṃ jarāmaraṇanti taṃ nemiṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā āha ^b^``jarāmaraṇanemī''^eb^ti. yathā ca rathacakkapavattiyā padhānakāraṇaṃ akkho, evaṃ saṃsāracakkapavattiyā āsavasamudayoti āha ^b^``āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā''^eb^ti. āsavā eva avijjādīnaṃ kāraṇattā āsavasamudayo. yathāha ``āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo''ti (ma0 ni0 1.103). vipākakaṭattārūpappabhedo kāmabhavādiko tibhavo eva ratho, tasmiṃ ^b^tibhavarathe^eb^. attano paccayehi samaṃ, sabbaso vā ādito paṭṭhāya yojitanti ^b^samāyojitaṃ^eb^. ādirahitaṃ kālaṃ pavattatīti katvā ^b^anādikālappavattaṃ^eb^.
[21] ``khandhānañca ^a^M1.0221^ea^ paṭipāṭi, dhātuāyatanāna ca.
[22] abbocchinnaṃ vattamānā, `saṃsāro'ti pavuccatī''ti.. (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.95 apasādanāvaṇṇanā; saṃ0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.2.60; a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.4.199) --

[25] evaṃ ^a^V1.0208^ea^ vuttasaṃsārova ^b^saṃsāracakkaṃ. anenā^eb^ti bhagavatā. ^b^bodhimaṇḍe^eb^ti bodhisaṅkhātassa ñāṇassa maṇḍabhāvappatte ṭhāne, kāle vā. ^b^vīriyapādehī^eb^ti saṃkilesavodānapakkhiyesu sannirumbhanasannikkhipanakiccatāya dvidhā pavattehi attano vīriyasaṅkhātehi pādehi. ^b^sīlapathaviya^eb^nti patiṭṭhaṭṭhena sīlameva pathavī, tassaṃ. ^b^patiṭṭhāyā^eb^ti sampādanavasena patiṭṭhahitvā. ^b^saddhāhatthenā^eb^ti anavajjadhammādānasādhanato saddhāva hattho, tena. ^b^kammakkhayakara^eb^nti kāyakammādibhedassa sabbassapi kammassa khayakaraṇato kammakkhayakaraṃ. ^b^ñāṇapharasu^eb^nti samādhisilāyaṃ sunisitamaggañāṇapharasuṃ gahetvā.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ``arānaṃ hatattā''ti ettha vuttāraghāte saṃsāraṃ cakkaṃ viya cakkanti gahetvā atthayojanaṃ katvā idāni paṭiccasamuppādadesanākkamenapi taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``atha vā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^anamataggaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭa^eb^nti anu anu amataggaṃ aviññātakoṭikaṃ saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ. ^b^sesā dasa dhammā^eb^ saṅkhārādayo jātipariyosānā ^b^arā^eb^. kathaṃ? nābhiyā avijjāya mūlato, nemiyā jarāmaraṇena antato sambandhattāti dassento āha ^b^``avijjāmūlakattā jarāmaraṇapariyantattā cā''^eb^ti. ^b^dukkhādīsū^eb^ti dukkhasamudayanirodhamaggesu. tattha dukkhe ^b^aññāṇaṃ^eb^ tadantogadhattā, tappaṭicchādanato ca, sesesu paṭicchādanatova. ^b^dukkha^eb^nti cettha dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ adhippetanti taṃ kāmabhavādivasena tidhā bhinditvā tathā tappaṭicchādikaṃ avijjaṃ, avijjādipaccaye tīsu bhavesu saṅkhārādike ca paṭipāṭiyā dassento ^b^``kāmabhave ca avijjā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^kāmabhave avijjā^eb^ti kāmabhave ādīnavappaṭicchādikā avijjā. ^b^rūpabhave arūpabhave avijjā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^kāmabhave saṅkhārāna^eb^nti kāmabhūmipariyāpannānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ, kāmabhave vā nipphādetabbā ye saṅkhārā, tesaṃ kāmabhavūpapattinibbattakasaṅkhārānanti attho. ^b^paccayo hotī^eb^ti puññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ tāva ārammaṇapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena cāti dvidhā paccayo hoti. apuññābhisaṅkhāresu sahajātassa sahajātādivasena ^a^M1.0222^ea^, asahajātassa anantarasamanantarādivasena, nānantarassa pana ārammaṇavasena ceva upanissayavasena ca paccayo hoti. ^b^arūpabhave saṅkhārāna^eb^nti āneñjābhisaṅkhārānaṃ ^a^V1.0209^ea^. ^b^paccayo hoti^eb^ upanissayavaseneva. imasmiṃ panatthe ettha vitthāriyamāne atippapañco hoti, sayameva ca parato āgamissatīti na naṃ vitthārayāma.

[03] ^b^tiṇṇaṃ āyatanāna^eb^nti cakkhusotamanāyatanānaṃ. ^b^ekassāyatanassā^eb^ti manāyatanassa. iminā nayena phassādīnampi vibhāgo veditabbo. ^b^tattha tattha sā sā taṇhā^eb^ti rūpataṇhādibhedā tattha tattha kāmabhavādīsu uppajjanakā taṇhā.

[03] taṇhādimūlikā kathā atisaṃkhittāti taṃ, upādānabhave ca vibhajitvā vitthāretvā dassetuṃ ^b^``katha''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^``kāme paribhuñjissāmī''^eb^ti iminā kāmataṇhāpavattimāha. tathā ^b^``saggasampattiṃ anubhavissāmī''^eb^tiādīhi. sā pana taṇhā yasmā bhusamādānavasena pavattamānā kāmupādānaṃ nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``kāmupādānapaccayā''^eb^ti. ^b^tathevā^eb^ti kāmupādānapaccayā eva.

[03] ^b^brahmalokasampatti^eb^nti rūpībrahmaloke sampattiṃ. ``sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmā''ti (mahāni0 1; cūḷani0 ajitamāṇavapucchāniddesa 8 thoka visadisaṃ) vacanato bhavarāgopi kāmupādānamevāti katvā ^b^``kāmupādānapaccayā eva mettaṃ bhāvetī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^sesupādānamūlikāsupī^eb^ti etthāyaṃ yojanā -- idhekacco ``natthi paro loko''ti natthikadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, so diṭṭhupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ caratītiādi vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ. aparo ``asukasmiṃ sampattibhave attā ucchijjatī''ti ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, so tatrūpapattiyā kāyena sucaritaṃ caratītiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. aparo ``rūpī manomayo hutvā attā ucchijjatī''ti rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti. ^b^bhāvanāpāripūriyā^eb^ti sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. aparo ``arūpabhave uppajjitvā attā ucchijjatī''ti arūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti. ^b^bhāvanāpāripūriyā^eb^ti sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. etāhiyeva attavādupādānamūlikāpi yojanā saṃvaṇṇitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. evaṃ diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādavasenāpi ^a^M1.0223^ea^ yojanā veditabbā. aparo ``sīlena suddhī''ti ``asuddhimaggaṃ suddhimaggo''ti parāmasanto sīlabbatupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ caratītiādinā sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.

[03] idāni yvāyaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ dassentena ``kāmabhave avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hotī''tiādinā ^a^V1.0210^ea^ avijjādīnaṃ paccayabhāvo, saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayuppannabhāvo ca dassito, tameva ^b^paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ^eb^ ānetvā nigamanavasena dassento ^b^``evaṃ aya''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha yathā saṅkhārā hetunibbattā, evaṃ avijjāpi kāmāsavādinā sahetukā evāti āha ^b^``ubhopete hetusamuppannā''^eb^ti. ^b^paccayapariggahe^eb^ti nāmarūpassa paccayānaṃ avijjādīnaṃ paricchijja gahaṇe, nipphādetabbe bhummaṃ. ^b^paññā^eb^ti kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhisaṅkhātā pakārato jānanā. ^b^dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇa^eb^nti paṭiccasamuppādāvabodho. idañca dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ yasmā addhāttaye kaṅkhāmalavitaraṇavasena pavattati, tasmā ^b^``atītampi addhāna''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^eteneva nayenā^eb^ti etena ``avijjā hetū''tiādinā avijjāyaṃ vuttena nayena. ``saṅkhārā hetu, viññāṇaṃ hetusamuppanna''ntiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 1.46) ^b^sabbapadāni vitthāretabbāni^eb^.

[03] saṃkhippanti ettha avijjādayo, viññāṇādayo cāti ^b^saṅkhepo,^eb^ hetu, vipāko ca. hetu vipākoti vā saṃkhippatīti ^b^saṅkhepo,^eb^ avijjādayo viññāṇādayo ca. saṅkhepabhāvasāmaññena pana ekavacanaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. te pana saṅkhepā atīte hetu, etarahi vipāko, etarahi hetu, āyatiṃ vipākoti evaṃ kālavibhāgena cattāro jātā. tenāha ^b^``purimasaṅkhepo cettha atīto addhā''^eb^tiādi. saṅkhepa-saddo vā bhāgādhivacananti atīto hetubhāgo paṭhamo saṅkhepo. esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^taṇhupādānabhavā gahitāva honti^eb^ kilesakammabhāvasāmaññato, tehi vinā avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ sakiccākaraṇato ca. kammaṃ taṇhā ca tassa sahakārīkāraṇaṃ hutvā vaṭṭanatthena ^b^kammavaṭṭaṃ^eb^.

[03] viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanānaṃ jātijarābhaṅgāvatthā ``jātijarāmaraṇa''nti vuttāti āha ^b^``jātijarāmaraṇāpadesena^eb^ ^b^viññāṇādīnaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0224^ea^ ^b^niddiṭṭhattā''^eb^ti. ^b^ime^eb^ti viññāṇādayo. ^b^āyatiṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ^eb^ paccuppannahetuto bhāvīnaṃ anāgatānaṃ gahitattā. ^b^te^eb^ti avijjādayo. ^b^ākārato^eb^ti sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ saṅgahe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi pakāsīyantīti ākārā, atītahetuādīnaṃ vā pakārā ākārā, tato ākārato. ^b^vīsatividhā honti^eb^ atītehetupañcakādibhedato.

[03] ^b^saṅkhāraviññāṇānaṃ antarā eko sandhī^eb^ti hetuto phalassa avicchedappavattibhāvato hetuphalasambandhabhūto eko sandhi. tathā ^b^bhavajātīnamantarā. vedanātaṇhānamantarā^eb^ pana phalato hetuno ^a^V1.0211^ea^ avicchedappavattibhāvato phalahetusambandhabhūto eko sandhi. phalabhūtopi hi dhammo aññassa hetusabhāvassa dhammassa paccayo hotīti.

[03] ^b^itī^eb^ti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. tenāha ^b^``catusaṅkhepa''^eb^ntiādi. ^b^sabbākārato^eb^ti idha vuttehi, avuttehi ca ^b^paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge^eb^ (vibha0 225 ādayo), anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānādīsu ca āgatehi sabbehi ākārehi. ^b^jānātī^eb^ti avabujjhati. ^b^passatī^eb^ti dassanabhūtena ñāṇacakkhunā paccakkhato passati. ^b^aññāti paṭivijjhatī^eb^ti tesaṃyeva vevacanaṃ. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ jānanaṃ. ^b^ñātaṭṭhenā^eb^ti yathāsabhāvato jānanaṭṭhena. ^b^pajānanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti aniccādīhi pakārehi paṭivijjhanaṭṭhena.

[03] idāni yadatthamidaṃ bhavacakkaṃ idhānītaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``iminā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^te dhamme^eb^ti te avijjādike dhamme. ^b^yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā^eb^ti mahāvajirañāṇena yāthāvato jānitvā. ^b^nibbindanto^eb^ balavavipassanāya ^b^virajjanto vimuccanto^eb^ ariyamaggehi ^b^are hanī^eb^ti yojanā. tattha yadā bhagavā virajjati vimuccati, tadā are hanati nāma. tato paraṃ pana abhisambuddhakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ ^b^``hani vihani viddhaṃsesī''^eb^ti.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ cakkavattino acetane cakkaratane uppanne tattheva loko pūjaṃ karoti, aññattha pūjāvisesā pacchijjanti, kimaṅgaṃ pana sammāsambuddhe uppanneti dassento ^b^``uppanne tathāgate''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^ko pana vādo aññesaṃ pūjāvisesāna^eb^nti yathāvuttato aññesaṃ amahesakkhehi devamanussehi kariyamānānaṃ nātiuḷārānaṃ pūjāvisesānaṃ arahabhāve ^a^M1.0225^ea^ kā nāma kathā. ^b^atthānurūpa^eb^nti arahattatthassa anurūpaṃ anvatthaṃ.

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ ^b^asilokabhayenā^eb^ti akittibhayena. ^b^raho pāpaṃ karonti^eb^ ``mā naṃ koci jaññā''ti ^b^esa^eb^ bhagavā ^b^na kadāci karoti^eb^ pāpahetūnaṃ bodhimaṇḍe eva suppahīnattā. aparo nayo -- ārakāti ^b^arahaṃ,^eb^ suvidūrabhāvatoicceva attho. kuto pana suvidūrabhāvatoti? ye abhāvitakāyā abhāvitasīlā abhāvitacittā abhāvitapaññā, tato eva appahīnarāgadosamohā ariyadhammassa akovidā ariyadhamme avinītā ariyadhammassa adassāvino appaṭipannā micchāpaṭipannā ca, tato suvidūrabhāvato. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --

[02] ``saṅghāṭikaṇṇecepi ^a^V1.0212^ea^ me, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa pāde pādaṃ nikkhipanto, so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo. atha kho so ārakāva mayhaṃ, ahañca tassa. taṃ kissa hetu? dhammaṃ hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na passati, dhammaṃ apassanto maṃ na passatī''ti (itivu0 92).
[03] yathāvuttapuggalā hi sacepi sāyaṃ pātaṃ satthu santikāvacarāva siyuṃ, na te tāvatā ``satthu santikā''ti vattabbā, tathā satthāpi nesaṃ. iti asappurisānaṃ ārakā dūreti ^b^arahaṃ^eb^.
[21] ``sammā na paṭipajjanti, ye nihīnāsayā narā.
[22] ārakā tehi bhagavā, dūre tenā^b^rahaṃ^eb^ mato''ti..

[03] tathā ārakāti ^b^arahaṃ,^eb^ āsannabhāvatoti attho. kuto pana āsannabhāvatoti? ye bhāvitakāyā bhāvitasīlā bhāvitacittā bhāvitapaññā, tato eva pahīnarāgadosamohā ariyadhammassa kovidā ariyadhamme suvinītā ariyadhammassa dassāvino sammāpaṭipannā, tato āsannabhāvato. vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā --

[02] ``yojanasate ^a^M1.0226^ea^ cepi me, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya, so ca hoti anabhijjhālu kāmesu na tibbasārāgo abyāpannacitto appaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṃvutindriyo. atha kho so santikeva mayhaṃ, ahañca tassa. taṃ kissa hetu? dhammaṃ hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu passati, dhammaṃ passanto maṃ passatī''ti (itivu0 92).
[03] tathārūpā hi puggalā satthu yojanasahassantarikāpi honti, na tāvatā te ``satthu dūracārino''ti vattabbā, tathā satthāpi nesaṃ. iti sappurisānaṃ ārakā āsanneti ^b^arahaṃ^eb^.
[21] ye ^a^V1.0213^ea^ sammā paṭipajjanti, suppaṇītādhimuttikā.
[22] ārakā tehi āsanne, tenāpi ^b^arahaṃ^eb^ jino..

[03] ye ime rāgādayo pāpadhammā yasmiṃ santāne uppajjanti, tassa diṭṭhadhammikampi samparāyikampi anatthaṃ āvahanti. nibbānagāminiyā paṭipadāya ekaṃseneva ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā ca, te attahitaṃ, parahitañca paripūretuṃ sammā paṭipajjantehi sādhūhi dūrato rahitabbā pariccajitabbā pahātabbāti ^b^rahā^eb^ nāma, te ca yasmā bhagavato bodhimūleyeva ariyamaggena sabbaso pahīnā samucchinnā. yathāha --
[02] ``tathāgatassa kho, brāhmaṇa, rāgo pahīno doso moho, sabbepi pāpakā akusalā dhammā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā''ti (pārā0 9-10 atthato samānaṃ).
[03] tasmā sabbaso na santi etassa rahāti arahoti vattabbe okārassa sānusāraṃ a-kārādesaṃ katvā ^b^``araha''^eb^nti vuttaṃ.
[21] pāpadhammā rahā nāma, sādhūhi rahitabbato.
[22] tesaṃ suṭṭhu pahīnattā, bhagavā ^b^arahaṃ^eb^ mato..

[03] ye te sabbaso pariññātakkhandhā pahīnakilesā bhāvitamaggā sacchikatanirodhā arahanto khīṇāsavā, ye ca sekkhā appattamānasā anuttaraṃ ^a^M1.0227^ea^ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamānā viharanti, ye ca parisuddhapayogā kalyāṇajjhāsayā saddhāsīlasutādiguṇasampannā puggalā, tehi na rahitabbo na pariccajitabbo, te ca bhagavatāti ^b^arahaṃ^eb^. tathā hi ariyapuggalā satthārā diṭṭhadhammassa paccakkhakaraṇato satthu dhammasarīrena avirahitā eva honti. yathāha āyasmā ^b^piṅgiyo^eb^ --
[21] ``passāmi naṃ manasā cakkhunāva,
[27] rattindivaṃ brāhmaṇa appamatto.
[26] namassamāno ^a^V1.0214^ea^ vivasemi rattiṃ,
[22] teneva maññāmi avippavāsaṃ..
[21] ``saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati ca,
[27] nāpentime gotamasāsanamhā.
[26] yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ vajati bhūripañño,
[22] sa tena teneva natohamasmī''ti.. (su0 ni0 1148-1149).
[03] teneva ca te aññaṃ satthāraṃ na uddisanti. yathāha --
[02] ``aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī''ti (ma0 ni0 3.128; a0 ni0 1.276).

[03] kalyāṇaputhujjanāpi yebhuyyena satthari niccalasaddhā eva honti. iti suppaṭipannehi purisavisesehi avirahitabbato, tesañca avirahanato na santi etassa rahā pariccajanakā, natthi vā etassa raho sādhūhi pariccajitabbatāti ^b^arahaṃ^eb^.
[21] ``ye sacchikatasaddhammā, ariyā suddhagocarā.
[22] na tehi rahito hoti, nātho tenā^b^rahaṃ^eb^ mato''ti..

[03] ^b^raho^eb^ti ca gamanaṃ vuccati, bhagavato ca nānāgatīsu paribbhamanasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāre gamanaṃ natthi kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena bodhimūleyeva sabbaso sasambhārassa kammavaṭṭassa viddhaṃsitattā. yathāha --
[21] ``yena ^a^V1.0215^ea^ devūpapatyassa, gandhabbo vā vihaṅgamo.
[27] yakkhattaṃ yena gaccheyyaṃ, manussattañca abbaje.
[22] te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā''ti.. (a0 ni0 4.36).
[25] evaṃ ^a^M1.0228^ea^ natthi etassa rahogamanaṃ gatīsu paccājātītipi ^b^arahaṃ^eb^.
[21] raho vā gamanaṃ yassa, saṃsāre natthi sabbaso.
[22] pahīnajātimaraṇo, ^b^arahaṃ^eb^ sugato mato..

[03] pāsaṃsattā vā bhagavā ^b^arahaṃ^eb^. akkharacintakā hi pasaṃsāyaṃ araha-saddaṃ vaṇṇenti. pāsaṃsabhāvo ca bhagavato anaññasādhāraṇo yathābhuccaguṇādhigato sadevake loke suppatiṭṭhito. tathā hesa anuttarena sīlena anuttarena samādhinā anuttarāya paññāya anuttarāya vimuttiyā asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggaloti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ guṇe vibhajitvā vuccamāne paṇḍitapurisehi devehi brahmehi bhagavatā vā pana pariyosāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyarūpo. iti pāsaṃsattāpi bhagavā ^b^arahaṃ^eb^.
[21] guṇehi sadiso natthi, yasmā loke sadevake.
[22] tasmā pāsaṃsiyattāpi, ^b^arahaṃ^eb^ dvipaduttamo..
[25] evaṃ sabbathāpi --
[21] ``ārakā mandabuddhīnaṃ, ārakā ca vijānataṃ.
[27] rahānaṃ suppahīnattā, vidūnamaraheyyato.
[22] bhavesu ca rahābhāvā, pāsaṃsā ^b^arahaṃ^eb^ jino''ti..

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ ^b^sammā^eb^ti aviparītaṃ. ^b^sāma^eb^nti sayameva. ^b^sambuddho^eb^ti hi ettha ^b^saṃ^eb^-saddo ``saya''nti etassa atthassa bodhako daṭṭhabbo. ^b^sabbadhammāna^eb^nti anavasesānaṃ ñeyyadhammānaṃ. kathaṃ panettha sabbadhammāvabodho ^a^V1.0216^ea^ labbhatīti? ekadesassa aggahaṇato. padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati yathā ``dikkhito na dadātī''ti. evañca katvā atthavisesānapekkhā kattari eva buddhasaddasiddhi veditabbā kammavacanicchāya abhāvato. ``sammā sāmaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho''ti ettakameva hi idha saddato labbhati, ``sabbadhammāna''nti pana atthato labbhamānaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. na hi bujjhanakiriyā avisayā yujjati.

[03] idāni ^a^M1.0229^ea^ tassā visayaṃ ``sabbadhamme''ti sāmaññato vuttaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^``abhiññeyye dhamme''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^abhiññeyye^eb^ti abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena jānitabbe. ke pana teti? catusaccadhamme. ^b^abhiññeyyato buddho^eb^ti abhiññeyyabhāvato bujjhi. pubbabhāge vipassanāpaññāya, adhigamakkhaṇe maggapaññāya, aparabhāge sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi aññāsīti attho. ito paresupi eseva nayo. ^b^pariññeyye dhamme^eb^ti dukkhaṃ ariyasaccamāha. ^b^pahātabbe^eb^ti samudayapakkhiye. ^b^sacchikātabbe^eb^ti nibbānaṃ sandhāyāha. bahuvacananiddeso pana sopādisesādikaṃ pariyāyasiddhaṃ bhedaṃ gahetvā kato, uddeso vā ayaṃ catusaccadhammānanti. tathā hi vakkhati ``cakkhuṃ dukkhasacca''ntiādi. uddeso ca avinicchitatthaparicchedassa dhammassa vasena karīyati. uddesena hi uddisiyamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthitāmattaṃ vuccati, na paricchedoti aparicchedena bahuvacanena vuttaṃ yathā ``appaccayā dhammā, asaṅkhatā dhammā''ti (dha0 sa0 dukamātikā 7-8). ^b^sacchikātabbe^eb^ti vā phalavimuttīnampi gahaṇaṃ, na nibbānassevāti bahuvacananiddeso kato. evañca ^b^bhāvetabbe^eb^ti ettha jhānānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] gāthāyaṃ ^b^bhāvetabbañcā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^-saddo avuttasamuccayattho, tena sacchikātabbassa gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^tasmā buddhosmī^eb^ti yasmā cattāri saccāni mayā buddhāni, saccavinimuttañca kiñci ñeyyaṃ natthi, tasmā sabbampi ñeyyaṃ buddhosmi, abbhaññāsinti attho.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ evaṃ saccavasena sāmaññato vuttamatthaṃ dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammehi, khandhādīhi ca saccavaseneva vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^``api cā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^mūlakāraṇabhāvenā^eb^ti santesupi avijjādīsu aññesu kāraṇesu tesampi mūlabhūtakāraṇabhāvena. taṇhā hi kammassa vicittabhāvahetuto, sahāyabhāvūpagamanato ca dukkhavicittatāya padhānakāraṇaṃ. ^b^samuṭṭhāpikā^eb^ti uppādikā. ^b^purimataṇhā^eb^ti purimabhavasiddhā taṇhā. ^b^ubhinna^eb^nti cakkhussa ^a^V1.0217^ea^, taṃsamudayassa ca. ^b^appavattī^eb^ti appavattinimittaṃ. ^b^nirodhapajānanā^eb^ti sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena nirodhassa paṭivijjhanā. ^b^ekekapaduddhārenā^eb^ti ``cakkhuṃ cakkhusamudayo''tiādinā ekekakoṭṭhāsaniddhāraṇena ^a^M1.0230^ea^. taṇhāyapi pariññeyyabhāvasabbhāvato, upādānakkhandhantogadhattā ca dukkhasaccasaṅgahaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``rūpataṇhādayo cha taṇhākāyā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^kasiṇānī^eb^ti kasiṇajjhānāni. ^b^dvattiṃsākārā^eb^ti dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāsā, tadārammaṇajjhānāni ca. ^b^nava bhavā^eb^ti kāmabhavādayo tayo, saññībhavādayo tayo, ekavokārabhavādayo tayoti nava bhavā. ^b^cattāri jhānānī^eb^ti aggahitārammaṇavisesāni cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni, vipākajjhānānaṃ vā etaṃ gahaṇaṃ. ettha ca kusaladhammānaṃ upanissayabhūtā taṇhā samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhāti veditabbā. kiriyadhammānaṃ pana yattha te tassa attabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtā.

[03] ^b^anubuddho^eb^ti bujjhitabbadhammassa anurūpato buddho. ^b^tenā^eb^ti tasmā. yasmā sāmaññato, visesato ca ekekapaduddhārena sabbadhamme buddho, tasmā vuttaṃ. kinti āha ^b^``sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā''^eb^ti, sabbassapi ñeyyassa sabbākārato aviparītaṃ sayameva abhisambuddhattāti attho. imināssa paropadesarahitassa sabbākārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttino anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa adhigamo dassito.

[03] nanu ca sabbaññutaññāṇato aññaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ, aññathā ``cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni buddhañāṇānī''ti (paṭi0 ma0 mātikā 1.73) vacanaṃ virujjheyyāti? na virujjhati, visayapavattibhedavasena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā. ekameva hi taṃ ñāṇaṃ anavasesasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatasammutidhammavisayatāya sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tattha ca āvaraṇābhāvato nissaṅgacāramupādāya ``anāvaraṇañāṇa''nti vuttaṃ. yathāha paṭisambhidāyaṃ ``sabbaṃ saṅkhatamasaṅkhataṃ anavasesaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tattha āvaraṇaṃ natthīti anāvaraṇañāṇa''ntiādi (paṭi0 ma0 1.119). tasmā natthi nesaṃ atthato bhedo, ekantena cetaṃ evamicchitabbaṃ. aññathā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇānaṃ sādhāraṇatā, asabbadhammārammaṇatā ca āpajjeyya. na hi bhagavato ñāṇassa aṇumattampi āvaraṇaṃ atthi, anāvaraṇañāṇassa ca asabbadhammārammaṇabhāve yattha taṃ na pavattati, tatthāvaraṇasabbhāvato anāvaraṇabhāvoyeva na siyā. atha vā pana hotu ^a^M1.0231^ea^ aññameva anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇato, idha pana sabbattha appaṭihatavuttitāya ^a^V1.0218^ea^ anāvaraṇañāṇanti sabbaññutaññāṇameva adhippetaṃ. tassa cādhigamena bhagavā ``sabbaññū, sabbavidū, sammāsambuddho''ti ca vuccati na sakiṃyeva sabbadhammāvabodhato. tathā ca vuttaṃ ^b^paṭisambhidāyaṃ^eb^ (paṭi0 ma0 1.162) ``vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ ``buddho''ti. sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthañāṇasamadhigamena hi bhagavato santāne anavasesadhamme paṭivijjhituṃ samatthatā ahosīti.

[01] etthāha -- kiṃ panidaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattamānaṃ sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati, udāhu kamenāti? kiñcettha -- yadi tāva sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati, atītānāgatapaccuppannājjhattabahiddhādibhedabhinnānaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ, asaṅkhatasammutidhammānañca ekajjhaṃ upaṭṭhāne dūrato cittapaṭaṃ pekkhantassa viya paṭivibhāgenāvabodho na siyā, tathā ca sati ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti vipassantānaṃ anattākārena viya sabbadhammā anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇassa visayā hontīti āpajjati. yepi ``sabbañeyyadhammānaṃ ṭhitalakkhaṇavisayaṃ vikapparahitaṃ sabbakālaṃ buddhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattati, tena te `sabbavidū'ti vuccanti, evañca katvā `caraṃ samāhito nāgo, tiṭṭhantopi samāhito'ti idampi vacanaṃ suvuttaṃ hotī''ti vadanti, tesampi vuttadosānātivatti, ṭhitalakkhaṇārammaṇatāya ca atītānāgatasammutidhammānaṃ tadabhāvato ekadesavisayameva bhagavato ñāṇaṃ siyā. tasmā sakiṃyeva ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti na yujjati.

[03] atha kamena sabbasmiṃ visaye ñāṇaṃ pavattati? evampi na yujjati. na hi jātibhūmisabhāvādivasena, disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne ñeyye kamena gayhamāne tassa anavasesapaṭivedho sambhavati, apariyantabhāvato ñeyyassa. ye pana ``atthassa avisaṃvādanato ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā `sesepi eva'nti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū bhagavā, tañca ñāṇaṃ na anumānikaṃ saṃsayābhāvato. saṃsayānubaddhaṃ hi loke anumānañāṇa''nti vadanti, tesampi taṃ na yuttaṃ. sabbassa hi appaccakkhabhāve atthāvisaṃvādanena ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ ^a^M1.0232^ea^ katvā ``sesepi eva''nti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanassa asambhavato. yañhi taṃ sesaṃ, taṃ appaccakkhanti.

[03] atha tampi paccakkhaṃ, tassa sesabhāvo eva na siyāti? sabbametaṃ akāraṇaṃ. kasmā ^a^V1.0219^ea^? avisayavicāraṇabhāvato. vuttaṃ hetaṃ bhagavatā ``buddhavisayo, bhikkhave, acinteyyo na cintetabbo. yo cinteyya, ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā''ti (a0 ni0 4.77). idaṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ -- yaṃkiñci bhagavatā ñātuṃ icchitaṃ sakalaṃ, ekadeso vā, tattha appaṭihatavuttitāya paccakkhato ñāṇaṃ pavattati, niccasamādhānañca vikkhepābhāvato. ñātuṃ icchitassa ca sakalassa avisayabhāve tassa ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā, ekanteneva sā icchitabbā ``sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanappaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhā manasikārappaṭibaddhā cittuppādappaṭibaddhā''ti vacanato. atītānāgatavisayampi bhagavato ñāṇaṃ anumānāgamatakkaggahaṇavirahitattā paccakkhameva.

[03] nanu ca etasmiṃ pakkhe yadā sakalaṃ ñātuṃ icchitaṃ, tadā sakiṃyeva sakalavisayatāya anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavatteyyāti vuttadosānātivattiyevāti? na, tassa visodhitattā. visodhito hi so buddhavisayo acinteyyoti. aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamānavuttitāya buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā. tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi taṃ ekadhammārammaṇaṃ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha acinteyyaṃ. vuttañhetaṃ ``yāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ. yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ. ñeyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ ñeyya''nti (mahāni0 69; cūḷani0 mogharājamāṇavapucchāniddesa 85; paṭi0 ma0 3.5). evamekajjhaṃ, visuṃ, sakiṃ, kamena vā icchānurūpaṃ sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ ^b^vijjāhī^eb^ti ettha vindiyaṃ vindatīti vijjā, yāthāvato upalabbhatīti attho. attano vā paṭipakkhassa vijjhanaṭṭhena vijjā, tamokkhandhādikassa padālanaṭṭhenāti attho. tato eva attano visayassa viditakaraṇaṭṭhenapi vijjā. ^b^sampannattā^eb^ti samannāgatattā, paripuṇṇattā vā, avikalattāti attho. tissannaṃ, aṭṭhannaṃ ca vijjānaṃ tattha tattha sutte gahaṇaṃ vineyyajjhāsayavasenāti ^a^M1.0233^ea^ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^satta saddhammā^eb^ nāma saddhā hirī ottappaṃ bāhusaccaṃ vīriyaṃ sati paññā ca. ye sandhāya vuttaṃ ``idha bhikkhu saddho hotī''tiādi (a0 ni0 10.11). ^b^cattāri jhānānī^eb^ti yāni kānici cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni.

[03] kasmā panettha sīlādayo pannaraseva ``caraṇa''nti vuttāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``imeyeva hī''^eb^tiādi ^a^V1.0220^ea^. tena tesaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahato nibbānupagamane ekaṃsato sādhanabhāvamāha. idāni tadatthasādhanāya āgamaṃ dassento ^b^``yathāhā''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^bhagavā^eb^tiādi vuttassevatthassa nigamanavasena vuttaṃ.

[03] nanu cāyaṃ vijjācaraṇasampadā sāvakesupi labbhatīti? kiñcāpi labbhati, na pana tathā, yathā bhagavatoti dassetuṃ ^b^``tattha vijjāsampadā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. caraṇadhammapariyāpannattā karuṇābrahmavihārassa, so cettha mahaggatabhāvappattā sādhāraṇabhāvoti āha ^b^``caraṇasampadā mahākāruṇikataṃ pūretvā ṭhitā''^eb^ti. yathā sattānaṃ anatthaṃ parivajjetvā atthe niyojanaṃ paññāya vinā na hoti, evaṃ nesaṃ atthānatthajānanaṃ satthu karuṇāya vinā na hotīti ubhayampi ubhayattha sakiccakameva siyā. yattha pana yassā padhānabhāvo, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``so sabbaññutāyā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^yathā taṃ vijjācaraṇasampanno^eb^ti yathā aññopi vijjācaraṇasampanno, tena vijjācaraṇasampannassevāyaṃ āveṇikā paṭipattīti dasseti. sā panāyaṃ satthu vijjācaraṇasampadā sāsanassa niyyānikatāya sāvakānaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā ekantakāraṇanti dassetuṃ ^b^``tenassā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. taṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] ettha ca vijjāsampadāya satthu paññāmahattaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti, caraṇasampadāya karuṇāmahattaṃ. tesu paññāya bhagavato dhammarajjappatti, karuṇāya dhammasaṃvibhāgo. paññāya saṃsāradukkhanibbidā, karuṇāya saṃsāradukkhasahanaṃ. paññāya paradukkhaparijānanaṃ, karuṇāya paradukkhapatikārārambho. paññāya parinibbānābhimukhabhāvo, karuṇāya tadadhigamo. paññāya sayaṃ taraṇaṃ, karuṇāya paresaṃ tāraṇaṃ. paññāya buddhabhāvasiddhi, karuṇāya buddhakiccasiddhi. karuṇāya vā bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ saṃsārābhimukhabhāvo, paññāya tattha anabhirati. tathā karuṇāya paresaṃ abhiṃsāpanaṃ ^a^M1.0234^ea^, paññāya sayaṃ parehi abhāyanaṃ. karuṇāya paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhati, paññāya attānaṃ rakkhanto paraṃ rakkhati. tathā karuṇāya aparantapo, paññāya anattantapo. tena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu catutthapuggalabhāvo siddho hoti. tathā karuṇāya lokanāthatā, paññāya attanāthatā. karuṇāya cassa ninnatābhāvo, paññāya unnamābhāvo. tathā karuṇāya sabbasattesu janitānuggaho paññānugatattā na ca na sabbattha virattacitto, paññāya sabbadhammesu virattacitto karuṇānugatattā na ca na sabbasattānuggahāya pavatto. yathā hi karuṇā bhagavato sinehasokavirahitā, evaṃ paññā ahaṃkāramamaṃkāravinimuttāti ^a^V1.0221^ea^ aññamaññavisodhitā paramavisuddhā guṇavisesā vijjācaraṇasampadāhi pakāsitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ ^b^gamanampi hi gatanti vuccati^eb^ ``gate ṭhite''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 1.214; 2.376). ^b^sobhana^eb^nti subhaṃ. subhabhāvo visuddhatāya, visuddhatā dosavigamenāti āha ^b^``parisuddhamanavajja''^eb^nti. gamanañca nāma bahuvidhanti idhādhippetaṃ gamanaṃ dassento ^b^``ariyamaggo''^eb^ti āha. so hi nibbānassa gati adhigamoti katvā ``gataṃ, gamana''nti ca vuccati. idāni tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tena hesā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^khemaṃ disa^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. ^b^asajjamāno^eb^ti paripanthābhāvena sugatigamanepi asajjanto saṅgaṃ akaronto, pageva itarattha. atha vā ekāsane nisīditvā khippabhiññāvaseneva catunnampi maggānaṃ paṭiladdhabhāvato asajjamāno asajjanto gato. yaṃ gamanaṃ gacchanto sabbamanatthaṃ apaharati, sabbañca anuttaraṃ sampattiṃ āvahati, tadeva sobhanaṃ nāma. tena ca bhagavā gatoti āha ^b^``iti sobhanagamanattā sugato''^eb^ti sobhanattho ^b^su^eb^-saddoti katvā.

[03] asundarānaṃ dukkhānaṃ saṅkhārappavattīnaṃ abhāvato accantasukhattā ekantato sundaraṃ nāma asaṅkhatā dhātūti āha ^b^``sundarañcesa ṭhānaṃ gato amataṃ nibbāna''^eb^nti. tenāha bhagavā ``nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha''nti (ma0 ni0 2.215; dha0 pa0 203-204). ^b^sammā^eb^ti suṭṭhu. suṭṭhu gamanañca nāma paṭipakkhena anabhibhūtassa gamananti āha ^b^``pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto''^eb^ti. idañca sikhāppattaṃ sammāgamanaṃ, yāya āgamanīyapaṭipadāya siddhaṃ, sāpi sammāgamanamevāti evampi ^a^M1.0235^ea^ bhagavā sugatoti dassetuṃ ^b^``sammā vā gato''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^sammāpaṭipattiyā^eb^ti sammāsambodhiyā sampāpane aviparītapaṭipattiyā. ^b^``sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karonto''^eb^ti etena mahābodhiyā paṭipadā avibhāgena sabbasattānaṃ sabbadā hitasukhāvahabhāveneva pavattatīti dasseti. ^b^``sassataṃ ucchedanti ime ante anupagacchanto gato''^eb^ti etena paṭiccasamuppādagatiṃ dasseti. ^b^``kāmasukhaṃ attakilamathanti ime anupagacchanto gato''^eb^ti etena ariyamaggagatiṃ dasseti.

[03] ^b^tatrā^eb^ti yuttaṭṭhāne yuttasseva bhāsane nipphādetabbe, sādhetabbe cetaṃ bhummaṃ. ^b^abhūta^eb^nti abhūtatthaṃ. atthamukhena hi vācāya abhūtatā, bhūtatā vā. ^b^ataccha^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^abhūta^eb^nti ^a^V1.0222^ea^ vā asantaṃ avijjamānaṃ. ^b^ataccha^eb^nti atathākāraṃ aññathāsantaṃ. ^b^anatthasañhita^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammikena, samparāyikena vā anatthena sañhitaṃ, anatthāvahaṃ. na atthoti anattho, atthassa paṭipakkho, abhāvo ca, tena sañhitaṃ, pisuṇavācaṃ, samphappalāpañcāti attho. evamettha catubbidhassāpi vacīduccaritassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ettha ca paṭhamā vācā sīlavantaṃ ``dussīlo''ti, acaṇḍālādimeva ``caṇḍālo''tiādinā bhāsamānassa daṭṭhabbā. dutiyā dussīlaṃ ``dussīlo''ti, caṇḍālādimeva ``caṇḍālo''tiādinā avinayena bhāsamānassa. tatiyā nerayikādikassa nerayikādibhāvavibhāvanīkathā yathā ``āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko''tiādikā (cūḷava0 348). catutthī ``vedavihitena yaññavidhinā pāṇātipātādikataṃ sugatiṃ āvahatī''ti lokassa byāmohanakathā. pañcamī bhūtena pesuññūpasaṃhārādikathā. chaṭṭhā yuttappattaṭṭhāne pavattitā dānasīlādikathā veditabbā. ^b^evaṃ sammā gadattā^eb^ti yathāvuttaṃ abhūtādiṃ vajjetvā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasañhitaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ tato eva sammā suṭṭhu gadanato ^b^sugato^eb^ da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā. āpāthagamanamattena kassaci appiyampi hi bhagavato vacanaṃ piyaṃ manāpameva atthasiddhiyā lokassa hitasukhāvahattā.

[03] apica sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ etassāti ^b^sugato^eb^. bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ bhaddakaṃ ^a^M1.0236^ea^. tathā lakkhaṇānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitarūpakāyatāya dutavilambitakhalitānukaḍḍhananippīḷanukkuṭikakuṭilākulatādidosarahitavilāsitarājahaṃsavasabhavāraṇamigarājagamanaṃ kāyagamanaṃ, ñāṇagamanañca vipulanimmalakaruṇāsativīriyādiguṇavisesasahitaṃ abhinīhārato yāva mahābodhi anavajjatāya, sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahatāya ca sobhanameva. atha vā sayambhūñāṇena sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti ^b^sugato^eb^. tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti ^b^sugato^eb^. lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti ^b^sugato^eb^. lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti ^b^sugato^eb^. tathā yaṃ imassa sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, sabbaṃ taṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sammā paccakkhato gato abbhaññāsīti ^b^sugato^eb^.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbathā^eb^ti sabbappakārena. yo yo loko yathā yathā veditabbo, tathā tathā. te ^a^V1.0223^ea^ pana pakāre dassetuṃ ^b^``sabhāvato''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sabhāvato^eb^ti dukkhasabhāvato. sabbo hi loko dukkhasabhāvo. yathāha ``saṃkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā''ti (mahāva0 14; dī0 ni0 2.387). ^b^samudayato^eb^ti yato so samudeti, tato taṇhādito. ^b^nirodhato^eb^ti yattha so nirujjhati, tato visaṅkhārato. ^b^nirodhūpāyato^eb^ti yena vidhinā so nirodho pattabbo, tato ariyamaggato, ito aññassa pakārassa abhāvā.

[03] iti ``sabbathā lokaṃ avedī''ti vatvā tadatthasādhakaṃ suttaṃ dassento ^b^``yattha kho āvuso''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^``na jāyatī''^eb^tiādinā ujukaṃ jātiādīni paṭikkhipitvā ^b^``na cavati na upapajjatī''^eb^ti padadvayena aparāparaṃ cavanupapajjanāni paṭikkhipati. keci pana ``na jāyatītiādi gabbhaseyyakavasena vuttaṃ, itaraṃ opapātikavasenā''ti vadanti. ^b^ta^eb^nti jātiādirahitaṃ. ^b^gamanenā^eb^ti padasā gamanena. ^b^ñāteyya^eb^nti jānitabbaṃ. ``ñātāya''nti vā pāṭho, ñātā ayaṃ nibbānatthikoti adhippāyo.

[03] kāmaṃ ^a^M1.0237^ea^ pādagamanena gantvā lokassantaṃ ñātuṃ, daṭṭhuṃ, pattuṃ vā na sakkā, apica parimitaparicchinnaṭṭhāne taṃ paññāpetvā dassemīti dassento ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sasaññimhī^eb^ti saññāsahite. tato eva ^b^samanake^eb^ saviññāṇake. aviññāṇake pana utusamuṭṭhānarūpasamudāyamatte paññāpetuṃ na sakkāti adhippāyo. ^b^loka^eb^nti khandhādilokaṃ. ^b^lokanirodha^eb^nti tassa lokassa nirujjhanaṃ, nibbānameva vā. adesampi hi taṃ yesaṃ nirodho, tesaṃ vasena upacārato, desatopi niddisīyati yathā ``cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā pahīyamānā pahīyati, ettha nirujjhamānā nirujjhatī''ti (dī0 ni0 2.401; ma0 ni0 1.134; vibha0 204).

[03] ^b^gamanenā^eb^ti pākatikagamanena. ^b^lokassanto^eb^ti saṅkhāralokassa anto antakiriyāhetubhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ. ^b^kudācana^eb^nti kadācipi. ^b^apatvā^eb^ti aggamaggena anadhigantvā. ^b^pamocana^eb^nti pamutti nissaraṇaṃ. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā lokassantaṃ apatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mutti natthi, tasmā. ^b^have^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^lokavidū^eb^ti sabhāvādito sabbaṃ lokaṃ jānanto. ^b^sumedho^eb^ti sundarapañño. ^b^lokantagū^eb^ti pariññābhisamayena lokaṃ viditvā pahānābhisamayena lokantagū. maggabrahmacariyavāsassa pariniṭṭhitattā ^b^vusitabrahmacariyo^eb^. sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ samitattā, catusaccadhammānaṃ ^a^V1.0224^ea^ vā abhisamitattā ^b^samitāvī. nāsīsati^eb^ na pattheti. yathā imaṃ lokaṃ, evaṃ parañca lokaṃ appaṭisandhikattā.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ evaṃ yadipi lokavidutā anavasesato dassitā sabhāvato dassitattā, loko pana ekadeseneva vuttoti taṃ anavasesato dassetuṃ ^b^``apica tayo lokā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha indriyabaddhānaṃ khandhānaṃ samūho, santāno ca ^b^sattaloko^eb^. rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya satto, lokīyanti ettha kusalākusalaṃ, tabbipāko cāti lokoti. anindriyabaddhānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ samūho, santāno ca ^b^okāsaloko^eb^ lokiyanti ettha tasā, thāvarā ca, tesañca okāsabhūtoti. tadādhāratāya hesa ``bhājanaloko''tipi vuccati. ubhayepi khandhā ^b^saṅkhāraloko^eb^ paccayehi saṅkharīyanti, lujjanti palujjanti cāti. ^b^āhāraṭṭhitikā^eb^ti paccayaṭṭhitikā, paccayāyattavuttikāti ^a^M1.0238^ea^ attho. paccayattho hettha ^b^āhāra^eb^-saddo ``ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā''tiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 5.232) viya. evaṃ hi ``sabbe sattā''ti iminā asaññasattāpi pariggahitā honti. sā panāyaṃ āhāraṭṭhitikatā nippariyāyato saṅkhāradhammo, na sattadhammoti āha ^b^``āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo''^eb^ti.

[03] yadi evaṃ ``sabbe sattā''ti idaṃ kathanti? puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanāti nāyaṃ doso. yathā aññatthāpi ``ekadhamme, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī sammadatthaṃ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. katamasmiṃ ekadhamme? sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā''ti (a0 ni0 10.27). diṭṭhigatikānaṃ sassatādivasena ``attā, loko''ti ca parikappanā yebhuyyena sattavisayā, na saṅkhāravisayāti āha ^b^``sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti vā āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko veditabbo''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantī^eb^ti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti paribbhamanti. ^b^disā bhanti virocamānā^eb^ti tesaṃ paribbhamaneneva tā disā pabhassarā hutvā virocanti. ^b^tāva sahassadhā loko^eb^ti tattakaṃ sahassappakāro okāsaloko, sahassalokadhātuyoti attho. ``tāva sahassavā''ti vā pāṭho.

[03] ^b^tampī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0225^ea^ taṃ tividhampi lokaṃ. tathā hissa sabbathāpi viditoti sambandho. ^b^eko loko^eb^ti ``sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā''ti yāya puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā, tāya sabbo saṅkhāraloko eko ekavidho pakārantarassa abhāvato. ^b^dve lokā^eb^tiādīsupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. ^b^nāma^eb^-ggahaṇena cettha nibbānassa aggahaṇaṃ, tassa alokasabhāvattā. nanu ca ``āhāraṭṭhitikā''ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphaladhammānampi lokatā āpajjatīti? nāpajjati, pariññeyyānaṃ dukkhasaccadhammānaṃ idha ``loko''ti adhippetattā. atha vā ``na lujjati na palujjatī''ti ^a^M1.0239^ea^ yo gahito tathā na hoti, so lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā. upādānānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā ^b^upādānakkhandhā. dasāyatanānī^eb^ti dasa rūpāyatanāni.

[03] ettha ca ``āhāraṭṭhitikā''ti paccayāyattavuttitāvacanena saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatā. tāya ca ``yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhaṃ. yaṃ dukkhaṃ, tadanattā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.15) vacanato dukkhānattatā ca pakāsitā hontīti tīṇipi sāmaññalakkhaṇāni gahitāni. ^b^nāma^eb^nti cattāro arūpino khandhā, te ca atthato phassādayo. ^b^rūpa^eb^nti bhūtupādāyarūpāni, tāni ca atthato pathavīādayoti aviseseneva salakkhaṇato saṅkhārā gahitā. taggahaṇeneva ye tesaṃ visesā kusalādayo, hetuādayo ca, tepi gahitā eva hontīti āha ^b^``iti ayaṃ saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā vidito''^eb^ti.

[03] āgamma cittaṃ seti etthāti ^b^āsayo^eb^ migāsayo viya. yathā migo gocarāya gantvā paccāgantvā tattheva vanagahane sayatīti so tassa āsayo, evaṃ aññathā pavattitvāpi cittaṃ āgamma yattha seti, so tassa āsayoti vuccati. so pana sassatadiṭṭhiādivasena catubbidho. vuttañca --
[21] ``sassatucchedadiṭṭhi ca, khanti cevānulomikā.
[22] yathābhūtañca yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, etaṃ āsayasaddita''nti..
