[03] ^b^esa nayo^eb^ti ``navahi ākārehī''tiādinā vuttavidhiṃ rassa-pade atidisati. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ yathādassite ``kathaṃ dīghaṃ assasanto''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 3.148; saṃ0 ni0 5.986; pārā0 165) āgate pāḷinaye. ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ rassapadavasena āgate pāḷinaye.
[03] ^b^aya^eb^nti yogāvacaro. ^b^addhānavasenā^eb^ti dīghakālavasena. ^b^ittaravasenā^eb^ti parittakālavasena. ^b^imehi ākārehī^eb^ti imehi navahi ākārehi.

[03] ^b^tādiso^eb^ti ^a^M1.0321^ea^ dīgho, rasso ca. ^b^cattāro vaṇṇā^eb^ti cattāro ākārā, te ca dīghādayo eva. ^b^nāsikagge va bhikkhuno^eb^ti gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ rassaṃ katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``nāsikagge vā''^eb^ti, ^b^vā^eb^-saddo aniyamattho, tena uttaroṭṭhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī^eb^ti sabbassa kāyassa paṭi paṭi paccekaṃ sammadeva vedanasīlo jānanasīlo, tassa vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedo etassa atthi, taṃ vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedamānoti attho. tattha tattha sabba-ggahaṇena assāsādikāyassa anavasesapariyādāne siddhepi anekakalāpasamudāyabhāvato tassa sabbesampi bhāgānaṃ saṃvedanadassanatthaṃ paṭi-saddaggahaṇaṃ. tattha sakkaccakārībhāvadassanatthaṃ saṃ-saddaggahaṇanti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``sakalassā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha yathā samānepi assāsapassāsesu yogino paṭipattividhāne paccekaṃ sakkaccaṃyeva paṭipajjitabbanti dassetuṃ visuṃ desanā katā, evaṃ tamevatthaṃ dīpetuṃ satipi atthassa samānatāya ``sakalassā''tiādinā padadvayassa visuṃ visuṃ atthavaṇṇanā katāti veditabbaṃ. ^b^pākaṭaṃ karonto^eb^ti vibhūtaṃ karonto, sabbaso vibhāventoti attho. pākaṭīkaraṇaṃ vibhāvanaṃ tattha asammuyhanaṃ ñāṇeneva nesaṃ pavattanena hotīti dassento ^b^``evaṃ viditaṃ karonto''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ñāṇasampayuttacitteneva assāsapassāse pavatteti, na vippayuttacittena, tasmā evaṃbhūto sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatīti vuccati buddhādīhīti yojanā. ^b^cuṇṇavicuṇṇavisaṭe^eb^ti anekakalāpatāya cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhāvena ^a^V1.0304^ea^ visaṭe. ^b^ādi pākaṭo hoti^eb^ satiyā, ñāṇassa ca vasena tathā pubbābhisaṅkhārassa pavattattā. ^b^tādisena bhavitabba^eb^nti catutthapuggalasadisena bhavitabbaṃ, pageva satiṃ, ñāṇañca paccupaṭṭhapetvā tīsupi ṭhānesu ñāṇasampayuttameva cittaṃ pavattetabbanti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^eva^eb^nti vuttappakārena sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedanavaseneva. ^b^ghaṭatī^eb^ti ussahati. ^b^vāyamatī^eb^ti vāyāmaṃ karoti, manasikāraṃ pavattetīti attho. ^b^tathābhūtassā^eb^ti ānāpānassatiṃ bhāventassa. ^b^saṃvaro^eb^ti sati ^a^M1.0322^ea^, vīriyampi vā. ^b^tāya satiyā^eb^ti yā ānāpāne ārabbha pavattā sati, tāya. ^b^tena manasikārenā^eb^ti yo so tattha satipubbaṅgamo bhāvanāmanasikāro, tena saddhinti adhippāyo. ^b^āsevatī^eb^ti ``tisso sikkhāyo''ti vutte adhikusaladhamme āsevati. tadāsevanañhettha sikkhananti adhippetaṃ.

[03] ^b^purimanaye^eb^ti purimasmiṃ bhāvanānaye, paṭhamavatthudvayeti adhippāyo. tatthāpi kāmaṃ ñāṇuppādanaṃ labbhateva assāsapassāsānaṃ yāthāvato dīgharassabhāvāvabodhasabbhāvato, tathāpi taṃ na dukkaraṃ yathāpavattānaṃ tesaṃ gahaṇamattabhāvatoti tattha vattamānakālappayogo kato. idaṃ pana dukkaraṃ purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ gamanasadisaṃ, tasmā sātisayenettha pubbābhisaṅkhārena bhavitabbanti dīpetuṃ anāgatakālappayogo katoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tattha yasmā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ñāṇuppādanādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena kāyasaṅkhārapassambhanapītipaṭisaṃvedanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. keci panettha ``saṃvarasamādānānaṃ saṅgaho''ti vadanti.

[01] ^b^kāyasaṅkhāra^eb^nti assāsapassāsaṃ. so hi cittasamuṭṭhānopi samāno karajakāyappaṭibaddhavuttitāya tena saṅkharīyatīti kāyasaṅkhāroti vuccati. yo pana ``kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro''ti (ma0 ni0 1.102) evamāgato kāyasaṅkhāro cetanālakkhaṇo satipi dvārantaruppattiyaṃ yebhuyyavuttiyā, tabbahulavuttiyā ca kāyadvārena lakkhito, so idha nādhippeto. ^b^passambhento^eb^tiādīsu pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ padaṃ purimassa purimassa atthavacanaṃ, tasmā passambhanaṃ nāma vūpasamanaṃ, tañca tathāpayoge asati uppajjanārahassa oḷārikassa kāyasaṅkhārassa payogasampattiyā anuppādananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti ``oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento''ti ettha. ^b^apariggahitakāle^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānassa anāraddhakāle, tato eva kāyacittānampi apariggahitakāle. ``nisīdati ^a^V1.0305^ea^ pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā''ti hi iminā kāyapariggaho, ``parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā''ti iminā cittapariggaho vutto. tenevāha ^b^``kāyopi cittampi pariggahitā hontī''^eb^ti. ^b^kāyo^eb^ti karajakāyo. ^b^sadarathā^eb^ti sapariḷāhā, sā ^a^M1.0323^ea^ ca nesaṃ sadarathatā garubhāvena viya oḷārikatāya avinābhāvinīti āha ^b^``oḷārikā''^eb^ti. ^b^balavatarā^eb^ti sabalā thūlā. ^b^santā hontī^eb^ti cittaṃ tāvaṃ bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvena ekaggaṃ hutvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā pavattamānaṃ santaṃ hoti vūpasantaṃ, tato eva taṃsamuṭṭhānā rūpadhammā lahumudukammaññabhāvappattā, tadanuguṇatāya sesaṃ tisantatirūpanti evaṃ citte, kāye ca vūpasante pavattamāne tannissitā assāsapassāsā santasabhāvā anukkamena sukhumatarasukhumatamā hutvā pavattanti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``yadā panassa kāyopī''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ābhujanaṃ ^b^ābhogo,^eb^ ``passambhemī''ti paṭhamāvajjanā. sammā anu anu āharaṇaṃ ^b^samannāhāro,^eb^ tasmiṃyeva atthe aparāparaṃ pavattāavajjanā. tasseva atthassa manasi karaṇaṃ citte ṭhapanaṃ ^b^manasikāro^eb^. vīmaṃsā ^b^paccavekkhaṇā^eb^.

[03] ^b^sāraddhe^eb^ti sadarathe sapariḷāhe. ^b^adhimatta^eb^nti balavaṃ oḷārikaṃ. liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ. kāyasaṅkhāroti hi adhippeto. ``adhimattaṃ hutvā pavattatī''ti kiriyāvisesanaṃ vā etaṃ. ^b^sukhuma^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^kāyamhī^eb^ti ettha ``citte cā''ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03] 221^b^.^eb^ paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kariyamānaṃ dutiyajjhānassa nānāvajjanaṃ parikammaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ viya dūrasamussāritapaṭipakkhanti katvā taṃsamuṭṭhāno kāyasaṅkhāro paṭhamajjhāne ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre ca oḷārikoti sadiso vutto. esa nayo sesūpacāradvayepi. atha vā dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya paṭipajjato dukkhāpaṭipadādivasena kilamato yogino kāyakilamathacittūpaghātādivasena, vitakkādisaṅkhobhena ca sapariphandatāya cittappavattiyā dutiyajjhānādiupacāresu kāyasaṅkhārassa oḷārikatā veditabbā. ^b^atisukhumo^eb^ti aññattha labbhamāno kāyasaṅkhāro catutthajjhāne atikkantasukhumo. sukhumabhāvopissa tattha natthi, kuto oḷārikatā appavattanato. tenāha ^b^``appavattimeva pāpuṇātī''^eb^ti.

[03] lābhissa ^a^M1.0324^ea^ sato anupubbasamāpattisamāpajjanavelaṃ, ekāsaneneva vā sabbesaṃ jhānānaṃ paṭilābhaṃ ^a^V1.0306^ea^ sandhāya ^b^majjhimabhāṇakā^eb^ heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato uparūparijhānūpacārepi sukhumataraṃ icchanti. tattha hi sopacārānaṃ jhānānaṃ uparūpari visesavantatā, santatā ca sambhaveyya, ekāvajjanūpacāraṃ vā sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ. evañhi heṭṭhā vuttavādena imassa vādassa avirodho siddho bhinnavisayattā. ^b^sabbesaññevā^eb^ti ubhayesampi. yasmā te sabbepi vuccamānena vidhinā passaddhimicchantiyeva. ^b^``apariggahitakāle pavattakāyasaṅkhāro pariggahitakāle paṭippassambhatī''^eb^ti idaṃ sadisasantānatāya vuttaṃ. na hi te eva oḷārikā assāsādayo sukhumā honti. passambhanākāro pana nesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^mahābhūtapariggahe sukhumo^eb^ti catudhātumukhena vipassanābhinivesaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^sakalarūpapariggahe sukhumo^eb^ bhāvanāya uparūpari paṇītabhāvato. tenevāha ^b^``rūpārūpapariggahe sukhumo''^eb^ti. ^b^lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanā^eb^ti kalāpasammasanamāha. nibbidānupassanato paṭṭhāya ^b^balavavipassanā^eb^. tato oraṃ ^b^dubbalavipassanā. pubbe vuttanayenā^eb^ti ``apariggahitakāle''tiādinā samathanaye vuttena nayena ``apariggahe pavatto kāyasaṅkhāro mahābhūtapariggahe paṭippassambhatī''tiādinā vipassanānayepi paṭippassaddhi yojetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
[03] ^b^assā^eb^ti imassa ``passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra''nti padassa. ^b^codanāsodhanāhī^eb^ti anuyogaparihārehi. ^b^eva^eb^nti idāni vuccamānākārena.

[03] ^b^katha^eb^nti yaṃ idaṃ ``passambhayaṃ...pe0... sikkhatī''ti (paṭi0 ma0 1.171) vuttaṃ, taṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena kāyasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ, yogino ca sikkhanaṃ hotīti kathetukamyatāya pucchitvā kāyasaṅkhāre sarūpato, oḷārikasukhumato, vūpasamato, anuyogaparihārato ca dassetuṃ ^b^``katame kāyasaṅkhārā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^kāyikā^eb^ti rūpakāye bhavā. ^b^kāyapaṭibaddhā^eb^ti kāyasannissitā. kāye sati honti, asati na honti, tato eva te akāyasamuṭṭhānāpi kāyena saṅkharīyantīti ^b^kāyasaṅkhārā. passambhento^eb^ti oḷārikoḷārikaṃ passambhento. sesapadadvayaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. oḷārikañhi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ avūpasantasabhāvaṃ sannisīdāpento ^a^M1.0325^ea^ ^b^``passambhento''^eb^ti vuccati, anuppādanirodhaṃ pāpento ^b^``nirodhento''^eb^ti, suṭṭhu santasabhāvaṃ nayanto ^b^``vūpasamento''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^yathārūpehī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0307^ea^ yādisehi. ^b^kāyasaṅkhārehī^eb^ti oḷārikehi kāyasaṅkhārehi. ^b^ānamanā^eb^ti abhimukhabhāvena kāyassa namanā. ^b^vinamanā^eb^ti visuṃ visuṃ passato namanā. ^b^sannamanā^eb^ti sabbato, suṭṭhu vā namanā. ^b^paṇamanā^eb^ti pacchato namanā. ^b^iñjanā^eb^dīni ānamanādīnaṃ vevacanāni, adhimattāni vā abhimukhaṃ calanādīni ānamanādayo, mandāni iñjanādayo. ^b^passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra^eb^nti tathārūpaṃ ānamanādīnaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ oḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento. tasmiṃ hi passambhite ānamanādayopi passambhitā eva honti.

[03] ^b^santaṃ sukhuma^eb^nti yathārūpehi kāyasaṅkhārehi kāyassa aparipphandanahetūhi ānamanādayo na honti, tathārūpaṃ darathābhāvato santaṃ, anoḷārikatāya sukhumaṃ. ^b^passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra^eb^nti sāmaññato ekaṃ katvā vadati. atha vā pubbe oḷārikoḷārikaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambhento anukkamena kāyassa aparipphandanahetubhūte sukhumasukhumatare uppādetvā tepi paṭippassambhetvā paramasukhumatāya koṭippattaṃ yaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambheti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^``santaṃ sukhumaṃ passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāra''^eb^nti.

[03] ^b^itī^eb^tiādi codakavacanaṃ. tattha ^b^itī^eb^ti pakāratthe nipāto. ^b^kirā^eb^ti arucisūcane, evaṃ ceti attho. ayañhettha adhippāyo -- vuttappakārena yadi atisukhumampi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passambhetīti. ^b^evaṃ sante^eb^ti evaṃ sati tayā vuttākāre labbhamāne. ^b^vātūpaladdhiyā^eb^ti vātassa upaladdhiyā. ^b^ca^eb^-saddo samuccayattho, assāsādivātārammaṇassa cittassa pabhāvanā uppādanā pavattanā na hoti, te ca tena passambhetabbāti adhippāyo. ^b^assāsapassāsānañca bhāvanā^eb^ti oḷārike assāsapassāse bhāvanāya paṭippassambhetvā sukhumānaṃ tesaṃ pabhāvanā ca na hoti, ubhayesaṃ tesaṃ tena paṭippassambhetabbato. ^b^ānāpānassatiyā^eb^ti ānāpānārammaṇāya satiyā ca pavattanaṃ na hoti, ānāpānānaṃ abhāvato. tato eva taṃsampayuttassa ^b^ānāpānassatisamādhissa ca pabhāvanā^eb^ uppādanāpi na hoti. na hi kadāci ārammaṇena vinā sārammaṇadhammā sambhavanti. ^b^na ca naṃ ta^eb^nti ettha ^b^na^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ ^a^M1.0326^ea^. taṃ vuttavidhānaṃ samāpattiṃ paṇḍitā paññavanto na ceva samāpajjantipi tato na vuṭṭhahantipīti yojanā. evaṃ codako sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvūpanayanaṃ passambhananti adhippāyena codeti.

[03] puna ^b^iti kirā^eb^tiādi yathāvuttāya codanāya vissajjanā. tattha ^b^kirā^eb^ti ``yadī''ti etassa ^a^V1.0308^ea^ atthe nipāto. iti kira sikkhati, mayā vuttākārena yadi sikkhatīti attho. ^b^evaṃ sante^eb^ti evaṃ passambhane sati. ^b^pabhāvanā hotī^eb^ti yadipi oḷārikā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassambhanti, sukhumā pana atthevāti anukkamena paramasukhumabhāvappattassa vasena nimittuppattiyā ānāpānassatiyā, ānāpānassatisamādhissa ca pabhāvanā ijjhatevāti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^yathā kathaṃ viyā^eb^ti yathāvuttavidhānaṃ taṃ kathaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ, atthi kiñci tadatthasampaṭipādane opammanti adhippāyo. idāni opammaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``seyyathāpī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^seyyathāpī^eb^ti opammatthe nipāto. ^b^kaṃse^eb^ti kaṃsabhājane. ^b^nimitta^eb^nti nimittassa, tesaṃ saddānaṃ pavattākārassāti attho. sāmiatthe hi idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^suggahitattā^eb^ti suṭṭhu gahitattā. ^b^sumanasikatattā^eb^ti suṭṭhu citte ṭhapitattā. ^b^sūpadhāritattā^eb^ti sammadeva upadhāritattā sallakkhitattā. ^b^sukhumakā saddā^eb^ti anurave āha, ye appakā. appattho hi ayaṃ ka-saddo. ^b^sukhumasaddanimittārammaṇatāpī^eb^ti sukhumo saddova nimittaṃ sukhumasaddanimittaṃ, tadārammaṇatāyapi. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? kāmaṃ tadāsukhumāpi saddā niruddhā, saddanimittassa pana suggahitattā sukhumatarasaddanimittārammaṇabhāvenāpi cittaṃ pavattati. ādito paṭṭhāya hi tassa tassa niruddhassa saddassa nimittaṃ avikkhittena cittena upadhārentassa anukkamena pariyosāne atisukhumasaddanimittampi ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittaṃ pavattateva. ^b^cittaṃ na vikkhepaṃ gacchati^eb^ tasmiṃ yathāupaṭṭhite nimitte samādhānasabbhāvato.

[03] ^b^evaṃ sante^eb^tiādi vuttassevatthassa nigamanavasena vuttaṃ. tattha yassa suttapadassa saddhiṃ codanāsodhanāhi attho vutto, taṃ uddharitvā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānāni vibhāgato dassetuṃ ^b^``passambhaya''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. taṃ sabbaṃ vuttanayattā uttānameva.

[03] 222^b^.^eb^ ^b^ādikammikassa^eb^ ^a^M1.0327^ea^ ^b^kammaṭṭhānavasenā^eb^ti samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. vipassanaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pana itaracatukkesupi labbhateva. ^b^etthā^eb^ti paṭhamacatukke. ^b^pañcasandhika^eb^nti pañcapabbaṃ, pañcabhāganti attho.

[03] ^b^kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhana^eb^nti kammaṭṭhānaganthassa uggaṇhanaṃ. tadatthaparipucchā ^b^kammaṭṭhānassa paripucchanā^eb^ ^a^V1.0309^ea^. atha vā ganthato, atthato ca kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanaṃ ^b^uggaho^eb^. tattha saṃsayaparipucchanā ^b^paripucchā. kammaṭṭhānassa upaṭṭhāna^eb^nti nimittupaṭṭhānaṃ, evaṃ bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa ``evamidha nimittaṃ upaṭṭhātī''ti upadhāraṇaṃ, tathā ^b^kammaṭṭhānappanā^eb^ ``evaṃ jhānamappetī''ti. ^b^kammaṭṭhānassa lakkhaṇa^eb^nti gaṇanānubandhanāphusanānaṃ vasena bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ṭhapanāya sampatti, tato parampi vā sallakkhaṇādivasena matthakappattīti kammaṭṭhānasabhāvassa sallakkhaṇaṃ. tenāha ^b^``kammaṭṭhānasabhāvūpadhāraṇanti vuttaṃ hotī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^attanāpi na kilamati^eb^ odhiso kammaṭṭhānassa uggaṇhanato. tato eva ^b^ācariyampi na viheseti^eb^ dhammādhikaraṇampi bhāvanāya matthakaṃ pāpanato. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti taṃ nimittaṃ attano akilamanāacariyāvihesanahetu. ^b^thoka^eb^nti thokaṃ thokaṃ. uggahetabbato ^b^uggaho,^eb^ sabbopi kammaṭṭhānavidhi, na pubbe vuttauggahamattaṃ. ācariyato uggaho ^b^ācariyuggaho,^eb^ tato. ^b^ekapadampī^eb^ti ekakoṭṭhāsampi.

[03] 223^b^.^eb^ ^b^anuvahanā^eb^ti assāsapassāsānaṃ anugamanavasena satiyā nirantaraṃ anupavattanā. ^b^phusanā^eb^ti assāsapassāse gaṇentassa gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā te satiyā anubandhantassa yathā appanā hoti, tathā cittaṃ ṭhapentassa ca nāsikaggādiṭṭhānassa nesaṃ phusanā. yasmā pana gaṇanādivasena viya phusanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthi, phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva gaṇanādi kātabbanti dassetuṃ idha phusanāgahaṇanti dīpento ^b^``phusanāti phuṭṭhaṭṭhāna''^eb^nti āha. ^b^ṭhapanā^eb^ti samādhānaṃ. taṃ hi sammadeva ārammaṇe cittassa ādhānaṃ ṭhapanaṃ hoti. tathā hi samādhi ``cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhitī''ti (dha0 sa0 11.15) niddiṭṭho. samādhippadhānā pana appanāti āha ^b^``ṭhapanāti appanā''^eb^ti. aniccatādīnaṃ sallakkhaṇato ^b^sallakkhaṇā vipassanā^eb^. pavattato, nimittato ca vinivaṭṭanato ^b^vivaṭṭanā^eb^ nāma ^b^maggo^eb^. sakalasaṃkilesapaṭippassaddhibhāvato ^a^M1.0328^ea^ sabbaso suddhīti ^b^pārisuddhi phalaṃ. tesa^eb^nti vivaṭṭanāpārisuddhīnaṃ. ^b^paṭipassanā^eb^ti paṭi paṭi dassanaṃ pekkhanaṃ. tenāha ^b^``paccavekkhaṇā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^khaṇḍa^eb^nti ekaṃ tīṇi pañcāti evaṃ gaṇanāya khaṇḍanaṃ. ^b^okāse^eb^ti gaṇanavidhiṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^gaṇananissitova^eb^ na kammaṭṭhānanissito. ^b^``sikhāppattaṃ nu kho''^eb^ti idaṃ cirataraṃ gaṇanāya manasi karontassa vasena vuttaṃ. so hi tathā laddhaṃ avikkhepamattaṃ nissāya evaṃ maññeyya ^a^V1.0310^ea^. ^b^``assāsapassāsesu yo upaṭṭhāti, taṃ gahetvā''^eb^ti idaṃ assāsapassāsesu yassa ekova paṭhamaṃ upaṭṭhāti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, yassa pana ubhopi upaṭṭhahanti, tena ubhayampi gahetvā gaṇetabbaṃ. ^b^``yo upaṭṭhātī''^eb^ti iminā ca dvīsu nāsāpuṭavātesu yo pākaṭataro upaṭṭhāti, so gahetabboti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^pavattamānaṃ pavattamāna^eb^nti āmeḍitavacanena nirantaraṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ dasseti. ^b^eva^eb^nti vuttappakārena upalakkhetvā vāti attho. ^b^pākaṭā honti^eb^ gaṇanāvasena bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato.

[03] palighassa parivattanaṃ, taṃ yattha nikkhipanti, so ^b^palighatthambho. tiyāmaratti^eb^nti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^purimanayenā^eb^ti sīghagaṇanāya, gopālakagaṇanāyāti attho. ^b^eko dve tīṇi cattāri pañcā^eb^ti gaṇanāvidhidassanaṃ. tasmā ^b^aṭṭhā^eb^tiādīsupi ekato paṭṭhāyeva paccekaṃ aṭṭhādīni pāpetabbāni. ^b^sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gaṇetabbameva^eb^. kasmāti tattha kāraṇaṃ, nidassanañca dasseti ^b^``gaṇanapaṭibaddhe hī''^eb^tiādinā. tattha arīyati tena nāvāti arittaṃ, pājanadaṇḍo. arittena upatthambhanaṃ ^b^arittupatthambhanaṃ,^eb^ tassa vasena.

[03] nippariyāyato nirantarappavatti nāma ṭhapanāyamevāti āha ^b^``nirantaraṃ pavattaṃ viyā''^eb^ti. anto pavisantaṃ vātaṃ manasi karonto anto cittaṃ paveseti nāma. bahi cittanīharaṇepi eseva nayo. ^b^vātabbhāhata^eb^nti abbhantaragataṃ vātaṃ bahulaṃ manasi karontassa vātena taṃ ṭhānaṃ abbhāhataṃ viya, medena pūritaṃ viya ca hoti, tathā upaṭṭhāti. ^b^nīharato^eb^ phuṭṭhokāsaṃ ^a^M1.0329^ea^ muñcitvā, tathā pana nīharato vātassa gatisamannesanamukhena nānārammaṇesu cittaṃ vidhāvatīti āha ^b^``puthuttārammaṇe cittaṃ vikkhipatī''^eb^ti.
[03] ^b^eta^eb^nti etaṃ assāsapassāsajātaṃ.

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ ^b^anugamana^eb^nti pavattapavattānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena satiyā anu anu pavattanaṃ anugacchanaṃ. tenevāha ^b^``tañca kho na ādimajjhapariyosānānugamanavasenā''^eb^ti. ^b^nābhi ādi^eb^ tattha paṭhamaṃ uppajjanato. paṭhamuppattivasena hi idha ādicintā, na uppattimattavasena. tathā hi te nābhito paṭṭhāya yāva nāsikaggā sabbattha uppajjanteva. yattha yattha ca uppajjanti, tattha tattheva bhijjanti dhammānaṃ gamanābhāvato. yathāpaccayaṃ pana desantaruppattiyaṃ ^a^V1.0311^ea^ gatisamaññā. ^b^hadayaṃ majjha^eb^nti hadayasamīpaṃ tassa uparibhāgo majjhaṃ. ^b^nāsikaggaṃ pariyosāna^eb^nti nāsikaṭṭhānaṃ tassa pariyosānaṃ assāsapassāsasamaññāya tadavadhibhāvato. tathā hete ``cittasamuṭṭhānā''ti vuttā, na ca bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ sambhavo atthi. tenāha ^b^``abbhantaraṃ pavisanavātassa nāsikaggaṃ ādī''^eb^ti. pavisananikkhamanapariyāyo pana taṃsadisavasena vuttoti veditabbo. ^b^vikkhepagata^eb^nti vikkhepaṃ upagataṃ, vikkhittaṃ asamāhitanti attho. ^b^sāraddhāyā^eb^ti sadarathabhāvāya. ^b^iñjanāyā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa calanāya.
[03] ^b^vikkhepagatena cittenā^eb^ti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ, itthambhūtalakkhaṇe vā. ^b^sāraddhā^eb^ti sadarathā. ^b^iñjitā^eb^ti iñjanakā calanakā. tathā ^b^phanditā^eb^.

[03] ^b^ādimajjhapariyosānavasenā^eb^ti ādimajjhapariyosānānugamanavasena na manasi kātabbanti sambandho. ``anubandhanāya manasi karontena phusanāvasena ca ṭhapanāvasena ca manasi kātabba''nti yenādhippāyena vuttaṃ, taṃ vivarituṃ ^b^``gaṇanānubandhanāvasena viyā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^visuṃ manasikāro natthī^eb^ti gaṇanāya, anubandhanāya ca vinā yathākkamaṃ kevalaṃ phusanāvasena, ṭhapanāvasena ca kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro natthi. nanu phusanāya vinā ṭhapanāya viya, phusanāya vinā gaṇanāyapi manasikāro natthiyeva? yadipi natthi, gaṇanā pana yathā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena ^a^M1.0330^ea^ gahetabbā, evaṃ anubandhanā ṭhapanāya, tāya vinā ṭhapanāya asambhavato. tasmā satipi phusanāya nānantarikabhāve gaṇanānubandhanā eva mūlabhāvato padhānabhāvena gahetvā itarāsaṃ tadabhāvaṃ dassento āha ^b^``gaṇanānubandhanāvasena viya hi phusanāṭhapanāvasena visuṃ manasikāro natthī''^eb^ti. yadi evaṃ tā kasmā uddese visuṃ gahitāti āha ^b^``phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyevā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^``phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva gaṇento''^eb^ti iminā gaṇanāya phusanā aṅganti dasseti. tenāha ^b^``gaṇanāya ca phusanāya ca manasi karotī''^eb^ti. ^b^tatthevā^eb^ti phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva. ^b^te^eb^ti assāsapassāse. ^b^satiyā anubandhanto^eb^ti gaṇanāvīthiṃ anugantvā satiyā nibandhanto, phuṭṭhokāseyeva te nirantaraṃ upadhārentoti attho. ^b^appanāvasena cittaṃ ṭhapento^eb^ti yathā appanā hoti, evaṃ yathāupaṭṭhite nimitte cittaṃ ṭhapento samādahanto. ^b^anubandhanāya cā^eb^tiādīsu anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotīti vuccatīti yojanā. ^b^svāyamattho^eb^ti yvāyaṃ ``phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva gaṇento, tattheva gaṇanaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā ^a^V1.0312^ea^ te satiyā anubandhanto''ti ca vutto, so ayamattho. yā accantāya na minoti na vinicchināti, sā mānassa samīpeti ^b^upamā^eb^ yathā ``goṇo viya gavayo''ti.

[03] 225^b^.^eb^ ^b^paṅguḷo^eb^ti pīṭhasappī. ^b^dolā^eb^ pekholo. ^b^kīḷata^eb^nti kīḷantānaṃ. ^b^mātāputtāna^eb^nti attano bhariyāya, puttassa ca. ^b^ubho koṭiyo^eb^ti āgacchantassa purimakoṭiṃ, gacchantassa pacchimakoṭinti dvepi koṭiyo. ^b^majjha^eb^nti dolāphalakasseva majjhaṃ. upanibandhanathambho viyāti ^b^upanibandhanathambho,^eb^ nāsikaggaṃ, mukhanimittaṃ vā, tassa ^b^mūle^eb^ samīpe ^b^ṭhatvā^eb^. kathaṃ ṭhatvā? satiyā vasena. satiñhi tattha sūpaṭṭhitaṃ karonto yogāvacaro tattha ṭhito nāma hoti, avayavadhammena samudāyassa apadisitabbato. ^b^nimitte^eb^ti nāsikaggādinimitte. ^b^satiyā nisīdanto^eb^ti sativasena nisīdanto. ``satiñhi tatthā''tiādinā ṭhāne viya vattabbaṃ. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāne.
[03] 226^b^.^eb^ ^b^te^eb^ti ^a^M1.0331^ea^ nagarassa antobahigatā manussā, tesaṃ saṅgahā ca hatthagatā.

[03] 227^b^.^eb^ ^b^ādito paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti upameyyatthadassanato paṭṭhāya. gāthāyaṃ ^b^nimitta^eb^nti upanibandhanānimittaṃ. ^b^anārammaṇamekacittassā^eb^ti ekassa cittassa na ārammaṇaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ na hontīti attho. ^b^ajānato ca tayo dhamme^eb^ti nimittaṃ assāso passāsoti ime tayo dhamme ārammaṇakaraṇavasena avindantassa. ^b^ca^eb^-saddo byatireke. ^b^bhāvanā^eb^ti ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā. ^b^nupalabbhatī^eb^ti na upalabbhati na sijjhatīti ayaṃ codanāgāthāya attho, dutiyā pana parihāragāthā suviññeyyāva.

[03] ^b^katha^eb^nti tāsaṃ atthaṃ vivarituṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā. ^b^ime tayo dhammā^eb^tiādīsu padayojanāya saddhiṃ ayamatthaniddeso -- ime nimittādayo tayo dhammā ekacittassa kathaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na honti, tathāpi na cime na ca ime tayo dhammā aviditā honti, kathaṃ na ca honti aviditā? tesañhi aviditatte cittañca kathaṃ vikkhepaṃ na gacchati, padhānañca bhāvanāya nipphādakaṃ vīriyañca kathaṃ paññāyati, nīvaraṇānaṃ vikkhambhakaṃ sammadeva samādhānāvahaṃ bhāvanānuyogasaṅkhātaṃ payogañca yogī kathaṃ sādheti, uparūpari lokiyalokuttarañca visesaṃ kathamadhigacchatīti.

[03] idāni ^a^V1.0313^ea^ tamatthaṃ kakacūpamāya sādhetuṃ ^b^``seyyathāpī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. bhūmibhāgassa visamatāya cañcale rukkhe chedanakiriyā na sukarā siyā, tathā ca sati kakacadantagati dubbiññeyyāti āha ^b^``same bhūmibhāge''^eb^ti. ^b^kakacenā^eb^ti khuddakena kharapattena. tenāha ^b^``puriso''^eb^ti. ^b^phuṭṭhakakacadantāna^eb^nti phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhakakacadantānaṃ vasena. tena kakacadantehi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva purisassa satiyā upaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti. tenāha ^b^``na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi karotī''^eb^ti. kakacassa ākaḍḍhanakāle purisābhimukhaṃ pavattā āgatā. pellanakāle tato vigatā ``gatā''ti vuttā. ^b^na ca āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā aviditā honti^eb^ sabbattha satiyā upaṭṭhitattā chinditabbaṭṭhānaṃ aphusitvā gacchantānaṃ, āgacchantānañca kakacadantānaṃ abhāvato. ^b^padhāna^eb^nti rukkhassa chedanavīriyaṃ ^a^M1.0332^ea^. ^b^payoga^eb^nti tasseva chedanakiriyaṃ. ^b^visesa^eb^nti anekabhāvāpādanaṃ, tena ca sādhetabbaṃ payojanavisesaṃ.

[03] ^b^yathā rukkho^eb^tiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. upanibandhati ārammaṇe cittaṃ etāyāti sati upanibandhanā nāma, tassā assāsapassāsānaṃ sallakkhaṇassa nimittanti ^b^upanibandhanānimittaṃ,^eb^ nāsikaggaṃ, mukhanimittaṃ vā. ^b^evamevā^eb^ti yathāpi so puriso kakacena rukkhaṃ chindanto āgatagate kakacadante amanasikarontopi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva satiyā upaṭṭhapanena āgatagate kakacadante jānāti, suttapadañca avirajjhanto atthakiccaṃ sādheti, evameva. ^b^nāsikagge mukhanimitte^eb^ti dīghanāsiko nāsikagge itaro mukhaṃ dasanaṃ nimīyati chādīyati etenāti mukhanimittanti laddhanāme uttaroṭṭhe.

[01] ^b^idaṃ padhāna^eb^nti yena vīriyārambhena āraddhavīriyassa yogino kāyopi cittampi kammaniyaṃ bhāvanākammakkhamaṃ bhāvanākammayoggaṃ hoti, idaṃ vīriyaṃ padhānanti phalena hetuṃ dasseti. ^b^upakkilesā pahīyantī^eb^ti cittassa upakkilesabhūtāni nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanavasena pahīyanti. ^b^vitakkā vūpasamantī^eb^ti tato eva kāmavitakkādayo micchāvitakkā upasamaṃ gacchanti, nīvaraṇappahānena vā paṭhamajjhānādhigamaṃ dassetvā vitakkavūpasamāpadesena dutiyajjhānādīnamadhigamamāha. ^b^ayaṃ payogo^eb^ti ayaṃ jhānādhigamassa hetubhūto kammaṭṭhānānuyogo payogo. ^b^saṃyojanā pahīyantī^eb^ti dasapi saṃyojanāni maggapaṭipāṭiyā samucchedavasena pahīyanti. ^b^anusayā byantī hontī^eb^ti tathā sattapi anusayā anuppattidhammatāpādanena bhaṅgamattassapi anavasesato vigatantā honti. ettha ca saṃyojanappahānaṃ nāma anusayanirodheneva hoti, pahīnesu ca ^a^V1.0314^ea^ saṃyojanesu anusayānaṃ lesopi na bhavissatīti ca dassanatthaṃ ^b^``saṃyojanā pahīyanti anusayā byantī hontī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^ayaṃ viseso^eb^ti imaṃ samādhiṃ nissāya anukkamena labbhamāno ayaṃ saṃyojanappahānādiko imassa samādhissa visesoti attho.

[01] ^b^yassā^eb^ti yena. ^b^anupubba^eb^nti anukkamena. ^b^paricitā^eb^ti pariciṇṇā. ayaṃ hettha saṅkhepattho -- ānāpānassati yathā buddhena bhagavatā desitā ^a^M1.0333^ea^, tatheva yena dīgharassapajānanādividhinā anupubbaṃ paricitā suṭṭhu bhāvitā, tato eva paripuṇṇā soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ pāripūriyā sabbaso puṇṇā. so bhikkhu imaṃ attano khandhādilokaṃ paññobhāsena pabhāseti. yathā kiṃ abbhā muttova candimā abbhupakkilesavimutto candimā tārakarājā viyāti.

[03] ^b^idhā^eb^ti kakacūpamāyaṃ. ^b^assā^eb^ti yogino. ^b^idhā^eb^ti vā imasmiṃ ṭhāne. ^b^assā^eb^ti upamābhūtassa kakacassa. āgatagatavasena yathā tassa purisassa amanasikāro, evaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ ^b^āgatagatavasena amanasikāramattameva payojanaṃ^eb^.

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ ^b^nimitta^eb^nti paṭibhāganimittaṃ. ^b^avasesajhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitā^eb^ti appanāvitakkādiavasesajhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitāti vadanti, vicārādīti pana vattabbaṃ nippariyāyena vitakkassa appanābhāvato. so hi pāḷiyaṃ ``appanā byappanā''ti (dha0 sa0 7) niddiṭṭho, taṃsampayogato vā yasmā jhānaṃ ``appanā''ti aṭṭhakathāvohāro, jhānaṅgesu ca samādhi padhānaṃ, tasmā taṃ ``appanā''ti dassento ^b^``avasesajhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitā appanāsaṅkhātā ṭhapanā ca sampajjatī''^eb^ti āha. ^b^kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato pabhutī^eb^ti ettha ^b^``anukkamato...pe0... laṅghanākārappattaṃ viya hotī''^eb^ti ettako gantho parihīno.

[03] ^b^sāraddhakāyassa^eb^ kassaci puggalassa. ^b^onamati^eb^ paṭṭikādīnaṃ palambanena. ^b^vikūjatī^eb^ti saddaṃ karoti. gattānisadakapparādīnaṃ sandhiṭṭhānesu ^b^valiṃ gaṇhāti^eb^ tattha tattha valitaṃ hoti. kasmā? yasmā sāraddhakāyo garuko hotīti kāyadarathavūpasamena saddhiṃ sijjhamāno oḷārikāssāsapassāsanirodho byatirekamukhena tassa sādhanaṃ viya vutto. ^b^oḷārikāssāsapassāsanirodhavasenā^eb^ti anvayavasena tadatthasādhanaṃ. tattha ^b^kāyadarathe vūpasante^eb^ti cittajarūpānaṃ lahumudukammaññabhāvena yo sesatisantatirūpānampi lahuādibhāvo, so idha kāyassa lahubhāvoti ^a^V1.0315^ea^ adhippeto. svāyaṃ yasmā cittassa lahuādibhāvena vinā natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``kāyopi cittampi lahukaṃ hotī''^eb^ti.
[03] ^b^oḷārike^eb^ ^a^M1.0334^ea^ ^b^assāsapassāse niruddhe^eb^tiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayampi vicetabbākārappattassa kāyasaṅkhārassa vicayanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ānītaṃ.
[03] 229^b^.^eb^ ^b^uparūpari vibhūtānī^eb^ti bhāvanābalena uddhaṃ uddhaṃ pākaṭāni honti. ^b^desato^eb^ti pakatiyā phusanadesato, pubbe attanā phusanavasena upadhāritaṭṭhānato.

[03] ^b^``kattha natthī''^eb^ti ṭhānavasena, ^b^``kassa natthī''^eb^ti puggalavasena vīmaṃsiyamānamatthaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``antomātukucchiya''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha yathā udake nimuggassa puggalassa niruddhokāsatāya assāsapassāsā na pavattanti, evaṃ antomātukucchiyaṃ. yathā matānaṃ samuṭṭhāpakacittābhāvato, evaṃ asaññībhūtānaṃ mucchāparetānaṃ, asaññīsu vā jātānaṃ, tathā nirodhasamāpannānaṃ. catutthajjhānasamāpannānaṃ pana dhammatāvaseneva nesaṃ anuppajjanaṃ, tathā rūpārūpabhavasamaṅgīnaṃ. keci pana ``anupubbato sukhumabhāvappattiyā catutthajjhānasamāpannassa, rūpabhave rūpānaṃ bhavaṅgassa ca sukhumabhāvato rūpabhavasamaṅgīnaṃ natthī''ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti. ^b^atthiyeva te assāsapassāsā^eb^ pariyesatoti adhippāyo, yathāvuttasattaṭṭhānavinimuttassa assāsapassāsānaṃ anuppajjanaṭṭhānassa abhāvato. ^b^pakatiphuṭṭhavasenā^eb^ti pakatiyā phusanaṭṭhānavasena. ^b^nimittaṃ ṭhapetabba^eb^nti satiyā tattha tattha sukhappavattanatthaṃ thiratarasañjānanaṃ pavattetabbaṃ. thirasaññāpadaṭṭhānā hi sati. ^b^imamevā^eb^ti imaṃ eva anupaṭṭhahantassa kāyasaṅkhārassa kaṇṭakuṭṭhāpananayena upaṭṭhāpanavidhimeva. ^b^atthavasa^eb^nti hetuṃ. ^b^attho^eb^ti hi phalaṃ, so yassa vasena pavattati, so atthavasoti. ^b^muṭṭhassatissā^eb^ti vinaṭṭhassatissa. ^b^asampajānassā^eb^ti sampajaññarahitassa, bhāventassa anukkamena anupaṭṭhahante assāsapassāse vīmaṃsitvā ``ime te''ti upadhāretuṃ, sammadeva pajānituñca samatthāhi satipaññāhi virahitassāti adhippāyo.

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ ^b^ito aññaṃ^eb^ kammaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^garuka^eb^nti bhāriyaṃ. sā cassa garukatā bhāvanāya sudukkarabhāvenāti āha ^b^``garukabhāvana''^eb^nti. uparūpari ^a^M1.0335^ea^ santasukhumabhāvappattito ``balavatī suvisadā sūrā ca satipaññā ca icchitabbā''ti vatvā sukhumassa nāma atthassa sādhanenāpi sukhumeneva ^a^V1.0316^ea^ bhavitabbanti dassetuṃ ^b^``yathā hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. idāni anupaṭṭhahantānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ pariyesanupāyaṃ dassento ^b^``tāhi ca panā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^gocaramukhe^eb^ti gocarābhimukhe. ^b^anupada^eb^nti padānupadaṃ. ^b^caritvā^eb^ti gocaraṃ gahetvā. ^b^tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne^eb^ti upanibandhanānimittasaññitaṭṭhāne. ^b^yojetvā^eb^ti manasikārena yojetvā. ^b^satirasmiyā bandhitvā^eb^ti vā vuttamevatthamāha ^b^``tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne yojetvā''^eb^ti. na hi upameyye bandhanayojanaṭṭhānāni visuṃ labbhanti.

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ ^b^nimitta^eb^nti uggahanimittaṃ, paṭibhāganimittaṃ vā. ubhayampi hi idha ekajjhaṃ vuttaṃ. tathā hi tūlapicuādiupamattayaṃ uggahe yujjati, sesaṃ ubhayattha. ^b^ekacce^eb^ti eke ācariyā.

[03] ^b^tārakarūpaṃ viyā^eb^ti tārakāya pabhārūpaṃ viya. maṇiguḷikādiupamā paṭibhāge vaṭṭanti. kathaṃ panetaṃ ekaṃyeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ anekākārato upaṭṭhātīti āha ^b^``tañca paneta''^eb^ntiādi. ^b^suttanta^eb^nti ekaṃ suttaṃ. paguṇappavattibhāvena avicchedaṃ, mahāvisayatañca sandhāyāha ^b^``mahatī pabbateyyā nadī viyā''^eb^ti. atthabyañjanasampattiyā samantabhaddakaṃ suttaṃ sabbabhāgamanoharā sabbapāliphullā vanaghaṭā viyāti āha ^b^``ekā vanarāji viyā''^eb^ti. tenāha bhagavā -- ``vanappagumbe yatha phussitagge''ti (khu0 pā0 6.13; su0 ni0 236). nānānusandhikaṃ nānāpeyyālaṃ vividhanayanipuṇaṃ bahuvidhakammaṭṭhānamukhasuttantaṃ atthikehi sakkaccaṃ samupajīvitabbanti āha ^b^``sītacchāyo...pe0... rukkho viyā''^eb^ti. ^b^saññānānatāyā^eb^ti nimittupaṭṭhānato pubbeva pavattasaññānaṃ nānāvidhabhāvato.

[03] ^b^ime tayo dhammā^eb^ti assāso, passāso, nimittanti ime tayo dhammā. ^b^natthī^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānavasena manasikātabbabhāvena natthi na upalabbhanti. ^b^na ca upacāra^eb^nti upacārampi na pāpuṇāti, pageva appananti adhippāyo. ^b^yassa panā^eb^ti vijjamānapakkho vuttanayānusārena veditabbo.
[03] idāni vuttasseva atthassa samatthanatthaṃ kakacūpamāyaṃ āgatā ^b^``nimitta''^eb^ntiādikā gāthā paccānītā.

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ ^b^nimitte^eb^ti ^a^M1.0336^ea^ ^a^V1.0317^ea^ yathāvutte paṭibhāganimitte. ^b^evaṃ hotī^eb^ti bhāvanamanuyuttassa eva hoti. tasmā ``punappunaṃ evaṃ manasi karohī''ti vattabbo. ^b^vosānaṃ āpajjeyyā^eb^ti ``nimittaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ uppādetuṃ, tayidaṃ laddhaṃ, handāhaṃ dāni yadā vā tadā vā visesaṃ nibbattessāmī''ti saṅkocaṃ āpajjeyya. ^b^visīdeyyā^eb^ti ``ettakaṃ kālaṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa nimittampi na uppannaṃ, abhabbo maññe visesassā''ti visādaṃ āpajjeyya.

[03] ``imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇato muccissāmīti paṭipannassa nimitta''nti vutte kathaṃ saṅkocāpatti, bhiyyoso mattāya ussāhameva kareyyāti ^b^``nimittamidaṃ...pe0... vattabbo''^eb^ti ^b^majjhimabhāṇakā^eb^ āhu. ^b^eva^eb^nti vuttappakārena paṭibhāganimitteyeva bhāvanācittassa ṭhapanena. ^b^ito pabhutī^eb^ti ito paṭibhāganimittuppattito paṭṭhāya. pubbe yaṃ vuttaṃ ``anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotī''ti (visuddhi0 1.224), tattha anubandhanaṃ, phusanañca vissajjetvā ^b^ṭhapanāvasena bhāvanā hotī^eb^ti ṭhapanāvaseneva bhāvetabbanti attho.

[03] ^b^porāṇehi^eb^ vuttovāyamatthoti ^b^``nimitte''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^nimitte^eb^ti paṭibhāganimitte. ^b^ṭhapayaṃ citta^eb^nti bhāvanācittaṃ ṭhapento, ṭhapanāvasena manasi karontoti attho. ^b^nānākāra^eb^nti ``cattāro vaṇṇā''ti (visuddhi0 1.219; pārā0 aṭṭha0 2.165; paṭi0 ma0 aṭṭha0 2.1.163) evaṃ vuttaṃ nānākāraṃ. ākārasāmaññavasena hetaṃ ekavacanaṃ. ^b^vibhāvaya^eb^nti vibhāvento antaradhāpento. nimittuppattito paṭṭhāya hi te ākārā amanasikaroto antarahitā viya honti. ^b^assāsapassāse^eb^ti assāsapassāse yo nānākāro, taṃ vibhāvayaṃ, assāsapassāsasambhūte vā nimitte. ^b^sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhatī^eb^ti tāya eva ṭhapanāya attano cittaṃ upanibandhati, appetīti attho. ye pana ``vibhāvayanti vibhāvento viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto''ti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ pubbabhāgavasena yujjeyya. ayañhettha attho -- dhitisampannattā ^b^dhīro^eb^ yogī assāsapassāse nānākāraṃ vibhāvento nānākārato te pajānanto vidite pākaṭe karonto, nānākāraṃ vā oḷārikoḷārike passambhento vūpasamento tattha yaṃ laddhaṃ nimittaṃ, tasmiṃ cittaṃ ṭhapento anukkamena sakaṃ cittaṃ nibandhati appetīti.

[03] ^b^vaṇṇato^eb^ti ^a^M1.0337^ea^ picupiṇḍatārakarūpādīsu viya upaṭṭhitavaṇṇato. ^b^lakkhaṇato^eb^ti kharabhāvādisabhāvato, aniccādilakkhaṇato vā. rakkhitabbaṃ taṃ nimittanti sambandho. nimittassa ^a^V1.0318^ea^ rakkhaṇaṃ nāma tattha paṭiladdhassa upacārajhānassa rakkhaṇeneva hotīti āha ^b^``punappunaṃ manasikāravasena vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ gamayitvā''^eb^ti.

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ ^b^etthā^eb^ti etissaṃ kāyānupassanāyaṃ. ^b^pārisuddhiṃ pattukāmo^eb^ti adhigantukāmo, samāpajjitukāmo ca, tattha sallakkhaṇāvivaṭṭanāvasena adhigantukāmo, sallakkhaṇāvasena samāpajjitukāmoti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetī^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^``katha''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^yathā hī^eb^tiādi kāyassa, cittassa ca assāsapassāsānaṃ samudayabhāvadassanaṃ. ^b^kammāragaggariyā^eb^ti kammārānaṃ ukkāyaṃ aggidhamanabhastā. ^b^dhamamānāyā^eb^ti dhamayantiyā, vātaṃ gāhāpentiyāti attho. ^b^tajja^eb^nti tadanurūpaṃ. ^b^evamevā^eb^ti ettha kammāragaggarī viya karajakāyo, vāyāmo viya cittaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. kiñcāpi assāsapassāsā cittasamuṭṭhānā, karajakāyaṃ pana vinā tesaṃ appavattanato ^b^``kāyañca cittañca paṭicca assāsapassāsā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^tassā^eb^ti nāmarūpassa. ^b^paccayaṃ pariyesatī^eb^ti ``avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo''tiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 1.50) avijjādikaṃ paccayaṃ vīmaṃsati pariggaṇhāti. ^b^kaṅkhaṃ vitaratī^eb^ti ``ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna''nti (ma0 ni0 1.18; saṃ0 ni0 2.20) ādinayappavattaṃ soḷasavatthukaṃ vicikicchaṃ atikkamati pajahati. ``yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna''nti (ma0 ni0 1.347; 361; 3.86; a0 ni0 4.181) ādinayappavattaṃ ^b^kalāpasammasanaṃ. pubbabhāge^eb^ti paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhipariyāpannāya udayabbayānupassanāya pubbabhāge ^b^uppanne. obhāsādayo^eb^ti obhāso ñāṇaṃ pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ adhimokkho paggaho upekkhā upaṭṭhānaṃ nikantīti ime obhāsādayo dasa. ^b^udayaṃ pahāyā^eb^ti udayabbayānupassanāya gahitaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ udayaṃ vissajjetvā tesaṃ bhaṅgasseva anupassanato bhaṅgānupassanaṃ ñāṇaṃ ^b^patvā^eb^ ādīnavānupassanāpubbaṅgamāya nibbidānupassanāya ^b^nibbindanto^eb^. muñcitukamyatāpaṭisaṅkhānupassanāsaṅkhārupekkhānulomañāṇānaṃ ciṇṇapariyante uppannagotrabhuñāṇānantaraṃ uppannena maggañāṇena sabbasaṅkhāresu ^b^virajjanto vimuccanto^eb^. maggakkhaṇe ^a^M1.0338^ea^ hi ariyo virajjati vimuccatīti ca vuccati. tenāha ^b^``yathākkamena cattāro ariyamagge pāpuṇitvā''^eb^ti. maggaphalanibbānapahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesasaṅkhātassa paccavekkhitabbassa pabhedena ^b^ekūnavīsatibhedassa^eb^ ^a^V1.0319^ea^. arahato hi avasiṭṭhakilesābhāvena ekūnavīsatitā. ^b^assā^eb^ti ānāpānakammaṭṭhānikassa.
[03] 234^b^.^eb^ ^b^visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayo nāma natthi^eb^ paṭhamacatukkavasena adhigatajhānassa vedanācittadhammānupassanāvasena desitattā. ^b^tesa^eb^nti tiṇṇaṃ catukkānaṃ.

[03] ^b^pītipaṭisaṃvedī^eb^ti pītiyā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedanāsīlo, tassā vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedo etassa atthi, taṃ vā paṭi paṭi sammadeva vedayamāno. tattha kāmaṃ saṃvedana-ggahaṇeneva pītiyā sakkaccaṃ viditabhāvo bodhito hoti, yehi pana pakārehi tassā saṃvedanaṃ icchitaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^paṭi^eb^-saddaggahaṇaṃ ``paṭi paṭi saṃvedīti paṭisaṃvedī''ti. tenāha ^b^``dvīhākārehī''^eb^tiādi.

[03] tattha ^b^kathaṃ ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotī^eb^ti pucchāvacanaṃ. ^b^sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjatī^eb^ti pītisahagatāni dve paṭhamadutiyajhānāni paṭipāṭiyā samāpajjati. ^b^tassā^eb^ti tena. ``paṭisaṃviditā''ti hi padaṃ apekkhitvā kattuatthe etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^samāpattikkhaṇe^eb^ti samāpannakkhaṇe. ^b^jhānapaṭilābhenā^eb^ti jhānena samaṅgibhāvena. ^b^ārammaṇato^eb^ti ārammaṇamukhena, tadārammaṇajhānapariyāpannā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ^b^ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā^eb^. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? yathā nāma sappapariyesanaṃ carantena tassa āsaye paṭisaṃvidite sopi paṭisaṃvidito gahito eva hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā, evaṃ pītiyā āsayabhūte ārammaṇe paṭisaṃvidite sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā eva hoti salakkhaṇato, sāmaññato ca tassā gahaṇassa sukarattāti.

[03] kathaṃ asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^vipassanākkhaṇe^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāya tikkhavisadappattāya visayato ^a^M1.0339^ea^ dassanakkhaṇe. ^b^lakkhaṇapaṭivedhenā^eb^ti pītiyā salakkhaṇassa, sāmaññalakkhaṇassa ca paṭivijjhanena. yaṃ hi yassa visesato, sāmaññato ca lakkhaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ vidite so yāthāvato vidito eva hoti. tenāha ^b^``asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotī''^eb^ti.

[03] idāni ^a^V1.0320^ea^ tamatthaṃ pāḷiyā eva vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``vuttañheta''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^dīghaṃ assāsavasenā^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. tattha pana satokāritādassanavasena pāḷi āgatā, idha pītipaṭisaṃveditāvasena, pītipaṭisaṃveditā ca atthato vibhattā eva. apica ayamettha saṅkhepattho -- ^b^dīghaṃ assāsavasenā^eb^ti dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena pajānato sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho. ^b^cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato^eb^ti jhānapariyāpannaṃ ``avikkhepo''ti laddhanāmaṃ cittassekaggataṃ taṃsampayuttāya paññāya pajānato. yatheva hi ārammaṇamukhena pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti, evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi ārammaṇamukhena paṭisaṃviditā eva hontīti. ^b^sati upaṭṭhitā hotī^eb^ti dīghaṃ assāsavasena jhānasampayuttā sati tassa ārammaṇe upaṭṭhitā ārammaṇamukhena jhānepi upaṭṭhitā nāma hoti. ^b^tāya satiyā^eb^ti evaṃ upaṭṭhitāya tāya satiyā yathāvuttena ^b^tena ñāṇena^eb^ suppaṭividitattā ārammaṇassa tassa vasena tadārammaṇā sā pīti ^b^paṭisaṃviditā hoti. dīghaṃ passāsavasenā^eb^tiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.

[03] evaṃ paṭhamacatukkavasena dassitaṃ pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ ārammaṇato, asammohato ca vibhāgaso dassetuṃ ``āvajjato''tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^āvajjato^eb^ti jhānaṃ āvajjantassa. ^b^sā pītī^eb^ti sā jhānapariyāpannā pīti. ^b^jānato^eb^ti samāpannakkhaṇe ārammaṇamukhena jānato. tassa sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho. ^b^passato^eb^ti dassanabhūtena ñāṇena jhānato vuṭṭhāya passantassa. ^b^paccavekkhato^eb^ti jhānaṃ paccavekkhantassa. ^b^cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahato^eb^ti ``ettakaṃ velaṃ jhānasamaṅgī bhavissāmī''ti jhānacittaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa. evaṃ pañcannaṃ vasībhāvānaṃ vasena jhānassa pajānanamukhena ārammaṇato pītiyā paṭisaṃvedanā dassitā.

[03] idāni ^a^M1.0340^ea^ yehi dhammehi jhānaṃ, vipassanā ca sijjhanti; tesaṃ jhānapariyāpannānaṃ, vipassanāmaggapariyāpannānañca saddhādīnaṃ vasena pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``saddhāya adhimuccato''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^adhimuccato^eb^ti saddahantassa, samathavipassanāvasenāti adhippāyo. ^b^vīriyaṃ paggaṇhato^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^abhiññeyya^eb^nti abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya jānitabbaṃ. ^b^abhijānato^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāpubbaṅgamāya maggapaññāya jānato. ^b^pariññeyya^eb^nti dukkhasaccaṃ tīraṇapariññāya, maggapaññāya ca parijānato. ^b^pahātabba^eb^nti samudayasaccaṃ pahānapariññāya, maggapaññāya ca pajahato. ^b^bhāvayato sacchikaroto bhāvetabbaṃ^eb^ maggasaccaṃ ^a^V1.0321^ea^, ^b^sacchikātabbaṃ^eb^ nirodhasaccaṃ. keci panettha pītiyā eva vasena abhiññeyyādīni uddharanti, taṃ ayuttaṃ jhānādisamudāyaṃ uddharitvā tato pītiyā niddhāraṇassa adhippetattā.

[03] ettha ca ``dīghaṃ assāsavasenā''tiādinā paṭhamacatukkavasena ārammaṇato pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ vuttaṃ, tathā ``āvajjato''tiādīhi pañcahi padehi. ``abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānato''tiādīhi pana asammohato. ``saddhāya adhimuccato''tiādīhi ubhayathāpīti saṅkhepato samathavasena ārammaṇato, vipassanāvasena asammohato pītipaṭisaṃvedanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. kasmā panettha vedanānupassanāyaṃ pītisīsena vedanā gahitā, na sarūpato evāti? bhūmivibhāgādivasena vedanaṃ bhinditvā catudhā vedanānupassanaṃ dassetuṃ. apica vedanākammaṭṭhānaṃ dassento bhagavā pītiyā oḷārikattā taṃsampayuttasukhaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ pītisīsena dasseti.

[03] ^b^eteneva nayena avasesapadānī^eb^ti ``sukhapaṭisaṃvedī cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī''ti padāni pītipaṭisaṃvedipade āgatanayeneva atthato veditabbāni. sakkā hi ``dvīhākārehi sukhapaṭisaṃveditā hoti, cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃveditā hoti ārammaṇato''tiādinā pītiṭṭhāne sukhādipadāni pakkhipitvā ``sukhasahagatāni tīṇi jhānāni, cattāri vā jhānāni samāpajjatī''tiādinā atthaṃ viññātuṃ. tenāha ^b^``tiṇṇaṃ jhānānaṃ vasenā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^vedanādayo^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena saññā gahitā. tenāha ^b^``dve khandhā''^eb^ti. ^b^vipassanābhūmidassanattha^eb^nti pakiṇṇakasaṅkhārasammasanavasena vipassanāya bhūmidassanatthaṃ ^b^``sukhanti dve sukhānī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ ^a^M1.0341^ea^ samathe kāyikasukhābhāvato. ^b^so^eb^ti so passambhanapariyāyena vutto nirodho. ``imassa hi bhikkhuno pubbe apariggahitakāle''tiādinā (visuddhi0 1.220) vitthārato kāyasaṅkhāre vutto, tasmā vuttanayeneva veditabbo. tattha kāyasaṅkhāravasena āgato, idha cittasaṅkhāravasenāti ayameva viseso.

[03] evaṃ cittasaṅkhārassa passambhanaṃ atidesena dassetvā yadaññaṃ imasmiṃ catukke vattabbaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^pītipade^eb^ti ``pītipaṭisaṃvedī''tiādinā desitakoṭṭhāse. ^b^pītisīsena vedanā vuttā^eb^ti pītiapadesena taṃsampayuttā vedanā vuttā, na pītīti adhippāyo. tattha kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. ^b^dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesū^eb^ti ``cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāra''nti cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃyuttesu dvīsu padesu. ``viññāṇapaccayā ^a^V1.0322^ea^ nāmarūpa''nti (mahāva0 1; ma0 ni0 3.126; udā0 1) vacanato cittena paṭibaddhāti ^b^cittapaṭibaddhā^eb^. tato eva kāmaṃ cittena saṅkharīyantīti ^b^cittasaṅkhārā,^eb^ saññāvedanādayo, idha pana upalakkhaṇamattaṃ saññā vedanāva adhippetāti āha ^b^``saññāsampayuttā vedanā''^eb^ti.

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ cittapaṭisaṃvedīti ettha dvīhākārehi cittapaṭisaṃveditā hoti ārammaṇato, asammohato ca. kathaṃ ārammaṇato? cattāri jhānāni samāpajjati, tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhenātiādinā vuttanayānusārena sabbaṃ suviññeyyanti āha ^b^``catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena cittapaṭisaṃveditā veditabbā''^eb^ti. ^b^cittaṃ modento^eb^ti jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ sampayuttāya pītiyā modayamāno, taṃ vā pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattaṃ vipassanācittaṃ tāya eva ārammaṇabhūtāya pītiyā modayamāno. ^b^pamodento^eb^tiādīni padāni tasseva vevacanāni pītipariyāyabhāvato.

[01] ^b^sampayuttāya pītiyā cittaṃ āmodetī^eb^ti jhānacittasampayuttāya pītisambojjhaṅgabhūtāya odagyalakkhaṇāya jhānapītiyā tameva jhānacittaṃ sahajātādipaccayavasena ceva jhānapaccayavasena ca paribrūhento haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākāraṃ pāpento āmodeti pamodeti ca. ^b^ārammaṇaṃ katvā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0342^ea^ uḷāraṃ jhānasampayuttaṃ pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānaṃ vipassanā^b^cittaṃ^eb^ tāya eva ārammaṇabhūtāya pītiyā yogāvacaro haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākāraṃ pāpento ``āmodeti pamodetī''ti vuccati.

[03] ^b^samaṃ ṭhapento^eb^ti yathā īsakampi līnapakkhaṃ, uddhaccapakkhañca anupagamma anonataṃ anunnataṃ yathā indriyānaṃ samattapaṭipattiyā avisamaṃ, samādhissa vā ukkaṃsagamanena āneñjappattiyā sammadeva ṭhitaṃ hoti, evaṃ appanāvasena ṭhapento. ^b^lakkhaṇapaṭivedhenā^eb^ti aniccādikassa lakkhaṇassa paṭi paṭi vijjhanena khaṇe khaṇe avabodhena. ^b^khaṇikacittekaggatā^eb^ti khaṇamattaṭṭhitiko samādhi. sopi hi ārammaṇe nirantaraṃ ekākārena pavattamāno paṭipakkhena anabhibhūto appito viya cittaṃ niccalaṃ ṭhapeti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``evaṃ uppannāyā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ^b^mocento^eb^ti vikkhambhanavimuttivasena vivecento visuṃ karonto, nīvaraṇāni pajahantoti attho. ^b^vipassanākkhaṇe^eb^ti bhaṅgānupassanākkhaṇe. bhaṅgo hi nāma aniccatāya paramā koṭi, tasmā ^a^V1.0323^ea^ tāya bhaṅgānupassako yogāvacaro cittamukhena sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ aniccato passati, no niccato. aniccassa dukkhattā, dukkhassa ca anattakattā tadeva dukkhato anupassati, no sukhato. anattato anupassati, no attato. yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, na taṃ abhinanditabbaṃ. yañca na abhinanditabbaṃ, na taṃ rañjitabbaṃ. tasmā bhaṅgadassanānusārena ``aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā''ti saṅkhāragate diṭṭhe tasmiṃ nibbindati, no nandati. virajjati, no rajjati. so evaṃ nibbindanto virajjanto lokiyeneva tāva ñāṇena rāgaṃ nirodheti, no samudeti, nāssa samudayaṃ karotīti attho. atha vā so evaṃ viratto yathā diṭṭhaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ, tathā adiṭṭhaṃ attano ñāṇena nirodheti, no samudeti. nirodhamevassa manasikaroti, no samudayanti attho. so evaṃ paṭipanno paṭinissajjati, no ādiyati. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? ayañhi aniccādianupassanā saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ pariccajanato, saṅkhatadosadassanena tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato pariccāgapaṭinissaggo pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cāti vuccati. tasmā tāya samannāgato yogāvacaro vuttanayena kilese ca pariccajati, nibbāne ca pakkhandati. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``so vipassanākkhaṇe aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāto cittaṃ mocento vimocento^eb^ ^a^M1.0343^ea^ ^b^...pe0...^eb^ paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānato ^b^cittaṃ mocento vimocento assasati ceva passasati cā''^eb^ti.

[03] tattha aniccassa, aniccanti vā anupassanā ^b^aniccānupassanā^eb^. tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāya etaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^niccasaññāto^eb^ti saṅkhatadhamme ``niccā sassatā''ti pavattāya micchāsaññāya. saññāsīsena cittadiṭṭhīnampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. esa nayo sukhasaññādīsupi. ^b^nibbidānupassanāyā^eb^ti saṅkhāresu nibbindanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya. ^b^nandito^eb^ti sappītikataṇhāto. ^b^virāgānupassanāyā^eb^ti tathā virajjanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``rāgato mocento''^eb^ti. ^b^nirodhānupassanāyā^eb^ti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhassa anupassanāya. yathā saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva, āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena na uppajjanti, evaṃ vā anupassanā nirodhānupassanā. muñcitukamyatā hi ayaṃ balappattā. tenāha ^b^``samudayato mocento''^eb^ti. paṭinissajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā ^b^paṭinissaggānupassanā. ādānato^eb^ti niccādivasena gahaṇato, paṭisandhiggahaṇato vāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ aniccanti ^a^V1.0324^ea^ anupassī, aniccassa vā anupassanasīlo ^b^aniccānupassī^eb^ti ettha kiṃ panetaṃ aniccaṃ, kathaṃ vā aniccaṃ, kā vā aniccānupassanā, kassa vā aniccānupassanāti catukkaṃ vibhāvetabbanti taṃ dassento ^b^``aniccaṃ veditabba''^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] tattha niccaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ sassataṃ yathā taṃ nibbānaṃ, na niccanti ^b^aniccaṃ,^eb^ udayabbayavantaṃ, atthato saṅkhatā dhammāti āha ^b^``aniccanti pañcakkhandhā. kasmā? uppādavayaññathattabhāvā''^eb^ti, uppādavayaññathattasabbhāvāti attho. tattha saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hetupaccayehi uppajjanaṃ ahutvā sambhavo attalābho ^b^uppādo^eb^. uppannānaṃ tesaṃ khaṇanirodho vināso ^b^vayo^eb^. jarāya aññathābhāvo ^b^aññathattaṃ^eb^. yathā hi uppādāvatthāya bhinnāya bhaṅgāvatthāyaṃ vatthubhedo natthi, evaṃ ṭhitisaṅkhātāya bhaṅgābhimukhāvatthāyampi vatthubhedo natthi, yattha jarāvohāro. tasmā ekassāpi dhammassa jarā yujjati, yā khaṇikajarāti vuccati. ekaṃsena ca uppādabhaṅgāvatthāsu vatthuno abhedo icchitabbo, aññathā ``añño uppajjati, añño bhijjatī''ti āpajjeyya ^a^M1.0344^ea^. tayimaṃ khaṇikajaraṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``aññathatta''^eb^nti. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato kathayissāma.

[03] yassa lakkhaṇattayassa bhāvā khandhesu aniccasamaññā, tasmiṃ lakkhaṇattaye aniccatāsamaññāti ``aniccatāti tesaṃyeva uppādavayaññathatta''nti vatvā visesato dhammānaṃ khaṇikanirodhe aniccatāvohāroti dassento ^b^``hutvā abhāvo vā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha uppādapubbakattā abhāvassa hutvāgahaṇaṃ. tena pākabhāvapubbakattaṃ vināsabhāvassa dasseti. ^b^tenevākārenā^eb^ti nibbattanākāreneva. ^b^khaṇabhaṅgenā^eb^ti khaṇikanirodhena. ^b^tassā aniccatāyā^eb^ti khaṇikabhaṅgasaṅkhātāya aniccatāya. ^b^tāya anupassanāyā^eb^ti yathāvuttāya aniccānupassanāya. ^b^samannāgato^eb^ti samaṅgibhūto yogāvacaro.

[03] ^b^khayo^eb^ saṅkhārānaṃ vināso, virajjanaṃ tesaṃyeva vilujjanaṃ ^b^virāgo,^eb^ khayo eva virāgo ^b^khayavirāgo,^eb^ khaṇikanirodho. accantamettha etasmiṃ adhigate saṅkhārā virajjanti nirujjhantīti ^b^accantavirāgo,^eb^ nibbānaṃ. tenāha ^b^``khayavirāgo saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgo, accantavirāgo nibbāna''^eb^nti. ^b^tadubhayavasena pavattā^eb^ti khayavirāgānupassanāvasena vipassanāya, accantavirāgānupassanāvasena maggassa pavatti yojetabbā. ārammaṇato vā vipassanāya khayavirāgānupassanāvasena ^a^V1.0325^ea^ pavatti, tanninnabhāvato accantavirāgānupassanāvasena, maggassa pana asammohato khayavirāgānupassanāvasena, ārammaṇato accantavirāgānupassanāvasena pavatti veditabbā. ^b^``eseva nayo''^eb^ti iminā yasmā virāgānupassī-pade vuttanayānusārena ``dve nirodhā khayanirodho ca accantanirodho cā''ti evamādiatthavaṇṇanaṃ atidisati, tasmā virāgaṭṭhāne nirodhapadaṃ pakkhipitvā ``khayo saṅkhārānaṃ vināso''tiādinā idha vuttanayena tassa atthavaṇṇanā veditabbā.

[03] paṭinissajjanaṃ pahātabbassa tadaṅgavasena vā samucchedavasena vā pariccajanaṃ ^b^pariccāgapaṭinissaggo^eb^. tathā sabbūpadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggabhūte visaṅkhāre attano nissajjanaṃ, tanninnatāya vā tadārammaṇatāya vā tattha pakkhandanaṃ ^b^pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo^eb^.

[03] ^b^tadaṅgavasenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0345^ea^ ettha aniccānupassanā tāva tadaṅgappahānavasena niccasaññaṃ pariccajati, pariccajantī ca tathā appavattiyaṃ ye ``nicca''nti gahaṇavasena kilesā, tammūlakā abhisaṅkhārā, tadubhayamūlakā ca vipākakkhandhā anāgate uppajjeyyuṃ, te sabbepi appavattikaraṇavasena pariccajati, tathā dukkhasaññādayo. tenāha ^b^``vipassanā hi tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajatī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^saṅkhatadosadassanenā^eb^ti saṅkhate tebhūmake saṅkhāragate aniccatādidosadassanena. niccādibhāvena ^b^tabbiparīte. tanninnatāyā^eb^ti tadadhimuttatāya. ^b^pakkhandatī^eb^ti anupavisati anupavisantaṃ viya hoti. ^b^saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajatī^eb^ti maggena kilesesu pariccattesu avipākadhammatāpādanena abhisaṅkhārā, tammūlakā ca khandhā anuppattirahabhāvena pariccattā nāma hontīti sabbepi te maggo pariccajatīti vuttaṃ. ^b^ubhaya^eb^nti vipassanāñāṇaṃ, maggañāṇañca. maggañāṇampi hi gotrabhuñāṇassa anu pacchā nibbānadassanato ^b^``anupassanā''^eb^ti vuccati.
[03] ^b^soḷasavatthuvasena cā^eb^ti soḷasannaṃ vatthūnaṃ vasenāpi vuccamānasantabhāvādivasenāpīti samuccayattho ^b^ca^eb^-saddo. ``ānāpānassati bhāvitā''ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03] 237^b^.^eb^ ^b^assā^eb^ti ānāpānassatisamādhissa. kāmavitakkādivitakkupacchedasamatthatāyapi mahānisaṃsatā ^a^V1.0326^ea^ veditabbāti sambandho. ^b^aya^eb^nti ānāpānassatisamādhi. uccāvacesu ārammaṇesu pavattiyeva ^b^ito cito ca cittassa vidhāvanaṃ^eb^.

[01] ^b^vijjā^eb^ nāma maggo. ^b^vimutti^eb^ phalaṃ. ^b^mūlabhāvo^eb^ vipassanāya pādakabhāvo. ^b^cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti^eb^ kāyānupassanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena tassā bhāvanāya pavattanato. ^b^satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti^eb^ bojjhaṅgabhāvanāya vinā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāpāripūriyā abhāvato. ^b^vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrenti^eb^ bojjhaṅgabhāvanāya tāsaṃ sikhāppattibhāvato. ^b^carimakāna^eb^nti antimakānaṃ.

[03] 238^b^.^eb^ ^b^nirodhavasenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0346^ea^ nirujjhanavasena. ^b^bhavacarimakā^eb^ti bhavavasena carimakā nihīnabhavapavattino. tathā ^b^jhānacarimakā^eb^ veditabbā. ^b^cuticarimakā^eb^ti cutiyā carimakā cutikkhaṇapavattino sabbapariyosānakā. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti tīsu bhavesu nihīne kāmabhave pavattanato. ^b^te^eb^ti assāsapassāsā. ^b^purato^eb^ti heṭṭhā. yasmā ^b^vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (vibha0 aṭṭha0 26 pakiṇṇakakathā) rūpadhammānaṃ soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukatā vibhāvitā, tasmā ^b^``soḷasamena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjitvā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^cuticittassa purato^eb^ti vā cuticittaṃ avadhibhāvena gahetvā tato oraṃ soḷasamena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjitvāti evaṃ pana atthe gayhamāne sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukatāva assāsapassāsānaṃ vuttā hoti.

[03] ime kira imaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuttassa bhikkhuno pākaṭā hontīti ānetvā sambandho. tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^``ānāpānārammaṇassa suṭṭhu pariggahitattā''^eb^ti. tamevatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``cuticittassā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.
[03] tattha ^b^āyuantaraṃ^eb^ nāma jīvitantaraṃ jīvanakkhaṇāvadhi. ^b^dhammatāya evā^eb^ti sabhāveneva, rucivasenevāti attho.

[03] ^b^candālokaṃ oloketvā^eb^ti juṇhapakkhe padosavelāyaṃ samantato āsiñcamānakhīradhāraṃ viya gaganatalaṃ, rajatapattasadisavālikāsanthatañca bhūmibhāgaṃ disvā ``ramaṇīyo vatāyaṃ kālo, deso ca mama ajjhāsayasadiso, kīva ciraṃ nu kho ayaṃ dukkhabhāro vahitabbo''ti attano āyusaṅkhāre upadhāretvā parikkhīṇeti adhippāyo. ^b^lekhaṃ katvā^eb^ti caṅkame tiriyaṃ lekhaṃ katvā.
[03] ^b^anuyuñjethā^eb^ti anuyuñjeyya, bhāveyyāti attho.

[03] 239^b^.^eb^ ^b^eva^eb^nti ^a^V1.0327^ea^ yathāvuttena virāgādiguṇānussaraṇappakārena. ^b^sabbadukkhūpasamasaṅkhātassā^eb^ti dukkhadukkhādibhedaṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ upasammati etthāti sabbadukkhūpasamoti saṅkhātabbassa.

[03] ``paññattidhammā''tiādīsu asabhāvopi ñāṇena dhārīyati avadhārīyatīti dhammoti vuccatīti tato nivattento ^b^``dhammāti sabhāvā''^eb^ti āha ^a^M1.0347^ea^. bhavanaṃ paramatthato vijjamānatā bhāvo, saha bhāvenāti ^b^sabhāvā,^eb^ sacchikaṭṭhaparamatthato labbhamānarūpāti attho. te hi attano sabhāvassa dhāraṇato dhammāti, yathāvuttenaṭṭhena sabhāvāti ca vuccanti. ^b^saṅgammā^eb^ti paccayasamodhānalakkhaṇena saṅgamena sannipatitvā. ^b^samāgammā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^paccayehī^eb^ti anurūpehi paccayehi. ^b^katā^eb^ti nibbattitā. ^b^akatā^eb^ti kehicipi paccayehi na katā. ^b^asaṅkhatā^eb^ti bahuvacanassa kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. ^b^aggamakkhāyatī^eb^ti aggo akkhāyati, ^b^ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro. so asaṅkhatalakkhaṇo sabhāvadhammo ^b^virāgo^eb^ti paccetabbo, virajjati ettha saṃkilesadhammoti. nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānena ariyamaggena pahīyamānā mānamadādayo taṃ patvā pahīyanti nāmāti āha ^b^``tamāgamma...pe0... vinassantī''^eb^ti. tattha ``seyyohamasmī''tiādinā (dha0 sa0 1121; saṃ0 ni0 4.108) maññanāvasena pavatto māno eva ^b^mānamado^eb^. purisabhāvaṃ nissāya uppajjanakamado ^b^purisamado. ādi^eb^-saddena jātimadādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^nimmadā^eb^ti vigatamadabhāvā. imameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``amadā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. madā nimmadīyanti ettha amadabhāvaṃ vināsaṃ gacchantīti ^b^madanimmadano^eb^. eseva nayo sesapadesupi. ^b^kāmapipāsā^eb^ti kāmānaṃ pātukamyatā, kāmataṇhā. kāmaguṇā eva āliyanti ettha sattāti ^b^kāmaguṇālayā. tebhūmakaṃ vaṭṭa^eb^nti tīsu bhūmīsu kammakilesavipākavaṭṭaṃ. ^b^esa^eb^ asaṅkhatadhammo. ^b^aparāparabhāvāyā^eb^ti aparāparaṃ yoniādito yoniādibhāvāya. ^b^ābandhanaṃ^eb^ gaṇṭhikaraṇaṃ. ^b^saṃsibbanaṃ^eb^ tunnakāraṇaṃ. nikkhamanaṃ, nissaraṇañcassa taṇhāya visaṃyogo evāti āha ^b^``visaṃyutto''^eb^ti.

[03] ye guṇe nimittaṃ katvā madanimmadanādināmāni nibbāne niruḷhāni, te madanimmadanatādike yathāvutte nibbattitanibbānaguṇe eva gahetvā āha ^b^``madanimmadanatādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ vasenā''^eb^ti, na pana madā nimmadīyanti etenāti evamādike. te hi ariyamaggaguṇā ^a^V1.0328^ea^. bhagavatā upasamaguṇā vuttāti sambandho. kattha pana vuttāti? ^b^asaṅkhatasaṃyuttā^eb^dīsu (saṃ0 ni0 4.366 ādayo). tattha ^b^sacca^eb^nti avitathaṃ. nibbānaṃ hi kenaci pariyāyena asantabhāvābhāvato ekaṃseneva santattā aviparītaṭṭhena saccaṃ. tenāha ``ekaṃ hi saccaṃ, na dutiyamatthī''ti ^a^M1.0348^ea^ (su0 ni0 890). ^b^pāra^eb^nti saṃsārassa paratīrabhūtaṃ. tenevāha ``tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo''ti (itivu0 69), ``appakā te manussesu, ye janā pāragāmino''ti (dha0 pa0 85) ca. ^b^sududdasa^eb^nti paramagambhīratāya, atisukhumasantasabhāvatāya ca anupacitañāṇasambhārehi daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya suṭṭhu duddasaṃ. natthi ettha jarā, etasmiṃ vā adhigate puggalassa jarābhāvoti ^b^ajaraṃ^eb^. tato eva jarādīhi apalokiyatāya thiraṭṭhena ^b^dhuvaṃ^eb^. taṇhādipapañcābhāvato ^b^nippapañcaṃ^eb^. natthi ettha matanti ^b^amataṃ^eb^. asivabhāvakarānaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ abhāvena ^b^sivaṃ^eb^. catūhi yogehi anupaddutattā ^b^khemaṃ^eb^. visaṅkhārabhāvena acchariyatāya, abhūtapubbatāya ca ^b^abbhutaṃ^eb^. sabbāsaṃ ītīnaṃ anatthānaṃ abhāvena ^b^anītikaṃ^eb^. niddukkhatāya ^b^abyābajjhaṃ^eb^. sabbasaṃkilesamalato accantasuddhiyā visesato suddhīti ^b^visuddhi^eb^. catūhipi oghehi anajjhottharaṇīyatāya ^b^dīpaṃ^eb^. sakalavaṭṭadukkhato paripālanaṭṭhena ^b^tāṇaṃ^eb^.

[01] ``saccañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmī''tiādikā pāḷi saṃkhittāti veditabbā. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena anantānāsavanipuṇājajjarāpalokitānidassanapaṇītācchariyānītikadhammamuttileṇaparāyaṇagambhīrādivacanehi ca bodhitā idha avuttā guṇā saṅgayhanti, tattha natthi etassa uppādanto vā vayanto vāti ^b^ananto,^eb^ asaṅkhatadhammo. āsavānaṃ anārammaṇatāya ^b^anāsavo^eb^. nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya ^b^nipuṇo^eb^. saṅkhatadhammo viya jarāya ajajjaritatāya ^b^ajajjaro^eb^. byādhiādīhi apalokiyatāya ^b^apalokitaṃ^eb^. acakkhuviññāṇaviññeyyatāya ^b^anidassano^eb^. atittikaraṭṭhena ^b^paṇīto^eb^. apacuratāya ^b^acchariyo^eb^. ītīhi anabhibhavanīyasabhāvattā, anītikabhāvahetuto ca ^b^anītikadhammo^eb^. vaṭṭadukkhamuttinimittatāya ^b^mutti^eb^. saṃsāraṃ bhayato passantehi nilīyanīyato ^b^leṇaṃ^eb^. tesaṃyeva parā gatīti ^b^parāyaṇo^eb^. pakatiñāṇena aladdhapatiṭṭhatāya agādhaṭṭhena ^b^gambhīro^eb^. katapuññehipi dukkhena kicchena anubujjhitabbato ^b^duranubodho^eb^. sacchikiriyaṃ muñcitvā na takkañāṇena avacaritabboti ^b^atakkāvacaro^eb^ ^a^M1.0349^ea^. buddhādīhi paṇḍiteheva veditabbato adhigantabbato ^b^paṇḍitavedanīyo^eb^ti evamattho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^ariyasāvakasseva^eb^ ^a^V1.0329^ea^ ^b^ijjhati^eb^ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena nibbānaguṇānaṃ pākaṭabhāvato. aṭṭhāne cāyaṃ ^b^eva^eb^-saddo vutto, ijjhati evāti yojanā. sukhasiddhivasena vā evaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^``ariyasāvakassevā''^eb^ti. tenevāha ^b^``evaṃ santepī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^upasamagarukenā^eb^ti nibbānaninnena. ^b^manasi kātabbā^eb^ yathāvuttā upasamaguṇā. ^b^sukhaṃ supatī^eb^tiādīsu vattabbaṃ mettākathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati. ^b^paṇītādhimuttiko^eb^ hoti nibbānādhimuttattā.
[06] anussatikammaṭṭhānaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti aṭṭhamaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 240^b^.^eb^ ^b^mettaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0350^ea^ ^a^V1.0330^ea^ brahmavihāraṃ. ^b^bhāvetukāmenā^eb^ti uppādetukāmena paccavekkhitabboti sambandho. ^b^sukhanisinnenā^eb^ti visamaṃ anisīditvā pallaṅkābhujanena sukhanisinnena.

[03] ^b^kasmā^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇāya kāraṇapucchā, aññaṃ adhigantukāmena aññattha ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā kimatthiyāti adhippāyo. mettā nāma atthato adoso. tathā hi ^b^adosaniddese^eb^ ``metti mettāyanā mettāyitatta''nti (dha0 sa0 1062) niddiṭṭhaṃ. ^b^khantī^eb^ti ca idha adhivāsanakkhanti adhippetā. sā pana atthato adosappadhānā cattāro arūpakkhandhāti mettāya sijjhamānāya titikkhākhanti siddhā eva hotīti āha ^b^``khanti adhigantabbā''^eb^ti. tena khantiyaṃ ānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā satthikāvāti dasseti. ^b^abhibhūto^eb^ pariyuṭṭhānena. ^b^pariyādinnacitto^eb^ kusaluppattiyā okāsālābhena. ^b^ādīnavo daṭṭhabbo^eb^ pāṇaghātādivasena diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādianatthamūlabhāvato.

[03] ^b^khantī paramaṃ tapo^eb^ti parāpakārasahanādikā titikkhalakkhaṇā khanti uttamaṃ tapo akattabbākaraṇakattabbakaraṇalakkhaṇāya sammāpaṭipattiyā mūlabhāvato. ^b^khantibalaṃ balānīka^eb^nti paramaṃ maṅgalabhūtā khanti eva balaṃ etassāti khantibalaṃ. vuttañhi ``khantibalā samaṇabrāhmaṇā''ti. dosādipaṭipakkhavidhamanasamatthatāya anīkabhūtena teneva ca khantibalena balānīkaṃ. ^b^khantyā bhiyyo na vijjatī^eb^ti attano paresañca anatthapaṭibāhano, atthāvaho ca khantito uttari apassayo natthi.

[03] ^b^vivecanatthāyā^eb^ti vikkhambhanatthāya. ^b^khantiyā saṃyojanatthāya^eb^ attānanti adhippāyo. bhāvanaṃ ^a^V1.0331^ea^ dūsentīti dosā, puggalāyeva dosā ^b^puggaladosā^eb^. yesu bhāvanā na sampajjati, aññadatthu vipajjateva, te eva ^a^M1.0351^ea^ vuttā. ^b^paṭhama^eb^nti vakkhamānena koṭṭhāsato koṭṭhāsantarupasaṃharaṇanayena vinā sabbapaṭhamaṃ.

[03] piyāyitabbo piyo, tappaṭipakkho ^b^appiyo^eb^. so saṅkhepato duvidho atthassa akārako, anatthassa kārakoti. tattha yo attano, piyassa ca anatthassa kārako, so veripuggalo daṭṭhabbo. yo pana attano, piyassa ca atthassa akārako, appiyassa ca atthassa kārako, ``atthaṃ me nācarī''tiādinā (dha0 sa0 1237), ``appiyassa me amanāpassa atthaṃ acarī''tiādinā ca āghātavatthubhūto, so ^b^appiyo,^eb^ ananukūlavuttiko aniṭṭhoti attho. ^b^liṅgavisabhāge^eb^ti itthiliṅgādinā liṅgena visadise. ^b^odhiso^eb^ti bhāgaso. ``tissa dattā''tiādinā odhisakanti attho.

[03] idāni yathāvuttesu chasu puggalesu abhāvetabbatāya kāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^``appiyaṃ hī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^appiyaṃ hi piyaṭṭhāne ṭhapento kilamatī^eb^ti dosena bhāvanāya saparissayatamāha. appiyatā hi piyabhāvassa ujupaṭipakkhā, na ca tassa piyaṭṭhāne ṭhapanena vinā bhāvanā sijjhati. ^b^atippiyasahāyakaṃ majjhattaṭṭhāne ṭhapento kilamatī^eb^ti rāgena bhāvanāya saparissayatamāha atippiyasahāyassa gehassitapemaṭṭhānabhāvato. tenāha ^b^``appamattakepī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^majjhattaṃ^eb^ iṭṭhāniṭṭhatāhi majjhasabhāvaṃ neva piyaṃ nāppiyanti attho. ^b^garuṭṭhāne piyaṭṭhāne ca ṭhapento kilamati^eb^ majjhatte sambhāvanīyapiyāyitabbatānaṃ abhāvā. na hi ajjhupekkhitabbe bhāvanīyatā, manāpatā vā paccupaṭṭhāti, piyagarubhāvasampanne ca paṭhamaṃ mettā bhāvetabbā. ^b^kodho uppajjati^eb^ koṭṭhāsantarabhāvānupanayanato.

[03] ^b^tamevā^eb^ti visabhāgaliṅgameva. liṅgasabhāgeti avisesetvā ^b^``piyapuggale''^eb^ti āha. ^b^bhittiyuddhamakāsī^eb^ti sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhāya pihitadvāre gabbhe sayanapīṭhe nisīditvā mettaṃ bhāvento mettāmukhena uppannarāgena andhīkato bhariyāya santikaṃ gantukāmo dvāraṃ asallakkhetvā bhittiṃ bhinditvāpi nikkhamitukāmatāya bhittiṃ pahari. tenāha ^a^M1.0352^ea^ ``mettāyanāmukhena rāgo vañcetī''ti (netti0 aṭṭha0 21), ``andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ rāgo sahate nara''nti ca.

[03] ādānanikkhepaparicchinne ^a^V1.0332^ea^ addhāpaccuppannabhūte dharamānatāya paccakkhato viya upalabbhamāne khandhappabandhe idha sattādiggahaṇaṃ, na tiyaddhagateti āha ^b^``kālakate panā''^eb^tiādi. kasmā pana kālakate mettābhāvanā na ijjhatīti? mettābyāpārassa ayogyaṭṭhānabhāvato. na hi matapuggalo hitūpasaṃhārāraho. yattha sati sambhave payogato hitūpasaṃhāro labbheyya, tattheva mānaso hitūpasaṃhāro yujjeyya. dukkhāpanayanamodappavattīsupi eseva nayoti karuṇābhāvanādīnampi kālakate anijjhanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. aññattha paguṇamettājhāno ācariyassa kālakatabhāvaṃ ajānanto taṃ mettāya pharitukāmo ^b^``ācariyaṃ ārabbha mettaṃ ārabhatī''^eb^ti vutto. tenāha ^b^``paguṇāva me mettājhānasamāpattī''^eb^ti. ^b^nimitta^eb^nti ārammaṇaṃ. ^b^gavesāhī^eb^ti ``yaṃ puggalaṃ uddissamettaṃ ārabhasi, so jīvati na jīvatī''ti jānāhīti attho. ^b^mettāyanto^eb^ti mettaṃ karonto, mettaṃ bhāventoti attho.

[03] 241^b^.^eb^ attani bhāvanā nāma sakkhibhāvatthāti nānāvidhasukhānubandhānavajjasukhābyāsekasukhādi yaṃ attani upalabbhati, taṃ nidassento tassa vattamānatāya āha ^b^``ahaṃ sukhito homī''^eb^ti. sarīrasukhaṃ nāma anekantikaṃ, īdisassa puggalassa anokāsaṃ cittadukkhanti tadabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``niddukkhoti vā''^eb^ti. homīti sambandho. tathā ^b^avero^eb^tiādīsu, visesato ca dukkhābhāve sukhasaññā. sā panāyaṃ niddukkhatā verīnaṃ puggalānaṃ verasaññitānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ abhāvato, visesato byāpādavirahato īghasaññitāya ītiyā abhāvato, anavajjakāyikasukhasamaṅgitāya ca hotīti dassento āha ^b^``avero abyāpajjo anīgho sukhī''^eb^ti. ^b^attānaṃ pariharāmī^eb^ti evaṃbhūto hutvā mama attabhāvaṃ pavattemi, yāpemīti attho.

[01] evaṃ sante yaṃ vibhaṅge vuttaṃ, taṃ virujjhatīti sambandho. ^b^evaṃ sante^eb^ti evaṃ sati, yadi attanipi mettā bhāvetabbāti attho. ``yaṃ vibhaṅge vutta''nti vatvā ^a^M1.0353^ea^ vibhaṅgadesanāya samānagatikaṃ suttapadaṃ āharanto ^b^``kathañca bhikkhū''^eb^tiādimāha. tassattho parato āgamissati.

[03] ^b^ta^eb^nti vibhaṅgādīsu vacanaṃ. ^b^appanāvasenā^eb^ti appanāvahabhāvanāvasena. ^b^ida^eb^nti ``ahaṃ sukhito homī''tiādivacanaṃ. ^b^sakkhibhāvavasenā^eb^ti ahaṃ viya sabbe sattā attano sukhakāmā, tasmā tesu mayā attani viya sukhūpasaṃhāro kātabboti evaṃ tattha attānaṃ sakkhibhāve ^a^V1.0333^ea^ ṭhapanavasena. tenāha ^b^``sacepi hī''^eb^tiādi. kasmā pana attani bhāvanā appanāvahā na hotīti? attasinehavasena saparissayabhāvato. koṭṭhāsantare pana bhāvitabhāvanassa tatthāpi sīmasambhedo hotiyeva.

[01] ^b^sabbā disā^eb^ti anavasesā dasapi disā. ^b^anuparigamma cetasā^eb^ti cittena pariyesanavasena anugantvā. ^b^nevajjhagā piyataramattanā kvacī^eb^ti sabbussāhena pariyesanto atisayena attato piyataraṃ aññaṃ sattaṃ katthaci disāya neva adhigaccheyya na passeyya. ^b^evaṃ piyo puthu attā paresa^eb^nti evaṃ kassaci attato piyatarassa anupalabbhanavasena puthu visuṃ visuṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyo. ^b^tasmā^eb^ tena kāraṇena, ^b^attakāmo^eb^ attano hitasukhaṃ icchanto, ^b^paraṃ^eb^ sattaṃ antamaso kunthakipillikampi, ^b^na hiṃse^eb^ na haneyya, na viheṭheyyāti attho.

[03] ^b^ayaṃ nayo^eb^ti sabbehi sattehi, attano ca piyatarabhāvaṃ nidassetvā tesu karuṇāyanaṃ vadatā bhagavatā sukhesitāya ``attānaṃ sakkhibhāve ṭhapetvā sattesu mettā bhāvetabbā''ti mettābhāvanāya nayadassanaṃ katamevāti attho.

[03] 242^b^.^eb^ ^b^sukhapavattanattha^eb^nti sukhena akicchena mettāya pavattanatthaṃ. ^b^yvāssā^eb^ti yo puggalo assa yogino. ^b^piyo^eb^ti iṭṭho. ^b^manāpo^eb^ti manavaḍḍhanako. ^b^garū^eb^ti guṇavisesavasena garukātabbo. ^b^bhāvanīyo^eb^ti sambhāvetabbo. ^b^ācariyamatto^eb^ti sīlādinā ācariyappamāṇo. ^b^piyavacanādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena atthacariyādike saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^sīlasutādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena saddhādike, dhutadhammajāgariyānuyogādike ca saṅgaṇhāti.

[03] ^b^kāma^eb^nti ^a^M1.0354^ea^ yuttappattakāritāsukhasiddhidīpanoyaṃ nipāto. tenetaṃ dīpeti -- tādisaṃ puggalaṃ uddissa bhāvanaṃ ārabhanto yogī yuttappattakārī, sukhena cassa tattha bhāvanā ijjhati, tena pana yoginā tāvatā santoso na kātabboti. tenāha ^b^``appanā sampajjatī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^sīmāsambheda^eb^nti mariyādāpanayanaṃ, attā piyo majjhatto verīti vibhāgākaraṇanti attho. ^b^tadanantara^eb^nti tato piyamanāpagarubhāvanīyato, tattha vā mettādhigamato anantaraṃ. atippiyasahāyake mettā bhāvetabbāti sambandho, garuṭṭhānīye paṭiladdhaṃ mettāmanasikāraṃ atippiyasahāyake upasaṃharitabbanti attho. sukhūpasaṃhārakatassa taṃ hoti pageva paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ ^a^V1.0334^ea^ vikkhambhitattā. atippiyasahāyakato anantaraṃ majjhatte mettā bhāvetabbā majjhattaṃ piyagaruṭṭhāne ṭhapetuṃ sukarabhāvato. ``atippiyasahāyakato''ti ca idaṃ purimāvatthaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. paguṇamanasikārādhigamato paṭṭhāya hissa sopi piyaṭṭhāne eva tiṭṭhati. ^b^majjhattato verīpuggale^eb^ti majjhattapuggale mettāyantena tattha paguṇamanasikārādhigamena piyabhāvaṃ upasaṃharitvā tadanantaraṃ verīpuggalaṃ bhāvanāya majjhatte ṭhapetvā tato majjhattato piyabhāvūpasaṃhārena verīpuggale ^b^mettā bhāvetabbā^eb^. ``verīpuggale''ti ca idaṃ purimāvatthaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse muduṃ kammaniyaṃ cittaṃ katvā^eb^ti piyagaruṭṭhānīyo, atippiyo, majjhatto, verīti catūsu puggalakoṭṭhāsesu paṭhamaṃ tāva piyagaruṭṭhānīye mettābhāvanaṃ adhigantvā vasībhāvappattiyā tathāpavattaṃ cittaṃ koṭṭhāsantarūpasaṃhāratthaṃ muduṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ atippiyasahāye atippiyabhāvaṃ vikkhambhetvā piyabhāvamatte cittaṃ ṭhapentena bhāvanā upasaṃharitabbā, tampi vasībhāvāpādanena muduṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ majjhatte udāsinabhāvaṃ vikkhambhetvā piyabhāvaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā bhāvanā upasaṃharitabbā, puna tampi vasībhāvāpādanena muduṃ kammaniyaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ verimhi verīsaññaṃ vikkhambhetvā majjhattabhāvūpaṭṭhapanamukhena piyabhāvaṃ uppādentena bhāvanā upasaṃharitabbā. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``tadanantare tadanantare upasaṃharitabba''^eb^nti, jhānacittaṃ upanetabbaṃ uppādetabbanti attho.

[03] ^b^verīpuggalo vā natthi^eb^ kammabalena vā etarahi payogasampattiyā vā sabbaso anatthakarassa abhāvato. ^b^mahāpurisajātikattā^eb^ti mahāpurisasabhāvattā ^a^M1.0355^ea^ cirakālaparicayasamiddhakhantimettānuddayādiguṇasampannatāya uḷārajjhāsayattāti attho. tādiso hi sabbasaho parāparādhaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññati. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``anatthaṃ karontepi pare verīsaññāva nuppajjatī''^eb^ti. ^b^tenā^eb^ti tena yoginā. atthi verīpuggaloti sambandho.

[03] 243^b^.^eb^ ^b^purimapuggalesū^eb^ti piyādīsu jhānassa ārammaṇabhūtesu purimesu puggalesu. ^b^mettaṃ samāpajjitvā^eb^ti paṭighaṃ vikkhambhetvā uppāditaṃ mettājhānaṃ samāpajjitvā. ^b^mettāyantena paṭighaṃ paṭivinodetabba^eb^nti ettha keci pana ``upacārajjhānaṃ sampādetvā''ti atthaṃ vadanti, tesaṃ upacārajjhānato vuṭṭhānampi icchitabbaṃ siyā ``vuṭṭhahitvā''ti vuttattā. pubbe tasmiṃ puggale asatiyā amanasikārena paṭighaṃ anuppādentassa sādhāraṇato taṃ vikkhambhetvā jhānassa uppādanaṃ, samāpajjanañca vuttaṃ. idāni pana taṃ anussarantassapi manasi karontassapi yathā paṭighaṃ ^a^V1.0335^ea^ na uppajjati, taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^``taṃ puggalaṃ mettāyantena paṭighaṃ vinodetabba''^eb^nti. mettāyanameva hi idha paṭighavinodanaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^na nibbātī^eb^ti na vūpasammati.
[03] ^b^anusārato^eb^ti anugamanato, paccavekkhaṇatoti attho. ^b^ghaṭitabba^eb^nti vāyamitabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^tañca kho^eb^ ghaṭanaṃ vāyamanaṃ. ^b^iminā^eb^ idāni vakkhamānena ākārena.

[03] ubhato dvīsu ṭhānesu daṇḍo etassāti ^b^ubhatodaṇḍakaṃ,^eb^ tena. ^b^ocarakā^eb^ lāmakācārā pāpapurisā. ^b^tatrāpī^eb^ti tesupi aṅgamaṅgāni okkantesupi. ^b^tenā^eb^ti manopadosena. ^b^na sāsanakaro^eb^. sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ hi sāsanaṃ. ^b^tassevā^eb^ti tatopi. nissakke hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, samuccaye ca ^b^eva^eb^-saddo, paṭhamaṃ kuddhapurisatopīti attho. ^b^tenā^eb^ti kujjhanena. ^b^pāpiyo^eb^ti pāpataro. sārambhādikassa kilesānubandhassa vatthubhāvato kodhassa sāvajjataṃ ñatvāpi kujjhanato sace kodhe anavajjasaññī kuddhassa puggalassa na paṭikujjheyyāti keci. ^b^ubhinna^eb^nti dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ. tenāha ^b^``attano ca parassa cā''^eb^ti. atha vā ^b^ubhinna^eb^nti ubhayesaṃ lokānaṃ, idhalokaparalokānanti attho.

[01] ^b^sapattakantā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0356^ea^ paṭisattūhi icchitā. ^b^sapattakaraṇā^eb^ti tehi kātabbā. ^b^kodhana^eb^nti kujjhanasīlaṃ. ^b^kodhanāya^eb^nti kodhano ayaṃ, ^b^aya^eb^nti ca nipātamattaṃ. ^b^kodhapareto^eb^ti kodhena anugato, parābhibhūto vā. ^b^dubbaṇṇova hotī^eb^ti pakatiyā vaṇṇavāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattopi mukhavikārādivasena virūpo eva hoti etarahi, āyatiṃ cāti. kodhābhibhavassa ekantikamidaṃ phalanti dīpetuṃ ``dubbaṇṇo vā''ti avadhāraṇaṃ katvā puna ^b^``kodhābhibhūto''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^na pacurattho^eb^ti na pahūtadhano. ^b^na bhogavā^eb^ti upabhogaparibhogavatthurahito. ^b^na yasavā^eb^ti na kittimā.

[03] ^b^chavālāta^eb^nti chavadahanālātaṃ, citakāyaṃ santajjanummukkantipi vadanti. ^b^ubhatopaditta^eb^nti ubhosu koṭīsu daḍḍhaṃ. ^b^majjhe gūthagata^eb^nti vemajjhaṭṭhāne sunakhassa vā siṅgālassa vā uhadena gūthena makkhitaṃ. ^b^kaṭṭhattha^eb^nti dārukiccaṃ. ^b^neva pharati^eb^ na sādheti. ^b^tathūpamāha^eb^nti tathūpamaṃ tādisaṃ ahaṃ. ^b^ima^eb^nti ``so ca hoti abhijjhālū''tiādinā (itivu0 92) heṭṭhā vuttaṃ sandhāya satthā ^a^V1.0336^ea^ vadati, tasmā kāmesu tibbasārāgatādinā sīlarahitanti adhippāyo. idha pana byāpannacittaṃ paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappatāvasena yojetabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^so dāni tva^eb^ntiādi yathāvuttehi suttapadehi attano ovadanākāradassanaṃ.

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo yo dhammo^eb^ti kāyasamācārādīsu yo yo sucaritadhammo. ^b^vūpasanto^eb^ti saṃyato. ^b^parisuddho^eb^ti kilesamalavigamena visuddho. kilesadāhābhāvena vā upasanto, anavajjabhāvena parisuddho, kāyasamācārasseva upasamo cirakālaṃ saṃyatakāyakammatāya veditabbo. evaṃ sesesupi.
[03] ^b^te^eb^ti vacīmanosamācāre.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ti upasantavacīsamācāro puggalo. ^b^paṭisanthārakusalo^eb^ti yathā parehi chiddaṃ na hoti, evaṃ paṭisantharaṇe kusalo. ^b^sakhilo^eb^ti adhivāsanakhantisaṅkhātena ^a^M1.0357^ea^ sakhilabhāvena samannāgato. ^b^sukhasambhāso^eb^ti piyakatho. ^b^sammodako^eb^ti sammodanīyakathāya sammodanasīlo. ^b^uttānamukho^eb^ti vikuṇitamukho ahutvā pītisomanassavasena vikasitamukho. ^b^pubbabhāsī^eb^ti yena kenaci samāgato paṭisanthāravasena paṭhamaṃyeva ābhāsanasīlo. ^b^madhurena sarena dhammaṃ osāreti^eb^ sarabhaññavasena. sarabhāṇaṃ pana karonto ^b^parimaṇḍalehi^eb^ paripuṇṇehi padehi ca byañjanehi ca abyākulehi dhammakathaṃ katheti.

[03] ^b^sabbajanassa pākaṭo^eb^ sakkaccakiriyāyāti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``yo hī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^okappetvā^eb^ti saddahitvā. okappanalakkhaṇā hi saddhā. ^b^ohitasoto^eb^ti avahitasoto, sussusantoti attho. ^b^aṭṭhiṃkatvā^eb^ atthaṃ katvā, atthiko vā hutvā.

[03] ^b^``ekopi na vūpasanto hotī''^eb^ti pāṭho, evarūpo puggalo nirayato nirayaṃ upapajjanto bahukālaṃ tattheva saṃsaratīti dassetuṃ ^b^``aṭṭhamahānirayasoḷasaussadanirayaparipūrako bhavissatī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tattha sañjīvādayo aṭṭha mahānirayā. avīcimahānirayassa dvāre dvāre cattāro cattāro katvā kukkuḷādayo soḷasa ussadanirayā. ^b^kāruññaṃ upaṭṭhapetabbaṃ^eb^ mahādukkhabhāgibhāvato. yasmiṃ ^a^V1.0337^ea^ puggale avihesābhūtā dukkhāpanayanakāmatā upatiṭṭhati, tattha paṭigho anokāsovāti āha ^b^``kāruññampi paṭicca āghāto vūpasammatī''^eb^ti.
[03] ^b^imassa ca atthassā^eb^ti ``yo yo dhammo''tiādinā vuttassa atthassa.

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ yaṃ verī dukkhāpetuṃ sakkoti, so tassa vasena ^b^``attano visaye''^eb^ti vutto bhikkhuno kāyo. ^b^ki^eb^nti kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. ^b^tassā^eb^ti verino. ^b^avisaye^eb^ti dukkhaṃ uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya agocare. ^b^sacitte^eb^ti attano citte. ^b^mahānatthakara^eb^nti idhalokatthaparalokatthaparamatthānaṃ virādhanavasena mahato vipulassa, nānāvidhassa ca diṭṭhadhammikādibhedassa anatthassa kāraṇaṃ. ^b^mūlanikantana^eb^nti sīlassa mūlāni nāma hirottappakhantimettānuddayā, tesaṃ chindanaṃ. kodho hi uppajjamānova pāṇātipātādivasena hirottappādīni ucchindati. ^b^jaḷo^eb^ti andhabālo.

[01] ^b^anariyaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0358^ea^ ^b^kamma^eb^nti verinā katamahāparādhamāha. ^b^yo saya^eb^nti yo tvaṃ sayampi. ^b^dosetukāmo^eb^ti kodhaṃ uppādetukāmo. ^b^yadi kari^eb^ yadi akāsi. ^b^dosuppādenā^eb^ti dosassa uppādanena. ^b^dukkhaṃ tassa ca nāmā^eb^ti dukkhañca nāma tassa aparādhakassa. ^b^nāmā^eb^ti asambhāvane nipāto, tena tassa kāraṇaṃ anekantikanti dasseti. tenāha ^b^``kāhasi vā na vā''^eb^ti, karissasi na vā karissasīti attho. ^b^ahitaṃ magga^eb^nti attano ahitāvahaṃ duggatimaggaṃ.

[03] ^b^aṭṭhāne^eb^ti doso tava appiyassa kārāpako, sattu pana tassa vasavattitāya dāsasadisoti aṭṭhānaṃ paccāpakiriyāya. tasmā ^b^tameva dosaṃ chindassu^eb^ ucchinda. ^b^khaṇikattā^eb^ti udayavayaparicchinno attano pavattikālasaṅkhāto khaṇo etesaṃ atthīti khaṇikā, tabbhāvato khaṇapabhaṅgubhāvatoti attho. ^b^kassa dānīdha kujjhasī^eb^ti aparādhakassa santāne yehi khandhehi te aparādho kato, te taṃkhaṇaṃyeva sabbaso niruddhā. idāni pana aññe tiṭṭhantīti kassa tvaṃ idha kujjhasi. na hi yuttaṃ anaparādhesu kujjhananti adhippāyo. ^b^taṃ vinā kassa so kare^eb^ti yo puggalo yassa dukkhaṃ karoti, taṃ dukkhakiriyāya visayabhūtaṃ puggalaṃ vinā kassa nāma so dukkhakārako dukkhaṃ kare kareyya. ^b^sayampi dukkhahetu tvamitī^eb^ti evaṃ sayampi tvaṃ etassa dukkhassa ^a^V1.0338^ea^ hetu, evaṃ samāne tassa tuyhañca tassa dukkhassa hetubhāve ^b^kiṃ^eb^ kāraṇā ^b^tassa kujjhasi^eb^ na tuyhanti attho.

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ paralokepi anugāmibhāvato kammaṃyeva sakaṃ santakaṃ etesanti kammassakā, tesaṃ bhāvo ^b^kammassakatā^eb^. paccavekkhaṇā nāma nisedhanatthā, nisedhanañca bhāvino kammassāti āha ^b^``yaṃ kammaṃ karissasī''^eb^ti. paṭighavasena pana pavattakammaṃ pākaṭabhāvato āsannaṃ, paccakkhañcāti āha ^b^``idañcā''^eb^ti. ^b^ca^eb^-saddo byatireke, so tassa kammassa phalanissandena ^b^``neva sammāsambodhi''^eb^ntiādinā byatirekato vuccamānamevatthaṃ joteti. neva samatthanti sambandho. niraye niyuttaṃ, jātanti vā ^b^nerayikaṃ. attānaṃyeva okirati^eb^ dosarajenāti adhippāyo.
[03] 247^b^.^eb^ ^b^satthu^eb^ ^a^M1.0359^ea^ ^b^pubbacariyaguṇā^eb^ paccavekkhitabbā, satthu gāravenāpi paṭighaṃ vūpasameyyāti.

[03] ^b^bodhisattopi samāno^eb^ nanu te satthā cittaṃ nappadūsesi, pageva abhisambuddhoti adhippāyo. ^b^deviyā paduṭṭhenā^eb^ti deviyā saddhiṃ padubbhinā micchācāravasena aparaddhena. yattha susāne chavasarīraṃ chaḍḍīyati, taṃ ^b^āmakasusānaṃ. nikhaññamāno^eb^ti nikhaṇiyamāno. ^b^purisakāraṃ katvā^eb^ti āvāṭato nikkhamanatthāya bāhubalena purisakāraṃ katvā. ^b^yakkhānubhāvenā^eb^ti aḍḍavinicchayena ārādhitacittassa yakkhassa ānubhāvena. ^b^sirigabbha^eb^nti vāsāgāre.

[03] ^b^āsīsethevā^eb^ti yathādhippete atthe ñāyato anavajjato āsaṃ kareyya. ^b^na nibbindeyyā^eb^ti ``evaṃ kicchāpannassa me kuto sotthibhāvo''ti na nibbindeyya. vuttañhi ``āpadāsu kho, mahārāja, thāmo veditabbo''ti (udā0 53). ^b^yathā icchi^eb^nti yena pakārena kassaci pīḷaṃ akatvā rajje patiṭṭhitaṃ attānaṃ icchiṃ, ^b^tathā ahaṃ ahu^eb^nti ^b^passāmi. vo^eb^ti hi nipātamattaṃ.
[03] ^b^kāsiraññā^eb^ti kalābunā kāsirājena. ^b^sakaṇṭakāhī^eb^ti ayakaṇṭakehi sakaṇṭakāhi.
[03] ^b^mahallako^eb^ti vuddho vayoanuppatto. ^b^rujjhantī^eb^ti nirujjhanti.
[03] ^b^cittapariggaṇhanakālo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0339^ea^ visevanaṃ kātuṃ adatvā cittassa sammadeva damanakālo.

[03] ^b^puthusallenā^eb^ti vipulena sallena. ^b^nāgo^eb^ti hatthināgo. ^b^vadhī^eb^ti vijjhi, māresīti vā attho. imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā mayi evaṃ karaṇaṃ nāma na tava vasena hoti, tasmā ^b^kassa vā^eb^ rañño, rājamattassa vā ^b^ayaṃ payogo^eb^ uyyojanāti attho.
[03] ^b^chabbaṇṇarasmī^eb^ti nīlapītalohitādivasena chabbaṇṇamayūkhā. chabbaṇṇakiraṇavantadantatāya hi te hatthī ``chaddantā''ti vuccanti, na chaddantavantatāya.

[03] ^b^chāto^eb^ti jighacchito. ^b^khādeyyā^eb^ti khādeyyaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^āhito^eb^ti ^a^M1.0360^ea^ suhito. ^b^sambala^eb^nti maggāhāraṃ. taṃ pana yasmā upacārena pathassa hitanti vuccati, tasmā ^b^``pātheyya''^eb^ntipi vuttaṃ. ``mittadubbhī vatāyaṃ andhabālo''ti kāruññena ^b^assupuṇṇehi nettehi taṃ purisaṃ udikkhamāno^eb^.

[03] ^b^mā ayyosi me bhadante^eb^ti ettha ^b^mā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, ^b^mā^eb^ti vā paṭikkhepo, tena upari tena kātabbaṃ vippakāraṃ paṭisedheti. ^b^ayyo me^eb^ti ayyirako tvaṃ mama atithibhāvato. ^b^bhadante^eb^ti piyasamudācāro. ^b^tvaṃ nāmetādisaṃ karī^eb^ti tvampi evarūpaṃ akāsi nāma.
[03] tiracchānabhūtopi pana mahākapi hutvā khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpesīti yojanā.
[03] ^b^peḷāya pakkhipantepī^eb^ti khuddakāya peḷāya pādehi koṭetvā pakkhipantepi. ^b^maddantepī^eb^ti dubbalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ nānappakārehi maddantepi. ^b^alampāne^eb^ti evaṃnāmake ahituṇḍike.

[03] ^b^pītaṃ vā^eb^ti ettha ^b^vā^eb^-saddo avuttatthavikappe, tena odātamañjiṭṭhādiṃ avuttaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^cittānuvattanto^eb^ti cittaṃ anuvattanto. ^b^homi cintitasannibho^eb^ evamayaṃ bahulābhaṃ labhatūti. ānubhāvena pana ^b^thalaṃ kareyya udakaṃ...pe0... chārikaṃ kare. evaṃ^eb^ pana ^b^yadi cittavasī hessaṃ...pe0... uttamattho na sijjhatī^eb^ti tadā attanā tattha diṭṭhaṃ ādīnavaṃ dasseti bhagavā. tattha ^b^uttamattho^eb^ti buddhabhāvamāha. ^b^bhojaputtehī^eb^ti luddaputtehi.

[03] ^b^aḷārā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0340^ea^ yena sayaṃ tadā luddahatthato mocito, taṃ satthavāhaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^atikassā^eb^ti nāsāya āvutarajjuṃ ākaḍḍhitvā. ^b^samparigayhā^eb^ti kāḷavettalatādīhi sabbaso pariggahetvā, acchariyāni dussahānaṃ sahanavasenāti adhippāyo.
[03] ^b^ativiya ayuttaṃ appatirūpaṃ^eb^ paṭighacittuppādanena kenaci appaṭisamakhantiguṇassa satthusāsanāvokkamanappasaṅgato.
[03] 248^b^.^eb^ ``anamataggoyaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃsāro''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 2.124; 3.99, 100; 3.5.520; kathā0 75) āgatāni suttapadāni anamataggasaddo, tadattho vā etesanti ^b^anamataggiyāni^eb^.

[03] ajehi ^a^M1.0361^ea^ gamanamaggo ^b^ajapatho^eb^. saṅkū laggāpetvā te ālambitvā gamanamaggo ^b^saṅkupatho. saṅkū^eb^ti aṅkusākārena katadīghadaṇḍo vuccati. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena papātamaggaduggamaggādike saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^ubhatobyūḷhe^eb^ti sampahāratthaṃ dvīhipi pakkhehi gāḷhasannāhe. ^b^aññāni ca dukkarāni karitvā^eb^ dhanāsāya pabbatavidugganadīviduggādipakkhandanavasenāti adhippāyo. ^b^maṃ posesi, upakāraṃ akāsi, tatra nappatirūpaṃ manaṃ padūsetu^eb^nti evaṃ cittaṃ uppādetabbanti sambandho. evaṃ cittuppādanañca etarahi dissamānena puttādīnaṃ posanādinā atītassa anumānato gahaṇavasena veditabbaṃ.

[03] 249^b^.^eb^ ^b^mettāyā^eb^ti mettāsaṅkhātāya, mettāsahitāya vā. ^b^cetovimuttiyā^eb^ti cittasamādhāne. ^b^āsevitāyā^eb^ti ādarena sevitāya. ^b^bhāvitāyā^eb^ti vaḍḍhitāya. ^b^bahulīkatāyā^eb^ti punappunaṃ katāya. ^b^yānīkatāyā^eb^ti yuttayānaṃ viya katāya. ^b^vatthukatāyā^eb^ti adhiṭṭhānavatthuṃ viya katāya. ^b^anuṭṭhitāyā^eb^ti adhiṭṭhitāya. ^b^paricitāyā^eb^ti pariciṇṇāya ciṇṇavasībhāvāya. ^b^susamāraddhāyā^eb^ti suṭṭhu sampāditāya. ^b^pāṭikaṅkhā^eb^ti icchitabbā avassaṃbhāvino. sesaṃ parato āgamissati.
