[03] ^b^tasmiṃ hi appanācitte^eb^ti ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānasampayutte appanāvasena pavatte citte, tasmiṃ vā paṭhamāruppassa apagamasaṅkhāte natthibhāve yathāvutte appanācitte uppanne. so bhikkhu abhāvameva passanto viharatīti sambandho. puriso katthaci gantvā āgantvā suññameva passati, natthibhāvameva passatīti yojanā. ^b^taṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti taṃ sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^``parikammamanasikārena antarahite''^eb^ti iminā ārammaṇakaraṇābhāvena tassa antaradhānaṃ na naṭṭhattāti dasseti. tatridaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ -- yathā so puriso tattha sannipatitaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā gato, tato sabbesu bhikkhūsu kenacideva karaṇīyena apagatesu āgantvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhikkhūhi suññameva passati, na bhikkhūnaṃ tatopi apagatakāraṇaṃ, evamayaṃ yogāvacaro pubbe viññāṇañcāyatanajjhānacakkhunā paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ disvā pacchā natthīti parikammamanasikārena tasmiṃ apagate tatiyāruppajjhānacakkhunā tassa natthibhāvameva passanto viharati, na tassa apagamanakāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsati jhānassa tādisābhogābhāvatoti. ^b^sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkammā^eb^ti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ.

[03] 284^b^.^eb^ natthitā ^a^V1.0379^ea^ pariyāyāsuññavivittabhāvāti ``natthī''ti padassa atthaṃ vadantena suññavivittapadānipi gahitāni. āmeḍitavacanaṃ pana bhāvanākāradassanaṃ. vibhaṅgepi imassa padassa ayamevattho vuttoti dassetuṃ ^b^``yampi vibhaṅge''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^taññeva viññāṇaṃ abhāvetī^eb^ti yaṃ pubbe ``anantaṃ viññāṇa''nti manasi kataṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ, taṃyevāti attho ^a^M1.0403^ea^. taṃyeva hi ārammaṇabhūtaṃ paṭhamena viya rūpanimittaṃ tatiyenāruppenābhāvetīti. ^b^khayato sammasana^eb^nti bhaṅgānupassanamāha. sā hi saṅkhatadhammānaṃ bhaṅgābhāvameva passantī ``viññāṇampi abhāvetī''tiādinā vattabbataṃ labhatīti adhippāyenāha ^b^``khayato sammasanaṃ viya vutta''^eb^nti. ^b^assā^eb^ti pāṭhassa. puna ^b^assā^eb^ti viññāṇassa. ^b^abhāvetī^eb^ti abhāvaṃ karoti. yathā ñāṇassa na upatiṭṭhati, evaṃ karoti amanasikaraṇato. tato eva ^b^vibhāveti^eb^ vigatabhāvaṃ karoti, vināseti vā yathā na dissati, tathā karaṇato. teneva ^b^antaradhāpeti^eb^ tirobhāvaṃ gameti. ^b^na aññathā^eb^ti imissā pāḷiyā evamattho, na ito aññathā ayujjamānakattāti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^assā^eb^ti paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvassa. ^b^kiñcana^eb^nti kiñcipi. sabhāvadhammassa appāvasesatā nāma bhaṅgo eva siyāti āha ^b^``bhaṅgamattampi assa avasiṭṭhaṃ natthī''^eb^ti. sati hi bhaṅgamattepi tassa sakiñcanatā siyā. ^b^akiñcana^eb^nti ca viññāṇassa kiñci pakāraṃ aggahetvā sabbena sabbaṃ vibhāvanamāha. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] 285^b^.^eb^ ^b^no ca santā^eb^ti yathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā savisesā santā, evamayaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti no ca santā tadabhāvato. yā ayaṃ khandhesu paccayayāpanīyatāya, rogamūlatāya ca rogasarikkhatā, dukkhatāsūlayogādinā gaṇḍasarikkhatā, pīḷājananādinā sallasarikkhatā ca, sā saññāya sati hoti, nāsatīti vuttaṃ ^b^``saññā rogo, saññā gaṇḍo, saññā salla''^eb^nti. sā cettha paṭukiccā pañcavokārabhavato oḷārikasaññā veditabbā. na kevalaṃ saññā eva, atha kho vedanācetanādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. saññāsīsena pana niddeso kato. ^b^etaṃ santa^eb^nti etaṃ asantabhāvakararogādisarikkhasaññāvirahato santaṃ. tato eva ^b^paṇītaṃ^eb^. kiṃ pana tanti āha ^b^``nevasaññānāsaññā''^eb^ti ^a^V1.0380^ea^? tadapadesena ^a^M1.0404^ea^ taṃsampayuttajjhānamāha ^b^``ādīnava''^eb^nti. ettha rogādisarikkhasaññādisabbhāvopi ādīnavo daṭṭhabbo, na āsannaviññāṇañcāyatanapaccatthikatāva. ^b^uparī^eb^ti catutthāruppe. ^b^sā vā^eb^ti sā eva. ^b^vattitā^eb^ti pavattitā nibbattitā vaḷañjitā.

[03] ^b^tasmiṃ nimitte^eb^ti tasmiṃ tatiyāruppasamāpattisaṅkhāte jhānanimitte. ^b^mānasa^eb^nti cittaṃ ``mano eva mānasa''nti katvā, bhāvanāmanasikāraṃ vā. taṃ hi manasi bhavanti mānasanti vuccati. jhānasampayuttadhammānampi jhānānuguṇatāya samāpattipariyāyo labbhatīti āha ^b^``ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattisaṅkhātesu catūsu khandhesū''^eb^ti, ārammaṇabhūtesūti adhippāyo.

[03] 286^b^.^eb^ yathāvuttaṃ ākiñcaññaṃ ārammaṇapaccayabhāvato āyatanaṃ kāraṇamassāti ^b^jhānaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ,^eb^ ākiñcaññameva ārammaṇapaccayabhūtaṃ jhānassa kāraṇanti ^b^ārammaṇaṃ ākiñcaññāyatana^eb^nti evaṃ vā attho daṭṭhabbo. sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^yāya saññāya bhāvato^eb^ti yādisāya saññāya atthibhāvena. yā hi sā paṭusaññākiccassa abhāvato saññātipi na vattabbā, saññāsabhāvānātivattanato asaññātipi na vattabbā, tassā vijjamānattāti attho. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ jhānaṃ. ^b^taṃ tāva dassetu^eb^nti ettha ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ sasāpaṭipadaṃ, yathāvuttasaññaṃ, tassā ca adhigamupāyanti attho. ^b^nevasaññīnāsaññī^eb^ti hi puggalādhiṭṭhānena dhammaṃ uddharantena saññāvantamukhena saññā uddhaṭā, aññathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti uddharitabbaṃ siyā. sā pana paṭipadā yattha pavattati, yathā ca pavattati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasi karoti, saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattiṃ bhāvetī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ hi catutthāruppabhāvanāya pavattiṭṭhānaṃ, saṅkhārāvasesasamāpatti pavattiākāroti. ^b^yatra hi nāmā^eb^ti yā nāma. ^b^natthibhāvampī^eb^ti viññāṇassa suññatampi, evaṃ sukhumampīti adhippāyo. ^b^santārammaṇatāyā^eb^ti santaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etissāti santārammaṇā, tabbhāvo santārammaṇatā, tāya, na jhānasantatāya. na hi tatiyāruppasamāpatti catutthāruppajjhānato santā.

[03] codako ^a^M1.0405^ea^ ``yaṃ santato manasi karoti, na tattha ādīnavadassanaṃ bhaveyya. asati ca ādīnavadassane samatikkamo eva na siyā''ti dassento ^b^``santato ce manasi karoti, kathaṃ samatikkamo^eb^ ^a^V1.0381^ea^ ^b^hotī''^eb^ti āha. itaro ^b^``asamāpajjitukāmatāyā''^eb^ti parihāramāha, tena ādīnavadassanampi atthevāti dasseti. ^b^so hī^eb^tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti. tattha yasmiṃ jhāne abhirati, tattha āvajjanasamāpajjanādipaṭipattiyā bhavitabbaṃ. sā panassa tatiyāruppe sabbaso natthi, kevalaṃ aññābhāvato ārammaṇakaraṇamattamevāti dassento ^b^``kiñcāpī''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] ^b^samatikkamitvāva gacchatī^eb^ti tesaṃ sippīnaṃ jīvikaṃ tiṇāyapi amaññamāno te vītivattatiyeva. ^b^so^eb^ti yogāvacaro. ^b^ta^eb^nti tatiyāruppasamāpattiṃ. ^b^pubbe vuttanayenā^eb^ti ``santā vatāyaṃ samāpattī''tiādinā vuttena nayena santato manasi karonto. ^b^ta^eb^nti yāya nevasaññīnāsaññī nāma hoti, saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattiṃ bhāvetīti vuccati, taṃ saññaṃ pāpuṇātīti yojanā. saññāsīsena hi desanā. ^b^paramasukhuma^eb^nti ukkaṃsagatasukhumabhāvaṃ. ^b^saṅkhārāvasesasamāpatti^eb^nti ukkaṃsagatasukhumatāya saṅkhārānaṃ sesatāmattaṃ samāpattiṃ. tenāha ^b^``accantasukhumabhāvappattasaṅkhāra''^eb^nti. antamaticca ^b^accantaṃ^eb^. yato sukhumatamaṃ nāma natthi, tathāparamukkaṃsagatasukhumasaṅkhāranti attho. paṭhamajjhānūpacārato paṭṭhāya hi tacchantiyā viya pavattamānāya bhāvanāya anukkamena saṅkhārā tattha antimakoṭṭhāsataṃ pāpitā, tato paraṃ nirodho eva, na saṅkhārappavattīti. tena vuccati ^b^``saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattī''^eb^ti.

[03] 287^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaṃ taṃ^eb^ catukkhandhaṃ. ^b^atthato^eb^ti kusalādivisesavisiṭṭhaparamatthato. visesato adhipaññāsikkhāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ idhādhippetanti āha ^b^``idha samāpannassa cittacetasikā dhammā adhippetā''^eb^ti. ^b^oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvato^eb^ti yadipi catutthāruppavipākasaññāya catutthāruppakusalasaññā oḷārikā, tathā vipassanāmaggaphalasaññāhi, tathāpi oḷārikasukhumatā nāma upādāyupādāya gahetabbāti pañcavokārabhavapariyāpannāya viya catuvokārepi heṭṭhā tīsu bhūmīsu saññāya viya oḷārikāya abhāvato. ^b^sukhumāyā^eb^ti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā sukhumāya saññāya bhāvato vijjamānattā. ^b^nevasaññā^eb^ti ettha ^a^M1.0406^ea^ ^b^na^eb^-kāro abhāvattho, ^b^nāsañña^eb^nti ettha ^b^na^eb^-kāro aññattho, ^b^a^eb^-kāro abhāvatthova, asaññaṃ anasaññañcāti attho. ^b^pariyāpannattā^eb^ti ekadesabhāvena antogadhattā. ^b^etthā^eb^ti catutthāruppe. dutiye atthavikappe ^b^nevasaññā^eb^ti ettha ^b^na^eb^-kāro aññattho. tathā ^b^nāsaññā^eb^ti ettha ^b^na^eb^-kāro, ^b^a^eb^-kāro ca aññattho evāti tena dvayena saññābhāvo eva dassitoti dhammāyatanapariyāpannatāya ^a^V1.0382^ea^ āyatanabhāvo vuttovāti ^b^``adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ nissayapaccayabhāvato.

[03] kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ, yenettha saññāva edisī jātāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``na kevala''^eb^ntiādi. saññāsīsenāyaṃ desanā katā ``nānattakāyā nānattasaññino''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 3.341, 359; a0 ni0 9.24) viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. evaṃ ^b^esa attho^eb^ti kañci visesaṃ upādāya sabhāvato atthīti vattabbasseva dhammassa kañci visesaṃ upādāya natthīti vattabbatāsaṅkhāto attho.
[03] atithokampi yaṃ ^b^telamatthi bhanteti āha^eb^ akappiyabhāvaṃ upādāya, tadeva ^b^natthi, bhante, telanti āha^eb^ nāḷipūraṇaṃ upādāya. tenāha ^b^``tattha yathā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] yadi ārammaṇasañjānanaṃ saññākiccaṃ, taṃ saññā samānā kathamayaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti āha ^b^``dahanakiccamivā''^eb^tiādi. saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā eva hesā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, tato eva ca ñāṇassa sugayhāpi na hoti. tenāha ^b^``nibbidājananampi kātuṃ na sakkotī''^eb^ti. ^b^akatābhiniveso^eb^ti akatavipassanābhiniveso appavattitasammasanacāro. ^b^pakativipassako^eb^ti pakatiyā vipassako. khandhādimukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisitvā dvārālambanehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammānaṃ vipassako sakkuṇeyya tabbisayaudayabbayañāṇaṃ uppādetuṃ, yathā pana sakkoti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``sopī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^kalāpasammasanavasenevā^eb^ti catutthāruppacittuppādapariyāpanne phassādidhamme avinibbhujja ekato gahetvā kalāpato samūhato sammasanavasena nayavipassanāsaṅkhātakalāpasammasanavasena. phassādidhamme vinibbhujjitvā visuṃ visuṃ sarūpato gahetvā aniccādivasena sammasanaṃ ^b^anupadadhammavipassanā^eb^ ^a^M1.0407^ea^. ^b^evaṃ sukhumattaṃ gatā^eb^ yathā dhammasenāpatināpi nāma anupadaṃ na vipassaneyyāti attho.

[03] ^b^therassā^eb^ti aññatarassa therassa. ^b^aññāhipī^eb^ti ettha ayamaparā upamā -- eko kira brāhmaṇo aññataraṃ purisaṃ manuññaṃ mattikabhājanaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ disvā yāci ``dehi me imaṃ bhājana''nti. so surāsittataṃ sandhāya ``nāyyo sakkā dātuṃ, surā ettha atthī''ti āha. brāhmaṇo ^a^V1.0383^ea^ attano samīpe ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ uddissa āha ``tena hi imassa pātuṃ dehī''ti. itaro ``natthayyo''ti āha. tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa ayogyabhāvaṃ upādāya ``atthī''tipi vattabbaṃ, pātabbatāya tattha abhāvato ``natthī''tipi vattabbaṃ jātaṃ, evaṃ idhāpīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] kasmā panettha yathā heṭṭhā ``ananto ākāso, anantaṃ viññāṇaṃ, natthi kiñcī''ti tattha tattha bhāvanākāro gahito, evaṃ koci bhāvanākāro na gahitoti? keci tāva āhu -- ``bhāvanākāro nāma sopacārassa jhānassa yathāsakaṃ ārammaṇe pavattiākāro, ārammaṇañcettha ākiñcaññāyatanadhammā. te pana gayhamānā ekassa vā pubbaṅgamadhammassa vasena gahetabbā siyuṃ, sabbe eva vā. tattha paṭhamapakkhe viññāṇassa gahaṇaṃ āpannanti `viññāṇaṃ viññāṇa'nti manasikāre catutthāruppassa viññāṇañcāyatanabhāvo āpajjati. dutiyapakkhe pana sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanadhammārammaṇatāya jhānassa `ākiñcaññaṃ ākiñcañña'nti manasikāre ākiñcaññāyatanatā vā siyā, abhāvārammaṇatā vā. sabbathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhāvo na labbhatī''ti. tadidamakāraṇaṃ tathā jhānassa appavattanato. na hi catutthāruppabhāvanā viññāṇamākiñcaññaṃ vā āmasantī pavattati, kiñcarahi? tatiyāruppassa santataṃ.

[03] yadi evaṃ, kasmā pāḷiyaṃ ``santa''nti na gahitanti? kiñcāpi na gahitataṃ ^b^sutte^eb^ (dī0 ni0 2.129; saṃ0 ni0 2.152), ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ (vibha0 606 ādayo) pana gahitameva. yathāha -- ``taññeva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasi karoti, saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattiṃ bhāvetī''ti (vibha0 619). atha kasmā ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ viya sutte bhāvanākāro na gahitoti? veneyyajjhāsayato, desanāvilāsato ca. ye hi veneyyā yathā heṭṭhā tīsu ^a^M1.0408^ea^ āruppesu ``ananto ākāso, anantaṃ viññāṇaṃ, natthi kiñcī''ti bhāvanākāro gahito, evaṃ aggahite eva tasmiṃ tamatthaṃ paṭivijjhanti, tesaṃ vasena sutte tathā desanā katā, suttantagatikāva abhidhamme ^b^suttantabhājanīye^eb^ (vibha0 605 ādayo) uddesadesanā. ye pana veneyyā vibhajitvā vutteyeva tasmiṃ tamatthaṃ paṭivijjhanti, tesaṃ vasena ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ bhāvanākāro vutto. dhammissaro pana bhagavā sammāsambuddho dhammānaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ jānanto katthaci bhāvanākāraṃ gaṇhāti, katthaci bhāvanākāraṃ na gaṇhāti. sā ca desanā yāvadeva veneyyavinayatthāti ayamettha desanāvilāso. suttantadesanā vā pariyāyakathāti tattha bhāvanākāro ^a^V1.0384^ea^ na gahito, abhidhammadesanā pana nippariyāyakathāti tattha bhāvanākāro gahitoti evampettha bhāvanākārassa gahaṇe, aggahaṇe ca kāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] apare pana bhaṇanti -- ``catutthāruppe visesadassanatthaṃ ^b^sutte^eb^ bhāvanākārassa aggahaṇaṃ, svāyaṃ viseso anupubbabhāvanājanito. sā ca anupubbabhāvanā pahānakkamopajanitā pahātabbasamatikkamena jhānānaṃ adhigantabbato. tathā hi kāmādivivekavitakkavicāravūpasamapītivirāgasomanassatthaṅgamamukhena rūpāvacarajjhānāni desitāni, rūpasaññādisamatikkamamukhena arūpajjhānāni. na kevalañca jhānāniyeva, atha kho sabbampi sīlaṃ, sabbāpi paññā paṭipakkhadhammappahānavaseneva sampādetabbato pahātabbadhammasamatikkamadassanamukheneva desanā āruḷhā. tathā hi ``pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 1.8, 194) sīlasaṃvaro, ``cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 1.213; ma0 ni0 1.411, 421; 3.15, 75) indriyasaṃvaro, ``neva davāya na madāyā''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.23, 422; 2.24; 3.75; saṃ0 ni0 2.63; a0 ni0 6.58; mahāni0 206; vibha0 518) bhojane mattaññutā, ``idha bhikkhu micchājīvaṃ pahāya sammāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappetī''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 5.8) ājīvapārisuddhi, ``abhijjhaṃ loke pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 1.217; ma0 ni0 1.412, 425; 3.16, 75) jāgariyānuyogo, ``aniccasaññā bhāvetabbā asmimānasamugghātāya, aniccasaññino, meghiya, anattasaññā ^a^M1.0409^ea^ saṇṭhāti, anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ gacchati, āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī''tiādinā paññā paṭipakkhadhammappahānavaseneva desitā. tasmā jhānāni desento bhagavā ``vivicceva kāmehī''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 1.226; saṃ0 ni0 2.152; a0 ni0 4.123) pahātabbadhammasamatikkamadassanamukheneva desesi. tena vuttaṃ ``kāmādivivekavitakkavicāravūpasamapītivirāgasomanassatthaṅgamamukhena rūpāvacarajjhānāni desitāni, rūpasaññādisamatikkamamukhena arūpajjhānānī''ti. tattha yathā rūpāvacaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvanāvisesādhigatehi vitakkādīhi viya saddhādīhipi tikkhavisadasūrasabhāvehi dhammehi samannāgatattā kāmacchandādīnaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ, tadekaṭṭhānañca pāpadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanato uttarimanussadhammabhāvappattaṃ ^a^V1.0385^ea^ kāmāvacaradhammehi saṇhasukhumaṃ, santaṃ, paṇītañca hoti; dutiyajjhānādīni pana bhāvanāvisesena oḷārikaṅgappahānato tato sātisayaṃ saṇhasukhumasaṇhasukhumatarādibhāvappattāni honti. tathā arūpāvacaraṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ rūpavirāgabhāvanābhāvena pavattamānaṃ ārammaṇasantatāyapi aṅgasantatāyapi pākatikaparittadhammehi viya sabbarūpāvacaradhammehi santasukhumabhāvappattaṃ hoti. ārammaṇasantabhāvenāpi hi tadārammaṇadhammā santasabhāvā honti, seyyathāpi lokuttaradhammārammaṇā dhammā.

[03] satipi dhammato, mahaggatabhāvenāpi ca abhede rūpāvacaracatutthato āruppaṃ aṅgatopi santameva, yatassa santavimokkhatā vuttā. dutiyāruppādīni pana paṭhamāruppādito aṅgato, ārammaṇato ca santasantatarasantatamabhāvappattāni tathā bhāvanāvisesasamāyogato, svāyaṃ bhāvanāviseso paṭhamajjhānūpacārato paṭṭhāya taṃtaṃpahātabbasamatikkamanavasena tassa tassa jhānassa santasukhumabhāvaṃ āpādento catutthāruppe saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvaṃ pāpeti. yato catutthāruppaṃ yathā anupadadhammavipassanāvasena vipassanāya ārammaṇabhāvaṃ upagantvā pakativipassakassāpi nibbiduppattiyā paccayo na hoti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattito, tathā sayaṃ tatiyāruppadhammesu pavattamānaṃ te yāthāvato vibhāvetuṃ na sakkoti, yathā tadaññajjhānāni attano ārammaṇaṃ. kevalaṃ pana ārabbha pavattimattamevassa tattha hoti ^a^M1.0410^ea^, tayidaṃ ārammaṇabhāvenāpi nāma vibhūtākāratāya ṭhātuṃ appahontaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇe kiṃ pahoti. tasmā tadassa avibhūtakiccataṃ disvā satthā heṭṭhā tīsu ṭhānesu bhāvanākāraṃ vatvā tādiso idha na labbhatīti dīpetuṃ catutthāruppadesanāyaṃ ^b^sutte^eb^ bhāvanākāraṃ pariyāyadesanattā na kathesi.

[03] yasmā pana sārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇe pavattiākāro atthevāti atisukhumabhāvappattaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ ``taṃyeva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasi karotī''ti (vibha0 619) ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ vuttaṃ yathādhammasāsanabhāvato, pubbabhāgavasena vā ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ ``santato manasi karotī''ti vuttaṃ tadā yogino tassa vibhūtabhāvato. appanāvasena pana ^b^sutte^eb^ bhāvanākāro na gahito avibhūtabhāvato. kammaṭṭhānaṃ hi kiñci ādito avibhūtaṃ hoti, yathā taṃ? buddhānussatiādi. kiñci majjhe, yathā taṃ? ānāpānassati. kiñci ubhayattha, yathā taṃ? upasamānussatiādi. catutthāruppakammaṭṭhānaṃ pana pariyosāne avibhūtaṃ bhāvanāya matthakappattiyaṃ ^a^V1.0386^ea^ ārammaṇassa avibhūtabhāvato. tasmā catutthāruppe imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ satthārā ^b^sutte^eb^ bhāvanākāro na gahito, na sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvatoti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.

[03] 288^b^.^eb^ ^b^asadisarūpo^eb^ti dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāsītianubyañjanabyāmappabhāketumālādīhi rūpaguṇehi aññehi asādhāraṇarūpakāyo, sabhāvattho vā ^b^rūpa^eb^-saddo ``yaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpa''ntiādīsu (dī0 ni0 2.400; ma0 ni0 1.133; vibha0 203) viya. tasmā ^b^asadisarūpo^eb^ti asadisasabhāvo, tena dasabalacatuvesārajjādiguṇavisesasamāyogadīpanato satthu dhammakāyasampattiyāpi asadisatā dassitā hoti. ^b^itī^eb^ti evaṃ vuttappakārena. ^b^tasmi^eb^nti āruppe. ^b^pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyā^eb^ti pubbe viya asādhāraṇaṃ tattha tattha jhāne patiniyatameva atthaṃ aggahetvā sādhāraṇabhāvato tattha tattheva pakiṇṇakaṃ visaṭaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā pavattā pakiṇṇakakathāpi vijānitabbā.

[03] 289^b^.^eb^ ^b^rūpanimittātikkamato^eb^ti ^a^M1.0411^ea^ kasiṇarūpasaṅkhātassa paṭibhāganimittassa atikkamanato. ^b^ākāsātikkamato^eb^ti kasiṇugghāṭimākāsassa atikkamanato. ^b^ākāse pavattitaviññāṇātikkamato^eb^ti paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa atikkamanato, na dutiyāruppaviññāṇātikkamanato. tadatikkamato hi tasseva vibhāvanaṃ hoti. dutiyāruppaviññāṇavibhāvane hi tadeva atikkantaṃ siyā, na tassa ārammaṇaṃ, na ca ārammaṇe dosaṃ disvā anārammaṇassa vibhāvanātikkamo yujjati. ^b^pāḷiya^eb^ñca ``viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ sato samāpajjati...pe0... sato vuṭṭhahitvā taṃyeva viññāṇaṃ abhāvetī''ti vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ ``taṃyeva viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ abhāvetī''ti, ``taṃyeva abhāvetī''ti vā. ``anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajjā''ti ettha pana dvayaṃ vuttaṃ ārammaṇañca viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇañcāyatanañca. tasmiṃ dvaye yena kenaci, yato vā vuṭṭhito, teneva padhānaniddiṭṭhena taṃ-saddassa sambandhe āpanne ``ayañca ārammaṇātikkamabhāvanā''ti viññāṇañcāyatanassa nivattanatthaṃ viññāṇavacanaṃ. tasmā paṭhamāruppaviññāṇasseva abhāvanātikkamo vutto.

[03] 290^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0387^ea^ ^b^santepī^eb^ti aṅgātikkame asatipi. ^b^suppaṇītatarā^eb^ti suṭṭhu paṇītatarā, sundarā paṇītatarā cāti vā attho. satipi catunnaṃ pāsādatalānaṃ, sāṭikānañca tabbhāvato, pamāṇato ca samabhāve uparūpari pana kāmaguṇānaṃ, sukhasamphassādīnañca visesena paṇītatarādibhāvo viya etāsaṃ catunnaṃ samāpattīnaṃ āruppabhāvato, aṅgato ca satipi samabhāve bhāvanāvisesasiddho pana sātisayo uparūpari paṇītatarādibhāvoti imamatthaṃ dasseti ^b^``yathā hī''^eb^tiādinā.

[03] 291^b^.^eb^ ^b^nissito^eb^ti nissāya ṭhito. ^b^duṭṭhitā^eb^ti na sammā ṭhitā, dukkhaṃ vā ṭhitā. ^b^tannissita^eb^nti tena nissitaṃ, ṭhānanti attho. ^b^tannissita^eb^nti vā taṃ ^b^maṇḍapalaggaṃ purisaṃ^eb^ nissāya ṭhitaṃ purisanti attho. maṇḍapalaggañhi anissāya tena vinābhūte vivitte bahi okāse ṭhānaṃ viya ākāsalaggaviññāṇassa viveke tadapagame tatiyāruppassa ṭhānanti.

[03] 292^b^.^eb^ ^b^ārammaṇaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0412^ea^ ^b^karoteva, aññābhāvena taṃ ida^eb^nti ``āsannaviññāṇañcāyatanapaccatthikarūpāsannākāsārammaṇaviññāṇāpagamārammaṇaṃ, no ca santa''nti ca diṭṭhādīnavampi taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ idaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajjhānaṃ aññassa tādisassa ārammaṇabhāvayogyassa abhāvena alābhena ārammaṇaṃ karoti eva. ^b^``sabbadisampati''^eb^nti idaṃ janassa agatikabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^vutti^eb^nti jīvikaṃ. ^b^vattatī^eb^ti jīvati.

[03] 293^b^.^eb^ ^b^āruḷho^eb^tiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho -- yathā koci puriso anekaporisaṃ dīghanisseṇiṃ āruḷho tassa uparimapade ṭhito tassā nisseṇiyā bāhumeva olubbhati aññassa alābhato, yathā ca paṃsupabbatassa, missakapabbatassa vā aggakoṭiṃ āruḷho tassa matthakameva olubbhati, yathā ca ^b^giriṃ^eb^ silāpabbataṃ āruḷho paripphandamāno aññābhāvato attano jaṇṇukameva olubbhati, ^b^tathā^eb^ etaṃ catutthāruppajjhānaṃ taṃ tatiyāruppaṃ olubbhitvā pavattatīti. yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ uttānameva.
[06] āruppaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti dasamaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 294^b^.^eb^ uddeso ^a^M1.0413^ea^ ^a^V1.0388^ea^ nāma niddesattho mudumajjhimapaññābāhullato, āgato ca bhāro avassaṃ vahitabboti āha ^b^``ekā saññāti evaṃ uddiṭṭhāya āhāre paṭikkūlasaññāya bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto''^eb^ti. tatthāyaṃ ^b^saññā^eb^-saddo ``rūpasaññā saddasaññā''tiādīsu (mahāni0 14) sañjānanalakkhaṇe dhamme āgato, ``aniccasaññā dukkhasaññā''tiādīsu vipassanāyaṃ āgato, ``uddhumātakasaññāti vā sopākarūpasaññāti vā ime dhammā ekatthā udāhu nānatthā''tiādīsu samathe āgato. idha pana samathassa parikamme daṭṭhabbo. āhāre hi paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇaṃ, tappabhāvitaṃ vā upacārajjhānaṃ idha ``āhāre paṭikkūlasaññā''ti adhippetaṃ. tattha yasmiṃ āhāre paṭikkūlasaññā bhāvetabbā, tattha nibbedavirāguppādanāya tappasaṅgena sabbampi āhāraṃ kiccappabhedādīnavopammehi vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``āharatīti āhāro''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^āharatī^eb^ti āhārapaccayasaṅkhātena uppattiyā, ṭhitiyā vā paccayabhāvena attano phalaṃ āneti nibbatteti pavatteti cāti attho. kabaḷaṃ karīyatīti kabaḷīkāro, vatthuvasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ, lakkhaṇato pana ojālakkhaṇo veditabbo, kabaḷīkāro ca so yathāvuttenatthena āhāro cāti ^b^kabaḷīkārāhāro^eb^. esa nayo sesesupi. phusatīti ^b^phasso^eb^. ayaṃ hi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattati. tathā hi so phusanalakkhaṇoti vuccati. cetayatīti cetanā, attano sampayuttadhammehi saddhiṃ ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho, manosannissitā cetanā ^b^manosañcetanā^eb^. upapattiparikappanavasena vijānātīti ^b^viññāṇaṃ^eb^. evamettha sāmaññatthato, visesatthato ca āhārā veditabbā. kasmā panete cattārova vuttā, aññe dhammā kiṃ attano phalassa paccayā na hontīti? no na honti, ime pana tathā ^a^V1.0389^ea^ ca honti ^a^M1.0414^ea^ aññathā cāti samānepi paccayabhāve atirekapaccayā honti, tasmā āhārāti vuccanti.

[03] kathaṃ? etesu hi paṭhamo sayaṃ yasmiṃ kalāpe tappariyāpannānaṃ yathārahaṃ paccayo hontova ojaṭṭhamakaṃ rūpaṃ āharati, dutiyo tisso vedanā āharati, tatiyo tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhiṃ āharati, catuttho paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṃ āharati. tenāha ^b^``kabaḷīkārāhāro''^eb^tiādi. ettha ca kammajādibhedabhinnā ojā sati paccayalābhe dve tisso paveṇiyo ghaṭentī ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ āharati, sukhavedanīyādibhedabhinno phassāhāro yathārahaṃ tisso vedanā āharati, puññābhisaṅkhārādibhedabhinno manosañcetanāhāro kāmabhavādīsu tīsu bhavesu yathārahaṃ saviññāṇaṃ, aviññāṇañca paṭisandhiṃ āharati, viññāṇāhāro yathāpaccayaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmaṃ rūpaṃ, nāmarūpañca āharatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. atha vā upatthambhakaṭṭhena ime eva dhammā āhārāti vuttā. yathā hi kabaḷīkārāhāro rūpakāyassa upatthambhakaṭṭhena paccayo, evaṃ arūpino āhārā sampayuttadhammānaṃ. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo, arūpino āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo''ti (paṭṭhā0 1.1.15). aparo nayo -- ajjhattikasantatiyā visesapaccayattā kabaḷīkārāhāro, phassādayo ca tayo dhammā āhārāti vuttā. visesapaccayo hi kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkārāhāro, nāmakāye vedanāya phasso, viññāṇassa manosañcetanā, nāmarūpassa viññāṇaṃ. yathāha ``seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko, āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati, anāhāro no tiṭṭhati (saṃ0 ni0 5.183). tathā phassapaccayā vedanā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa''nti (udā0 1; mahāva0 1; netti0 24).

[03] ^b^kabaḷīkārāhāre^eb^ti kabaḷīkāre āhāre ^b^nikanti^eb^ taṇhā, ^b^taṃ bhayaṃ^eb^ anatthāvahato. gadhitassa hi āhāraparibhogo anatthāya hoti. hetuatthe bhummaṃ. evaṃ sesesu. ^b^nikantī^eb^ti nikāmanā chandarāgo ^a^M1.0415^ea^. bhāyati etasmāti bhayaṃ, nikanti eva bhayaṃ ^b^nikantibhayaṃ^eb^. kabaḷīkārāhārahetu imesaṃ sattānaṃ chandarāgo bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ diṭṭhadhammikādibhedassa anatthassa sakalassāpi vaṭṭadukkhassa hetubhāvato. tenevāha ``kabaḷīkāre ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo, atthi nandī, atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ viruḷha''ntiādi (saṃ0 ni0 2.64; kathā0 296; mahāni0 7). ^b^upagamanaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0390^ea^ appahīnavipallāsassa ārammaṇena samodhānaṃ saṅgati sukhavedanīyādiphassuppatti ^b^bhayaṃ^eb^ bhayānakaṃ tīhi dukkhatāhi aparimuccanato. tenāha ``sukhavedanīyaṃ, bhikkhave, phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhā vedanā (saṃ0 ni0 4.129), tassa vedanāpaccayā taṇhā...pe0... dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti (udā0 1). tattha tattha bhave upapajjati etenāti ^b^upapatti,^eb^ upapajjanaṃ vā ^b^upapatti,^eb^ khipanaṃ ^b^bhayaṃ^eb^ bhayānakaṃ upapattimūlakehi byasanehi aparimuttato. tenāha ``avidvā, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo puññañce saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, puññupagaṃ bhavati viññāṇaṃ. apuññañce saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, apuññupagaṃ bhavati viññāṇa''ntiādi (saṃ0 ni0 2.51). ^b^paṭisandhī^eb^ti bhavantarādīhi paṭisandhānaṃ, taṃ ^b^bhayaṃ^eb^ bhayānakaṃ paṭisandhinimittehi dukkhehi avimuccanato. tenāha ``viññāṇe ce, bhikkhave, āhāre atthi rāgo, atthi nandī, atthi taṇhā, patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ viruḷha''ntiādi (saṃ0 ni0 2.64).

[03] ^b^puttamaṃsūpamena^eb^ ovādena ^b^dīpetabbo^eb^ nicchandarāgaparibhogāya. evaṃ hi tattha nikantibhayaṃ na hoti. niccammā gāvī yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagacchati, tattha tattheva naṃ pāṇino khādantiyeva. evaṃ phasse sati vedanā uppajjati, vedanā ca dukkhasallādito daṭṭhabbāti phasse ādīnavaṃ passantassa upagamanabhayaṃ na hotīti āha ^b^``phassāhāro niccammagāvūpamena dīpetabbo''^eb^ti. ekādasahi aggīhi sabbaso ādittā bhavā aṅgārakāsusadisāti passato upapattibhayaṃ na hotīti āha ^b^``manosañcetanāhāro aṅgārakāsūpamena dīpetabbo''^eb^ti. corasadisaṃ viññāṇaṃ anatthapātato, pahārasadisī vedanā duradhivāsatoti sammadeva passato paṭisandhibhayaṃ na hotīti āha ^b^``viññāṇāhāro sattisatūpamena dīpetabbo''^eb^ti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M1.0416^ea^ kiccādimukhena āhāresu ādīnavaṃ vibhāvetvā idāni tattha yathādhippetaṃ āhāraṃ niddhāretvā paṭikkūlato manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``imesu panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^upādāyarūpaniddesepi^eb^ ``kabaḷīkāro āhāro''ti (dha0 sa0 595) āgatattā tato visesento ^b^``asitapītakhāyitasāyitappabhedo''^eb^ti āha, bhūtakathanaṃ vā etaṃ. tattha ^b^asitapītakhāyitasāyitappabhedo^eb^ti asitabbapātabbakhāyitabbasāyitabbavibhāgo kālabhedavacanicchāya abhāvato yathā ``duddha''nti. ^b^kabaḷīkāro āhāro vā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ yathā phassāhārādinivattanaṃ, evaṃ ojāhāranivattanampi daṭṭhabbaṃ. savatthuko eva hi āhāro idha kammaṭṭhānabhūto, tena āharīyatīti ^a^V1.0391^ea^ āhāroti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. āharatīti āhāroti ayaṃ panattho nibbattitaojāvasena veditabbo. ^b^imasmiṃ atthe^eb^ti imasmiṃ kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte atthe. ^b^uppannā saññā^eb^ti saññāsīsena bhāvanaṃ vadati. tathā hi vakkhati ``paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇavasena panā''tiādi (visuddhi0 1.305).

[03] ^b^kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyattidhammato, atthato ca suggahitaṃ sumanasikataṃ sūpadhāritaṃ katvā. tenāha ^b^``uggahato ekapadampi avirajjhantenā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^uggahato^eb^ti ācariyuggahato. ^b^ekapadampī^eb^ti ekampi padaṃ, ekakoṭṭhāsampi vā, padesamattampīti attho. ^b^dasahākārehī^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu antimajīvikābhāvato, piṇḍapātassa alābhalābhesu paritassanagedhādisamuppattito, bhuttassa sammadajananato, kimikulasaṃvaddhanatoti evamādīhipi ākārehi āhāre paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā? vuttaṃ hetaṃ ``antamidaṃ, bhikkhave, jīvikānaṃ yadidaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ, abhisāpoyaṃ, bhikkhave, lokasmiṃ `piṇḍolo vicarasi pattapāṇī'''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.80), ``aladdhā ca piṇḍapātaṃ paritassati, laddhā ca piṇḍapātaṃ gadhito mucchito ajjhosanno anādīnavadassāvī anissaraṇapañño paribhuñjatī''ti (a0 ni0 3.124), ``bhutto ca āhāro kassaci kadāci maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ āvahati, ukkocakādayo, takkoṭakādayo ca dvattiṃsa dvattiṃsa kulappabhedā kimayo ca naṃ upanissāya jīvantī''ti.

[03] vuccate ^a^M1.0417^ea^ -- antimajīvikābhāvo tāva cittasaṃkilesavisodhanatthaṃ kammaṭṭhānābhinivesato pageva manasi kātabbo ``māhaṃ chavālātasadiso bhaveyya''nti. tathā piṇḍapātassa alābhalābhesupi paritassanagedhādisamuppattinivāraṇaṃ pageva anuṭṭhātabbaṃ suparisuddhasīlassa paṭisaṅkhānavato tadabhāvato. bhattasammado anekantiko, paribhogantogadho vā veditabbo. kimikulasaṃvaddhanaṃ pana na saṅgahetabbaṃ, saṅgahitameva vā ``dasahākārehī''ti ettha niyamassa akatattā. iminā vā nayena itaresampettha saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yathāsambhavamettha paṭikkūlatāpaccavekkhaṇassa adhippetattā. tathā hi gharagoḷikavaccamūsikajatukavaccādikaṃ sambhavantaṃ gahitaṃ, na ekantikanti. tathā pariyesanādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ vattabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^gamanato^eb^tiādīsu paccāgamanampi gamanasabhāgattā gamaneneva saṅgahitaṃ. paṭikkamanasālādiupasaṅkamanaṃ ^a^V1.0392^ea^ viya pariyesane samānapaṭikkūlaṃ hi asuciṭṭhānakkamanavirūpaduggandhadassanaghāyanādhivāsanehi. ^b^gamanato^eb^ti bhikkhācāravasena gocaragāmaṃ uddissa gamanato. ^b^pariyesanato^eb^ti gocaragāme bhikkhatthaṃ āhiṇḍanato. ^b^paribhogato^eb^ti āhārassa paribhuñjanato. ubhayaṃ ubhayena āsayati, ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammabalavavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato sayati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti āsayo, āmāsayassa upari tiṭṭhanako pittādiko. mariyādattho hi ayamākāro, tato ^b^āsayato^eb^. nidadhāti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo, tato ^b^nidhānato. aparipakkato^eb^ti gahaṇīsaṅkhātena kammajatejena aparipakkato. ^b^paripakkato^eb^ti yathābhuttassa āhārassa vipakkabhāvato. ^b^phalato^eb^ti nibbattito. ^b^nissandato^eb^ti ito cito ca vissandanato. ^b^sammakkhanato^eb^ti sabbaso makkhanato. sabbattha āhāre paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbāti yojanā. taṃtaṃkiriyānipphattipaṭipāṭivasena cāyaṃ gamanatotiādikā anupubbī ṭhapitā, sammakkhanaṃ pana paribhogādīsu labbhamānampi nissandavasena visesato paṭikkūlanti sabbapacchā ṭhapitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] 295^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ mahānubhāve^eb^ti idāni vattabbapaṭipattiyā mahānubhāveti vadanti, sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānapariharaṇādisiddhaṃ vā dhammasudhammataṃ purakkhatvā yogāvacarena ^a^M1.0418^ea^ evaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti dassento ^b^``evaṃ mahānubhāve nāma sāsane''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^nāma^eb^-saddo sambhāvane daṭṭhabbo. pabbajitena gāmābhimukhena gantabbanti yojanā. ayañca gamanādito paccavekkhaṇā yogino na attuddesikāva, atha kho anuddesikāpīti dassento ^b^``sakalaratti''^eb^ntiādinā dhuradvayaṃ pariggahesi. ^b^pariveṇa^eb^nti pariveṇaṅgaṇaṃ. ^b^vīsatiṃsavāre^eb^ti ettha santatipaccuppannavasena vāraparicchedoti keci, apare pana ``uṇhāsanenā''ti vadanti. nīvaraṇavikkhambhanañhi appattā bhāvanā pharaṇapītiyā abhāvato nisajjāvasena kāyakilamathaṃ na vinodatiyevāti iriyāpathacalanaṃ hotiyeva. vīsatiṃsaggahaṇaṃ pana yathāsallakkhitabhikkhācaraṇavelāvasena. atha vā gamanato yāva sammakkhanamanasikāro eko vāro, evaṃ vīsatiṃsavāre kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karitvā. ^b^nijanasambādhānī^eb^ti janasambādharahitāni, tena appākiṇṇataṃ, appasaddataṃ, appanigghosatañca dasseti. tato eva ^b^pavivekasukhāni^eb^ janavivekena iṭṭhāni, pavivekassa vā jhānānuyogassa upakārāni. yasmā ^b^chāyūdakasampannāni,^eb^ tasmā ^a^V1.0393^ea^ ^b^sītalāni^eb^. yasmā ^b^sucīni,^eb^ tasmā ^b^ramaṇīyabhūmibhāgānī^eb^ti purimāni dve pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kāraṇavacanāni. ^b^ariya^eb^nti niddosaṃ. ^b^vivekarati^eb^nti jhānānuyogaratiṃ.

[03] kiñcāpi yogāvacarānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ nāma sujaggitaṃ susammaṭṭhameva hoti, kadāci pana jagganato pacchā evampi siyāti paṭikkūlatāpaccavekkhaṇāya sambhavadassanatthaṃ ^b^``pādarajagharagolikavaccādisamparikiṇṇa''^eb^ntiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. tattha ^b^paccattharaṇa^eb^nti bhūmiyā chavirakkhaṇatthaṃ attharitabbaṃ cimilikādiattharaṇamāha. ^b^jatukā^eb^ khuddakavagguliyo. ^b^upahatattā^eb^ti dūsitattā. ^b^tato^eb^ti tato tato. appekadā ^b^ulūkapārāvatādīhī^eb^ti idhāpi ``appekadā''ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^udakacikkhallādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena kacavarādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. pariveṇato vihāraṅgaṇappavesamaggo ^b^vihāraracchā^eb^.

[03] ^b^vitakkamāḷake^eb^ti ``kattha nu kho ajja bhikkhāya caritabba''ntiādinā vitakkanamāḷake. ^b^gāmamagga^eb^nti gāmagāmimaggaṃ. ^b^khāṇukaṇṭakamaggo^eb^ti khāṇukaṇṭakavanto maggo. ^b^daṭṭhabbo hotī^eb^ti dassanena gamanaṃ upalakkheti.

[03] ^b^gaṇḍaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0419^ea^ ^b^paṭicchādentenā^eb^tiādi evamajjhāsayena nivāsanādi kātabbanti vattadassanaṃ, gaṇḍaroginā vātātapādiparissayavinodanatthaṃ gaṇḍaṃ paṭicchādayamānena viya. atha vā gaṇḍaṃ viya gaṇḍaṃ paṭicchādayamānenāti ekaṃ gaṇḍa-saddaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ bhavati. ``gaṇḍoti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana''nti (a0 ni0 9.15; saṃ0 ni0 4.103) vacanato ^b^gaṇḍo^eb^ti attabhāvassa pariyāyo, visesato rūpakāyassa dukkhatāsūlayogato, asucipaggharaṇato, uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātakapakkapabhijjanato. ^b^vaṇacoḷaka^eb^nti vaṇapaṭicchādakavatthakhaṇḍaṃ. ^b^nīharitvā^eb^ti thavikato uddharitvā. ^b^kuṇapānipī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo garahāyaṃ evarūpānipi daṭṭhabbāni bhavantīti, sambhavadassane vā idampi tattha sambhavatīti. ^b^adhivāsetabbo^eb^ti khamitabbo aññathā āhārassa anupalabbhanato. ^b^gāmadvāre^eb^ti gāmadvārasamīpe, ummārabbhantare vā. ^b^gāmaracchā^eb^ vinivijjhitvā ṭhitā ^b^oloketabbā honti^eb^ yugamattadassināpi satāti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^paccattharaṇādī^eb^ti gharagolikavaccādisaṃkiliṭṭhapaccattharaṇādikaṃ. ^b^anekakuṇapapariyosāna^eb^nti ettha ^a^V1.0394^ea^ dunnivatthaduppārutamanussasamākulānaṃ gāmaracchānaṃ olokanampi ānetvā vattabbaṃ. tampi hi paṭikkūlamevāti. ^b^aho vatā^eb^ti garahane nipāto. ^b^bho^eb^ti dhammālapanaṃ. yāvañcidaṃ paṭikkūlo āhāro yadatthaṃ gamanampi nāma evaṃ jegucchaṃ, duradhivāsanañcāti attho.

[03] 296^b^.^eb^ ^b^gamanapaṭikkūla^eb^nti gamanameva paṭikkūlaṃ gamanapaṭikkūlaṃ. ^b^adhivāsetvāpī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, tena ``ettakenāpi mutti natthi, ito parampi mahantaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ sakalaṃ adhivāsetabbamevā''ti vakkhamānaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ sampiṇḍeti. ^b^saṅghāṭipārutenā^eb^ti saṅghāṭiyā kappanapārupanena pārutasarīrena. ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yāsu vīthīsu. ^b^yāva piṇḍikamaṃsāpī^eb^ti yāva jaṅghapiṇḍikamaṃsappadesāpi. ^b^udakacikkhalle^eb^ti udakamisse kaddame. ^b^ekena cīvara^eb^nti ekena hatthena nivatthacīvaraṃ. macchā dhovīyanti etenāti ^b^macchadhovanaṃ,^eb^ udakaṃ. sammissa-saddo paccekaṃ sambandhitabbo. ^b^oḷigallāni^eb^ ucchiṭṭhodakagabbhamalādīnaṃ sakaddamānaṃ sandanaṭṭhānāni, yāni jaṇṇumattāsucibharitānipi honti. ^b^candanikāni^eb^ kevalānaṃ ucchiṭṭhodakagabbhamalādīnaṃ sandanaṭṭhānāni ^a^M1.0420^ea^. ^b^yato^eb^ti oḷigallādito. ^b^tā makkhikā^eb^ti tattha saṇḍasaṇḍacārino nīlamakkhikā. ^b^nilīyantī^eb^ti acchanti.

[03] ^b^dadamānāpī^eb^tiādi satipi kesañci saddhānaṃ vasena sakkaccakāre paṭikkūlapaccavekkhaṇāyogyaṃ pana asaddhānaṃ vasena pavattanakāsakkaccakārameva dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ. ^b^tuṇhī honti^eb^ sayameva riñcitvā gacchissatīti. ^b^gacchā^eb^ti apehi. ^b^re^eb^ti ambho. ^b^muṇḍakā^eb^ti anādarālapanaṃ. ^b^samudācarantī^eb^ti kathenti. piṇḍolyassa antimajīvikābhāvenāha ^b^``kapaṇamanussena viya gāme piṇḍāya caritvā nikkhamitabba''^eb^nti.

[03] 297^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ pattagate āhāre. ^b^lajjitabbaṃ hoti^eb^ ``ucchiṭṭhaṃ nu kho ayaṃ mayhaṃ dātukāmo''ti āsaṅkeyyāti, ^b^sedo paggharamāno^eb^ āhārassa vā uṇhatāya, bhikkhuno vā sapariḷāhatāyāti adhippāyo. ^b^sukkhathaddhabhattampī^eb^ti sukkhatāya thaddhampi bhattaṃ, pageva takkakañjikādinā upasittanti adhippāyo. tena sedena kilinnatāya paṭikkūlataṃ vadati.

[03] ^b^tasmi^eb^nti piṇḍapāte. ^b^sambhinnasobhe^eb^ti sabbaso vinaṭṭhasobhe. ^b^vemajjhato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti jivhāya majjhato paṭṭhāya. ^b^dantagūthako^eb^ dantamalaṃ. ^b^vicuṇṇitamakkhito^eb^ti ubhayehi dantehi vicuṇṇito ^a^V1.0395^ea^ kheḷādīhi samupalitto. evaṃbhūtassa cassa yāyaṃ pubbe vaṇṇasampadā, gandhasampadā, abhisaṅkhārasampadā ca, sā ekaṃsena vinassati, raso pana nasseyya vā na vāti āha ^b^``antarahitavaṇṇagandhasaṅkhāraviseso''^eb^ti. ^b^suvānadoṇiya^eb^nti sārameyyānaṃ bhuñjanakāmbaṇe. ^b^suvānavamathu viyā^eb^ti vantasunakhachaḍḍanaṃ viya. ^b^cakkhussa āpāthaṃ atītattā ajjhoharitabbo hotī^eb^ti ukkaṃsagataṃ tassa paṭikkūlabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.

[03] 298^b^.^eb^ ^b^paribhoga^eb^nti ajjhoharaṇaṃ. ^b^esa^eb^ āhāro anto pavisamāno bahalamadhukatelamakkhito viya paramajeguccho hotīti sambandho. ^b^anto^eb^ti koṭṭhassa abbhantare. nidhānamanupagato āmāsayaṃ appattoyeva āhāro pittādīhi vimissito hotīti āha ^b^``pavisamāno''^eb^ti. āmāsayapakkāsayavinimutto koyamāsayo nāmāti ^a^M1.0421^ea^ āsaṅkaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``yasmā''^eb^tiādi. pittamevāsayo ^b^pittāsayo. adhiko hotī^eb^ti vuttaṃ mandapuññabāhullato lokassa. ^b^evaṃ āsayato^eb^ti jeguccho hutvā anto paviṭṭho jegucchatarehi pittādīhi vimissito ativiya jeguccho hotīti evaṃ āsayato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
[03] 299^b^.^eb^ ^b^nidhānato^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^so^eb^ti āhāro. ^b^dasavassikenā^eb^ti jātiyā dasavassena sattena. ^b^okāse^eb^ti āmāsayasaṅkhāte padese.

[03] 300^b^.^eb^ ^b^evarūpe^eb^ti edise, dasavassāni yāva vassasataṃ adhotavaccakūpasadiseti attho. ^b^nidhāna^eb^nti nidhātabbataṃ. ^b^yathāvuttappakāre^eb^ti sace pana ``dasavassikenā''tiādinā (visuddhi0 1.299) yathāvutto pakāro etassāti yathāvuttappakāro, tasmiṃ. ^b^paramandhakāratimise^eb^ti ativiya andhakaraṇamahātamasi. atiduggandhajegucche padese paramajegucchabhāvaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti sambandho. kattha kiṃ viyāti āha ^b^``yathā nāmā''^eb^tiādi. kālameghena abhivuṭṭhe āvāṭe bahuso vassanena ekaccaṃ asucijātaṃ uppilavitvā vigaccheyyāti ^b^akālamegha^eb^-ggahaṇaṃ. ^b^tiṇapaṇṇakilañjakhaṇḍa^eb^-ggahaṇaṃ na asubhassāpi asubhena sammissatāya asubhabhāvappattidassanatthaṃ. ^b^kāyaggisantāpakuthitakuthanasañjātapheṇapubbuḷakācito^eb^ti gahaṇitejena pakkuthitanippakkatāya samuppannapheṇapubbuḷanicito. ^b^aparipakkato^eb^ti aparipakkabhāvato.

[03] 301^b^.^eb^ ^b^suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viyā^eb^ti yathā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo vidhinā tāpiyamānā suvaṇṇarajatādike ^a^V1.0396^ea^ muñcantiyo suvaṇṇarajatādibhāvaṃ upagacchantīti vuccanti, na evamayaṃ. ayaṃ pana āhāro kāyagginā paripakko pheṇapubbuḷake muñcanto saṇhaṃ karonti etthāti ``saṇhakaraṇī''ti laddhanāmake nisade pisitvā nāḷike khuddakaveḷunāḷikāyaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānamattena pakkhippamānapaṇḍumattikā viya karīsabhāvaṃ upagantvā pakkāsayaṃ pūreti, muttabhāvaṃ upagantvā muttavatthiṃ pūretīti yojanā. gahaṇiyā indhanabhāgo viya kimibhakkhabhāgo ca apākaṭova ^a^M1.0422^ea^. rasabhāgo phalato pakāsīyati, aparipakkasabhāgā ca teti te anāmasitvā karīsamuttabhāgā evettha dassitā.

[03] 302^b^.^eb^ paṭikkūlassa nāma phalena paṭikkūleneva bhavitabbanti dassento ^b^``sammā paripaccamāno''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^nakhadantādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena na kevalaṃ tacādīni eva ^b^dvattiṃsākārapāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (ma0 ni0 3.154; khu0 pā0 3ḍvattiṃsākāra) āgatāni, atha kho akkhigūthakaṇṇagūthadantamalajallikāsambhavādīni dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsavinimuttāni asubhāni saṅgaṇhanto ^b^``nānākuṇapānī''^eb^ti āhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] 303^b^.^eb^ ^b^nissandamāno^eb^ti vissavanto, paggharantoti attho. ^b^ādinā pakārenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena nāsikāya siṅghāṇikā, mukhena kheḷo, kadāci pittaṃ, semhaṃ, lohitaṃ vamati, vaccamaggena uccāro, passāvamaggena passāvo, sakalakāye lomakūpehi sedajallikāti evaṃpakāraṃ asuciṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^``paṭhamadivase''^eb^ti idaṃ nissandadivasāpekkhāya vuttaṃ. tenāha ^b^``dutiyadivase nissandento''^eb^ti. ^b^vikuṇitamukho^eb^ti jigucchāvasena saṅkucitamukho. tenāha ^b^``jegucchī''^eb^ti. ^b^maṅkubhūto^eb^ti vimanakajāto ``imampi nāma posemī''ti. ^b^ratto^eb^ti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātena cittassa vipariṇāmākārena chandarāgena ratto. ^b^giddho^eb^ti abhikaṅkhanasabhāvena abhigijjhanena giddho gedhaṃ āpanno. ^b^gadhito^eb^ti dummocanīyabhāvena ganthito viya tattha paṭibaddho. ^b^mucchito^eb^ti rasataṇhāya mucchaṃ mohaṃ āpanno. ^b^viratto^eb^ti vigatarāgo. ^b^aṭṭīyamāno^eb^ti dukkhiyamāno. ^b^harāyamāno^eb^ti lajjamāno. ^b^jigucchamāno^eb^ti hīḷento.

[03] ^b^navadvārehī^eb^ti pākaṭānaṃ mahantānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, lomakūpavivarehipi sandatevāti. ^b^nilīyatī^eb^ti attānaṃ adassento nigūhati, saṅkucati vā. ^b^eva^eb^nti ekena dvārena pavesanaṃ anekehi dvārehi anekadhā nikkhāmanaṃ, pakāsanaṃ pavesanaṃ, nigūḷhaṃ nikkhāmanampīti somanassajātena ^a^V1.0397^ea^ pavesanaṃ, maṅkubhūtena nikkhāmanaṃ, sārattena pavesanaṃ, virattena nikkhāmananti imehi pakārehi.

[03] 304^b^.^eb^ ^b^paribhogakālepī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0423^ea^ ^b^pi^eb^-saddena paviṭṭhamattopi nāma pavesadvāraṃ jegucchaṃ karoti, pageva laddhaparivāso paripākappatto itaradvārānīti dasseti. ^b^esa^eb^ āhāro. ^b^gandhaharaṇattha^eb^nti vissagandhāpanayanatthaṃ. ^b^kāyagginā^eb^ti gahaṇitejānugatena kāyusmānā. ^b^pheṇuddehaka^eb^nti pheṇāni uṭṭhapetvā uṭṭhapetvā. ^b^paccitvā^eb^ti paripākaṃ gantvā. ^b^uttaramāno^eb^ti uppilavanto. ^b^semhādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena pittādike saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^karīsādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena sedajallikādike. ^b^imāni dvārāni^eb^ mukhādīni. ^b^ekacca^eb^nti passāvamaggaṃ sandhāya vadati. cokkhajātikā pana mukhādīnipi dhovitvā hatthaṃ puna dhovantiyeva. puna ^b^ekacca^eb^nti vaccamaggaṃ. ^b^dvattikkhattu^eb^nti dvikkhattuṃ, tikkhattuṃ vā. ettha ca āhāratthāya gamanapariyesanānaṃ paṭikkūlatā āhāre paṭikkūlatā vuttā. paribhogassa tannissayato, āsayanidhānānaṃ taṃsambandhato, itaresaṃ tabbikāratoti ayampi viseso veditabbo. kimibhakkhabhāvopi hissa vikārapakkheyeva ṭhapetabboti.

[03] 305^b^.^eb^ ^b^taṃ nimitta^eb^nti yathāvuttehi ākārehi punappunaṃ manasi karontassa paṭikkūlākāravasena upaṭṭhitaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārasaññitaṃ bhāvanāya nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, na uggahapaṭibhāganimittaṃ. yadi hi tattha uggahanimittaṃ uppajjeyya, paṭibhāganimittenapi bhavitabbaṃ. tathā ca sati appanāppattena jhānena bhavitabbaṃ, na ca bhavati, kasmā? bhāvanāya nānākārato, sabhāvadhammabhāvena ca kammaṭṭhānassa gambhīrabhāvato. tenāha ^b^``kabaḷīkārāhārassa sabhāvadhammatāya gambhīrattā''^eb^ti. ettha hi yadipi paṭikkūlākāravasena bhāvanā pavattati. ye pana dhamme upādāya kabaḷīkārāhārapaññatti, te eva dhammā paṭikkūlā, na paññattīti paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇamukhenapi sabhāvadhammeyeva ārabbha bhāvanāya pavattanato, sabhāvadhammānañca sabhāveneva gambhīrabhāvato na tattha jhānaṃ appetuṃ sakkoti. gambhīrabhāvato hi purimasaccadvayaṃ duddasaṃ jātanti. yadi upacārasamādhinā cittaṃ samādhiyati, kathaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ``saññā'' icceva voharīyatīti āha ^b^``paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇavasena panā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] idāni imissā bhāvanāya ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``imañca panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^rasataṇhāyā^eb^ti madhurādirasavisayāya taṇhāya. ^b^patilīyatī^eb^ti saṅkucati anekākāraṃ tattha paṭikkūlatāya ^a^V1.0398^ea^ saṇṭhitattā. ^b^patikuṭatī^eb^ti apasakkati ^a^M1.0424^ea^ na visarati. ^b^pativattatī^eb^ti nivattati. ^b^kantāranittharaṇatthiko^eb^ti mahato dubbhikkhakantārassa nittharaṇappayojano. ^b^vigatamado^eb^ti mānamadādīnaṃ abhāvena nimmado, madābhāvaggahaṇeneva cassa davamaṇḍanavibhūsanādīnampi abhāvo gahitoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^kabaḷīkārāhārapariññāmukhenā^eb^ti vuttanayena paṭikkūlākārato kabaḷīkārāhārassa paricchijja jānanadvārena. ^b^pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo^eb^ti anativattanaṭṭhena pañcasu kāmaguṇesu niyutto, tappayojano vā rāgo. ^b^pariññaṃ^eb^ samatikkamaṃ ^b^gacchati^eb^. rasataṇhāya hi sammadeva vigatāya rūpataṇhādayopi vigatā eva honti bhojane mattaññutāya ukkaṃsagamanato. sati ca visayisamatikkame visayo samatikkanto eva hotīti āha ^b^``so pañcakāmaguṇapariññāmukhena rūpakkhandhaṃ parijānātī''^eb^ti. rūpāyatanādīsu hi pariññaṃ gacchantesu tannissayabhūtāni, taggāhakā pasādā ca sukheneva pariññaṃ gacchantīti. ^b^aparipakkādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena āsayanidhānānampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. tattha ^b^aparipakkaṃ^eb^ tāva udariyameva. āsayaggahaṇena pittasemhapubbalohitānaṃ, paripakkaggahaṇena karīsamuttānaṃ, phalaggahaṇena kesādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ pariggaho siddho hotīti āha ^b^``kāyagatāsatibhāvanāpi pāripūriṃ gacchatī''^eb^ti. ^b^asubhasaññāyā^eb^ti asubhabhāvanāya, aviññāṇakāsubhabhāvanānuyogassāti attho. ^b^anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti^eb^ paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇena kāyassa asuciduggandhajegucchabhāvasallakkhaṇato. ^b^imaṃ pana paṭipatti^eb^nti imaṃ āhāre paṭikkūlasaññābhāvanaṃ. ^b^amatapariyosānata^eb^nti nibbānaniṭṭhitaṃ āhāre paṭikkūlasaññābhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nibbānādhigamanti attho.
[06] āhārepaṭikkūlabhāvanāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ ^b^``ekaṃ vavatthānanti evaṃ uddiṭṭhassa catudhātuvavatthānassa bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto''^eb^ti uddeso nāma niddesattho mudumajjhapaññābāhullato ^a^M1.0425^ea^, āgato ca bhāro avassaṃ vahitabboti katvā vuttaṃ. tattha satipi visayabhedena vavatthānassa bhede vavatthānabhāvasāmaññena pana taṃ abhinnaṃ katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``ekaṃ vavatthāna''^eb^nti, pubbabhāge vā satipi visayabhede atthasiddhiyaṃ ^a^V1.0399^ea^ tassa ekavisayatāvāti ``ekaṃ vavatthāna''nti vuttaṃ. yathā hi dvattiṃsākāre kammaṃ karontassa yogino yadipi pubbabhāge visuṃ visuṃ koṭṭhāsesu manasikāro pavattati, aparabhāge pana ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekasmiṃyeva koṭṭhāse atthasiddhi hoti, na sabbesu, evamidhāpīti. tattha siyā -- yathā paṭikkūlabhāvasāmaññena dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhāne abhedato manasikāro pavattati, evaṃ idha dhātubhāvasāmaññena abhedato manasikāro pavattatīti ``ekaṃ vavatthāna''nti vuttanti? nayidamevaṃ. tattha hi paṇṇattisamatikkamato paṭṭhāya paṭikkūlavaseneva sabbattha manasikāro pavattetabbo, idha pana sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇato dhātuyo manasi kātabbā, na dhātubhāvasāmaññato. tenevāha ^b^``sabhāvūpalakkhaṇavasena sanniṭṭhāna''^eb^nti. kiṃ vā etena papañcena, aññehi ekūnacattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānehi asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ catudhātuvavatthānaṃ nāma ekaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti dassetuṃ ``ekaṃ vavatthāna''nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ``catudhātuvavatthānassa bhāvanāniddeso''ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu catudhātuvavatthānaṃ bhāvanāva? saccaṃ bhāvanāva, sakiṃ pavattaṃ pana vavatthānaṃ, tassa bahulīkāro bhāvanāti vacanabhedena vuttaṃ. kathaṃ pana bhāvanā niddisīyati tassā vacīgocarātikkantabhāvatoti? nāyaṃ doso bhāvanatthe bhāvanāvohārato. bhāvanattho hi kammaṭṭhānapariggaho idha ``bhāvanā''ti adhippeto.

[03] ^b^sabhāvūpalakkhaṇavasenā^eb^ti kakkhaḷattādikassa salakkhaṇassa upadhāraṇavasena. idaṃ hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇādikammaṭṭhānaṃ viya na paṇṇattimattasallakkhaṇavasena, nīlakasiṇādikammaṭṭhānaṃ viya na nīlādivaṇṇasallakkhaṇavasena, nāpi vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ viya saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatādisāmaññalakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena pavattati, atha kho pathavīādīnaṃ sabhāvasallakkhaṇavasena pavattati. tena vuttaṃ ``sabhāvūpalakkhaṇavasenā''ti, kakkhaḷattādikassa salakkhaṇassa upadhāraṇavasenāti attho. ^b^sanniṭṭhāna^eb^nti ñāṇavinicchayo veditabbo, na yevāpanakavinicchayo, nāpi vitakkādivinicchayo ^a^M1.0426^ea^. ^b^dhātumanasikāro^eb^ti dhātūsu manasikāro, catasso dhātuyo ārabbha bhāvanāmanasikāroti attho. kātabbato kammaṃ, yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato ṭhānañcāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ, catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ sabhāvasallakkhaṇavasena pavattaṃ yogakammaṃ. tenāha ^b^``dhātumanasikāro, dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ, catudhātuvavatthānanti atthato eka''^eb^nti. ^b^tayidaṃ^eb^ catudhātuvavatthānaṃ. ^b^``dvidhā āgata''^eb^nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu dhātuvibhaṅge nātisaṅkhepavitthāravasena āgataṃ, tasmā ``tidhā āgata''nti vattabbanti? na, tatthāpi ajjhattikānaṃ dhātūnaṃ pabhedato anavasesapariyādānassa katattā, bāhirānañca dhātūnaṃ pariggahitattā ^a^V1.0400^ea^. atha vā ^b^dvidhā āgata^eb^nti ettha dvidhāva āgatanti na evaṃ niyamo gahetabbo, atha kho dvidhā āgatamevāti, tena tatiyassāpi pakārassa saṅgaho siddho hoti. so ca nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayo ``saṅkhepato ca vitthārato cā''ti ettha āvuttivasena, ^b^ca^eb^-saddeneva vā saṅgahoti daṭṭhabbo. atha vā yo nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayena atisaṅkhepapaṭikkhepamukhena labbhamāno vitthārabhāgo, taṃ vitthāranayantogadhameva katvā vuttaṃ ``dvidhā āgata''nti. evañca katvā ``nātitikkhapaññassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa vasena vitthārato āgata''nti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. ^b^``mahāsatipaṭṭhāne''^eb^ti ca idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, ^b^satipaṭṭhāna^eb^(dī0 ni0 2.378 ādayo; ma0 ni0 3.111 ādayo) ^b^kāyagatāsatisuttādīsu^eb^pi (ma0 ni0 3.153 ādayo) tatheva āgatattā. ^b^rāhulovāde^eb^ti mahārāhulovāde (ma0 ni0 2.113 ādayo). ^b^dhātuvibhaṅge^eb^ti dhātuvibhaṅgasutte (ma0 ni0 3.342 ādayo), abhidhamme dhātuvibhaṅge (vibha0 172 ādayo) ca.

[03] kāmaṃ ^b^mahāsatipaṭṭhāne^eb^ atthena upamaṃ parivāretvā desanā āgatā, upamā ca nāma yāvadeva upameyyatthavibhāvanatthāti upamaṃ tāva dassetvā upameyyatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``seyyathāpī''^eb^tiādinā pāḷi ānītā. kasmā panettha dhātuvasena, tatthapi catumahābhūtavasena kammaṭṭhānaniddeso katoti? sattasuññatāsandassanatthaṃ, ettha dhātuvasena, tatthāpi oḷārikabhāvena supākaṭatāya, ekaccaveneyyajanacaritānukulatāya ca mahābhūtavasena kammaṭṭhānaniddeso katoti veditabbo. tattha ^b^pathavīdhātū^eb^tiādīsu dhātuttho nāma sabhāvattho, sabhāvattho ^a^M1.0427^ea^ nāma suññatattho, suññatattho nāma nissattattho. evaṃ sabhāvasuññatanissattatthena pathavīyeva dhātu ^b^pathavīdhātu. āpodhātu^eb^ādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^pathavīdhātū^eb^ti sahajarūpadhammānaṃ patiṭṭhā dhātu, tathā ^b^āpodhātū^eb^ti ābandhanadhātu, ^b^tejodhātū^eb^ti paripācanadhātu, ^b^vāyodhātū^eb^ti vitthambhanadhātūti evamettha samāso, bhāvattho ca veditabbo. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana parato āgamissati.

[03] ^b^evaṃ tikkhapaññassā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^eva^eb^nti yathādassitaṃ pāḷiṃ paccāmasati. nātitikkhapaññassa vitthāradesanāti katvā āha ^b^``tikkhapaññassā''^eb^ti. yathā vatthayugaṃ arahatīti vatthayugiko, evaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ arahati, dhātukammaṭṭhānapayojanoti vā dhātukammaṭṭhāniko, tassa ^b^dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa^eb^.

[03] ^b^cheko^eb^ti ^a^V1.0401^ea^ taṃtaṃsamaññāya kusalo, yathājāte sūnasmiṃ naṅguṭṭhakhuravisāṇādivante aṭṭhimaṃsādiavayavasamudāye avibhatte gāvīsamaññā, na vibhatte, vibhatte pana aṭṭhimaṃsādiavayavasamaññāti jānanako. ^b^goghātako^eb^ti jīvikatthāya gunnaṃ ghātako. ^b^antevāsī^eb^ti kammakaraṇavasena tassa samīpavāsī tassa tannissāya jīvanato. ^b^vinivijjhitvā^eb^ti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne aññaṃ vinivijjhitvā. ^b^mahāpathānaṃ vemajjhaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte^eb^ti catunnaṃ mahāpathānaṃ tāya eva vinivijjhanaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte. yasmā te cattāro mahāpathā catūhi disāhi āgantvā samohitā viya honti, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ catumahāpathānaṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^catumahāpathe^eb^. vilīyanti bhijjanti vibhajjantīti bīlā, bhāgā, ^b^va^eb^-kārassa ba-kāraṃ, i-kārassa ca ī-kāraṃ katvā. tameva hi bhāgatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. kiñcāpi ṭhita-saddo ``ṭhito vā''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 5.28) viya ṭhānasaṅkhātairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya, gatinivattiatthatāya vā ṭhā-saddassa aññattha ṭhapetvā gamanaṃ sesairiyāpathasamaṅgitāya bodhako, idha pana yathā tathā rūpakāyassa pavattiākārabodhako adhippetoti āha ^b^``catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena ṭhitattā^eb^ ^b^yathāṭhita''^eb^nti ^a^M1.0428^ea^. tattha ^b^ākārenā^eb^ti ṭhānādinā rūpakāyassa pavattiākārena. ṭhānādayo hi iriyāsaṅkhātāya kāyikakiriyāya pavattiṭṭhānatāya ``iriyāpathā''ti vuccanti. ^b^yathāṭhita^eb^nti yathāpavattaṃ. yathāvuttaṭṭhānamevettha paṇidhānanti adhippetanti āha ^b^``yathāṭhitattāva yathāpaṇihita''^eb^nti. ^b^ṭhita^eb^nti vā kāyassa ṭhānasaṅkhātairiyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^paṇihita^eb^nti tadaññairiyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^ṭhita^eb^nti vā kāyasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccavasena avaṭṭhānaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^paṇihita^eb^nti paccayakiccavasena tehi tehi paccayehi pakārato nihitaṃ paṇihitanti evamettha attho veditabbo. ^b^dhātuso^eb^ti dhātuṃ dhātuṃ pathavīādidhātuṃ visuṃ visuṃ katvā. ^b^paccavekkhatī^eb^ti pati pati avekkhati ñāṇacakkhunā vinibbhujitvā passati.

[03] yathā chekotiādinā pāḷiyā saddatthavivaraṇavasena vuttamevatthaṃ idāni bhāvatthavibhāvanavasena dassetuṃ ^b^``yathā goghātakassā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^posentassā^eb^ti maṃsūpacayaparibrūhanāya kuṇḍakabhattakappāsaṭṭhiādīhi saṃvaḍḍhentassa. ^b^vadhitaṃ mata^eb^nti hiṃsitaṃ hutvā mataṃ. ^b^mata^eb^nti ca matamattaṃ. tenevāha ^b^``tāvadevā''^eb^ti. ^b^gāvīti saññā na antaradhāyati^eb^ yāni aṅgapaccaṅgāni upādāya gāvīsamaññā, matamattāyapi gāviyā tesaṃ sannivesassa avinaṭṭhattā. ^b^bilāso^eb^ti bilaṃ bilaṃ katvā. ^b^vibhajitvā^eb^ti aṭṭhisaṅghātato maṃsaṃ vivecetvā, tato vā vivecitaṃ ^a^V1.0402^ea^ maṃsaṃ bhāgaso katvā. tenevāha ^b^``maṃsasaññā pavattatī''^eb^ti. ^b^pabbajitassapi^eb^ apariggahitakammaṭṭhānassa. ^b^ghanavinibbhoga^eb^nti santatisamūhakiccaghanānaṃ vinibbhujanaṃ vivecanaṃ. ^b^dhātuso paccavekkhato^eb^ti yathāvuttaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā dhātuso paccavekkhantassa. ^b^sattasaññā^eb^ti attānudiṭṭhivasena pavattā sattasaññāti vadanti, vohāravasena pavattasattasaññāyapi tadā antaradhānaṃ yuttameva yāthāvato ghanavinibbhogassa sampādanato. evaṃ hi sati yathāvuttaopammatthena opameyyattho aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti. tenevāha ^b^``dhātuvaseneva cittaṃ santiṭṭhatī''^eb^ti.

[03] 307^b^.^eb^ evaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānassa saṅkhepato āgataṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni vitthārato āgataṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``mahāhatthipadūpame panā''^eb^tiādi ^a^M1.0429^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^eva^eb^nti iminā ^b^rāhulovāda-^eb^ (ma0 ni0 2.113 ādayo) ^b^dhātuvibhaṅgesu^eb^ (ma0 ni0 3.342 ādayo; vibha0 172 ādayo) dhātukammaṭṭhānassa vitthārato āgamanameva upasaṃharati, na sabbaṃ desanānayaṃ aññathāpi tattha desanānayassa āgatattā.

[03] ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ yathādassite mahāhatthipadūpamapāṭhe. ^b^ajjhattikā^eb^ti sattasantānapariyāpannā. ^b^ajjhattaṃ paccatta^eb^nti padadvayenāpi taṃtaṃpāṭipuggalikadhammo vuccatīti āha ^b^``ubhayampi niyakassa adhivacana''^eb^nti. sasantatipariyāpannatāya pana attani gahetabbabhāvūpagamanavasena attānaṃ adhikicca pavattaṃ ^b^ajjhattaṃ^eb^. taṃtaṃsantatipariyāpannatāya ^b^paccattaṃ^eb^. tenevāha ^b^``attani pavattattā ajjhattaṃ, attānaṃ paṭicca paṭicca pavattattā paccatta''^eb^nti. ^b^kakkhaḷa^eb^nti kathinaṃ. yasmā taṃ thaddhabhāvena sahajātānaṃ patiṭṭhā hoti, tasmā ^b^``thaddha''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^kharigata^eb^nti kharīsu kharasabhāvesu gataṃ tappariyāpannaṃ, kharasabhāvamevāti attho. yasmā pana kharasabhāvaṃ pharusākārena upaṭṭhānato pharusākāraṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``pharusa''^eb^nti. tenāha ^b^``dutiyaṃ ākāravacana''^eb^nti. ^b^upādinnaṃ^eb^ nāma sarīraṭṭhakaṃ. taṃ pana kammasamuṭṭhānataṃ sandhāya upādinnampi atthi anupādinnampi, taṇhādīhi ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhavasena sabbampetaṃ upādinnamevāti dassetuṃ ^b^``upādinnanti daḷhaṃ ādinna''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ``mama''nti gahitaṃ ``aha''nti parāmaṭṭhanti yojanā. ^b^seyyathida^eb^nti kathetukamyatāpucchāvācīti āha ^b^``taṃ katamanti ceti attho''^eb^ti. ^b^tato^eb^ti pacchā. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ ajjhattikādibhedato dassitaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ. ^b^dassento^eb^ti vatthuvibhāgena dassento. kiñcāpi matthaluṅgaṃ aṭṭhimiñjeneva saṅgahetvā idha pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ na uddhaṭaṃ, ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge^eb^ ^a^V1.0403^ea^ (paṭi0 ma0 1.4) pana vīsatiyā ākārehi paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dassetuṃ visuṃ gahitanti tampi saṅgaṇhanto thaddhabhāvādhikatāya pathavīdhātukoṭṭhāsesuyeva ^b^``matthaluṅgaṃ pakkhipitvā vīsatiyā ākārehi pathavīdhātu niddiṭṭhāti veditabbā''^eb^ti āha. ^b^``yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcī''^eb^ti vā iminā pāḷiyaṃ matthaluṅgassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. tasmā idha ^b^``yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcī''^eb^ti idaṃ pubbāparāpekkhaṃ ``matthaluṅgaṃ pakkhipitvā vīsatiyā ākārehi pathavīdhātu niddiṭṭhāti veditabbā, yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcī''ti vacanato. puna ^b^yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcī^eb^ti avasesesu tīsu koṭṭhāsesūti ^a^M1.0430^ea^ yojetabbaṃ. ^b^tīsu koṭṭhāsesū^eb^ti tippakāresu koṭṭhāsesu. na hi te tayo koṭṭhāsā.

[03] ^b^vissandanabhāvenā^eb^ti paggharaṇasabhāvena. ^b^appotī^eb^ti visarati. ^b^pappotī^eb^ti pāpuṇāti, sasambhārāapavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. so hi vissandanabhāvena sasambhārapathavīsaṅkhātaṃ taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ visarati, pāpuṇāti ca, lakkhaṇāpavaseneva vā. sopi hi sahajātāññamaññanissayādipaccayatāya sesabhūtattayasaṅkhātaṃ taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ dravabhāvasiddhena vissandanabhāvena ābandhattaṃ, āsattattaṃ, avippakiṇṇañca karontaṃ ``appoti pappotī''ti vattabbataṃ arahatīti.

[03] ^b^tejanavasenā^eb^ti nisitabhāvena tikkhabhāvena. ^b^vuttanayenā^eb^ti kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena ``nānāvidhesū''ti āpodhātuyaṃ vuttanayena. ^b^kupitenā^eb^ti khubhitena. ^b^usumajāto^eb^ti usmābhibhūto. ^b^jīratī^eb^ti jiṇṇo hoti. tejodhātuvasena labbhamānā imasmiṃ kāye jarāpavatti pākaṭajarāvasena veditabbāti dassetuṃ ^b^``indriyavekallata''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. sarīre pakatiusumaṃ atikkamitvā uṇhabhāvo ^b^santāpo,^eb^ sarīrassa dahanavasena pavatto mahādāho ^b^paridāho^eb^ti ayametesaṃ viseso. ^b^yena jīrīyatī^eb^ti ca ekāhikādijararogena jarīyatītipi attho yujjati. satakkhattuṃ tāpetvā tāpetvā sītudake pakkhipitvā uddhaṭā sappi ^b^``satadhotasappī''^eb^ti vadanti. ^b^asita^eb^nti bhuttaṃ. ^b^khāyita^eb^nti khāditaṃ. ^b^sāyita^eb^nti assāditaṃ. ^b^sammā paripākaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā vasena vuttaṃ, asammāparipākopi pana visamavepākiniyā tassā eva vasena veditabbo. ^b^rasādibhāvenā^eb^ti rasarudhiramaṃsamedanhāruaṭṭhiaṭṭhimiñjasukkavasena. ^b^viveka^eb^nti puthubhāvaṃ aññamaññaṃ visadisabhāvaṃ. asitādibhedassa hi āhārassa pariṇāme raso hoti, taṃ paṭicca rasadhātu uppajjatīti attho. evaṃ ``rasassa pariṇāme rudhira''ntiādinā sabbaṃ netabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^vāyanavasenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0404^ea^ samudīraṇavasena, savegagamanavasena vā. ^b^uggārahikkādī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena uddekakhipanādipavattanakavātānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo ^a^M1.0431^ea^. ^b^uccārapassāvādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena pittasemhalasikākevaladuggandhādinīharaṇakānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. yadipi kucchi-saddo udarapariyāyo, koṭṭha-saddena pana antantarassa vuccamānattā tadavasiṭṭho udarappadeso idha kucchi-saddena vuccatīti āha ^b^``kucchisayā vātāti antānaṃ bahivātā''^eb^ti. ^b^samiñjanapasāraṇādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ālokanavilokanauddharaṇātiharaṇādikā sabbā kāyikakiriyā saṅgahitā. ^b^``assāsapassāsā cittasamuṭṭhānāvā''^eb^ti etena assāsapassāsānaṃ sarīraṃ muñcitvā pavatti natthīti dīpeti. na hi bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānassa sambhavo atthīti. yadi evaṃ kathaṃ ``passāsoti bahinikkhamananāsikavāto, dīghanāsikassa nāsikaggaṃ, itarassa uttaroṭṭhaṃ phusanto pavattatī''ti vacanaṃ? taṃ nikkhamanākārena pavattiyā cittasamuṭṭhānassa, santāne pavattautusamuṭṭhānassa ca vasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti āpodhātuādīnaṃ tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ niddesaṃ sandhāyāha. tattha āpodhātuniddese ``yaṃ vā panañña''nti iminā sambhavassa, tejodhātuniddese sarīre pākatikausmāya, vāyodhātuniddese dhamanijālānusaṭassa tattha tattha cammakhīlapīḷakādinibbattakavāyuno saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. samiñjanādinibbattakavātā cittasamuṭṭhānāva. yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ ``purimā pañca catusamuṭṭhānā''ti vacanaṃ? na hi samiñjanādinibbattakā eva aṅgamaṅgānusārino vātā, atha kho tadaññepīti natthi virodho.

[03] ^b^itī^eb^ti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. tenāha ^b^``vīsatiyā ākārehī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ vitthārato āgate dhātukammaṭṭhāneti attho. tena ayaṃ vaṇṇanā na kevalaṃ mahāhatthipadūpamasseva (ma0 ni0 1.300 ādayo), atha kho ^b^mahārāhulovāda-^eb^ (ma0 ni0 2.113 ādayo) ^b^dhātuvibhaṅgasuttāna^eb^mpi (ma0 ni0 3.342 ādayo) atthasaṃvaṇṇanā hotiyevāti dassitaṃ hoti. bhāvanānayepi eseva nayo. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``evaṃ rāhulovādadhātuvibhaṅgesupī''ti.

[03] 308^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhāvanānaye^eb^ti bhāvanāya naye. yena kammaṭṭhānabhāvanā ijjhati, tasmiṃ bhāvanāvidhimhīti attho. ^b^etthā^eb^ti dhātukammaṭṭhāne. yasmā yesaṃ ``tikkhapañño nātitikkhapañño''ti imesaṃ duvidhānaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ dvidhā āgataṃ dvidhā desitaṃ, tasmā kammaṭṭhānābhinivesopi tesaṃ dvidhāva icchitabboti taṃ tāva dassetuṃ ^b^``tikkhapaññassa bhikkhuno''^eb^tiādi ^a^M1.0432^ea^ āraddhaṃ. ^b^lomā pathavīdhātūtī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho ^a^V1.0405^ea^. ^b^evaṃ vitthārato dhātupariggaho^eb^ti ``kesā pathavīdhātu, lomā pathavīdhātū''tiādinā evaṃ dvācattālīsāya ākārehi vitthārato dhātukammaṭṭhānapariggaho. ^b^papañcato^eb^ti dandhato saṇikato. ^b^yaṃ thaddhalakkhaṇa^eb^nti kesādīsu yaṃ thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ kakkhaḷabhāvo. ^b^yaṃ ābandhanalakkhaṇa^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^evaṃ manasi karoto^eb^ti vatthuṃ anāmasitvā evaṃ lakkhaṇamattato manasikāraṃ pavattentassa. ^b^assā^eb^ti tikkhapaññassa. ^b^kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotī^eb^ti yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ tadeva lakkhaṇaṃ vibhūtaṃ hoti, tassa vā lakkhaṇassa suṭṭhu upaṭṭhānato taṃ ārabbha pavattamānaṃ manasikārasaṅkhātaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vibhūtaṃ visadaṃ hoti, tikkhapaññassa indriyapāṭavena saṃkhittarucibhāvato. sabbaso mandapaññassa bhāvanāva na ijjhatīti āha ^b^``nātitikkhapaññassā''^eb^ti. ^b^evaṃ manasi karoto^eb^ti vuttanayena saṅkhepato manasi karoto. ^b^andhakāraṃ avibhūtaṃ hotī^eb^ti anupaṭṭhānato andhaṃ viya karontaṃ apākaṭaṃ hoti kammaṭṭhānanti yojanā. ^b^purimanayenā^eb^ti ``kesā pathavīdhātū''tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena. vatthuāmasanena ^b^vitthārato manasi karontassa pākaṭaṃ hoti^eb^ kammaṭṭhānaṃ, nātitikkhapaññassa akhippanisantitāya vitthārarucibhāvato.

[03] idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``yathā dvīsu bhikkhūsū''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^peyyālamukha^eb^nti peyyālapāḷiyā mukhabhūtaṃ dvārabhūtaṃ ādito vāraṃ, vāradvayaṃ vā. ^b^vitthāretvā^eb^ti anavasesato sajjhāyitvā. ^b^ubhatokoṭivasenevā^eb^ti tassa tassa vārassa ādiantaggahaṇavaseneva. ^b^oṭṭhapariyāhatamatta^eb^nti oṭṭhānaṃ samphusanamattaṃ. yathā ganthaparivattane tikkhapaññassa bhikkhuno saṅkhepo ruccati, na vitthāro. itarassa ca vitthāro ruccati, na saṅkhepo, evaṃ bhāvanānayepīti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[01] ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā tikkhapaññassa saṅkhepo, nātitikkhapaññassa ca vitthāro sappāyo, tasmā. yasmā kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitukāmassa sīlavisodhanādipubbakiccaṃ icchitabbaṃ, taṃ sabbākārasampannaṃ heṭṭhā vuttamevāti idha na āmaṭṭhaṃ. yasmā pana vivekaṭṭhakāyassa, vivekaṭṭhacittasseva ca bhāvanā ijjhati ^a^M1.0433^ea^, na itarassa, tasmā tadubhayaṃ dassento ^b^``rahogatena paṭisallīnenā''^eb^ti āha. tattha ^b^rahogatenā^eb^ti rahasi gatena, ekākinā bhāvanānukūlaṭṭhānaṃ upagatenāti attho. ^b^paṭisallīnenā^eb^ti pati pati puthuttārammaṇato cittaṃ nisedhetvā kammaṭṭhāne sallīnena, tattha saṃsiliṭṭhacittenāti attho. ^b^sakalampi attano rūpakāyaṃ āvajjetvā^eb^ti uddhaṃ pādatalā, adho kesamatthakā, tiriyaṃ tacapariyantaṃ sabbampi ^a^V1.0406^ea^ attano karajakāyaṃ dhātuvasena manasi karonto yasmā cātumahābhūtiko ayaṃ kāyo, tasmā ``atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū''ti catumahābhūtavasena samannāharitvāti attho. idāni tāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ lakkhaṇato, upaṭṭhānākārato ca manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yo imasmiṃ kāye''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^thaddhabhāvo^eb^ti lakkhaṇamāha. thaddhattalakkhaṇā hi pathavīdhātu. ^b^kharabhāvo^eb^ti upaṭṭhānākāraṃ, ñāṇena gahetabbākāranti attho. ^b^dravabhāvo^eb^ lakkhaṇaṃ āpodhātuyā paggharaṇasabhāvattā. ^b^ābandhanaṃ^eb^ upaṭṭhānākāro. ^b^uṇhabhāvo^eb^ lakkhaṇaṃ tejodhātuyā usmāsabhāvattā. ^b^paripācanaṃ^eb^ upaṭṭhānākāro. ^b^vitthambhanaṃ^eb^ lakkhaṇaṃ vāyodhātuyā upatthambhanasabhāvattā. ^b^samudīraṇaṃ^eb^ upaṭṭhānākāro, upaṭṭhānākāro ca nāma dhātūnaṃ sakiccakaraṇavasena ñāṇassa vibhūtākāro. kasmā panettha ubhayaggahaṇaṃ? puggalajjhāsayato. ekaccassa hi dhātuyo manasi karontassa tā sabhāvato gahetabbataṃ gacchanti, ekaccassa sakiccakaraṇato, yo rasoti vuccati. tatrāyaṃ yogī dhātuyo manasi karonto ādito paccekaṃ salakkhaṇato, sarasatopi pariggaṇhāti. tenāha ^b^``yo imasmiṃ kāye thaddhabhāvo vā kharabhāvo vā...pe0... evaṃ saṃkhittena dhātuyo pariggahetvā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^pariggahetvā^eb^ti pariggāhakabhūtena ñāṇena dhātuyo lakkhaṇato, rasato vā paricchijja gahetvā. ayaṃ tāva saṃkhittato bhāvanānaye kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso.

[01] evaṃ pana dhātuyo pariggahetvā ``atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu thaddhabhāvo vā kharabhāvo vā, āpodhātu dravabhāvo vā ābandhanabhāvo vā, tejodhātu uṇhabhāvo vā paripācanabhāvo vā, vāyodhātu vitthambhanabhāvo ^a^M1.0434^ea^ vā samudīraṇabhāvo vā''ti evaṃ lakkhaṇādīhi saddhiṃyeva dhātuyo manasi karontena kālasatampi kālasahassampi punappunaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ, takkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ kātabbaṃ. tassevaṃ manasi karoto yaṃ lakkhaṇādīsu supākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, tadeva gahetvā itaraṃ vissajjetvā tena saddhiṃ ``pathavīdhātu āpodhātū''tiādinā manasikāro pavattetabbo. evaṃ manasi karontena hi anupubbato, nātisīghato, nātisaṇikato, vikkhepapaṭibāhanato, paṇṇattisamatikkamanato, anupaṭṭhānamuñcanato, lakkhaṇato, tayo ca suttantāti imehi dasahākārehi manasikārakosallaṃ anuṭṭhātabbaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^anupubbato^eb^ti anupaṭipāṭito ācariyassa santike uggahitapaṭipāṭito, sā ca desanāpaṭipāṭiyeva ^a^V1.0407^ea^. evaṃ anupubbato manasi karontenāpi nātisīghato manasi kātabbaṃ. atisīghato manasi karoto hi aparāparaṃ kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro nirantaraṃ pavattati, kammaṭṭhānaṃ pana avibhūtaṃ hoti, na visesaṃ āvahati. tasmā ^b^nātisīghato^eb^ manasi kātabbaṃ. yathā ca nātisīghato, evaṃ ^b^nātisaṇikato^eb^pi. atisaṇikato manasi karoto hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchati, visesādhigamassa paccayo na hoti. atisīghaṃ atisaṇikañca maggaṃ gacchantā purisā ettha nidassetabbā. ^b^vikkhepapaṭibāhanato^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe cetaso vikkhepo paṭibāhitabbo. bahiddhā vikkhepe hi sati kammaṭṭhānā parihāyati paridhaṃsati. ekapadikamaggagāmī puriso cettha nidassetabbo. ^b^paṇṇattisamatikkamanato^eb^ti ``yā ayaṃ pathavīdhātū''tiādikā paṇṇatti, taṃ atikkamitvā lakkhaṇesu eva cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.

[03] evaṃ paṇṇattiṃ vijahitvā kakkhaḷalakkhaṇādīsu eva manasikāraṃ pavattentassa lakkhaṇāni supākaṭāni suvibhūtāni hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. tassevaṃ punappunaṃ manasikāravasena cittaṃ āsevanaṃ labhati. sabbo rūpakāyo dhātumattato upaṭṭhāti suñño nissatto nijjīvo yantaṃ viya yantasuttena aparāparaṃ parivattamāno. sace pana bahiddhāpi manasikāraṃ upasaṃharati, athassa āhiṇḍantā manussatiracchānādayo sattākāraṃ vijahitvā ^a^M1.0435^ea^ dhātusamūhavaseneva upaṭṭhahanti, tehi kariyamānā kiriyā dhātumayena yantena pavattiyamānā hutvā upaṭṭhāti, tehi ajjhohariyamānaṃ pānabhojanādi dhātusaṅghāte pakkhippamāno dhātusaṅghāto viya upaṭṭhāti. athassa tathā laddhāsevanampi cittaṃ yadi accāraddhavīriyatāya uddhaccavasena vā atilīnavīriyatāya kosajjavasena vā bhāvanāvidhiṃ na otareyya, tadā ^b^adhicittasuttaṃ^eb^ (a0 ni0 3.103), ^b^anuttarasītibhāvasuttaṃ^eb^ (a0 ni0 6.85), ^b^bojjhaṅgasutta^eb^nti (saṃ0 ni0 5.194-195) imesu tīsu suttesu āgatanayena vīriyasamādhiyojanā kātabbā. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``tayo ca suttantā''^eb^ti. evaṃ pana vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā tasmiṃyeva lakkhaṇe manasikāraṃ pavattentassa yadā saddhādīni indriyāni laddhasamatāni suvisadāni pavattanti, tadā asaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena sātisayaṃ thāmappattehi sattahi balehi laddhūpatthambhāni vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni hutvā pātubhavanti, tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāniyeva honti saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi. ettāvatā cānena upacārajjhānaṃ samadhigataṃ hoti dhātulakkhaṇārammaṇaṃ ^a^V1.0408^ea^. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``punappunaṃ pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti...pe0... upacāramatto samādhi uppajjatī''^eb^ti.

[03] tattha ^b^dhātumattato^eb^ti visesanivattiattho ^b^matta^eb^-saddo. tena yaṃ ito bāhirakā, lokiyamahājano ca ``satto jīvo''tiādikaṃ visesaṃ imasmiṃ attabhāve avijjamānaṃ vikappanāmatteneva samāropenti, taṃ nivatteti. tenevāha ^b^``nissattato nijjīvato''^eb^ti. ^b^āvajjitabba^eb^nti samannāharitabbaṃ. ^b^manasi kātabba^eb^nti punappunaṃ bhāvanāvasena dhātumattato dhātulakkhaṇaṃ manasi ṭhapetabbaṃ. ^b^paccavekkhitabba^eb^nti tadeva dhātulakkhaṇaṃ pati pati avekkhitabbaṃ, bhāvanāsiddhena ñāṇacakkhunā aparāparaṃ paccakkhato passitabbaṃ.

[01] ^b^tassevaṃ vāyamamānassā^eb^ti tassa yogino evaṃ vuttappakārena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa, tattha ca bhāvanāanuyoge sakkaccakāritāya, sātaccakāritāya, sappāyasevitāya, samathanimittasallakkhaṇena, bojjhaṅgānaṃ anupavattanena, kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhavuttitāya, antarā saṅkocaṃ anāpajjantena bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ussoḷhiyaṃ avaṭṭhānena ^a^M1.0436^ea^ sammadeva vāyāmaṃ payogaṃ parakkamaṃ pavattentassa. ^b^dhātuppabhedāvabhāsanapaññāpariggahito^eb^ti pathavīādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ sabhāvalakkhaṇāvabhāsanena avabhāsanakiccāya bhāvanāpaññāya ādimajjhapariyosānesu avijahanena sabbato gahito mahaggatabhāvaṃ appattatāya upacāramatto sikhāppatto kāmāvacarasamādhi uppajjati. ^b^upacārasamādhī^eb^ti ca ruḷhīvasena veditabbaṃ. appanaṃ hi upecca cārī samādhi upacārasamādhi, appanā cettha natthi. tādisassa pana samādhissa samānalakkhaṇatāya evaṃ vuttaṃ. kasmā panettha appanā na hotīti? tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^``sabhāvadhammārammaṇattā''^eb^ti. sabhāvadhamme hi tassa gambhīrabhāvato asati bhāvanāvisese appanājhānaṃ na uppajjati, lokuttaraṃ pana jhānaṃ visuddhibhāvanānukkamavasena, āruppaṃ ārammaṇātikkamabhāvanāvasena appanāppattaṃ hotīti ^b^maraṇānussatiniddese^eb^ (visuddhi0 1.177) vuttovāyamattho.

[03] evaṃ rūpakāye avisesena catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ pariggaṇhanavasena dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni tattha aṭṭhiādīnaṃ vinibbhujanavasena saṅkhepato ^b^sutte^eb^ āgataṃ dhātumanasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``atha vā panā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ye ime cattāro koṭṭhāsā vuttāti sambandho. yathāpaccayaṃ ṭhitā sannivesavisiṭṭhā kaṭṭhavallitiṇamattikāyo upādāya yathā agārasamaññā, na tattha ^a^V1.0409^ea^ koci agāro nāma atthi, evaṃ yathāpaccayaṃ sannivesavisiṭṭhāni pavattamānāni aṭṭhinhārumaṃsacammāni paṭicca sarīrasamaññā, na ettha koci attā jīvo. kevalaṃ tehi parivāritamākāsamattanti dasseti. desanā sattasuññatāsandassanaparāti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento ^b^``nissattabhāvadassanattha''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^aṭṭhiñca paṭiccā^eb^ti paṇhikaṭṭhikādibhedaṃ paṭipāṭiyā ussitaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ atirekatisatabhedaṃ aṭṭhiṃ upādāya. ^b^nhāruñcā^eb^ti tameva aṭṭhisaṅghāṭaṃ ābandhitvā ṭhitaṃ navasatappabhedaṃ nhāruṃ. ^b^maṃsa^eb^nti tameva aṭṭhisaṅghāṭaṃ anulimpitvā ṭhitaṃ navapesisatappabhedaṃ maṃsaṃ. ^b^camma^eb^nti macchikapattakacchāyāya chaviyā sañchāditaṃ sakalasarīraṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ bahalacammaṃ ^b^paṭicca^eb^ upādāya. sabbattha ^b^ca^eb^-saddo samuccayattho. ^b^ākāso parivārito^eb^ti yathā bhittipādādivasena ṭhapitaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ, tasseva ābandhanavalli, anulepanamattikā, chādanatiṇanti etāni kaṭṭhādīni anto, bahi ca parivāretvā ṭhito ākāso ^a^M1.0437^ea^ ^b^agārantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati,^eb^ gehanti paṇṇattiṃ labhati, evameva yathāvuttāni aṭṭhiādīni anto, bahi ca parivāretvā ṭhito ākāso tāneva aṭṭhiādīni upādāya ^b^rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati,^eb^ sarīranti vohāraṃ labhati. yathā ca kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca saṅkhaṃ gataṃ agāraṃ loke ``khattiyagehaṃ, brāhmaṇageha''nti vuccati, evamidampi ``khattiyasarīraṃ brāhmaṇasarīra''nti voharīyati, natthettha koci satto vā jīvo vāti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^te^eb^ti te cattāro koṭṭhāse vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvāti yojanā. ^b^taṃtaṃantarānusārinā^eb^ti aṭṭhinhārūnaṃ nhārumaṃsānaṃ maṃsacammānanti tesaṃ tesaṃ koṭṭhāsānaṃ vivarānupātinā ñāṇasaṅkhātena ^b^hatthena. vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā^eb^ti anekakkhattuṃ viniveṭhetvā. atha vā ^b^vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā^eb^ti paccekaṃ aṭṭhiādīnaṃ antarānusārinā ñāṇahatthena vinibbhogaṃ katvā. ^b^etesū^eb^ti sakalampi attano rūpakāyaṃ catudhā katvā vibhattesu yathāvuttesu aṭṭhiādīsu catūsu koṭṭhāsesu. ^b^purimanayenevā^eb^ti ``yo imasmiṃ kāye thaddhabhāvo vā''tiādinā pubbe vuttanayeneva. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ, taṃ anantaranaye vuttākāreneva vattabbaṃ.

[03] 309^b^.^eb^ vitthārato āgate pana ``catudhātuvavatthāne''ti ānetvā yojanā. ^b^evaṃ^eb^ idāni vuccamānākārena ^b^veditabbo^eb^ bhāvanānayo. ^b^``dvācattālīsāya ākārehi dhātuyo uggaṇhitvā''^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu ādito dvattiṃsākārā dhātuyo na hontīti? vatthusīsena dhātūnaṃyeva uggahetabbattā ^a^V1.0410^ea^ nāyaṃ doso. ^b^vuttappakāre^eb^ti ``gocaragāmato nātidūranāccāsannatādīhi pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgate''tiādinā (visuddhi0 1.53) vuttappakāre. ^b^katasabbakiccenā^eb^ti palibodhupacchedādikaṃ kataṃ sabbakiccaṃ etenāti katasabbakicco, tenassa sīlavisodhanādi pana kammaṭṭhānuggahaṇato pageva siddhaṃ hotīti dasseti. ^b^sasambhārasaṅkhepato^eb^ti sambharīyanti etena buddhivohārāti sambhāro, tannimittaṃ. kiṃ panetaṃ? pathavīādi. kesādīsu hi vīsatiyā ākāresu ``pathavī''ti buddhivohārā pathavīnimittakā thaddhataṃ upādāya pavattanato. tasmā ^a^M1.0438^ea^ tattha pathavīsambhāro nāma savisesāya tassā atthitāya kesādayo saha sambhārehīti sasambhārā. āpokoṭṭhāsādīsupi eseva nayo. sasambhārānaṃ saṅkhepo sasambhārasaṅkhepo, tato sasambhārasaṅkhepato bhāvetabbanti yojanā. saṅkhepato vīsatiyā, dvādasasu, catūsu, chasu ca koṭṭhāsesu yathākkamaṃ pathavīādikā catasso dhātuyo pariggahetvā dhātuvavatthānaṃ sasambhārasaṅkhepato bhāvanā. tenāha ^b^``idha bhikkhu vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesū''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ^b^sasambhāravibhattito^eb^ti sasambhārānaṃ kesādīnaṃ vibhāgato kesādike vīsati koṭṭhāse pubbe viya ekajjhaṃ aggahetvā vibhāgato pathavīdhātubhāvena vavatthāpanaṃ. āpokoṭṭhāsādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato^eb^ti lakkhīyati etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ, dhammānaṃ sabhāvo, idha pana thaddhatādi. tasmā thaddhalakkhaṇādivantatāya saha lakkhaṇehīti salakkhaṇā, kesādayo dvācattālīsa ākārā. tesaṃ saṅkhepato. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- kesādike vīsati koṭṭhāse ekajjhaṃ gahetvā tattha thaddhatādikaṃ catubbidhampi lakkhaṇaṃ vavatthapetvā bhāvanā salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato bhāvanā. esa nayo āpokoṭṭhāsādīsupi. ^b^salakkhaṇavibhattito^eb^ti thaddhalakkhaṇādinā salakkhaṇānaṃ kesādīnaṃ vibhāgato kesādīsu dvācattālīsāya ākāresu paccekaṃ thaddhatādīnaṃ catunnaṃ catunnaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ vavatthāpanavasena bhāvanā.

[01] evaṃ catūhi ākārehi uddiṭṭhaṃ bhāvanānayaṃ niddisituṃ ^b^``kathaṃ sasambhārasaṅkhepato bhāvetī''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ettha ca yathā tikkhapañño puggalo tikkhatāya paropariyattasabbhāvato tikkhindriyamudindriyatāvasena duvidhoti. tattha tikkhindriyassa vasena saṅkhepato paṭhamanayo vutto, mudindriyassa vasena dutiyo. evaṃ nātitikkhapaññopi puggaloti. tattha yo visadindriyo puggalo, tassa vasena sasambhārasaṅkhepato, salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato ca bhāvanānayo niddiṭṭho. yo pana nātivisadindriyo, tassa vasena sasambhāravibhattito, salakkhaṇavibhattito ca bhāvanānayo niddiṭṭhoti ^a^V1.0411^ea^ veditabbo. tassa evaṃ vavatthāpayato eva dhātuyo pākaṭā honti savisesaṃ dhātūnaṃ pariggahitattā. bhāvanāvidhānaṃ panettha heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] 310^b^.^eb^ ^b^yassā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0439^ea^ nātivisadindriyaṃ puggalaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^evaṃ bhāvayato^eb^ti sasambhārasaṅkhepato bhāventassa. yena vidhinā uggahetvā kusalo hoti, so sattavidho vidhi ^b^``uggahakosalla''^eb^nti vuccati, tannibbattaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ. evaṃ ^b^manasikārakosalla^eb^mpi veditabbaṃ. ^b^dvattiṃsākāre^eb^ti dhātumanasikāravasena pariggahite kesādike dvattiṃsavidhe koṭṭhāse. ^b^``dvattiṃsākāre''^eb^ti ca idaṃ tejavāyukoṭṭhāsesu vaṇṇādivasena vavatthānassa abhāvato vuttaṃ. ^b^sabbaṃ tattha vuttavidhānaṃ kātabba^eb^nti ``vacasā manasā''tiādinā vuttauggahakosalluddesato paṭṭhāya yāva ``anupubbamuñcanādivasenā''ti padaṃ, tāva āgataṃ sabbaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ kātabbaṃ sampādetabbaṃ. ^b^vaṇṇādivasenā^eb^ti vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena. ayañca vaṇṇādivasena manasikāro dhātupaṭikkūlavaṇṇamanasikārānaṃ sādhāraṇo pubbabhāgoti nibbattitadhātumanasikārameva dassetuṃ ^b^``avasāne evaṃ manasikāro pavattetabbo''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] 311^b^.^eb^ ^b^aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā^eb^ti ete ``sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacammaṃ kesā''ti evaṃ vohariyamānā bhūtupādāyadhammā ``mayi kesā jātā, mayamettha jātā''ti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇasuññā. iminā kāraṇassa ca phalassa ca abyāpāratāya dhātumattataṃ sandasseti, tena ca ābhogapaccavekkhaṇānampi evameva abyāpāratā dīpitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. na hi tāni, tesaṃ kāraṇāni ca tathā tathā ābhujitvā, paccavekkhitvā ca uppajjanti, paccayabhāvaṃ vā gacchantīti. ^b^itī^eb^ti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. ^b^acetano^eb^ti na cetano, cetanārahito vā. ^b^abyākato^eb^ti abyākatarāsipariyāpanno. ^b^suñño^eb^ti attasuñño. tato eva ^b^nissatto^eb^. thaddhalakkhaṇādhikatāya ^b^thaddho^eb^. tato eva ^b^pathavīdhātū^eb^ti evaṃ manasikāro pavattetabboti sambandho. evaṃ sabbattha.
[03] 312^b^.^eb^ ^b^suññagāmaṭṭhāne^eb^ti ettha ^b^suññagāma^eb^ggahaṇaṃ paramatthato vedakavirahadassanatthaṃ kāyassa.
[03] 313^b^.^eb^ ^b^madhukaṭṭhike^eb^ti madhukabījāni.
[03] 314^b^.^eb^ gehathambhānaṃ ^a^M1.0440^ea^ ^a^V1.0412^ea^ ādhārabhāvena ṭhapitasilāyo ^b^pāsāṇaudukkhalakānī^eb^ti adhippetāni.
[03] 315^b^.^eb^ duggandhādibhāve cassa sadisabhāvadassanatthaṃ ^b^allagocamma^eb^ggahaṇaṃ.
[03] 316^b^.^eb^ yebhuyyena maṃsapesīnaṃ bahalatāya ^b^mahāmattika^eb^ggahaṇaṃ.
[03] 317^b^.^eb^ ^b^kuṭṭadārūsū^eb^ti dārukuṭṭikāya kuṭiyā bhittipādabhūtesu kaṭṭhesu.

[03] 318^b^.^eb^ paṇhikaṭṭhiādīnaṃ ādhārabhāvo viya gopphakaṭṭhiādīnaṃ ādheyyabhāvopi asamannāhārasiddhoti dassanatthaṃ ^b^``paṇhikaṭṭhigopphakaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita''^eb^ntiādiṃ vatvā puna ^b^``sīsaṭṭhigīvaṭṭhike patiṭṭhita''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.
[03] 319^b^.^eb^ ^b^sinnavettaggādīsū^eb^ti seditavettakaḷīrādīsu.
[03] 321^b^.^eb^ uraṭṭhisaṅghāṭo pañjarasadisatāya ^b^``uraṭṭhipañjara''^eb^nti vutto. tassa athirabhāvadassanatthaṃ ^b^jiṇṇasandamānikapañjaraṃ^eb^ nidassanabhāvena gahitaṃ.
[03] 322^b^.^eb^ ^b^yamakamaṃsapiṇḍe^eb^ti maṃsapiṇḍayugaḷe.

[03] 323^b^.^eb^ kilomakassa setavaṇṇatāya ^b^``pilotikapaliveṭhite''^eb^ti pilotikaṃ nidassanabhāvena vuttaṃ. ^b^evameva na vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ jānātī^eb^ti ettha na vakkahadayāni jānanti ``mayaṃ paṭicchannakilomakena paṭicchannānī''ti, na sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ jānāti ``ahaṃ paṭicchannakilomakena paṭicchanna''nti yojetabbaṃ.
[03] 324^b^.^eb^ ^b^koṭṭhamatthakapassa^eb^nti kusūlassa abbhantare matthakapassaṃ.
[03] 325^b^.^eb^ ^b^dvinnaṃ thanānamantare^eb^ti dvinnaṃ thanappadesānaṃ vemajjhe, thanappadeso ca abbhantaravasena veditabbo.
[03] 327^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekavīsatiantabhoge^eb^ti ^a^V1.0413^ea^ ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu obhaggobhagge antamaṇḍale.
[03] 328^b^.^eb^ āmāsaye ^a^M1.0441^ea^ ṭhito paribhuttāhāro udariyanti adhippetanti āha ^b^``udariyaṃ udare ṭhitaṃ asitapītakhāyitasāyita''^eb^nti.

[03] 331^b^.^eb^ abaddhapittaṃ saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ viya, kāyusmā viya ca kammajarūpapaṭibaddhavuttikanti āha ^b^``ābaddhapittaṃ jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhita''^eb^nti. paṭibaddhatāvacanena cassa jīvitindriye sati sabbhāvameva dīpeti, na jīvitindriyassa viya ekantakammajatanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^pittakosake^eb^ti mahākosāṭakīkosasadise pittādhāre. ^b^yūsabhūto^eb^ti rasabhūto.
[03] 332^b^.^eb^ ucchiṭṭhodakagabbhamalādīnaṃ chaḍḍanaṭṭhānaṃ candanikā, tassaṃ ^b^candanikāyaṃ^eb^.
[03] 333^b^.^eb^ pubbāsayo mandapaññānaṃ kesañcideva hotīti katvā asabbasādhāraṇanti adhippāyenāha ^b^``pubbo anibaddhokāso''^eb^ti.

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ ^b^pittaṃ viyā^eb^ti abaddhapittaṃ viya. ^b^sakalasarīra^eb^nti jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ sabbaṃ sarīrappadesaṃ. ^b^vakkahadayayakanapapphāsāni tementa^eb^nti ettha yakanaṃ heṭṭhābhāgapūraṇena, itarāni tesaṃ upari thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharaṇena ca temetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni temayamāne^eb^ti temakatemitabbānaṃ abyāpāratāsāmaññanidassanatthaṃ eva upamā daṭṭhabbā, na ṭhānasāmaññanidassanatthaṃ. sannicitalohitena hi temetabbānaṃ kesañci heṭṭhā, kassaci upari ṭhitatā ^b^kāyagatāsatiniddese^eb^ (visuddhi0 1.206) dassitāti. yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṭṭhānaṃ ``mayi lohitaṃ ṭhita''nti na jānāti, vakkādīni ``amhe temayamānaṃ lohitaṃ ṭhita''nti na jānantīti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ ^b^patthinnasineho^eb^ti thinabhāvaṃ ghanabhāvaṃ gatasineho. sakalasarīre maṃsanti yojanā, tañca thūlasarīraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. medassa satipi patthinnatāya ghanabhāve maṃsassa viya na baddhatāti vuttaṃ ^b^``patthinnayūso''^eb^ti. tenevassa āpokoṭṭhāsatā.
[03] 337^b^.^eb^ ^b^udakapuṇṇesu^eb^ ^a^M1.0442^ea^ ^a^V1.0414^ea^ ^b^taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesū^eb^ti nātipariṇatānaṃ sajalakānaṃ aggato chinnānaṃ tālasalāṭukānaṃ vivarāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
[03] 338^b^.^eb^ vasāya attano ādhāre abhibyāpanamukhena abyāpāratāsāmaññaṃ vibhāvetabbanti ācāmagatatelaṃ nidassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03] 339^b^.^eb^ ^b^kheḷuppattipaccaye^eb^ ambilaggamadhuraggādike.

[03] 343^b^.^eb^ kesādīsu manasikāraṃ pavattetvā tejokoṭṭhāsesu pavattetabbo manasikāroti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ. ^b^yena santappatī^eb^ti yena kāyo santappati, ayaṃ santappanakicco. ^b^tejo^eb^ti tassa pariggaṇhanākāro eva paccāmaṭṭho. ^b^yena jīrīyatī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo.

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ ^b^assāsapassāsavasenā^eb^ti antopavisanabahinikkhamananāsikāvātabhāvena. ^b^``evaṃ pavattamanasikārassā''^eb^ti iminā vuttākārena sasambhāravibhattito pavattakammaṭṭhānamanasikārassa. ^b^dhātuyo pākaṭā hontī^eb^ti vitthārato pariggahitattā dhātuyo vibhūtā honti. idhāpi bhāvanāvidhānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
[03] 345^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthevā^eb^ti tesuyeva vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu. ^b^paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ vitthambhanalakkhaṇa^eb^nti etthāpi ``tatthevā''ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03] puna ^b^tatthevā^eb^ti tesuyeva dvādasasu koṭṭhāsesūti attho. ettha ca kesādikoṭṭhāsānaṃ saṃviggahatāya tattha vijjamānā āpodhātuādayo nhāniyacuṇṇādīsu udakādayo viya suviññeyyāti ^b^``tattheva ābandhanalakkhaṇa''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.
