[03] santappanāditejokoṭṭhāsesu pana vāyodhātuādayo na tathā suviññeyyāti katvā ^b^``tena avinibhutta''^eb^nti vuttaṃ, na tatthevāti. yadi evaṃ, vāyukoṭṭhāsesu kathaṃ tatthevāti? vāyukoṭṭhāsāpi hi uddhaṅgamavātādayo piṇḍākāreneva pariggahetabbataṃ upagacchanti, na pana santappanāditejokoṭṭhāsāti ^a^V1.0415^ea^ nāyaṃ doso. tattha ^b^tenā^eb^ti tena tejena. ^b^avinibhutta^eb^nti avinābhūtaṃ, taṃtaṃkalāpagatavasena vā evaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^evaṃ vavatthāpayato^eb^ti vuttākārena salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato dhātuyo vavatthāpentassa ^a^M1.0443^ea^. ^b^vuttanayenā^eb^ti ``tassevaṃ vāyamamānassā''tiādinā (visuddhi0 1.308) heṭṭhā vuttanayena.

[03] 346^b^.^eb^ ^b^evampi bhāvayato^eb^ti salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato dhātuyo pariggahetvā bhāventassāpi. ^b^pubbe vuttanayenā^eb^ti sasambhāravibhattito ^b^bhāvanāyaṃ^eb^ vuttena nayena. ^b^eva^eb^nti yathā kese, evaṃ. ^b^sabbakoṭṭhāsesū^eb^ti ekacattālīsabhedesu sesasabbakoṭṭhāsesu evamettha aṭṭhasaṭṭhidhātusatassa pariggaho vutto hoti. bhāvanāvidhānaṃ panettha heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[01] idāni vacanatthādimukhenapi dhātūsu manasikāravidhānaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``vacanatthato''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^vacanatthato^eb^ti yasmā sabbapaṭhamaṃ kammaṭṭhānassa uggahaṇaṃ vacanavasena hoti vacanadvārena tadatthassa ādito gahetabbato, tasmā vacanatthatopi dhātūnaṃ manasikātabbatā vuttā. ^b^kalāpato^eb^ti vacanatthavasena visesato, sāmaññato ca dhātuyo pariggahetvā ṭhitassa yasmā tā piṇḍaso pavattanti, na paccekaṃ, tasmā kalāpatopi manasikātabbatā vuttā. te pana kalāpā paramāṇuparimāṇā hontīti tappariyāpannānaṃ pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ ekasmiṃ sarīre parimeyyaparicchedaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^cuṇṇato^eb^ manasikātabbatā vuttā. so panāyaṃ tāsaṃ cuṇṇato manasikāro saṅghāṭavasena hotīti nibbaṭṭitasarūpameva pariggahetabbaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^lakkhaṇādito^eb^ manasikāro vutto. lakkhaṇādito dhātuyo pariggaṇhantena salakkhaṇavibhattito kammaṭṭhānābhinivese yasmā dvācattālīsāya koṭṭhāsānaṃ vasena dhātūsu pariggayhamānāsu ``ettakā utusamuṭṭhānā, ettakā cittādisamuṭṭhānā''ti ayaṃ vibhāgo ñātabbo hoti, tasmā ^b^samuṭṭhānato^eb^ manasikāro vutto.

[03] evaṃ pariññātasamuṭṭhānānampi tāsaṃ saddānusārena vinā visesasāmaññapariggaho kātabboti dassetuṃ ^b^nānattekattato^eb^ manasikāro vutto. lakkhaṇavisesato vinibhuttarūpāpi etā aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatāya padesena avinibhuttāti ayaṃ viseso pariggahetabboti dassetuṃ ^a^M1.0444^ea^ ^b^vinibbhogāvinibbhogato^eb^ manasikāro vutto. satipi avinibbhogavuttiyaṃ kācideva kāsañci sabhāgā, kāci visabhāgāti ayampi viseso pariggahetabboti dassetuṃ ^b^sabhāgavisabhāgato^eb^ manasikāro vutto. sabhāgavisabhāgāpi dhātuyo ajjhattikā īdisakiccavisesayuttā, bāhirā tabbiparītāti ^a^V1.0416^ea^ ayaṃ viseso pariggahetabboti dassetuṃ ^b^ajjhattikabāhiravisesato^eb^ manasikāro vutto. sajātisaṅgahādiko dhātusaṅgahavisesopi pariggahitabboti dassetuṃ ^b^saṅgahato^eb^ manasikāro vutto. sandhāraṇādīhi yathāsakakiccehi aññamaññūpatthambhabhāvatopi dhātuyo pariggahetabbāti dassetuṃ ^b^paccayato^eb^ manasikāro vutto. abyāpāranayato dhātuyo pariggahetabbāti dassetuṃ ^b^asamannāhārato^eb^ manasikāro vutto. attano paccayadhammavisesato, paccayabhāvavisesato ca dhātuyo pariggahetabbāti dassetuṃ ^b^paccayavibhāgato^eb^ manasikāro vuttoti evametesaṃ terasannaṃ ākārānaṃ pariggahe kāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^ākārehī^eb^ti pakārehi, kāraṇehi vā.

[03] 347^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^patthaṭattā^eb^ti puthuttā, tena puthubhāvato puthuvī, puthuvī eva pathavīti niruttinayena saddatthamāha. patthanaṭṭhena vā pathavī, patiṭṭhābhāvena patthāyati upatiṭṭhatīti attho. ^b^``appotī''^eb^ti padassa attho heṭṭhā vutto eva. ^b^āpīyatī^eb^ti sosīyati, pivīyatīti keci. ``ayaṃ panattho sasambhārāpe yujjatī''ti vadanti, lakkhaṇāpepi yujjateva. sopi hi pharusapācanavisosanākārena sesabhūtattayena pīyamāno viya pavattatīti. ^b^appāyatī^eb^ti brūheti. paribrūhanarasā hi āpodhātu. ^b^tejatī^eb^ti niseti, tikkhabhāvena sesabhūtattayaṃ usmāpayatīti attho. ^b^vāyatī^eb^ti samīreti, desantaruppattihetubhāvena bhūtasaṅghātaṃ gametīti attho.

[03] evaṃ tāva visesato vacanatthaṃ vatvā idāni sāmaññato vattuṃ ^b^``avisesena panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^salakkhaṇadhāraṇato^eb^ti yathā titthiyaparikappito ``pakati attā''ti evamādiko sabhāvato natthi, na evametā. etā pana salakkhaṇaṃ sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo. ^b^dukkhādānato^eb^ti ^a^M1.0445^ea^ dukkhassa vidahanato. etā hi dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitā hutvā ayalohādidhātuyo viya ayalohādiṃ anekappakāraṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ vidahanti. ^b^dukkhādhānato^eb^ti anappakassa dukkhassa vidhānamattato avasavattanato, taṃ vā dukkhaṃ etāhi kāraṇabhūtāhi sattehi anuvidhīyati, tathāvihitañca taṃ etāsveva dhīyati ṭhapīyatīti evaṃ dukkhādhānato, dhātuyo. apica ``nijjīvaṭṭho dhātuṭṭho''ti vuttovāyamattho. tathā hi bhagavā ``chadhāturoyaṃ bhikkhu puriso''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 3.343-345) jīvasaññāsamūhananatthaṃ dhātudesanaṃ akāsīti. iti vacanatthamukhenapi asādhāraṇato, sādhāraṇato ca dhātūnaṃ sarasalakkhaṇameva vibhāvīyatīti āha ^b^``evaṃ visesasāmaññavasena vacanatthato manasi kātabbā''^eb^ti. manasikāro pana vacanatthamukhena dhātuyo pariggahetvā ṭhitassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] 348^b^.^eb^ ^b^ākārehī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0417^ea^ pakārehi. atha vā ākarīyanti dissanti ettha dhātuyoti ākārā, koṭṭhāsā. ^b^aṭṭhadhammasamodhānā^eb^ti yathāvuttānaṃ paccayavisesena visiṭṭharūpānaṃ vaṇṇādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ dhammānaṃ samavadhānato sannivesavisesavasena sahāvaṭṭhānato taṃ upādāya. ^b^kesāti sammuti^eb^ samaññāmattaṃ hoti. ^b^tesaṃyeva vinibbhogā^eb^ti tesaṃyeva vaṇṇādīnaṃ vinibbhujanato. yathā hi vaṇṇādayo aṭṭha dhammā paññāya vinibbhujjamānā aññamaññabyatirekena paramatthato upalabbhanti, na evaṃ vaṇṇādibyatirekena paramatthato kesā upalabbhanti. tasmā ye ca dhamme samudite upādāya ``kesā''ti sammuti, tesu visuṃ visuṃ katesu natthi ``kesā''ti sammuti, vohāramattanti attho.

[01] ^b^``aṭṭhadhammakalāpamattamevā''^eb^ti idaṃ kesapaññattiyā upādāyabhūte vaṇṇādike ekattena gahetvā vuttaṃ, na tesaṃ aṭṭhadhammamattabhāvato. ^b^kammasamuṭṭhāno koṭṭhāso^eb^ti kesesu tāva kesamūlaṃ, evaṃ lomādīsupi yathārahaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^dasadhammakalāpopī^eb^ti ettha asitādiparipācako tejokoṭṭhāso navadhammakalāpopīti vattabbo. yadime kesādikoṭṭhāsā yathārahaṃ aṭṭhanavadasadhammasamūhabhūtā ^a^M1.0446^ea^, atha kasmā pathavīādidhātumattato manasi karīyantīti āha ^b^``ussadavasena panā''^eb^tiādi. yasmā ayaṃ dhātumanasikāro yāvadeva sattasaññāsamugghāṭanattho, dhammavinibbhogo ca sātisayaṃ sattasaññāsamugghāṭāya saṃvattati, tasmā koṭṭhāsesu evaṃ dhammavibhāgo veditabbo. ettha hi udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pubbo muttañca utusamuṭṭhānā, asitādiparipācakatejo kammasamuṭṭhāno, assāsapassāsavāto cittasamuṭṭhānoti cha ekasamuṭṭhānā, sedoassu kheḷo siṅghāṇikāti cattāro utucittavasena dvisamuṭṭhānā, sesā dvattiṃsa catusamuṭṭhānā.

[03] tesu asitādiparipācake tejokoṭṭhāse eko kalāpo jīvitanavako, aññesu ekasamuṭṭhānesu utusamuṭṭhāno, cittasamuṭṭhāno vā ekeko aṭṭhako, dvisamuṭṭhānesu utucittavasena dve dve aṭṭhakā, catusamuṭṭhānesu utucittāhārasamuṭṭhānā tayo tayo aṭṭhakā, utucittasamuṭṭhānesu saddanavakā, aṭṭhasu tejovāyokoṭṭhāsesu aṭṭha jīvitanavakā, sesesu catuvīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu kāyabhāvadasakadvayasahitā, cakkhādisaññitesu maṃsakoṭṭhāsesu cakkhusotaghānajivhāvatthudasakasahitā cāti paripuṇṇāyatanake rūpakāye bhedaṃ anāmasitvā ekattavasena gayhamānā sattacattālīsādhikasatarūpakalāpā rūpavibhāgato sādhikaṃ diyaḍḍharūpasahassaṃ hoti, koṭṭhāsānaṃ pana avayavavibhāgena tadavayavakalāpānaṃ bhede gayhamāne rūpadhammānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyabhedatā veditabbā ^a^V1.0418^ea^. evaṃ dhammavibhāgato anekabhedabhinnāpi ime dvācattālīsa koṭṭhāsā ussadaggahaṇena catudhātuvaseneva vavatthapetabbā. tenāha ^b^``ussadavasena pana...pe0... manasi kātabbā''^eb^ti. tattha manasikāravidhi vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] 349^b^.^eb^ ^b^majjhimena pamāṇenā^eb^ti ārohapariṇāhehi majjhimasarīre labbhamānena majjhimena parimāṇena. ^b^pariggayhamānā^eb^ti paññāya paritakketvā gayhamānā. ^b^paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇā^eb^ti ettha yathā ``aṅgulassa aṭṭhamo bhāgo yavo, yavassa aṭṭhamo bhāgo ūkā, ūkāya ^a^M1.0447^ea^ aṭṭhamo bhāgo likkhā, likkhāya aṭṭhamo bhāgo rathareṇu, rathareṇussa aṭṭhamo bhāgo tajjārī, tajjāriyā aṭṭhamo bhāgo aṇu, evaṃ aṇuno aṭṭhamo bhāgo paramāṇu nāmā''ti keci. ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (vibha0 aṭṭha0 515) pana ``sattadhaññamāsappamāṇaṃ ekaṃ aṅgulaṃ, sattaūkāpamāṇo eko dhaññamāso, sattalikkhāpamāṇā ekā ūkā, chattiṃsarathareṇuppamāṇā ekā likkhā, chattiṃsatajjārippamāṇo eko rathareṇu, chattiṃsāṇuppamāṇā ekā tajjārī, chattiṃsaparamāṇuppamāṇo eko aṇū''ti vuttaṃ. tasmā aṇuno chattiṃsatimabhāgamatto paramāṇu nāma ākāsakoṭṭhāsiko maṃsacakkhussa agocaro dibbacakkhusseva gocarabhūto. taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇā''^eb^ti, yathāvuttaparamāṇuppabhedena cuṇṇavicuṇṇabhūtā. ^b^sukhumarajabhūtā^eb^ti tatoyeva ativiya sukhumarajabhāvaṃ gatā.

[01] ^b^doṇamattā siyā^eb^ti soḷasa nāḷimattā. idhāpi ``majjhimena pamāṇenā''ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. tena ``pakatiyā catumuṭṭhikaṃ kuḍuvaṃ, catukuḍuvaṃ nāḷi, tāya nāḷiyā soḷasa nāḷiyo doṇaṃ, taṃ pana magadhanāḷiyā dvādasa nāḷiyo hontī''ti vadanti. ^b^saṅgahitā^eb^ti yathā na vippakirati, evaṃ ābandhanavasena sampiṇḍitvā gahitā. ^b^anupālitā^eb^ti yathā paggharaṇasabhāvāya āpodhātuyā vasena kilinnabhāvaṃ, picchilabhāvaṃ vā nāpajjati, evaṃ anurakkhitā. ^b^vitthambhitā^eb^ti saṅghātavāyunā ativiya vitthambhanaṃ pāpitā. ^b^na vikirati na viddhaṃsatī^eb^ti sukhumarajabhūtāpi pathavīdhātu ābandhanaparipācanasamudīraṇakiccāhi āpotejovāyodhātūhi laddhapaccayā sinehena temitā tejasā paripakkā vāyunā vitthambhanaṃ pāpitā piṭṭhacuṇṇā viya na ito cito ca vikirati na viddhaṃsati, atha kho piṇḍitā ghanabhūtā hutvā nānappakārena gahetabbataṃ āpajjati. tenāha ^b^``avikiriyamānā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^vikappa^eb^nti vibhāgaṃ. yadipi tejovāyodhātuyopi saviggahā rūpadhammabhāvato, yādiso pana ghanabhāvo pathavīāpodhātūsu labbhati ^a^V1.0419^ea^, na tādiso tejovāyodhātūsu labbhatīti meyyabhāvābhāvato tattha cuṇṇabhedo na uddhaṭo. tathā hi sasambhāratejovāyūsupi meyyabhāvo na labbhateva.

[03] ^b^yūsagatā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0448^ea^ yūsabhāvaṃ dravabhāvaṃ gatā. tato eva ^b^ābandhanākārabhūtā. na paggharatī^eb^ti na ogaḷati. ^b^na parissavatī^eb^ti na vissandati. ^b^pīṇitapīṇitabhāvaṃ dassetī^eb^ti āpodhātuyā brūhanarasatāya vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^usumākārabhūtā^eb^ti etena kāye pākatikausmāpi gahaṇīsaṅkhātāya tassāyeva tejodhātuyā vasena hotīti dasseti. ^b^paripācetī^eb^ti santejeti. sā hi yathābhuttassa āhārassa sammā pariṇāmanena rasādisampattiyā hetubhāvaṃ gacchantī imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti santejetīti vuccati. tenevāha ^b^``na pūtibhāvaṃ dassetī''^eb^ti. kammūpanissayāya, cittappasādahetukāya ca sarīre vaṇṇasampadāya tejodhātu visesapaccayo, pageva utuāhārasamuṭṭhānāya rūpasampattiyā yathāvuttatejodhātūti āha ^b^``vaṇṇasampattiñcassa āvahatī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^samudīraṇavitthambhanalakkhaṇā^eb^ti ettha ^b^samudīraṇaṃ^eb^ anupellanaṃ, visosananti keci. ^b^vitthambhanaṃ^eb^ sesabhūtattayassa thambhitattāpādanaṃ, uppīlananti eke. ^b^tāyā^eb^ti vitthambhanalakkhaṇāya vāyodhātuyā. ^b^aparāyā^eb^ti samudīraṇalakkhaṇāya. sā hi pellanasabhāvā. tenāha ^b^``samabbhāhato''^eb^ti. samabbhāhanañca rūpakalāpassa desantaruppattiyā hetubhāvo. ^b^avaghaṭṭanaṃ^eb^ āsannataruppattiyā. ^b^lāḷetī^eb^ti parivatteti. idāni yadatthaṃ cuṇṇato manasikāro āgato, taṃ nigamanavasena dassetuṃ ^b^``evameta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^dhātuyanta^eb^nti suttena viya yantarūpakaṃ asatipi kattubhūte attani cittavasena dhātumayaṃ yantaṃ pavattati, idhāpi manasikāravidhi vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] 350^b^.^eb^ yadipi catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ lakkhaṇādayo heṭṭhā tattha tattha vuttā eva, tathāpi te anavasesato dassetvā visuṃ kammaṭṭhānapariggahavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``lakkhaṇādito''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha lakkhīyati etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ, kakkhaḷattaṃ lakkhaṇametissāti ^b^kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇā^eb^. nanu ca kakkhaḷattameva pathavīdhātūti? saccametaṃ, tathāpi viññātāviññātasaddatthatāvasena abhinnepi dhamme kappanāsiddhena bhedena evaṃ niddeso kato. evaṃ hi atthavisesāvabodho hotīti. atha vā ^a^V1.0420^ea^ lakkhīyatīti ^a^M1.0449^ea^ lakkhaṇaṃ, kakkhaḷattaṃ hutvā lakkhiyamānā dhātu kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. sesāsupi eseva nayo. ^b^patiṭṭhānarasā^eb^ti sahajātadhammānaṃ patiṭṭhābhāvakiccā. tato eva nesaṃ sampaṭicchanākārena ñāṇassa paccupatiṭṭhatīti ^b^sampaṭicchanapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^. padaṭṭhānaṃ panettha aññadhammatāya na uddhaṭaṃ, sādhāraṇabhāvasabbhāvato vā dūrakāraṇaṃ viya. yathā vā dhammuddesavāravaṇṇanādīsu rasādinā aññesaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ dassetvā paccayavantatādassanatthaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ uddhaṭaṃ, na evamidha. idha pana dhātūnaṃ anaññasādhāraṇavisesavibhāvanaparāya codanāya aññadhammabhūtaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ na uddhaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^brūhanarasā^eb^ti sahajātadhammānaṃ vaḍḍhanakiccā. tathā hi sā nesaṃ pīṇitabhāvaṃ dassetīti vuccati. ^b^saṅgahapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^ti bāhiraudakaṃ viya nhānīyacuṇṇassa sahajātadhammānaṃ saṅgahaṇapaccupaṭṭhānā. ^b^maddavānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^ti bāhiraggi viya jatulohādīnaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ mudubhāvānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānā. ^b^abhinīhāro^eb^ bhūtasaṅghāṭassa desantaruppattihetubhāvo, nīharaṇaṃ vā bījato aṅkurassa viya.

[03] 351^b^.^eb^ ^b^utusamuṭṭhānāva^eb^ kammādivasena anuppattito. ^b^utucittasamuṭṭhānā^eb^ kadāci ututo, kadāci cittato uppajjanato. ^b^avasesā^eb^ti vuttāvasesā kesādayo catuvīsati, ādito tayo tejokoṭṭhāsā, pañca vāyokoṭṭhāsā cāti dvattiṃsa. ^b^sabbepī^eb^ti te sabbepi kammādivasena uppajjanato ^b^catusamuṭṭhānā^eb^. kesādīnampi hi maṃsato avimuttabhāgo kammāhāracittasamuṭṭhānova hotīti.

[03] 352^b^.^eb^ ^b^nānattekattato^eb^ti visesasāmaññato. dhammānaṃ hi aññamaññaṃ visadisatā nānattaṃ, samānatā ekattaṃ. ^b^sabbāsampī^eb^ti catunnampi. ^b^salakkhaṇādito^eb^ti sakaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ salakkhaṇaṃ, tato salakkhaṇādito. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena rasapaccupaṭṭhānānaṃ viya mudusaṇhapharusabhāvādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^``kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena nānattabhūtāna''^eb^nti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ ekattaṃ hoti sādhāraṇattāti? na, ``aññā eva dhātuyo kammasamuṭṭhānā, aññā utuādisamuṭṭhānā''tiādikaṃ bhedaṃ sandhāya tathā vacanato. ^b^etāsaṃ^eb^ dhātūnaṃ. ^b^ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ ruppanasabhāvaṃ. kimpanetaṃ ruppanaṃ nāma? yā sītādivirodhipaccayasannipāte visadisuppatti, tasmiṃ vā sati yo vijjamānasseva visadisuppattiyā ^a^M1.0450^ea^ hetubhāvo, taṃ ruppanaṃ. ^b^anatītattā^eb^ti apariccajanato.

[03] ^b^mahantapātubhāvo^eb^ ^a^V1.0421^ea^ cettha sasambhāradhātuvasena veditabbo, tathā ^b^mahāvikāratā^eb^ mahābhūtasāmaññalakkhaṇadhātuvasena, ^b^mahāparihāratā, mahattavijjamānatā^eb^ ca ubhayavasenāti. bhūtasaddāpekkhāya ^b^``etānī''^eb^ti napuṃsakaniddeso. ^b^mahantāni pātubhūtāni^eb^ anekasatasahassa rūpakalāpasaṅghāṭatāya samūhavasena, santativasena ca aparimitaparimāṇānaṃ, anekayojanāyāmavitthārānañca uppajjanato. ^b^cattāri nahutānī^eb^ti cattāri dasasahassāni. ^b^devadānavādīnaṃ^eb^ tigāvutādisarīravasena mahantāni pātubhūtāni.

[01] tatthāyaṃ vacanattho -- mahantāni bhūtāni jātāni nibbattānīti ^b^mahābhūtānī^eb^ti. anekābhūtavisesadassanena, anekabbhutadassanena ca anekacchariyadassanavasena mahanto abbhuto, mahantāni vā abhūtāni etthāti ^b^mahābhūto,^eb^ māyākāro. yakkhādayo jātivaseneva mahantā bhūtāti ^b^mahābhūtā,^eb^ niruḷho vā ayaṃ tesu mahābhūtasaddo daṭṭhabbo. pathavīādayo pana vañcakatāya, aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatāya ca mahābhūtā viya ^b^mahābhūtā^eb^. bhūtasaddassa ubhayaliṅgatāya napuṃsakatā katā. tattha ^b^vañcakatā^eb^ sayaṃ anīlādisabhāvāni hutvā nīlādisabhāvassa upaṭṭhāpanaṃ, anitthipurisādisabhāvāneva ca hutvā itthipurisādiākārassa upaṭṭhāpanaṃ. tathā aññamaññassa anto, bahi ca aṭṭhitānaṃyeva aññamaññaṃ nissāya avaṭṭhānato ^b^aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatā^eb^. yadi hi imā dhātuyo aññamaññassa anto ṭhitā, na sakiccakarā siyuṃ aññamaññānuppavesanato, atha bahi ṭhitā vinibbhuttā siyuṃ. tathā sati avinibbhuttavādo hāyeyya, tasmā na niddisitabbaṭṭhānā. evaṃ santepi patiṭṭhānādinā yathāsakaṃ kiccavisesena sesānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ upakārikā honti, yena sahajātādinā paccayena paccayā honti. tenāha ^b^``na ca aññamaññaṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhantī''^eb^ti. ^b^manāpehī^eb^ti manoharehi cāturiyavantehi. ^b^vaṇṇasaṇṭhānavikkhepehī^eb^ti kāḷasāmatādivaṇṇehi, puthulavivarakisatādisaṇṭhānehi, hatthabhamukādivikkhepehi ca. ^b^sarasalakkhaṇa^eb^nti sabhāvabhūtaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ, sakiccakaṃ vā sabhāvaṃ.

[03] ^b^mahāparihārato^eb^ti ^a^M1.0451^ea^ ettha vacanatthaṃ vadanto āha ^b^``mahantehi...pe0... bhūtāni, mahāparihārāni vā bhūtānī''^eb^ti. tattha pacchimatthe purimapade uttarapadassa parihāra-saddassa lopaṃ katvā ^b^``mahābhūtānī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^tathā hī^eb^ti tato eva vikārassa mahantattā evāti taṃ vikāraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``bhūmito''^eb^tiādi ^a^V1.0422^ea^ vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^accimato^eb^ti aggissa. koṭisatasahassaṃ ekaṃ ^b^koṭisatasahassekaṃ cakkavāḷa^eb^nti taṃ sabbaṃ āṇākhettabhāvena ekaṃ katvā vadati. ^b^vilīyatī^eb^ti vipattikarameghābhivuṭṭhena khārudakena lavaṇaṃ viya vilayaṃ gacchati viddhaṃsati. ^b^kupitenā^eb^ti khubhitena. ^b^vikīratī^eb^ti vidhamati viddhaṃsati.

[03] anupādinnesu vikāramahattaṃ dassetvā upādinnesu dassento ^b^``patthaddho''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^kaṭṭhamukhena vā^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddo upamattho. yathā kaṭṭhamukhena sappena ḍaṭṭho patthaddho hoti, evaṃ pathavīdhātuppakopena so kāyo kaṭṭhamukheva hoti, kaṭṭhamukhamukhagato viya patthaddho hotīti attho. atha vā ^b^vā^eb^-saddo avadhāraṇattho. so ``pathavīdhātuppakopena vā''ti evaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbo. ayañhettha attho -- kaṭṭhamukhena ḍaṭṭhopi kāyo pathavīdhātuppakopeneva patthaddho hoti, tasmā pathavīdhātuyā aviyutto so kāyo sabbadā kaṭṭhamukhamukhagato viya hotīti. ^b^vā^eb^-saddo vā aniyamattho, tatrāyamattho -- kaṭṭhamukhena ḍaṭṭho kāyo patthaddho hoti vā, na vā hoti mantāgadavasena, pathavīdhātuppakopena pana mantāgadarahito so kāyo kaṭṭhamukhamukhagato viya hoti ekantapatthaddhoti.

[03] ^b^pūtiyo^eb^ti kuthito. ^b^santatto^eb^ti sabbaso tatto samuppannadāho. ^b^sañchinno^eb^ti samantato chinno paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇo āyasmato upasenattherassa sarīraṃ viya. ^b^mahāvikārāni bhūtānī^eb^ti mahāvikāravantāni bhūtāni mahābhūtānīti purimapade uttarapadalopena niddeso daṭṭhabbo. ^b^``pathavī''^eb^tiādinā sabbalokassa pākaṭānipi vipallāsaṃ muñcitvā yathāsabhāvato pariggaṇhane mahantena vāyāmena vinā na pariggaṇhantīti duviññeyyasabhāvattā ``mahantānī''ti vuccanti. tāni hi suviññeyyāni. ``amahantānī''ti mantvā ṭhitā tesaṃ duppariggahataṃ disvā ^a^M1.0452^ea^ ``aho mahantāni etānī''ti jānātīti mahābhūtekadesatādīhi vā kāraṇehi ^b^mahābhūtāni^eb^. etā hi dhātuyo mahābhūtekadesato, mahābhūtasāmaññato, mahābhūtasannissayato, mahābhūtabhāvato, mahābhūtapariyosānato cāti imehipi kāraṇehi ^b^``mahābhūtānī''^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] tattha ^b^mahābhūtekadesato^eb^ti ``bhūtamidanti, bhikkhave, samanupassathā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.401) hi avisesena khandhapañcakaṃ ``bhūta''nti vuccati. tattha yadidaṃ kāmabhave, rūpabhave, pañcavokārabhave, ekacce ca saññībhave pavattaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ, taṃ mahāvisayatāya ``mahābhūta''nti ^a^V1.0423^ea^ vattabbataṃ arahati. pathavīādayo pana catasso dhātuyo tassa mahābhūtassa ekadesabhūtā ``mahābhūtā''ti vuccanti. samudāyesu hi pavattavohārā avayavesupi dissanti yathā ``samuddo diṭṭho, paṭo daḍḍho''ti ca. ^b^mahābhūtasamaññato^eb^ti tadadhīnavuttitāya bhavanti ettha upādārūpānīti bhūtāni, pathavīādayo catasso dhātuyo. sā panāyametāsu bhūtasamaññā anaññatthavuttitāya upādārūpānaṃ aviparītaṭṭhā, lokassa cetā bahūpakārā, cakkhusamuddādīnaṃ nissayabhūtā cāti mahantāni bhūtānīti samaññāyiṃsu. ^b^mahābhūtasannissayato^eb^ti mahantānaṃ mahānubhāvānaṃ mahāsammatamandhātuppabhutīnaṃ raññaṃ, sakkādīnaṃ devānaṃ, vepacittiādīnaṃ asurānaṃ, mahābrahmādīnaṃ brahmānaṃ, guṇato vā mahantānaṃ buddhānaṃ, paccekabuddhānaṃ, sāvakānaṃ upādāyupādāya vā sabbesampi bhūtānaṃ sattānaṃ nissayabhūtatāya mahantā bhūtā etesūti mahābhūtā. cātumahābhūtiko hi nesaṃ kāyoti. ^b^mahābhūtabhāvato^eb^ti bahubhūtabhāvato. ayaṃ hi ^b^mahā^eb^-saddo ``mahājano sannipatito''tiādīsu bahubhāve dissati. pathavīādayo ca dhātuyo ekasmimpi attabhāve aparimeyyappabhedā pavattanti. tasmā mahantā bahū anekasatasahassappabhedā bhūtāti mahābhūtā. ^b^mahābhūtapariyosānato^eb^ti mahābhūtassa vasena pariyosānappattito.
[21] ``kālo ghasati bhūtāni, sabbāneva sahattanā.
[22] yo ca kālaghaso bhūto, sa bhūtapacaniṃ pacī''ti.. (jā0 1.2.190) --

[25] hi ^a^M1.0453^ea^ evamādīsu khīṇāsavo ``bhūto''ti vutto. so hi ucchinnabhavanettikatāya āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikattā ekantato ``bhūto''ti vuccati, na itare, bhavissantīti vohāraṃ anatītattā. bhūto eva idha pūjāvasena ``mahābhūto''ti vutto yathā ``mahākhīṇāsavo, mahāmoggallāno''ti ca. imāsañca dhātūnaṃ anādimati saṃsāre pabandhavasena pavattamānānaṃ yathāvuttassa mahābhūtasseva santāne pariyosānappatti, nāññatra. tasmā mahābhūte bhūtā pariyosānaṃ pattāti mahābhūtā purimapade bhūta-saddassa lopaṃ katvā. evametā dhātuyo mahābhūtekadesatādīhi mahābhūtāti veditabbā. pathavīādīnaṃ kakkhaḷapaggharaṇādivisesalakkhaṇasamaṅgitā apariccattadhātulakkhaṇānaṃyevāti āha ^b^``dhātulakkhaṇaṃ anatītattā''^eb^ti. na hi sāmaññapariccāgena viseso, visesanirapekkhaṃ vā sāmaññaṃ pavattati. tathā hi vadanti --
[21] ``tamatthāpekkhato ^a^V1.0424^ea^ bhedaṃ, sasāmaññaṃ jahāti no.
[22] gaṇhāti saṃsayuppādā, samevekatthakaṃ dvaya''nti..

[03] ^b^salakkhaṇadhāraṇena cā^eb^ti yena salakkhaṇadhāraṇena ``dhātuyo''ti vuccanti, teneva ^b^``dhammā''^eb^tipi vuccanti ubhayathāpi nissattanijjīvatāya eva vibhāvanato. tenevāha -- ``chadhāturoyaṃ bhikkhu puriso, dhammesu dhammānupassī viharatī''ti ca. arūpānaṃ khaṇato rūpānaṃ khaṇassa nātīttaratāyāha ^b^``attano khaṇānurūpa''^eb^nti. ^b^dharaṇenā^eb^ti ṭhānena, pavattanenāti attho. ^b^khayaṭṭhenā^eb^ti khaṇabhaṅgutāya. ^b^bhayaṭṭhenā^eb^ti udayavayapaṭipīḷanādinā sappaṭibhayatāya. ^b^asārakaṭṭhenā^eb^ti attasāravirahena.

[03] 353^b^.^eb^ ^b^sahuppannāva etā^eb^ti etā catasso dhātuyo saha uppannāva saha pavattamānāva samānakāle labbhamānāpi avakaṃsato ^b^sabbapariyantime^eb^ utucittāhārasamuṭṭhānesu suddhaṭṭhake, kammajesu jīvitanavaketi ekekasmiṃ ^b^suddhaṭṭhakādikalāpepi padesena avinibbhuttā^eb^ visuṃ visuṃ aniddisitabbaṭṭhānatāya. yattha hi tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ patiṭṭhāvasena ^a^M1.0454^ea^ pathavī, tattheva tassā ābandhanaparipācanasamudīraṇavasena itarā. esa nayo sesāsupi.

[03] 354^b^.^eb^ ^b^purimā dve garukattā sabhāgā^eb^ aññamaññanti adhippāyo. ettha ca nanu pathaviyāpi lahubhāvo atthi. tathā hi sā ``kakkhaḷaṃ mudukaṃ saṇhaṃ pharusaṃ garukaṃ lahuka''nti niddiṭṭhā, āpepi lahubhāvo labbhatevāti? na, nippariyāyagarubhāvassa adhippetattā. garubhāvo eva hi pathavīdhātuyā garutaraṃ upādāya lahubhāvoti pariyāyena vutto sītabhāvo viya tejodhātuyā. yadi evaṃ rūpassa lahutāti kathaṃ? ayampi vuttanayā eva lahutākāraṃ upādāya labbhanato. na hi paricchedavikāralakkhaṇāni paramatthato labbhanti nipphannarūpānaṃ avatthāvisesasabhāvato. tasmā paramatthasiddhaṃ garubhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``purimā dve garukattā sabhāgā''ti. ^b^``tathā''^eb^ti padena ``sabhāgā''ti imamatthaṃ upasaṃharati. ^b^``dve''^eb^ti pana idaṃ yathā ``purimā''ti ettha, evaṃ ``pacchimā''ti etthāpi ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^visabhāgā^eb^ garukalahukabhāvatoti adhippāyo. yathā ca garukalahukabhāvehi, evaṃ peyyabhāvāpeyyabhāvehi ca sabhāgavisabhāgatā yojetabbā.

[03] 355^b^.^eb^ ^b^ajjhattikā^eb^ ^a^V1.0425^ea^ heṭṭhā vuttājjhattikā, sattasantānapariyāpannāti attho. ^b^viññāṇavatthu viññattīndriyāna^eb^nti cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ viññāṇavatthūnaṃ, dvinnaṃ viññattīnaṃ, itthipurisindriyajīvitindriyānañca. ye pana ``viññāṇavatthūti hadayavatthu gahita''nti vadanti, tesaṃ indriya-ggahaṇena aṭṭhannampi rūpindriyānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^``vuttaviparītappakārā''^eb^ti idaṃ bāhirānaṃ dhātūnaṃ yathā sabbaso viññāṇavatthuviññattīndriyānaṃ anissayatā ca iriyāpathaviraho ca vuttavipariyāyo, evaṃ catusamuṭṭhānatāpīti katvā vuttaṃ, na lakkhaṇarūpassa viya kutocipi samuṭṭhānassa abhāvato utusamuṭṭhānatāya tāsaṃ. lahutādinissayatāpi ajjhattikānaṃ dhātūnaṃ vattabbā, na vā vattabbā. viññatti-ggahaṇaṃ hi lakkhaṇanti.
[03] 356^b^.^eb^ ^b^itarāhī^eb^ti āpotejovāyudhātūhi. ^b^ekasaṅgahā^eb^ti sajātisaṅgahena ekasaṅgahā. samānajātiyānaṃ hi saṅgaho sahajātisaṅgaho. tenāha ^b^``samuṭṭhānanānattābhāvato''^eb^ti.

[03] 357^b^.^eb^ ^b^tiṇṇaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0455^ea^ ^b^mahābhūtānaṃ patiṭṭhā hutvā paccayo hotī^eb^ti yehi mahābhūtehi sampiṇḍanavasena saṅgahitā, paripācanavasena anupālitā, samudīraṇavasena vitthambhitā ca, tesaṃ attanā sahajātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ patiṭṭhā hutvā tato eva sandhāraṇavasena avassayo hoti, vuttanayena vā patiṭṭhā hutvā sahajātādivasena paccayo hotīti. esa nayo sesāsupi.

[03] 358^b^.^eb^ yadipi aññamaññāabhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammāti heṭṭhā dhātūnaṃ asamannāhāratā dassitā eva, athāpi imināva nayena visuṃ kammaṭṭhānapariggaho kātabboti dassento ^b^``pathavīdhātu cetthā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^pathavīdhātu cetthā^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, tena ayampi eko manasikārappakāroti dīpeti. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etāsu dhātūsu. ahaṃ ``pathavīdhātū''ti vā ``paccayo homī''ti vā na jānātīti attani viya attano kicce ca ābhogābhāvaṃ dassetvā upakārakassa viya upakattabbānampi ābhogābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``itarānipī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbāsu dhātūsu, tatthāpi attakiccupakattabbabhedesu sabbesu.

[03] 359^b^.^eb^ ^b^paccayavibhāgato^eb^ti paccayadhammavibhāgato ceva paccayabhāvavibhāgato ca. ``paccayato''ti hi iminā pathavīādīnaṃ aññāsādhāraṇo patiṭṭhābhāvādinā sesabhūtattayassa paccayabhāvo vutto. idha pana yehi dhammehi pathavīādīnaṃ uppatti, tesaṃ pathavīādīnañca anavasesato ^a^V1.0426^ea^ paccayabhāvavibhāgo vuccatīti ayaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ ākārānaṃ viseso. ^b^kamma^eb^nti kusalākusalaṃ rūpuppādakaṃ kammaṃ. ^b^citta^eb^nti yaṃ kiñci rūpuppādakaṃ cittaṃ. ^b^āhāro^eb^ti ajjhattiko rūpuppādako āhāro. ^b^utū^eb^ti yo koci utu, atthato tejodhātu. ^b^kammamevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ samuṭṭhānasaṅkarābhāvadassanatthaṃ, tena akammajānampi kesañci kammassa pariyāyapaccayabhāvo dīpito hoti. tathā hi vakkhati ``kammapaccayacittasamuṭṭhāna''ntiādi. nanu ca kammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ kammato aññenapi paccayena bhavitabbanti? bhavitabbaṃ, so pana kammagatikovāti paṭiyogīnivattanatthaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ kataṃ, tenāha ^b^``na cittādayo''^eb^ti. ^b^cittādisamuṭṭhānāna^eb^nti etthāpi ayamattho yathārahaṃ vattabbo. ^b^itare^eb^ti cittādito ^a^M1.0456^ea^ aññe. ^b^janakapaccayo^eb^ti samuṭṭhāpakataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, paccayo pana kammapaccayova. vuttaṃ hi ``kusalākusalā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo''ti (paṭṭhā0 1.1.427).

[03] ^b^sesāna^eb^nti cittādisamuṭṭhānānaṃ. ^b^pariyāyato upanissayapaccayo hotī^eb^ti ^b^paṭṭhāne^eb^ (paṭṭhā0 1.1.9) arūpānaṃyeva upanissayapaccayassa āgatattā nippariyāyena rūpadhammānaṃ upanissayapaccayo natthi. sutte pana ``puggalaṃ upanissāya vanasaṇḍaṃ upanissāyā''ti vacanato suttantikapariyāyena vinā abhāvo upanissayapaccayoti veditabbo. ^b^cittaṃ janakapaccayo hotī^eb^ti sahajātanissayāhārādivasena paccayo hontaṃ cittaṃ samuṭṭhāpakataṃ upādāya ``janakapaccayo hotī''ti vuttaṃ. āhārautūsupi eseva nayo.

[03] evaṃ kammādīnaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ vasena dhātūsu paccayavibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ dhātūnampi vasena paccayavibhāgaṃ dassento paṭhamaṃ tāva ^b^``kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ mahābhūta''^eb^ntiādinā uddisitvā puna ^b^``tattha kammasamuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātū''^eb^tiādinā niddisati. ^b^tattha kammasamuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātū^eb^ti ``kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ mahābhūta''nti ettha sāmaññato vuttā kammajapathavīdhātu. ^b^kammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ itarāsa^eb^nti kammajānaṃ āpodhātuādīnaṃ tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ sahuppattiyā attano upakārakānaṃ tāsaṃ upakārakato, ādhārabhāvato, uppādato yāva bhaṅgādharaṇato, vigamābhāvato ca sahajātāññamaññanissayātthiavigatavasena ceva patiṭṭhāvasena ca paccayo hoti, hontī ca kammaṃ viya attano, tāsañca na janakavasena paccayo hoti asamuṭṭhāpakattā tāsaṃ. kāmañcettha nissayapaccaya-ggahaṇeneva patiṭṭhābhāvo saṅgahito, pathavīdhātuyā pana anaññasādhāraṇakiccaṃ sahajātānaṃ patiṭṭhābhāvoti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ ^a^V1.0427^ea^ ^b^``patiṭṭhāvasena cā''^eb^ti visuṃ katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^ābandhanavasena cā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^tisantatimahābhūtāna^eb^nti utucittāhārasamuṭṭhānānaṃ catumahābhūtānaṃ aññamaññaṃ avokiṇṇānaṃ, avicchedena pavattiṃ upādāya santatīti santatiggahaṇaṃ. pathavīdhātuyā patiṭṭhābhāvo nāma sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃyevāti āha ^b^``na patiṭṭhāvasenā''^eb^ti. ^b^na ābandhanavasenā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^etthā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0457^ea^ etesu kammasamuṭṭhānamahābhūtesu. ``cittasamuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātu cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ itarāsa''ntiādīsu sukaro tantinayo netunti ^b^``cittāahāra...pe0... eseva nayo''^eb^ti atidisati.

[03] ^b^sahajātādipaccayavasappavattāsu ca panā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^-saddo samuccayattho, ^b^pana^eb^-saddo visesattho, tadubhayena ca yathāvuttasahajātādipaccayehi pavattamānā dhātuyo iminā visesena pavattantīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.

[03] idāni taṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``ekaṃ paṭiccā''^eb^tigāthamāha. tattha ekaṃ dhātuṃ paṭicca tisso dhātuyo catudhā sampavattanti, tisso dhātuyo paṭicca ekāva dhātu catudhā sampavattati, dve dhātuyo paṭicca dve dhātuyo chadhā sampavattantīti yojanā. attho pana pathavīādīsu ekekissā paccayabhāve itarāsaṃ tissannaṃ tissannaṃ paccayuppannatāti ayameko catukko, tissannaṃ tissannaṃ paccayabhāve itarāya ekekissā paccayuppannatāti ayamaparo catukko, paṭhamadutiyā, tatiyacatutthā, paṭhamatatiyā, dutiyacatutthā, paṭhamacatutthā, dutiyatatiyāti imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ paccayabhāve tattha tattha itarāsaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ paccayuppannatāti ayameko chakko. evaṃ paccayabhāvena catudhā, chadhā ca pavattamānānaṃ ekakadvikatikavasena tikadukaekakavasena ca yathākkamaṃ paccayapaccayuppannatāvibhāgo veditabbo. ayañca paccayabhāvo sahajātāññamaññanissayātthiavigatapaccayavasena, tatthāpi ca aññamaññamukheneva veditabbo. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^paṭiccavāre^eb^ ``ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā, tayo mahābhūte paṭicca ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ, dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā uppajjantī''ti (paṭṭhā0 1.1.53).

[03] ^b^abhikkamapaṭikkamādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ādānavissajjanādikāyikakiriyākaraṇassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^uppīḷanassa paccayo hoti^eb^ ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuvasena sijjhanato. ^b^sāvā^eb^ti pathavīdhātuyeva. ^b^āpodhātuyā anugatā^eb^ āpodhātuyā tattha appadhānabhāvaṃ, pathavīdhātuyā ca ^a^V1.0428^ea^ padhānabhāvanti patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi sātisayakiccattā tassā patiṭṭhāpanassa pādaṭṭhapanassa paccayo hotīti ^a^M1.0458^ea^ sambandho. ^b^avakkhepanassā^eb^ti adhonikkhipanassa. tattha ca garutarasabhāvāya āpodhātuyā sātisayo byāpāroti āha ^b^``pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātū''^eb^ti. tathā uddhaṅgatikā tejodhātūti uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo vutto. tiriyaṃ gatikāya vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāroti tejodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo gahito. tattha ṭhitaṭṭhānato abhimukhaṃ pādassa haraṇaṃ ^b^atiharaṇaṃ,^eb^ purato haraṇaṃ. tato thokaṃ vītikkamma haraṇaṃ ^b^vītiharaṇaṃ,^eb^ passato haraṇaṃ.

[03] ^b^ekekena mukhenā^eb^ti ``patthaṭattā pathavī''tiādinā (visuddhi0 1.347) vibhattesu terasasu ākāresu ekekena dhātūnaṃ pariggaṇhanamukhena. ^b^svāya^eb^nti so ayaṃ upacārasamādhi. kathaṃ panassa vavatthānapariyāyoti āha ^b^``catunnaṃ dhātūna''^eb^ntiādi.

[03] 360^b^.^eb^ idāni imissā bhāvanāya ānisaṃse dassetuṃ ^b^``idañca panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^suññataṃ avagāhatī^eb^ti dhātumattatādassanena rūpakāyassa anattakataṃ vavatthāpayato tadanusārena nāmakāyassāpi anattakatā supākaṭā hotīti sabbaso attasuññataṃ pariyogāhati tattha patiṭṭhahati. ^b^sattasaññaṃ samugghātetī^eb^ti tato eva ``satto poso itthī puriso''ti evaṃ pavattaṃ ayāthāvasaññaṃ ugghāteti samūhanati. ^b^vāḷamigayakkharakkhasādivikappaṃ anāvajjamāno^eb^ti sasantāne viya parasantānepi dhātumattatāya sudiṭṭhattā khīṇāsavo viya ``ime sīhabyagghādayo vāḷamigā, ime yakkharakkhasā''ti evamādivikappaṃ akaronto bhayabheravaṃ sahati abhibhavati. yathāvuttavikappanāpajjanaṃ hi bhayabheravasahanassa kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^ugghāto^eb^ uppilāvitattaṃ. ^b^nigghāto^eb^ dīnabhāvappatti. ^b^mahāpañño^eb^ ca pana hoti dhātuvasena kāye sammadeva ghanavinibbhogassa karaṇato. tathā hidaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ buddhicaritassa anukūlanti vuttaṃ, ^b^sugatiparāyaṇo vā^eb^ indriyānaṃ aparipakkatāyanti adhippāyo.
[06] ekūnavīsatibhāvanānayapaṭimaṇḍitassa
[06] catudhātuvavatthānaniddesassa līnatthavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 361^b^.^eb^ ``ko ^a^M1.0459^ea^ ^a^V1.0429^ea^ samādhī''tiādinā sarūpādipucchā yāvadeva vibhāgāvabodhanatthā. sarūpādito hi ñātassa pabhedo vuccamāno suviññeyyo hoti saṅkhepapubbakattā vitthārassa, vitthāravidhinā ca saṅkhepavidhi saṅgayhatīti ^b^``samādhissa vitthāraṃ bhāvanānayañca dassetu''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. atha vā ^b^``ko samādhī''^eb^tiādināpi samādhisseva pakārabhedo dassīyati, bhāvanānisaṃsopi bhāvanānayanissito evāti adhippāyena ``vitthāraṃ bhāvanānayañca dassetu''nti vuttaṃ. ^b^sabbappakārato^eb^ti palibodhupacchedādikassa sabbassa bhāvanāya pubbakiccassa karaṇappakārato ceva sabbakammaṭṭhānabhāvanāvibhāvanato ca.

[01] ^b^``samattā hotī''^eb^ti vatvā tameva samattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``duvidhoyevā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^idha adhippeto samādhī^eb^ti lokiyasamādhiṃ āha. ^b^dasasu kammaṭṭhānesū^eb^ti yāni heṭṭhā ``upacārāvahānī''ti vuttāni dasa kammaṭṭhānāni, tesu. ^b^appanāpubbabhāgacittesū^eb^ti appanāya pubbabhāgacittesu aṭṭhannaṃ jhānānaṃ pubbabhāgacittuppādesu. ^b^ekaggatā^eb^ti ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ, nānāvajjanavīthiyañca ekaggatā. ^b^avasesakammaṭṭhānesū^eb^ti ``appanāvahānī''ti vuttesu tiṃsakammaṭṭhānesu.

[03] 362^b^.^eb^ diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto attabhāvo, tattha sukhavihāro ^b^diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro^eb^. kāmaṃ ^b^``samāpajjitvā''^eb^ti etena appanāsamādhiyeva vibhāvito, ^b^``ekaggacittā''^eb^ti pana padena upacārasamādhinopi gahaṇaṃ hotīti tato nivattanatthaṃ ^b^``appanāsamādhibhāvanā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^na kho panete^eb^ti ete bāhirakabhāvitā jhānadhammā cittekaggatāmattakarā. ^b^ariyassa vinaye^eb^ buddhassa bhagavato sāsane ^b^``sallekhā''ti na vuccanti^eb^ kilesānaṃ sallekhanapaṭipadā na hotīti katvā, sāsane pana avihiṃsādayopi sallekhāva lokuttarapādakattā.

[03] ^b^sambādhe^eb^ti taṇhāsaṃkilesādinā saṃkiliṭṭhatāya paramasambādhe ativiya saṅkaṭaṭṭhānabhūte saṃsārappavatte. ^b^okāsādhigamanayenā^eb^ti atthapaṭilābhayoggassa navamakhaṇasaṅkhātassa okāsassa adhigamanayena. tassa ^a^M1.0460^ea^ hi dullabhatāya appanādhigamampi anadhigamayamāno saṃvegabahulo puggalo upacārasamādhimhiyeva ^a^V1.0430^ea^ ṭhatvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karoti ``sīghaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ samatikkamissāmī''ti.

[03] ^b^abhiññāpādaka^eb^nti iddhividhādiabhiññāñāṇapādakabhūtaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. ^b^hotīti vuttanayā^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo pakārattho, tena ``iminā pakārena vuttanayā''ti sesābhiññānampi vuttappakāraṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^sati sati āyatane^eb^ti purimabhavasiddhe abhiññādhigamassa kāraṇe vijjamāne. abhiññādhigamassa hi adhikāro icchitabbo, yo ``pubbahetū''ti vuccati. na samāpattīsu vasībhāvo. tenāha bhagavā ``sati sati āyatane''ti (ma0 ni0 3.158; a0 ni0 3.102). ^b^abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassā^eb^ti vakkhamānavibhāgāya abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya sacchikātabbassa. ^b^dhammassā^eb^ti bhāvetabbassa ceva vibhāvetabbassa ca dhammassa. abhiññāsacchikiriyāya cittaṃ abhininnāmetīti yojanā. ^b^tatra tatrevā^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃyeva sacchikātabbadhamme. sakkhibhāvāya paccakkhakāritāya bhabbo sakkhibhabbo, tassa bhāvo sakkhibhabbatā, taṃ ^b^sakkhibhabbataṃ^eb^.

[03] taṃ taṃ bhavagamikammaṃ ārabbha bhavapatthanāya anuppannāyapi kammassa katūpacitabhāveneva bhavapatthanākiccaṃ sijjhatīti dassento āha ^b^``apatthayamānā vā''^eb^ti. saha byeti pavattatīti sahabyo, sahāyo, idha pana ekabhavūpago adhippeto, tassa bhāvo sahabyatā, taṃ ^b^sahabyataṃ^eb^.
[03] kiṃ pana appanāsamādhibhāvanāyeva bhavavisesānisaṃsā, udāhu itarāpīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha ^b^``upacārasamādhibhāvanāpī''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ^b^nibbāna^eb^nti tissannaṃ dukkhatānaṃ nibbutiṃ. rūpadhamme pariyāpannā vijjamānāpi saṅkhāradukkhatā cittassa abhāvena asantasamāva. tenāha ^b^``sukhaṃ viharissāmā''^eb^ti. ^b^soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhī^eb^ti aniccānupassanādukkhānattanibbidāvirāganirodhapaṭinissaggavivaṭṭānupassanāti imāhi aṭṭhahi, aṭṭhahi ca ariyamaggaphalañāṇehīti evaṃ soḷasahi. ^b^navahi samādhicariyāhī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0461^ea^ pañcannaṃ rūpajjhānānaṃ, catunnaṃ arūpajjhānānañca vasena evaṃ navahi. keci pana ``cattāro rūpajjhānasamādhī, cattāro arūpajjhānasamādhī, ubhayesaṃ upacārasamādhiṃ ekaṃ katvā evaṃ navā''ti vadanti.
[03] ^b^samādhibhāvanāyoge^eb^ti ^a^V1.0431^ea^ samādhibhāvanāya anuyoge anuyuñjane, samādhibhāvanāsaṅkhāte vā yoge. ^b^yogo^eb^ti bhāvanā vuccati. yathāha ``yogā ve jāyatī bhūrī''ti (dha0 pa0 282).
[03] 363^b^.^eb^ ^b^samādhipī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena sīlaṃ sampiṇḍeti.
